S04bsu016_u:2_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahāvyūhe kūṭāgāre sārdhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:2_2_0: sattvottarajñāninā ca / asaṅgottarajñāninā ca / kusumottarajñāninā ca / sūryottarajñāninā ca / candrottarajñāninā ca / vimalottarajñāninā

S04bsu016_u:2_3_1: ca / vimaladhvajena ca / sūryadhvajena ca / ruciradhvajena ca / virajadhvajena ca / vairocanadhvajrena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /

S04bsu016_u:2_6_1: ca / avalokitanetreṇa ca / utpalanetreṇa ca / vajranetreṇa ca / ratnanetreṇa ca / gagananetreṇa ca / samantanetreṇa ca bodhisattvena
S04bsu016_u:2_8: bodhimaṇḍamukuṭena ca / digvairocanamukuṭena ca / sarvabuddhasaṃbhūtagarbhamaṇimukuṭena ca /

S04bsu016_u:2_20_1: dharmaprabheṇa ca / śāntiprabheṇa ca / sūryaprabheṇa ca / vikurvitaprabheṇa ca / devaprabheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu016_u:2_21_0: / puṇyaketunā ca / jñānaketunā ca / dharmaketunā ca / abhijñāketunā [Gv_3] ca / prabhāketunā / kusumaketunā ca / bodhiketunā
S04bsu016_u:2_21_1: ca / brahmaketunā ca / samantāvabhāsaketunā ca / maṇiketunā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu016_u:2_22: / brahmaghoṣeṇa ca / sāgaraghoṣeṇa ca / dharaṇīnirnādaghoṣeṇa ca / lokendraghoṣeṇa ca / śailendrarājasaṃghaṭṭanaghoṣeṇa ca /
S04bsu016_u:2_28_0: ca / puṇyasumerūdgatena ca / guṇaprabhāvodgatena ca / yaśodgatena ca / samantāvabhāsodgatena ca / mahāmaitryudgatena ca /
S04bsu016_u:2_28_1: jñānasaṃbhārodgatena ca / tathāgatakulagotrodgatena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /

S04bsu016_u:2_29_1: ca / ratnaśriyā ca / ketuśriyā ca / jñānaśriyā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu016_u:2_30_0: / śailendrarājena ca / dharmendrarājena ca / jagadindrarājena ca / brahmendrarājena ca / gaṇendrarājena ca / devendrarājena
S04bsu016_u:2_30_1: ca / śāntendrarājena ca / acalendrarājena ca / ṛṣabhendrarājena ca / pravarendrarājena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu016_u:2_31_0: / praśāntasvareṇa ca / asaṅgasvareṇa ca / dharaṇīnirghoṣasvareṇa ca / sāgaranigarjitasvareṇa ca / meghanirghoṣasvareṇa ca /
S04bsu016_u:2_31_1: dharmāvabhāsasvareṇa ca / gagananirghoṣasvareṇa ca / sarvasattvakuśalamūlanigarjitasvareṇa ca /
S04bsu016_u:2_34_0: / ratnabuddhinā ca / jñānabuddhinā ca / gaganabuddhinā ca / asaṅgabuddhinā ca / vimalabuddhinā ca / viśuddhabuddhinā ca /
S04bsu016_u:2_34_1: tryadhvāvabhāsabuddhinā ca / viśālabuddhinā ca / samantāvalokabuddhinā ca / dharmadhātunayāvabhāsabuddhinā ca bodhisattvena
S04bsu016_u:3_0_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saparivārāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakamaharddhikānāṃ teṣāṃ ca lokendrāṇāṃ saparivārāṇāmetadabhavatna
S04bsu016_u:3_0_1: śakyaṃ sadevakenāpi lokena tathāgataviṣayaṃ tathāgatajñānagocaraṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ tathāgatavaiśāradyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:3_0_2: tathāgatasamādhiṃ tathāgatavihāraṃ tathāgatādhipatyaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ tathāgatajñānamavagantuṃ vā avagāhituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ
S04bsu016_u:3_0_3: vā prajñātuṃ vā vijñātuṃ vā vicārayituṃ vā vibhāvayituṃ vā vibhājituṃ vā prabhāvayituṃ vā parasattvasaṃtāneṣu vā pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
S04bsu016_u:3_1_0: anyatra tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatavikurvitena tathāgatānubhāvena tathāgatapūrvaprāṇidhānena pūrvabuddhasukṛtakuśalamūlatayā
S04bsu016_u:3_2_0: apyeva nāma bhagavānasmākaṃ yathāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāmāśaya vimātratayā adhimuktinānātvatayā pratibodhanānātvatayā
S04bsu016_u:4_0_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya mahākaruṇāśarīraṃ mahākaruṇāmukhaṃ mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamaṃ
S04bsu016_u:4_0_1: mahākaruṇādharmagaganayānugamaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma [Gv_5] samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma jagadvirocanavyūham /
S04bsu016_u:4_1: samanantarasamāpannasya ca bhagavato mahāvyūhaḥ kūṭāgāro 'nantamadhyavipulaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:4_6: teṣu ca aparimāṇagandhodakanadyo 'nantāvartagandhodakaparipūrṇāḥ sarvaratnapuṣpaughakaluṣāḥ pradakṣiṇavāhinyaḥ sarvabuddhanirghoṣanigarjitavyūhāḥ samavatiṣṭhante sma /
S04bsu016_u:4_9_0: aparimāṇāśca ratnadhvajāḥ, evam vastradhvajāḥ patākādhvajā ratnapaṭṭadhvajāḥ puṣpadhvajā ābharaṇadhvajā mālyadhvajāḥ sarvaratnakiṅkiṇījāladhvajā
S04bsu016_u:4_20: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tadacintyaṃ tathāgatakuśalamūlam,
S04bsu016_u:4_29: yathā ca jetavanamevaṃrūpayā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyā pariśuddhaṃ saṃsthitam,
S04bsu016_u:4_30_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparamākāśadhātuparyavasānāḥ sarvalokadhātavaḥ pariśuddhāḥ saṃsthitā alaṃkṛtāḥ pratimaṇḍitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:5_1_0: atha tāvadeva pūrvasyāṃ diśi anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa kanakameghapradīpadhvajāyā
S04bsu016_u:5_12_0: yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamupaniśritya samantavyūhamaṇiratnajālasaṃchannāni
S04bsu016_u:5_12_1: kūṭāgārāṇi dikprabhāsamaṇirājapadmagarbhāṇi ca siṃhāsanānyabhinirmāya nyaṣidatparyaṅkamābhujya cintārājamaṇiratnajālālaṃkārasaṃchannāni
S04bsu016_u:6_0_0: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa vajrasāgaragarbhāyā lokadhātoḥ samantāvabhāsaśrīgarbharājasya
S04bsu016_u:6_0_1: tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād duryodhanavīryavegarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhamanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbodhisattvaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:6_0_2: tena ca bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ [Gv_7] sarvagandhadāmajālāvanaddhān
S04bsu016_u:6_9_1: bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya dakṣiṇāṃ diśamupaniśritya jagadvirocanamaṇikūṭāgārāṇi samantadigvirocanamaṇiratnapadmagarbhāṇi ca
S04bsu016_u:7_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrānto 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairnānāvarṇagandhadhvajasumerumeghaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:7_11_1: bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya paścimāṃ diśamupaniśritya [Gv_8] sarvagandharājaśarīramuktājālasaṃchāditān
S04bsu016_u:7_11_2: kūṭāgārān devendrapratibhāsadhvajamaṇiratnapadmagarbhāṇi ca siṃhāsanānyabhinirmāya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkamābhujya suvarṇamaṇirājasaṃchāditāni
S04bsu016_u:8_0_0: uttarāyāṃ diśi anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa ratnavastrāvabhāsadhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau
S04bsu016_u:8_0_1: dharmadhātugaganaśrīvairocanasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādasaṅgaśrīrājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhamanabhilāpyalokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbodhisattvaistena
S04bsu016_u:8_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8_11_0: sāgaravyūhamaṇirājavastrameghasaṃchannaṃ gaganatalamadhitiṣṭhan yen bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:8_11_1: namaskṛtya uttarāṃ diśamupaniśritya sāgarasaṃbhavamaṇirājakūṭāgāravaiḍūryapadmagarbhasiṃhāsanāni ca abhinirmāya nyaṣīdat
S04bsu016_u:9_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9_10_0: padmakūṭāgārameghasaṃchannān sarvalokadhātuprasarānadhitiṣṭhan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9_10_2: ca abhinirmāya nyasīdat paryaṅkamābhujya kusumarājajālasaṃchāditāni vicitrakośajālamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhāni bodhisattvaśarīrāṇyadhiṣṭhāya /
S04bsu016_u:10_0_0: pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa gandhameghavyūhadhvajāyā lokadhātornāgeśvararājasya
S04bsu016_u:10_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalanayasamudrāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10_10_0: candrajyotiścakramaṇḍalavarṇameghaiḥ sarvagaganatalaṃ saṃchādayan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10_10_1: namaskṛtya purvadakṣiṇāṃ diśamupaniśritya virajovairocanamaṇiśrīkusumakūṭāgāran siṃhavajramaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanāni ca abhinirmāya
S04bsu016_u:11_9_1: sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ diśamupaniśritya samantadigabhimukharaśmijālabindusaddharmadhātuprabhāsamahāmaṇiratnakūṭāgārān
S04bsu016_u:12_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:12_11_0: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvamākāśadhātuṃ spharan yen bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya paścimottarāṃ
S04bsu016_u:13_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamudrādabhyudgamya yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:14_0_0: urdhvāyāṃ diśi anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa akṣayabuddhavaṃśanirdeśāyā lokadhātoḥ
S04bsu016_u:14_0_2: bhagavatā anujñātaḥ tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāduccalitvā yena sahālokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:14_1_0: sarvalakṣaṇānuvyañjanebhyaḥ sarvaromamukhebhyaḥ sarvakāyāt sarvāṅgapratyaṅgebhyaḥ sarvavacanapathebhyaḥ sarvacīvaraparivārebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:14_1_1: sarvabodhisattvaparivārasya ātmano bhagavataśca vairocanasya pūrvāntakoṭīgatānāṃ ca atītānāgatānāṃ sarvatathāgatānāmaparāntakoṭīgatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:14_1_2: ca anāgatānāṃ vyākṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pratyutpannānāṃ ca daśasu dikṣu sarvakṣetraprasarapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarvadānapāramitāpratisaṃyuktān
S04bsu016_u:14_3: sarvakṣāntipāramitāsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca aṅgapratyaṅgacchedena nidarśanasaṃprayuktānapi pūrvayogasamudrān pratibhāsaprāptān saṃdarśayan,
S04bsu016_u:14_10_1: [Gv_12] pratibhāsaprāptān saṃdarśayan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya ūrdhvāṃ diśamupaniśritya
S04bsu016_u:15_0_0: sarve ca te bodhisattvāḥ saparivārāḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaniryātāḥ sarvatathāgatapādamūlamukhoddarśanāya
S04bsu016_u:15_1: evaṃrūpāpramāṇasamanvāgatairbodhisattvaiḥ sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ paripūrṇamabhūt yadut tathāgatānāmadhiṣṭhānena /
S04bsu016_u:15_2: na ca te mahāśrāvakāḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanamahākāśyaparevatasubhūtyaniruddhanandikakapphiṇakātyāyanapūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputrapramukhā jetavane tathāgatavikurvitamadrākṣuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:15_3_0: na ca tān buddhavyūhān buddhavṛṣabhitāṃ buddhavikrīḍitaṃ buddhaprātihāryaṃ buddhādhipateyatāṃ buddhacaritavikurvitaṃ buddhaprabhāvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:15_4_0: nāpi tamacintyaṃ bodhisattvaviṣayaṃ bodhisattvasamāgamaṃ bodhisattvasamavasaraṇaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ bodhisattvopasaṃkramaṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:15_4_2: bodhisattvabhavanaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ bodhisattvasamādhivikrīḍitaṃ bodhisattvavyavalokita bodhisattvavijṛmbhitaṃ bodhisattvavikramaṃ
S04bsu016_u:15_7: na ca teṣāṃ pūrvaṃ daśadiglokadhātuparyāpannāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapariśuddhayaḥ saṃvarṇitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:15_9: na ca taiḥ pūrvaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiranuttarāyāṃ saṃyaksaṃbodhau sattvāḥ pāramitāsu samādāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:15_14: na ca taiḥ pūrvaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ sarvajagadviśeṣavatījñānabhūmiradhyālambitā /
S04bsu016_u:15_20: tena te mahāśrāvakāḥ agrayugabhadrayugapramukhāstaṃ tathāgatavikurvitaṃ na paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:15_21: na śṛṇvanti, na jānanti, na budhyanti, nāvataranti, nādhimucyante nādhigacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:15_22: na samanvāharanti, na vilokayanti, na nirīkṣante, na nidhyāyanti, nopnidhyāyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? buddhajñānagocaro 'sau,
S04bsu016_u:15_23: na śrāvakagocaraḥ / tena te mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane sthitāstāni buddhavikurvitāni na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:15_27: na ca samādhiḥ saṃvidyate, yena parīttālambane vipulavikurvitādhiṣṭhānānyavatareyuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:15_28: nāṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyate, na sā ṛddhiḥ, na sā vṛṣabhitā, na tadbalam, na tadādhipateyam, na tatsthānam, na saṃjñā, na cakṣurvikramaḥ saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:15_29_0: yena tatsaṃjānīyurvā paśyeyurvā avatareyurvā adhigaccheyurvā sphareyurvā vyavalokayeyurvā anubhaveyurvā ākrameyurvā pareṣāṃ
S04bsu016_u:15_29_1: prabhāvayeyurvā deśayeyurvā sūcayeyurvā saṃvarṇayeyurvā saṃdarśayeyurvā upanāmayeyurvā upasaṃhareyurvā,
S04bsu016_u:15_34: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te śrāvakayānena niryātāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:15_39: saṃniṣaṇṇāḥ / bhagavataḥ purato vāmadakṣiṇapṛṣṭhato bhagavato 'bhimukhaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:15_41_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi śakyamasamārjitasarvajñatājñānairasamudānītasarvajñatājñānaiḥ asaṃprasthitasarvajñatājñānaiḥ apraṇihitasarvajñatājñānaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:15_44: tena te mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane sthitāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni buddhādhiṣṭhānāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:16_0_0: tadyathāpi nāma gaṅgāyā mahānadyā ubhayatastīre bahūni pretaśatasahasrāṇi samāgatāni kṣutpipāsāprapīḍitāni nagnāni nirvasanāni
S04bsu016_u:16_0_1: vidagdhagātracchavivarṇāni vātātapapariśuṣkāṇi kākasaṃghopadrutāni vṛkaśṛgālairvitrāsyamānāni tāṃ gaṅgāṃ mahānadīṃ na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:16_2: āvaraṇīyakarmāvṛtatvāt / evameva te sthavirā mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane sthitāḥ tāni tathāgatavikurvitāni na paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:17_0: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo mahatyahni vartamāne mahato janakāyasya madhye styānamiddhamavakrāmet /
S04bsu016_u:17_1: sa suptaḥ svapnāntaragatastatraiva pradeśe devanagaraṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:17_2: sudarśanacakranilayaṃ sarvaṃ ca sumerutalaṃ savṛkṣaṃ sodyānamaṇḍalamapsaraḥkoṭīniyutaśatasahasrākīrṇaṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrādhyuṣitaṃ vicitradivyapuṣpābhikīrṇam /
S04bsu016_u:17_9: sa ca sarvo janakāyo na paśyet,
S04bsu016_u:17_10: na jānīyāt, na vilokayet, tatraiva pradeśe sthitaḥ san /
S04bsu016_u:17_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? tasyaiva hi puruṣasya svapnāntaragatasya taddarśanam,
S04bsu016_u:17_12: tatraiva ca pradeśe sthitasya tasya mahājanakāyasyādarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:17_13_0: evameva te bodhisattvāste ca lokendrā bodhyabhimukhā vipulena buddhādhiṣṭhānena svakuśalamūlasusamārjitatayā ca sarvajñatāpraṇidhānasvabhinirhṛtatayā
S04bsu016_u:17_14: avataranti, anubhavanti / te ca mahāśrāvakā agrayugabhadrayugapramukhā na paśyanti na jānanti bodhisattvacakṣurvirahitatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:18_0: tadyathāpi nāma himavati parvatarāje auṣadhyākarākīrṇe mantravidyauṣadhijñānagrahaṇasiddhavidyaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvauṣadhividhīn prajānan auṣadhigrahaṇakarma kuryāt /
S04bsu016_u:18_1: tatraiva ca śailendrābhirūḍhāḥ paśugaveḍakaṛkṣamṛgalubdhakāstadanye vā punarauṣadhyavidhijñāḥ puruṣāstamauṣadhirasavīryavipākaprabhāvopāyayogaṃ na prajānanti /
S04bsu016_u:18_2: evemeva te bodhisattvāstathāgatajñānaviṣayamavatīrṇā bodhisattvavikurvitaviṣayananiryātāstaṃ tathāgatasamādhivikurvitaviṣayaṃ prajānanti,
S04bsu016_u:18_3: te ca mahāśrāvakāagrayugabhadrayugapramukhāstatraiva jetavane viharantaḥ svakāryasaṃtuṣṭāḥ parakāryanirutsukā upekṣakā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāreṇa sukhasparśaṃ viharanti,
S04bsu016_u:19_0: tadyathāpi nāma iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī sarvaratnākarasamṛddhā nidhiśatasahasranicitā nānāvidhānantaratnaparipūrṇā /
S04bsu016_u:19_1_1: tato yatheṣṭaṃ ratnānyādāaya ātmānaṃ samyak prīṇayet,
S04bsu016_u:19_2: mātāpitaraṃ samyakparicaret, putradāraṃ ca poṣayet / tadanyeṣāmapi sattvānāṃ vṛddhānāmāturāṇāṃ daridrāṇāṃ vinipatitānāmaśanavasanaviprahīṇānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu016_u:19_6_0: tatraiva ca vicaranti / na ca ratnāni gṛhṇanti / na ratnakāryāṇi kurvanti / evaṃ te bodhisattvā jetavane tatra acintye tathāgataviṣaye
S04bsu016_u:19_12: te ca mahāśrāvakāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni taṃ ca mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇasaṃnipātaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti /
S04bsu016_u:20_0: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo dūṣyavastrābaddhābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ ratnadvīpamanuprāptaḥ syāt /
S04bsu016_u:20_2: tiṣṭhet, niṣīdet, śayyāṃ vā kalpayet, na ca taṃ ratnākaraṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:20_3: na ratnavṛkṣān, na vastraratnāni, na gandharatnāni, na sarvaratnāni paśyet / nāpi tāni ratnāni parijānīyādviṣayato vā mūlyato vā paribhogato va /
S04bsu016_u:20_5: na ca ratnakāryamanubhavet / anāvṛtacakṣuṣaḥ etatsarvaṃ paśyeyurvijānīyuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:20_6_0: evameva te bodhisattvā dharmaratnadvīpamanuprāptā anuttaraṃ tathāgataratnaṃ sarvalokālaṃkāraṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ jetavane sthitamacintyāni
S04bsu016_u:20_7: te ca mahāśrāvakāstatraiva bhagavataḥ pādamūle tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti,
S04bsu016_u:20_9: na ca taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ mahāratnākaram /
S04bsu016_u:20_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ sarvajñatāvipakṣāvidyādūṣyāvabaddhajñānacakṣuṣāṃ tadasaṅgabodhisattvajñānacakṣurna pariśuddham,
S04bsu016_u:21_0: tadyathāpi nāma asti virajaḥprabhāsavatī nāma cakṣuḥpariśuddhiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:21_3_0: sa virajaḥprabhāsavatyā cakṣuḥpariśuddhyā samanvāgatastamondhakāraparyavanaddhāyāṃ rātryāmanekeṣāṃ prāṇakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:21_4: anucaṃkramet, tiṣṭhet, niṣīdet, nāneryāpathān, vā kalpayet / na ca te manuṣyāstaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:21_6: sa ca puruṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ paśyet nāneryāpathākalpavihāriṇaṃ nānādigabhimukhaṃ nānāsaṃsthānaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāprāvaraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:21_7: evemeva tathāgataḥ sabodhisattvagaṇaparivāro viśuddhāsaṅgajñānacakṣuḥ sarvalokaṃ jānāti paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:22_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurmahato janakāyasya madhye pṛthivīkṛtsnaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeta,
S04bsu016_u:22_1: apkṛtsnaṃ vā, tejaḥkṛstnaṃ vā, vāyukṛtsnaṃ vā, nīlakṛtnraṃ vā, pītakṛtsnaṃ vā, lohitakṛtsnaṃ vā, avadātakṛtsnaṃ vā, devakṛtsnaṃ vā, vividhasattvakāryakṛtsnaṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:22_2: sarvarutaravitakṛtsnaṃ vā, sarvālambanakṛtsnaṃ vā samādhiṃ samāpadyeta /
S04bsu016_u:22_4: na ca taṃ jvalanālokaṃ na ca tadvividhakāyakṛtsnam yāvat taṃ sarvālambanakṛtsnaṃ na paśyet,
S04bsu016_u:22_6: evameva tathāgatasya tadacintyabuddhasamādhiviṣayavikurvitaṃ saṃdarśayataḥ ye mahāśrāvakā na paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:23_0: tadyathāpi nāma añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣo netrayorañjitamātrayoḥ sarvajanakāyenādṛśyaśarīro bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:23_1: sa gacchan vā sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā sarvajanakāyaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:23_3: sa sarvajagat paśyati / te ca mahāśrāvakāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:24_0: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣasya sahajātā devatā nityānubaddhā /
S04bsu016_u:24_1: sā taṃ puruṣaṃ paśyati, sa ca puruṣastāṃ devatāṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:24_2: evameva tathāgataḥ sarvajñajñānaviṣayāvasthito mahānti buddhavikurvitāni saṃdarśayati mahato bodhisattvagaṇasaṃnipātasya madhye /
S04bsu016_u:24_3: te ca mahāśrāvakāstaṃ tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ tacca bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalavikurvitaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti /
S04bsu016_u:25_1: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣuḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na saṃjānāti na vedayati,
S04bsu016_u:25_3: na ca parinirvṛtaḥ saḥ / sarvalokavyavahāraśca tasmin pradeśe pravartante /
S04bsu016_u:25_4: na ca tān saṃjānāti, na vedayati yaduta tasyā eva samāpatteradhiṣṭhānādhipatyena /
S04bsu016_u:25_6: ṣaḍindriyaṃ caiṣāmasti, na ca taṃ tathāgatasamādhivikurvitavṛṣabhitāprātihāryaṃ paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:25_7: nāvataranti, na saṃjānanti, na vijānanti, na ca taṃ mahābodhisattvasaṃnipātam bodhisattvaprātihāryaṃ bodhisattvavikurvitamavataranti,
S04bsu016_u:25_8: na paśyanti na jānanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? gambhīro hi buddhaviṣayo vipulo 'prameyo durdṛśo duṣpratibodho duravagāhaḥ sarvalokasamatikrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:25_10: tena te mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane bhagavataḥ pādamūlagatāstāni buddhavikurvitāni na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:25_11: taṃ ca mahābodhisattvasaṃnipātam tacca jetavanamacintyāsaṃkhyeyaviśuddhalokadhātuguṇavyūhasamavasaraṇaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti yathāpi tadabhājanībhūtatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:26_0: atha khalu vairocanapraṇidhānābhiraścimaprabho bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:27_5: pravartate prātihāryaṃ yatra loko na gāhate // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:27_7: alakṣaṇā hi te dharmā ye saṃbuddhaiḥ prabhāvitāḥ // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:27_15: na prajānanti te caryāṃ na caiṣāṃ cittagocaram // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:28_0: atha khalu duryodhanavīryavegarājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:30_0: atha khalu samantaśrīsamudgatatejorājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:31_5: na ca pradeśa saṃbuddho na ca buddho diśānugaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:31_15: yathā hi pṛthivī loke pratiṣṭhā sarvadehinām /
S04bsu016_u:32_0: atha khalu asaṅgaśrīgarbharājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:34_0: atha khalu dharmadhātupraṇidhisunirmitacandrarājo bodhisattvo buddhadhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:36_0: atha khalu dharmārciṣmattejorājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:37_5: kiṃ punaḥ sarvasattvā hi vijñāsyanti vināyakam /
S04bsu016_u:37_15: yeṣāṃ ca praṇidhistatra yeṣāṃ ca manaso ratiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:38_0: atha khalu sarvamāramaṇḍalavikiraṇajñānadhvajarājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:39_13: śakyaṃ na jñānaparyanto gantuṃ buddhasya kenacit /
S04bsu016_u:39_18: cittamityapi yatrāsya citte cittaṃ na jāyate // 69 //
S04bsu016_u:39_21: atha khalu vairocanapraṇidhānaketudhvajo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:40_4: khedo notpadyate teṣāṃ na teṣāṃ sīdate manaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:40_10: vicaranti ca saṃsāre na ca saṃsāraniśritāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:40_13: sarva prahīṇā dhīrāṇāṃ buddhasaṃpasthitā hi te // 77 //
S04bsu016_u:40_14: vṛthā samāśrito lokaḥ sadā baddhaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu016_u:41_0: atha khalu sarvāvaraṇavikiraṇajñānavikrāntarājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:42_7: asaṅgāḥ svaṃ śubhaṃ bodhau nāmayanti parārthinaḥ // 84 //
S04bsu016_u:42_18: bhavanti niyatā bodhau dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam /
S04bsu016_u:43_1: daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:44_10: utsoḍhavyaḥ sa nikhilo buddhānāṃ na tvadarśanam // 95 //
S04bsu016_u:44_12: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānāmaśrutirna ca // 96 //
S04bsu016_u:44_13: ekaikatra varaṃ kalpān nivāso narake 'pi tān /
S04bsu016_u:46_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ vyavalokya bhūyasyā mātrayā vibhajan vistārayan
S04bsu016_u:46_0_1: deśayan uttānīkurvan saṃprakāśayan avabhāsayan prabhāsayan upadiśan dharmadhātunayena ākāśadhātusamatayā tryadhvasamatayā
S04bsu016_u:46_0_2: dharmadhātusamatayā sattvadhātusamatayā sarvalokadhātusamatayā sarvakarmavaṃśasamatayā sattvāśayasamatayā sattvādhimuktisamatayā
S04bsu016_u:46_1: evaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ tathāgatasamādhiṃ caiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati sma daśabhirnirdeśapadaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:46_12: iti hi bho jinaputrā etān daśān pramukhān kṛtvā anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇūrajaḥsamān etasya siṃhavijṛmbhitasya samādhinirdeśananugacchāmi /
S04bsu016_u:46_13: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputrāḥ tathāgatajñānagocara eṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:47_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattva etasyaiva siṃhavijṛmbhitasya tathāgatasamādherarthanirdeśaṃ dyotayamāno buddhādhiṣṭhānena
S04bsu016_u:48_4: dharmadhātu vipulam karitvanā dṛśyate drumavareṣu nāyakaḥ // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:48_8: bodhisattva bahumegha akṣayā enti te daśadiśāṃ samantato // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:48_10: utthihantu parṣāsu śāstuno dharmadhātu sphariṣu daśa diśaḥ // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:48_14: dharmamegha śruṇamāna sūratā ekakṣetri cari kalpakoṭiyaḥ // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:48_21: kāyamegha satataṃ pramuñcato dharmavarṣatu upetu bodhaye // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:49_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān bhūyasyā mātrayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmatraiva siṃhavijṛmbhite buddhasamādhau saṃniyojanārthaṃ bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāddharmadhātusamantadvāravijñaptitryadhvāvabhāsaṃ
S04bsu016_u:50_0: atha khalu ye te bodhisattva jetavane saṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:50_1_0: te paśyanti sma sarvadharmadhātugateṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajontargateṣu
S04bsu016_u:50_1_1: buddhakṣetrasaṃgateṣu nānābaleṣu nānāviśuddheṣu nānāpratiṣṭhāneṣu nānāsaṃsthāneṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhimaṇḍavaragataṃ bodhisattvasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:50_2_0: kvaciddevabhavanagataṃ kvacinnāgabhavanagataṃ kvacid yakṣabhavanagataṃ kvacid gandharvabhavanagataṃ kvacidasurabhavanagataṃ
S04bsu016_u:50_3: yāvantaśca te bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tathāgatasya gambhīrabuddhasamādhivikurvitāni paśyanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_4_1: nānādharmadigdvāreṣu nānādiksaṃjñāgatesu nānādiksamavasaraṇeṣu nānādigbhāgeṣu nānādiganugameṣu nānādiksāgareṣu yaduta pūrvasyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:50_4_2: diśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyāmadhaḥ ūrdhvaṃ diśi kṣetrakāyadikṣu
S04bsu016_u:50_6: sarve te bhagavatā vairocanena pūrvakuśalacaryāsabhāgatayā caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:50_7: darśanena śravaṇena anusmṛtyā paryupāsanena ca paripācitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:50_28: samantavyūhadharmaprabheṇa ca bodhisattvasamādhinā te bodhisattvāstān bhagavato vairocanasya buddhavikurvitasamudrānavataranti /
S04bsu016_u:50_68: ekadharmavākpathaniruktipadaprabhedena bodhisattvasamādhinā te bodhisattvāstān bhagavato vairocanasya buddhavikurvitasamudrānavataranti /
S04bsu016_u:50_121_0: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvadharmadhātuspharaṇenāvatāreṇa teṣāṃ punarbodhisattvānāṃ bhagavataḥ saṃmukhībhāvagatānāṃ jetavanānuprāptānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:50_123_3: bodhisattvānāṃ jetavane saṃnipatitānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ tathāgataguṇasamudramavataratāṃ tathāgataraśmyavabhāsitānāṃ sarvaśarīrebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:50_124: yaduta cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe vipularaśmijālameghāḥ sarvajagatsaṃtoṣaṇā niścaritvā daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_125: sarvaratnamaṇighaṇṭāmegha niścaritvā sarvatryadhvatathāgataguṇavarṇanirdeśameghanirnādānanuravanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_126: sarvajagadvādyameghaḥ sarvārambaṇebhyo niścaritvā sarvasattvakarmavipākamadhuravādyaghoṣasaṃprayuktā anuvaranto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_127: sarvabodhisattvapraṇidhānavicitrabodhisattvacaryāsaṃdarśanarūpameghā niścaritvā sarvabodhisattvapraṇidhānarutaghoṣān nigarjanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_129: sarvatryadhvatathāgatasadṛśabodhimaṇḍameghā niścaritvā sarvatathāgatātisaṃbodhiniryāṇavyūhān saṃdarśayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_130: sarvārambaṇebhyaḥ sarvanāgendrakāyameghā niścaritvā sarvagandhavarṣāṇi pravarṣanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_131: sarvajagadindrasadṛśakāyameghā niścaritvā samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāmudīrayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_132: sarvārambaṇebhyaḥ sarvaratnamayasarvapariśuddhabuddhakṣetrapratibhāsameghā niścaritvā sarvatathāgatadharmacakrapravartanāni darśayanto daśa diśaḥ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:50_133: evaṃpramukhā anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā mahāvyūhavikurvitameghā niścaranti sma teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmadhiṣṭhānena acintyadharmasamudrāvabhāsapratilābhadharmatayā ca /
S04bsu016_u:51_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena etānyeva sarvavikurvitāni saṃdarśayan daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:52_0: saṃprekṣato jetavane anantaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ vipulaṃ pravṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:52_1: ārambaṇā sarvatu kāyameghā niścārya te sarvadiśaḥ spharanti // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:52_2: anantavarṇā vipulā viśuddhā vyūhā vicitrāḥ sugatātmajānām /
S04bsu016_u:52_3: dṛśyanti sarvehi ta āsanebhyaḥ sārambaṇebhyaḥ pratibhāsaprāptāḥ // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:52_5: romṇāṃ mukhebhyaḥ sugatātmajānāṃ rutāni bauddhāni nigarjamānāḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:52_10: acintyā asaṅkhyāḥ sugatasya romṇo adhiṣṭhitā nirmita niścaranti // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:52_14: śrūyanti te jetavane drumāṇāṃ kośāntarebhyo 'pi viniścarantaḥ // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:52_15: tryadhvasthitānāmiha yā jinanāṃ kṣetreṣu sarveṣvakhilā vikurvā /
S04bsu016_u:52_17: ekaikaromṇi pravibhaktu citrā buddhā dikkṣetre samudrameghāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:52_18: abhāsayanti jinādhivāsāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣu ca buddhameghāḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:52_22: spharanti sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyatha bodhimaṇḍān // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:53_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhasamādhyavabhāsitasaṃtānānāmekaikasya bodhisattvasya anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni mahākaruṇāmukhānyavakrāntāni /
S04bsu016_u:53_4: niścaritvā sarvadikṣu dharmadhātuṃ spharitvā sattvān saṃbodhayanti paripācayanti vinayanti /
S04bsu016_u:53_8_0: keciddevabhavaneṣu kecinnāgabhavaneṣu kecid yakṣabhavaneṣu kecidgandharvabhavaneṣu kecidasurabhavaneṣu kecidgaruḍabhavaneṣu
S04bsu016_u:53_9_0: kecinmanuṣyendrabhavaneṣu kecid yamanagareṣu kecit sarvapretālayeṣu kecit sarvanarakalokeṣu kecit sarvatiryagyonigatiṣu [Gv_35]
S04bsu016_u:53_9_1: asaṃbhinnayā mahākaruṇayā asaṃbhinnena praṇidhānena asaṃbhinnena jñānena asaṃbhinnena sattvasaṃgrahaprayogena darśanavainayikānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:53_9_3: raśmijālapramuñcanavainayikānāṃ yathāśayānāaṃ sattvānāṃ paripākavinayārthaṃ jetavanānte bodhisattvā nānāvikurvitavyūhaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:53_11: kecit svabhavanakūṭāgārāsanaparivārā daśa diśaḥ spharantaḥ saṃdṛśyante,
S04bsu016_u:53_16_0: kālavaśena kālamanuvartamānā anurūpakāyābhinirhārabhedena anurūpakāyavarṇasaṃsthānabhedena svarabhedena mantrabhedena īryāpathabhedena
S04bsu016_u:55_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīrapi kumarabhūtaḥ pratiṣṭhānakūṭāgāragataḥ sārdhaṃ sabhāgacaritairbodhisattvaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:55_22_0: praṇataśarīrarbrahmendraiḥ, mahāgauravābhiṣṭutamahitam evaṃrūpayā bodhisattvavikramavyūhasaṃpadā mañjuśrīrbodhisattvaḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya
S04bsu016_u:55_22_1: bhagavantamanekaśatakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya anekākārayā pūjayitvā bhagavato 'ntikādapakramya yena dakṣiṇāpathastena janapadacaryāṃ
S04bsu016_u:56_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān śariputro buddhānubhāvena adrākṣīnmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamanayā īdṛśyā bodhisattvavikurvitavyūhasaṃpadā jetavanānniṣkamya yena dakṣiṇā dik tenopasaṃkramamāṇam /
S04bsu016_u:56_1: dṛṣṭvā ca asyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ janapadacaryāṃ prakrameyam /
S04bsu016_u:56_2: sa ṣaṣṭimātrairbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu016_u:56_3_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantamavalokya bhagavatābhyanujñāto bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
S04bsu016_u:56_3_1: 'ntikātprakramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopajagāma sārdhaṃ taiḥ ṣaṣṭibhirbhikṣubhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:56_6: mahāsudatena ca bhikṣuṇā, puṇyaprabheṇa ca mahāvatsena ca vibhudattena ca viśuddhacāriṇā ca devaśriyā ca indramatinā ca brahmottamena ca praśāntamatinā ca bhikṣuṇā /
S04bsu016_u:56_8_0: sarve ca te bhikṣavaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā dūrānugatādhimuktayaḥ śraddhānayapariśuddhā mahācetanāsamudācārā
S04bsu016_u:57_0_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputro gacchanneva mārgaṃ sarvāstān bhikṣūnavalokya sāgarabuddhiṃ bhikṣumāmantrayāmāsa - paśya sāgarabuddhe
S04bsu016_u:57_5: mārgavikramavyūhāṃśca sarvadigmaṇḍalābhimukhān vartamānān puṇyasamyagvyūhāṃśca vāmadakṣiṇena mahānidhānānyudvelāni bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:57_8: daśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatorṇākośebhyo raśmijālamaṇḍalāni niścaritvā sarvabuddhadharmānnigarjamānān mūrdhni nipatanti /
S04bsu016_u:57_9: evaṃpramukhānāyuṣmān śāriputro mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya aparimāṇān mārgakramaṇaguṇavyūhāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:57_10: bhāṣate udīrayati prabhāvayati saṃvarṇayati vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti /
S04bsu016_u:57_11: yathā yathā svaviraḥ śāriputro mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya guṇānudīrayati,
S04bsu016_u:57_12: tathā tathā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittāni viśuddhyanti prasīdanti,
S04bsu016_u:57_13: prītivegā vivardhante, harṣa utpadyate, saṃtānāni caiṣāṃ karmaṇyāni bhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:57_14: indriyāṇi prasīdanti, saumanasyaṃ vivardhate, daurmanasyaṃ prahīyate, cittamalo 'pagacchati, sarvāvaraṇāni vinivartante, buddhadarśanamabhimukhībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:57_18: mahākaruṇā saṃbhavati, pāramitāmaṇḍalamavakrāmati, mahāpraṇidhānāni saṃjāyante, daśasu dikṣu buddhasamudrā ābhāsībhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:57_19: te evamudāraṃ sarvajñatāprasādavegaṃ pratilabdhā etadavocan - upanayatu upādhyāyo 'smānetasya satpuruṣasya sakāśam /
S04bsu016_u:57_20: āyuṣmān śāriputra trairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya etadavocat - ime mañjuśrīḥ bhikṣavaḥ tvaddarśanakāmāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:57_21: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto mahatā bodhisattvavikurvitena sārdha parṣanmaṇḍalapramāṇena bhūmimaṇḍalena nāgāvalokitena pratyudāvṛtya tān bhikṣūnavalokayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:57_22_0: atha khalu te bhikṣavo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya añjalīn pragṛhya etadavocan - anena vayaṃ satpuruṣa
S04bsu016_u:57_24: tena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena īdṛśā eva bhavem,
S04bsu016_u:57_26: evaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣam, evaṃrūpāṇi lakṣaṇāni, īdṛśāni vikurvitāni yādṛśāni tava /
S04bsu016_u:58_0_0: evamukte ebhirbhikṣubhiḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnidamavocat - daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣavo
S04bsu016_u:58_0_1: mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā [Gv_38] tathāgatabhūmimavakrāmati,
S04bsu016_u:58_12: ebhirbhikṣavo daśabhiraparikhedacittotpādaiḥ samanvāgataḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā saṃvartate sarvakuśalamūleṣu,
S04bsu016_u:59_0: atha khalu te bhikṣava imaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā sarvabuddhavidarśanāsaṅgacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratyalabhanta,
S04bsu016_u:59_2: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvajagatyupapannāḥ sattvāstānaśeṣānadrākṣuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:59_6: ye ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāratnamayā bhavanavimānaparibhogāstānapi paśyanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:59_9: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ cittendriyāśayān vyavalokayanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:59_17: te mahāvabhāsapratilabdhā mahāprajñāmaṇḍalāvabhāsitā daśa bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhante sma /
S04bsu016_u:59_18: tān mṛdusūkṣmābhijñāṅkurapratilabdhān bodhicittotpādadṛḍhapratiṣṭhitān mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ samantabhadrāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ samādāpya pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:59_20: te mahāpraṇidhānasāgarābhinirhṛtayā cittaviśuddhyā kāyaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhante sma /
S04bsu016_u:59_25: daśasu ca dikṣu sarvatathāgatakāyameghānabhinirharanti sma sarvabuddhadharmapariniṣpattaye /
S04bsu016_u:60_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastān bhikṣūnanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpya anupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena dakṣiṇāpathe dhanyākaraṃ nāma mahānagaraṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:60_1_0: upetya dhanyākarasya mahānagarasya pūrveṇa vicitrasāradhvajavyūhaṃ nāma mahāvanaṣaṇḍaṃ pūrvabuddhādhyuṣitacaityaṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:60_2: yatra bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā aneke duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:60_5: tatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dharmadhātunayaprabhāsaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ prakāśayāmāsa daśasūtrāntakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprasravam /
S04bsu016_u:60_7: te taṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā nāgagatiṃ vijugupsantastathāgataguṇān spṛhayanto nāgagatiṃ vivartya devamanuṣyopapattiṃ parigṛhṇanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:60_9: tasya taṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ kālāntareṇa anantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayaṃ gatastribhiryānaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:61_0: aśrauṣurdhanyākaramanuṣyāḥ - mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ idaṃ dhanyākaraṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:61_2: śrutvā ca punarupāsakopāsikā dārakadārikā mahāprajñopāsakaśreṣṭhipūrvaṃgamāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcaśataparivārā dhanyākarānnagarānniṣkramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:61_3_0: tatra mahāprajñopāsakaḥ sudattena copāsakena sārdhaṃ vasudattena ca puṇyaprabheṇa ca yaśodevena ca somaśrityā ca somanandinā
S04bsu016_u:61_3_1: ca sumatinā ca mahāmatinā ca rāhulabhadreṇa ca bhadraśriyā copāsakena sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirupāsakaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ
S04bsu016_u:61_3_2: puraskṛtaḥ yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:62_0_0: tatra mahāprajñā nāmopāsikā suprabhayā copāsikayā sārdhaṃ sugātrayā ca subhadrayā ca bhadraśriyā ca candraprabhāsayā ca ketuprabhayā
S04bsu016_u:62_0_1: ca śrībhadrayā ca sulocanayā copāsikayā sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirupāsikāśataiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:62_0_2: mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu016_u:63_0_0: tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ suvratena ca śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sārdhaṃ suśīlena ca svācāreṇa ca suvikrāmīṇā ca sucintinā ca sumatinā
S04bsu016_u:63_0_1: ca subuddhinā ca sunetreṇa ca subāhunā ca [Gv_40] suprabheṇa ca śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śreiṣṭhidārakaśataiḥ
S04bsu016_u:63_0_2: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:64_0_0: tatra subhadrā dārikā mahāprajñasya gṛhapaterduhitā bhadrayā ca dārikayā sārdhamabhirāmavartayā ca dṛḍhamatyā ca śrībhadrayā
S04bsu016_u:64_0_1: ca brahmadattayā ca śrīprabhayā ca suprabhayā dārikayā sārdhametatpramukhaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā yena
S04bsu016_u:64_0_2: mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkramya mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:65_0_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dhanyākarānnagarāt tāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā viditvā yathāśayaṃ
S04bsu016_u:65_0_1: saṃdarśanādhipatyenābhibhūya mahāmaitryādhipatyena prahlādya mahākaruṇādhipatyena dharmadeśanāmabhinirhṛtya jñānādhipatyena
S04bsu016_u:65_0_2: cittāśayān pravicintya mahāpratisaṃvidā dharmamupadeṣṭukāmaḥ sudhanaṃ śreiṣṭhidārakamvalokayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:65_1_0: (sudhanaḥ khalu punaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kena kāraṇenocyate sudhana iti? sudhanasya khalu śreṣṭhidārakasya samanantarāvakrāntasya
S04bsu016_u:65_1_1: mātuḥ kukṣau tasmin gṛhe sapta ratnāṅkurāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ samantādgṛhasya suvibhaktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:65_3: yataste ratnāṅkurāḥ samutpatya dharaṇitalamabhinirbhidya abhyudgatāḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāaragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya /
S04bsu016_u:65_4: sa yadā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ paripūrṇo daśānāṃ māsānāmatyayājjātaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:65_5: tadā tāni sapta mahānidhānāni saptahastāyāmavistārodvedhapramāṇāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vivṛttāni virocanti bhrājante sma /
S04bsu016_u:65_6: pañca ca bhājanaśatāni tasmin gṛhe prādurbhūtāni nānāratnamayāni,
S04bsu016_u:65_21: pañca ratnabhājanaśatāni sahajātasya khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya gṛhe sarvakośakoṣṭhāgāreṣu dhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇavividharatnavarṣāṇyabhipravarṣitāni /
S04bsu016_u:65_22: tasya naimittikairbrāhmaṇairmātāpitṛbhyāṃ jñātivargeṇa ca vipulasamṛddhirasya jātamātrasya gṛhe prādurbhūteti sudhanaḥ sudhana iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam /
S04bsu016_u:65_23_0: ) sudhanaḥ khalu śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ [Gv_41] udārādhimuktikaḥ kalyāṇamitrānugatāśayo
S04bsu016_u:66_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamavalokya pratisaṃmodate sma,
S04bsu016_u:66_1_0: dharmaṃ cāsya deśayāmāsa - yaduta sarvabuddhadharmānārabhya sarvabuddhadharmasamudayāvāptimārabhya sarvabuddhānantatāmārabhya
S04bsu016_u:67_0_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ taṃ ca mahājanakāyaṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
S04bsu016_u:67_0_1: saṃpraharṣayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya pūrvakuśalamūlaṃ saṃsmārya dhanyākare mahānagare yathāśayānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:68_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya sakāśādidamevaṃrūpaṃ buddhaguṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyabhilāṣaparamaḥ
S04bsu016_u:69_0: tvatprabhāvata ahaṃ mahāmate bodhi prasthitu hitāya dehinām /
S04bsu016_u:69_1: tatra niścayu anantagocaro yo mamā bhavati taṃ śṛṇohi me // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:69_5: māraīśvaravaśaṃgatāḥ sadā yatra bāla abudhā bhiniśritāḥ // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:69_9: īrṣya mātsarya sadā sudāmitāḥ pretatiryannarakākṣaṇe gatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:69_35: sattvasārasugatān diśaṃ gatāṃstān pi darśayahi mārgadeśaka // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:69_50: prajñapāyasamayogavāha te dharmayāni pravare sthapehi me // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:69_74: jñānavajra dṛḍhamārya dehi me yena saṃskṛtapuraṃ vidāryate // 35 //

S04bsu016_u:70_6_1: bodhisattvacaryā prārabhyā? kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caritavyam? kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayitavyāḥ?

S04bsu016_u:70_6_5: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreiṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:71_0: sādhu śubhapuṇyasāgara yo hi tvamupāgato mama sakāśam /
S04bsu016_u:71_4: ye bodhisattva sudṛḍhā akhinnamanasaḥ saṃsāri te carim /
S04bsu016_u:71_7: yastvaṃ samantabhadrāṃ praṇidhi si sacārikāṃ jagadartham // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:71_11: sa tvaṃ jinan daśaddiśi paśyannapi yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu016_u:71_16: caryāṃ samantabhadrāṃ spṛśiṣyasi śivāṃ prasara bodhim // 45 //
S04bsu016_u:71_19: prekṣasva sattvanayutān śrutvā tava praṇidhiprīti saṃjātā /
S04bsu016_u:72_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:72_1: yastvamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parigaveṣitavyāṃ manyase /
S04bsu016_u:72_2: durlabhāste kulaputra sattvā ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādayanti /
S04bsu016_u:72_3: ataste durlabhatamāḥ sattvā ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parigaveṣante /
S04bsu016_u:72_4: tena hi kulaputra bhūtakalyāṇamitreṣu niścayaprāptena bodhisattvena bhavitavyaṃ sarvajñajñānapratilambhāya /
S04bsu016_u:72_9: asti kulaputra ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe rāmāvarānto nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:72_12: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:72_13_0: kathaṃ prayoktavyam / kathaṃ bodhisattvacaryā prārabhyā? kathaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caritavyam? kathaṃ bodhisattvacaryā paripūrayitavyā?
S04bsu016_u:72_13_1: kathaṃ pariśodhayitavyā? kathamavatartavyā? kathamabhinirhartavyā? kathamanusartavyā? kathamadhyālambitavyā? kathaṃ vistārayitavyā?
S04bsu016_u:72_13_2: kathaṃ bodhisattvasya paripūrṇaṃ bhavati samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍalam? sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitraḥ samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍalamupadekṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:73_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau
S04bsu016_u:73_0_1: śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvo 'valokya kalyāṇamitrapremānugatacittaḥ
S04bsu016_u:75_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena rāmāvarānto janapadastenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:75_1_0: upetya rāmāvarānte janapade vicaran pūvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo dārakarmādhiṣṭhānamanobhirucitān bhogān paribhuñjāno yena sugrīvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:75_1_1: parvatastenopasaṃkramya sugrīvaṃ parvatamadhiruhya meghaśriyaṃ bhikṣumanugaveṣamāṇaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niryayau /
S04bsu016_u:75_2: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmapi diśaṃ niryayau /
S04bsu016_u:75_4: adhastādapi / sa saptāhasyātyayānmeghaśriyaṃ bhikṣumapaśyadanyatamasmin parvataśikharotsaṅge caṃkramyamāṇam /
S04bsu016_u:75_5_0: sa yena meghaśrīrbhikṣustenopasaṃkramya meghaśriyo bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya meghaśriyaṃ bhikṣuṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ
S04bsu016_u:75_5_1: prāñjaliḥ sthitvā etadavocat - yatkhalu āryo jānīyāt - mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:75_6: na ca jāne kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:75_10_0: kathaṃ pariśodhayitavyā, kathamavatartavyā, kathamabhinirhartavyā, kathamanusartavyā, kathamadhyālambitavyā, kathaṃ vistārayitavyā,
S04bsu016_u:75_11: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:75_12: tadvadatu me āryaḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvā niryānti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:75_13: evamukte meghaśrīrbhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śriṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:75_15_0: duṣkaraṃ hi etat kulaputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yaduta bodhisattvacaryāparimārgaṇaṃ bodhisattvogocaraparimārgaṇaṃ bodhisattvaniryāṇaviśuddhiparimārgaṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:75_17_0: aparāṅmukhajñānālokāvabhāsena samantābhimukhāvalokanayā samantaviṣayāpratihatena darśanena sarvāvaraṇavigatena vipaśyinā
S04bsu016_u:75_17_1: kauśalyena samantacakṣurviṣayapariśuddhayā śarīraviśuddhyā sarvadiksrotaḥprasarābhimukhapraṇatena kayapraṇāmakauśalyena sarvabuddhadharmameghasaṃdhāranena
S04bsu016_u:75_18: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /

S04bsu016_u:75_34: yatha pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvaṃ diśi ekamapi tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:75_36_0: ekaikasyāṃ diśi anuvilokayan nānāvarṇāṃstathāgatān paśyāmi nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvikurvitān nānāvṛṣabhitāvikrīḍitān vicitraparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhān
S04bsu016_u:75_38: buddhānusmṛterlābhī / kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmanantajñānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāṃ caryā jñātum,
S04bsu016_u:76_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe sāgaramukho nāma dikpratyuddeśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:76_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha, kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:76_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitraṃ paridīpayiṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:76_14_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako meghaśriyo bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya meghaśriyaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛty
S04bsu016_u:78_10_0: anupūrveṇa yena sāgaramukhaṃ dikpratyuddeśo yena ca sāgaramegho bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:78_10_1: sāgarameghaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā etadavocat -
S04bsu016_u:78_11: na ca jāne kathaṃ bodhisattvā vivartante lokavaṃśāt /
S04bsu016_u:78_12: āvartante tathāgatavaṃśe / uttaranti saṃsārasāgarāt / avataranti sarvajñajñānasāgaram /
S04bsu016_u:78_14: saṃpadyante tathāgatakule / vivartante saṃsārasrotasaḥ / pravartante bodhisattvacaryāsrotasi,
S04bsu016_u:79_0: evamukte sāgaramegho bhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:79_2: na hi kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
S04bsu016_u:79_3_2: prakṛtikṛpāsnehānugatānāṃ sarvabhavagatisaṃvāsābhimukhānāṃ tathāgataviṣayābhilāṣiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
S04bsu016_u:80_0: ahaṃ kulaputra pūrṇāni dvādaśa varṣāṇi iha sāgaramukhe dikpratyuddeśe viharāmi imaṃ mahāsāgaramārambaṇīkṛtya āmukhīkṛtya,
S04bsu016_u:80_1_0: yaduta mahāsāgarasya vipulāpramāṇatāmanuvicintayan vimalaprasannatāṃ ca gambhīraduravagāhatāṃ ca anupūrvanimnasusthitāṃ ca
S04bsu016_u:80_1_1: anekaratnākaravicitratāṃ ca vāriskandhāpramāṇatāṃ ca acintyodāravarṇavimātratāṃ ca anantabhūtāṃ ca vicitrodārapraṇādhivāsanatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:80_1_2: [Gv_52] ca mahāmeghapraticchannatāṃ ca antarāpurṇatāṃ ca anuvicintayan /
S04bsu016_u:80_2: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - asti na punaranyaḥ kaścidiha loke yo 'smānmanāsāgarādvipulataraśca vistīrṇataraśca apramāṇataraśca gambhīrataraśca vicitrataraśca /
S04bsu016_u:80_3: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ yoniśaścintāmanasikāraprayuktasya mahāsāgarasyādhastānmahāpadmaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:80_9: taṃ ca tathāgatakāyamita upādāya yāvadbhavāgraparamaṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:81_0_0: sa ca me tathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya śirasaṃ parimārjya samantanetraṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvatathāgataviṣayaṃ bodhisattvacaryāprabhāvanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:81_1: taṃ cāhaṃ samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhṇāmi saṃdhārayāmi pravartayāmi puanidhyāyāmi evaṃrūpeṇodgaheṇa,
S04bsu016_u:81_4: na ca tasya dharmaparyāyasya ekaikasmātparivartādekaikasmāddharmadvārākaikasmāddharmanayādekaikasmāddharmayoneḥ ekaikasmāddharmapadaprabhedāt kṣaya upalabhyate,
S04bsu016_u:81_5: na ūnatvaṃ vā paryādānaṃ vā paryavasthānaṃ vā paryantaniṣṭhā vā /
S04bsu016_u:82_0: iti hi kulaputra pūrṇāni dvādaśa varṣāṇyahamimaṃ samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān /
S04bsu016_u:82_1: evaṃrūpeṇodgaheṇa yadekadivasena asaṃkhyeyan parivartān paryavāpnomi śrutodgahaṇadhāraṇyālokāvabhāsena /
S04bsu016_u:82_12_0: ye ca me kecit sattvā upasaṃkrāmanti pūrvasyāṃ diśi devā vā devendrā vā nāgā vā nāgendrā vā yakṣā vā yakṣendrā vā asurā vā
S04bsu016_u:82_12_1: asurendrā vā garuḍā vā garuḍendrā vā mahoragā vā mahoragendrā vā manuṣyā vā manuṣyendrā vā brahmāṇo vā brahmendrā vā,
S04bsu016_u:82_13: tān sarvānatraiva samantanetre tathāgatabodhisattvacaryāvabhāse dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi niveśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:82_14: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmeva samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ rocayāmi nirūpayāmi paridīpayāmi saṃvarṇayāmi saṃdarśayāmi vibhajāmi vistārayāmi uttānīkaromi vivarāmi pramuñcāmi avabhāsayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:82_15_0: yathā purvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāḥ paścimāyā uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyāḥ purvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ paścimottarāyā adha
S04bsu016_u:82_15_1: urdhvāyāśca diśaḥ ye kecit sattvā upasaṃkrāmanti - pūrvavat /
S04bsu016_u:83_1: etamahaṃ kulaputra, ekaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ jānāmi / kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktuṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsamudrāvatīrṇānāṃ pariśuddhapraṇidhyanugamena,
S04bsu016_u:84_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe itaḥ ṣaṣṭiyojanaiḥ sāgaratīraṃ nāma laṅkāpatham /
S04bsu016_u:84_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvacaryā pariśodhayitavyā /
S04bsu016_u:85_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sāgarameghaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:87_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanī taṃ ca samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamanusmaran,
S04bsu016_u:87_9: anupūrveṇa yena sāgaratīraṃ laṅkāpathastenopasaṃkramya pūrvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā /
S04bsu016_u:87_10: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha ūrdhvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā /
S04bsu016_u:87_16: acintyāṃśca sūkṣmasphuṭavastrameghān gaganatale prītimanobhirmahoragendraiḥ prahitān prasṛtānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ spṛhamāṇarūpaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:87_19: acintyāni ca yakṣendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi vikṛtaśarīrāṇi gaganatalagatānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣormaitryādhipateyatayā /
S04bsu016_u:87_20: acintyāni ca rākṣasendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi gaganatale anuparivartamānāni supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣorārakṣāpratipannānyapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:87_22: acintyāni ca śuddhāvāsakāyikadevatāśatasahasrāṇi gaganatale vimānagatānyapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ
S04bsu016_u:88_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣuṃ gaganatale caṃkramyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ
S04bsu016_u:88_0_1: prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjaliḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣuṃ namaskṛtya evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:88_1_0: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā anveṣṭavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmāḥ samudānayitavyāḥ? kathaṃ
S04bsu016_u:88_1_1: bodhisattvena buddhadharmāḥ saṃhartavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmāḥ sevitavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā
S04bsu016_u:88_1_2: bhāvayitavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā anuvartitavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmāḥ paripiṇḍayitavyāḥ? kathaṃ
S04bsu016_u:88_1_3: bodhisattvena buddhadharmāḥ paribhāvayitavyāḥ? kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā viśodhayitavyāḥ sarvabodhisattvakāryapariprāpaṇāya?
S04bsu016_u:88_1_4: kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā anugantavyāḥ? śrutaṃ [Gv_56] ca ma āryo bodhisattvānāmavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:88_2: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmeṣu prayoktavyam,
S04bsu016_u:89_0: evamukte supratiṣṭhito bhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:89_1: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya buddhadharmān sarvajñatādharmān svayaṃbhūdharmān paripṛcchasi /
S04bsu016_u:89_3: etaṃ me kulaputra asaṅgamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamāyūhatā niryūhatā anusaratā vibhajatā vicinvatā pravicinvatā pratibhāsayatā prabhāsayatā asaṅgakoṭirnāma jñānālokaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:89_14: asyāhaṃ kulaputra anabhisaṃskārikāyā ṛddheranubhāvena iha gaganatale caṃkramāmi,
S04bsu016_u:89_16: antadardhāmi prādurbhavāmi, dhūmāyāmi prajvalāmi / eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavāmi, bahudhā bhūtvaiko bhavāmi / āvirbhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_17: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāramasajjan gacchāmi tadyathāpi nāma ākāśe /
S04bsu016_u:89_18: ākāśe 'pi paryaṅkena kramāmi tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ /
S04bsu016_u:89_22: pṛthivīmapi kampayāmi / imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau evaṃ mahaujasvinau pāṇinā saṃparimārjayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_26: anantavarṇaprabhājālameghān pramuñcan samantāddiśo niryāmi - yaduta pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niryāmi,
S04bsu016_u:89_27: [Gv_57] dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha urdhvāmapi diśaṃ niryāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_28: ekaikena cittakṣeṇena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekaṃ lokadhātumatikramāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_29_0: dvāvapi daśāpi lokadhātuśatamapi lokadhātusahasramapi lokadhātuśatasahasramapi lokadhātukoṭīmapi lokadhātukoṭīśatamapi lokadhātukoṭīsahasramapi
S04bsu016_u:89_31: asaṃkhyeyānapi acintyānapi atulyānapi amāpyānapi asamantānapi aparyantānapi asīmāprāptānapi anabhilāpyānabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūnatikramāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_32: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S04bsu016_u:89_35: tāsu tāsu lokadhātudikṣu, teṣu teṣu lokadhātuparivarteṣu,
S04bsu016_u:89_39: teṣu teṣu lokadhātudvāreṣu, teṣu teṣu lokadhātukalpanirdeśeṣu,
S04bsu016_u:89_42: teṣu teṣu lokadhātuparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye buddhābhagavanto dharmaṃdeśayanti,
S04bsu016_u:89_43: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmekaikaṃ tathāgatamanantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kāyanānātvairekaikena kāyena anantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ pūjāmeghaiḥ pravarṣannupasaṃkramāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_44_0: upasaṃkramya pūjāṃ karomyapratiprasrabdhaḥ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvavilepanaiḥ sarvavastraiḥ sarvadhvajaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:89_45: yacca te buddha bhagavanto bhāṣante deśayanti udīrayanti saṃprakāśayanti saṃvarṇayanti paridīpayanti upadiśanti nirdiśanti prabhāvayanti,
S04bsu016_u:89_46: tatsarvamājānāmi, udgṛhṇāmi / yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhistāṃ sarvāmanusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_47: evameva dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi ekamapi lokadhātumatikramāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_49: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S04bsu016_u:89_50: teṣu teṣu lokadhātusamudreṣu tāsu tāsu lokadhātuviśuddhiṣu,
S04bsu016_u:89_51: yāvat teṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu016_u:89_52: tān sarvān paśyāmi / teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ karomi sarvapuṣpairyāvatsarvaparigrahaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:89_53: yacca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante yāvatprabhāvayanti tatsarvamājānāmi udgṛhṇāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_54: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhistāṃ sarvāmanusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_56: yaiḥ samāgacchāmi, te sarve niyatā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:89_58: sūkṣmā vā udārā vā hīnā vā praṇītā vā sukhitā vā duḥkhitā vā,
S04bsu016_u:89_60: ye ca sattvā māmupasaṃkrāmanti tān sarvānatraiva samantajave 'moghavikramaparyavasāne bodhisattvavimokṣe pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_61: etamahaṃ kulaputra samantajavaṃ tathāgatapūjopasthānaprayogaṃ [Gv_58] sarvasattvaparipākānukūlamasaṅgamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:89_62_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāśīlānāṃ mahāyānapratipattiśīlānāṃ bodhisattvamārgāvipravāsaśīlānāsaṅgaśīlānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:89_62_3: viśuddhaśīlānāṃ virajonirmalaśīlānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:90_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe vajrapuraṃ nāma dramiḍapaṭṭanam /
S04bsu016_u:90_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:91_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārakaḥ supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:93_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārakastaṃ dharmālokamanusmaran dharmaprasādavegāviṣṭo buddhānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ triratnavaṃśānupacchedaprayuktaḥ
S04bsu016_u:93_0_3: anupūrveṇa vajrapuraṃ nāma dramiḍapaṭṭanamupasaṃkramya meghaṃ dramiḍaṃ paryeṣan adrākṣīt madhyenagaraṃ śṛṅgāṭake dharmasāṃkathyāya
S04bsu016_u:93_0_4: siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaṃ daśānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ cakrākṣaraparivartavyūhaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānam /
S04bsu016_u:94_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako meghasya dramiḍasya pādau śirasābhivandya meghaṃ dramiḍamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:94_0_1: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ saṃyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:94_1_0: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam? kathaṃ pratipattavyam? kathaṃ bodhisattvasya bodhisattvabodhicittotpādo
S04bsu016_u:94_1_1: na praṇaśyati? sarvabhavagatiṣu kathamāśayo dṛḍhībhavatyaparikhedatayā? kathamadhyāśayaḥ pariśuddhyatyanavamardyatayā? kathaṃ
S04bsu016_u:94_1_2: mahākaruṇābalaṃ saṃjāyate aparikhedatayā? kathaṃ dhāraṇībalamākrāmati samantamukhaviśuddhatayā? kathaṃ prajñālokaḥ saṃjāyate
S04bsu016_u:95_0_0: atha khalu megho dramiḍo bodhisattvagauraveṇa tataḥ siṃhāsanādutthāya avatīrya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya sarvaśarīreṇa
S04bsu016_u:95_3_0: anekaiśca nānāvarṇai rucirairmanoramairgandhapuṣpairabhyavakīrya abhiprakīrya anyaiśca vividhaiḥ pūjāprakāraiḥ pūjayitvā
S04bsu016_u:95_3_1: satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:95_6: sa sarvabuddhavaṃśasyānupacchedāya pratipanno bhavati virāgavaṃśasya yathāvadvijñāptaye 'bhiyuktaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:95_17_0: sarvāryairabhinanditaḥ, sarvabrahmendraiḥ pūjitaḥ, sarvadevendrairārakṣitaḥ, sarvayakṣendrairapacitaḥ, sarvarākṣasendraiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:95_19: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā
S04bsu016_u:96_0: iti hi megho dramiḍaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya purata ebhirvacanapadairbodhisattvān saṃvarṇya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu016_u:96_4: devamaharddhikā vā devā vā, nāgamaharddhikā vā nāgā vā, yakṣamaharddhikā vā yakṣā vā,
S04bsu016_u:96_13_0: te tenāvabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ santo meghasya dramiḍasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmantaḥ eteṣāṃ meghena dramiḍenādhiṣṭhitāśayānāṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:96_13_1: hlāditakāyacittānām udāraprāmodyajātānāṃ mahāgauravasthitānāṃ nihatamāradhvajānāṃ māyāśāṭhyāpagatānāṃ viprasannendriyāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:96_13_2: megho dramiḍastameva cakrākṣaraparivartavyūhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati pravedayati,
S04bsu016_u:96_14: praveśayati, nayati, anugamayati, yaṃ śrutvā sarve te 'vinivartanīyā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:96_15: [Gv_61] sa punarapi dharmāsane niṣadya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra sarasvatyā dhāraṇyālokasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:96_17: evaṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ brahmantrān prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:96_19: evaṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ brahmamantranānātvaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:96_21: evaṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ brahmamantraikatvaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:96_23: evaṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ brahmamantrasaṃbhedaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:96_31: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe yathā ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvānāṃ sarvavyavahāraniruktimantrasaṃjñāsāgaramavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:96_32: tathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu apramāṇeṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu acintyeṣu atulyeṣu asamanteṣu asīmāprāpteṣu anabhilāpyanabhilāpyeṣu,
S04bsu016_u:96_33_0: tathā dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣvapramāṇeṣu
S04bsu016_u:96_33_1: yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyeṣu sattvānāṃ sarvavyavahāraniruktimantrasaṃjñāsāgaramavatarāmi - yaduta devānāṃ devamantrān prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:96_36: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:97_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe vanavāsī nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:98_1_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako meghasya dramiḍasya pādau śirasābhivandya dharmagauraveṇa kṛtvā mūlaṃ jātaśraddhālakṣaṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:98_1_1: prarūpayamāṇaḥ kalyāṇamitrānugatāṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyan aśrumukho rudan meghaṃ dramiḍamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:98_1_2: punaḥ punaravalokya praṇipatya meghasya dramiḍasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:100_12: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ārya,
S04bsu016_u:100_19_0: yaduta sarvabuddhārāgaṇatāyai sarvabuddhābhirādhanatāyai sarvabuddhadarśanatāyai sarvabuddhavijñaptaye sarvabuddhasamatānugamāya
S04bsu016_u:100_21_0: evamabhiprāyaḥ evaṃmanorathaḥ evamabhinandyaḥ evamāśayaḥ evaṃnidhyaptiparamaḥ evaṃgocarābhimukhaḥ evanayānugamābhimukhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:100_22: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti,
S04bsu016_u:100_23_0: cittagahanamavabhāsayati, cittamalamapaharati, cittasaṃtatiṃ prasādayati, cittakauṭilyamapanayati, cittatāpaṃ prahlādayati,
S04bsu016_u:100_23_1: vyāvartayati, saṃsāracittaṃ vinivartayati, akuśalebhyo vivartayati, narakebhyo vivecayati, niketanebhya uccālayati, anabhiniveśāt
S04bsu016_u:100_28: anugamamukheṣu sthāpayati, svabhāvanidhyaptau spharati, balānugamena vibhajati sarvajagatsamatānugamāya cittam /
S04bsu016_u:100_29: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam? kathamabhiyoktavyam? kathaṃ prayoktavyam? kathaṃ prayuktasya kṣipraṃ viśudhyati bodhisattvacaryāmaṇḍalam?
S04bsu016_u:101_0_0: atha khalu muktakaḥ śreṣṭhī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvabuddhakṣetrasamavasaraṇaṃ nāma anantāvartadhāraṇīmukhapūrvaṃgamaṃ bodhisattvasamādhimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:101_2_0: samanantarasamāpannasya ca muktakasya śreṣṭhinastathārūpā kāyapariśuddhiḥ saṃsthitā yayā kāyapariśuddhayā daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
S04bsu016_u:101_2_1: buddhā bhagavantaḥ saha buddhakṣetrapariśuddhayā saparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ saha prabhāviśuddhayā sapūrvacaryāsaṃvāsāḥ sabuddhavikurvitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:101_3_0: anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyānāvaraṇā anyonyasuvibhaktā anyonyasuvyavasthitanānākalpasaṃsthānā yathāvadvijñaptā nānābuddhakṣetravyūhāḥ
S04bsu016_u:101_8: kvacidantaḥpuramadhyagatāḥ, kvacidabhiniṣkrāmantaḥ kvacidbodhimaṇḍavaragatāḥ mahāvyūhavikurvitamārasainyaparājayaṃ kurvantaḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:101_13_0: yacca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante nānāsattvanikāyeṣu nānāsattvalokeṣu nānāsattvagatiṣu nānāsattvopapattiṣu nānāsattvasaṃnipāteṣu
S04bsu016_u:101_13_3: sattvanayeṣu nānāśayaprayogeṣu sattvasamudreṣu nānendriyavimātratāviśuddheṣu nānākleśavāsanānuśayiteṣu sattvaprasareṣu vividhabuddhivikurvitasaṃdarśanairnānāniruktibhirnānāsvarāṅgarutanirhārairnānāsūtrāntanayodāhārairnānādhāraṇīmukhaparivartairnānāpratisaṃvinnayaprabhavairnānāsatyanāmasamudraparivartaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:101_14_3: parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu yatte buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante sarvasvarāṅgarutaghoṣānugāminyā tathāgatavācā,
S04bsu016_u:101_15: taṃ sarvaṃ sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ śṛṇoti udgṛhṇāti saṃdhārayati pravartayati upanidhyāyati /
S04bsu016_u:101_16: tacca vikurvitaṃ paśyati, tāṃ ca acintyāṃ bodhisattvasamādhivṛṣabhitām /
S04bsu016_u:102_0: atha khalu muktakaḥ śreṣṭhī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstasmātsamādhervyūtthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgavyūhaṃ nāma tathāgatavimokṣamāyūhāmi niryūhāmi /
S04bsu016_u:102_1_0: tasya me kulaputra asaṅgavyūhaṃ tathāgatavimokṣamāyūhato niryūhataḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi jāmbūnadaprabhāsavatyāṃ lokadhātau tāreśvararājo
S04bsu016_u:102_1_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ vairocanagarbhabodhisattvapramukhena sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalena cakṣuṣa
S04bsu016_u:102_2_0: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi sarvabalavegavatyāṃ lokadhātau samantagandhavitāno nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ cintārājabodhisattvapramukhena
S04bsu016_u:102_3_0: paścimāyāṃ diśi sarvagandhaprabhāsavatyāṃ lokadhātau merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhamasaṅgacittabodhisattvapramukhena
S04bsu016_u:102_4_0: uttarāyāṃ diśi kāṣāyadhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau vajrapramardano nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ vajrapadavikrāmibodhisattvapramukhena
S04bsu016_u:102_5_0: uttarapūrvāyāṃ diśi sarvaratnarucirāyāṃ lokadhātau anilambhacakṣurvairocano nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhamanilambhasunirmitabodhisattvapūrvaṃgamena
S04bsu016_u:102_6_0: pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi gandhārciḥprabhāsvarāyāṃ lokadhātau gandhapradīpo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvadharmadhātutalabhedaketurājabodhisattvapūrvaṃgamena
S04bsu016_u:102_7_0: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi sūryakesaranirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau samantamukhajñānavirocanaghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:102_8_0: paścimottarāyāṃ diśi gandhālaṃkāraruciraśubhagarbhāyāṃ lokadhātāvapramāṇaguṇasāgaraprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:102_9_0: aghodiśi ratnasiṃhāvabhāsajvalanāyāṃ lokadhātau dharmadhātuvidyotitaraśmirnām tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sārdhaṃ dharmadhātvarcirvairocanasaṃbhavamatibodhisattvapūrvaṃgamena
S04bsu016_u:102_10_0: ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi lakṣaṇaruciravairocanāyāṃ lokadhātāvapratihataguṇakīrtivimokṣaprabharājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:103_0: iti hi kulaputra, etān daśa tathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:103_2: na cāhaṃ tatra gacchāmi / yasyāṃ ca velāyāmicchāmi, tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:103_11: iti hi kulaputra yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi yasyāṃ yasyāṃ lokadhātau yaṃ yameva tathāgataṃ draṣṭumākāṅkṣāmi,
S04bsu016_u:103_13: yasmin yasminnadhvani yasmin yasminnārambaṇe yasyāṃ yasyāṃ pūrvacayāyāṃ tathāgataṃ draṣṭumākāṅkṣāmi,
S04bsu016_u:103_14: yasmin yasmin vikurvitakāraṇe yasmin yasmin sattvavinayakāraṇe yaṃ yaṃ tathāgataṃ draṣṭumākāṅkṣāmi,
S04bsu016_u:103_17: na cāhaṃ tatra gacchāmi / so 'haṃ kulaputra na kutaścidāgamanatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prajānan,
S04bsu016_u:103_27: evamanugacchāmi [Gv_67] evamanusmarāmi svacittādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharma iti /
S04bsu016_u:104_0: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - svacittamevopastambhayitavyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:104_10: etamahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgavyūhatathāgatavimokṣaṃ jānāmi āyūhāmi niryūhāmi /
S04bsu016_u:104_13: na caiṣāmātmani lokadhātuṣu vā dvayasaṃjñā pravartate /
S04bsu016_u:105_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe milaspharaṇaṃ nāma jambūdvīpaśīrṣam /
S04bsu016_u:105_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:106_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako muktakasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya muktakaṃ śreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:106_0_1: punaḥ punaravalokya muktakasya śreṣṭhino 'saṃkhyān guṇānudānayan upavicārayan,
S04bsu016_u:106_1_0: abhilaṣan, avijahan rudan paridevan kalyāṇamitrasnehajātaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratiśaraṇaḥ kalyāṇamitrārāgaṇābhimukhaḥ kalyāṇamitrajñānamavikopayan
S04bsu016_u:106_1_1: kalyāṇamitrādhīnāṃ sarvajñatāṃ samanupaśyan kalyāṇamitrānugatāśayaḥ kalyāṇamitropāyasādhyopacāraḥ kalyāṇamitracetanāvaśartī,
S04bsu016_u:108_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāmeva muktakasya śreṣṭhino 'nuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:108_12_0: anupūrveṇa yena milaspharaṇaṃ jambūdvīpaśīrṣaṃ tenopasaṃkramya sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣuṃ parimārgayan apaśyadanyatarasminnāśrame
S04bsu016_u:108_13: tasya tathā samāpannasya gambhīrasya śāntasya nirunmiñjitasya nirālambasya romāñcordhvakāyasya sarvaromamukhebhyo 'cintyaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣavikurvitaṃ pravartayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:108_14_0: yena vimokṣamukhavikurvitena sa cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharati anantanānāvikurvitavikalpaiḥ sarvasattvaparipākāya
S04bsu016_u:109_1_0: brāhmaṇagṛhapatīṃśca sarvānnapānavidhibhiḥ sarvasāṅgopacāraiḥ sarvābharaṇaiḥ sarvavastraiḥ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:109_1_1: sarvavilepanaiḥ sarvakāmopacāraiḥ sarvaratnaiḥ sarvāyatanaiḥ sarvabhājanavidhibhiḥ sarvopakaraṇavidhibhiḥ daridrān sattvān
S04bsu016_u:109_1_2: saṃgṛhyamāṇān duḥkhitaṃ jagadāśvāsayamānān satvamanāṃsi paritoṣayamānān sattvāśayān viśodhayamānān sattvān bodhau paripācayamānān
S04bsu016_u:110_0_0: jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ niścaritvā kṣatriyapaṇḍitarūpān brāhmaṇapaṇḍitarūpān lokapaṇḍitarūpān vividhaśilpapaṇḍitarūpān manuṣyagatipaṇḍitarūpān
S04bsu016_u:110_0_2: vacāṃsyudīrayato durmanasaḥ sattvān praharṣamāṇān dharmadhanaparihīṇān sattvānanugṛhyamāṇān duḥkhitān sattvān sukhayamānān
S04bsu016_u:110_0_3: vinipatitān sattvānabhyuddharamāṇān [Gv_69] vipannayānapātrān sattvānāśvāsayamānān bhītān sattvān paritrāyamāṇān kuśalamūlaśabdamanuśrāvayamāṇān
S04bsu016_u:110_0_4: pāpavinivṛttiśabdamudīrayamāṇān kuśaladharmasamādāpane sattvān viniyojayamānān arthacaryāyāṃ sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānān prītivegaṃ
S04bsu016_u:110_0_5: saṃjanayamānān priyavāditāsaṃgrahavastūnyudīrayamāṇān samānārthatāṃ ca lokasyopadarśayamānān daśa diśaḥ spharitvā gacchato
S04bsu016_u:111_0_0: nābhimaṇḍalāt sarvasattvān sattvajagaccharīrasaṃsthānān ajinacīvaravalkaladharān daṇḍakāṣṭhakuṇḍikāgṛhītān nānārūpān kalpasaṃsthānān
S04bsu016_u:111_0_1: praśānteryāpathān ṛṣigaṇānniścaritvā uparyantarīkṣe buddhavarṇānudīrayamānān dharmaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayamāṇān buddhaghoṣaṃ niścārayamāṇān
S04bsu016_u:111_0_2: bodhisattvasaṃghaṃ saṃdarśayamānān brahmacaryaṃ saṃpravarṇayamānān guptendriyatāyāṃ sattvānniyojayamānān niḥsvabhāvārthaṃ
S04bsu016_u:111_0_3: prarūpayamāṇān jñānārthe lokaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayamānān laukikaśāstravidhiṃ praṇayamānān sarvajñajñānaniryāṇamārgavidhiṃ pradarśayamānān
S04bsu016_u:111_0_4: anupūrvakriyāyāṃ sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānān daśa diśaḥ spharitvā gacchato 'paśyat /
S04bsu016_u:112_0_0: dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ sarvalokapravṛttisaṃkhyā acintyānekaśarīrasaṃsthānanāgakanyā niścaritvā acintyaṃ nāgavikurvitaṃ saṃdarśayamānāḥ
S04bsu016_u:112_0_2: sarvamākāśadhātuṃ vyūhayamānā acintyaratnachatrameghālaṃkāraiḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ saṃchādayamānā acintyaratnadhvajameghālaṃkāram
S04bsu016_u:112_5: sarvalokadhātuprasarānalaṃkurvatīḥ sarvasattvāni praharṣayamāṇāḥ sarvabuddhān pūjayamānāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇāḥ sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyat /
S04bsu016_u:113_0_1: mahājaladharān saṃkṣobhayamāṇān lokadhātuśatasahasrāṇi saṃprakampayamānān sarvaśailendrarājānj saṃghaṭṭayamānān sarvadevabhavanāni
S04bsu016_u:113_0_2: saṃprakampayamānān [Gv_70] sarvamāramaṇḍalāni jihmīkurvāṇān sarvamārasainyaṃ pramardayamānān sarvalokamadamānadarpān prabhañjayamānān
S04bsu016_u:113_0_3: praduṣṭacittānnivārya prasādayamānān vihiṃsācittān pratinivārayamāṇān sattvānāmakuśalān dharmānupaśamayamānān kleśaparvatān
S04bsu016_u:113_0_4: vikirayamāṇān raṇasaṃgrāmānupaśamayamānān vividhāsuramāyāvikurvitavikrīḍitaiḥ sattvān saṃvejayamānān pāpādudvejayamānān saṃsārāduntrāsayamānān
S04bsu016_u:113_0_5: sarvabhavagatibhya uccālya anikete niveśayamānān bodhicitte sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānān bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ viśodhayamānān
S04bsu016_u:113_0_6: bodhisattvān pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayamānān bodhisattvabhūmiṣu avatārayamāṇān bodhisattvānāṃ buddhadharmanayāvabhāsaṃ janayamānān
S04bsu016_u:113_0_7: nānādharmanayavyavasthānaiścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe dharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇānapaśyat sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:114_0_1: sattvānāmātmābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nirātmatāṃ niḥsattvatāmudīrayamāṇān śāśvatābhiniviṣṭānāṃ sarvasaṃskārānityatāṃ paridīpayamānān
S04bsu016_u:114_0_3: jñānaviṣayasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmanayabhidyotayamānān viṣayābhiratānāmanālayatāṃ kathayamānān śāntau niketāśayatānāṃ praṇidhiviśeṣamabhirocayamānān
S04bsu016_u:115_0_1: nāneryāpathavikalpān nānāyānābhirūḍhān nānāparivāraparivṛtān sattvadhātuparipālanaprayuktān nānāprabhāvabhāsaprayuktān nānāghoṣanirghoṣanigarjitān
S04bsu016_u:115_2_1: dharmacakramanupravartayamānān paravādicakraṃ nigṛhyamāṇān sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyat /
S04bsu016_u:116_0_2: buddhastotrāṇyudīrayamāṇān bodhicittaṃ paridīpayamānān bodhisattvacaryāṃ saṃvarṇayamānān sarvābhisaṃbodhimukhānyabhiṣṭavamānān
S04bsu016_u:116_0_4: [Gv_71] saṃparigṛhyamāṇān sarvasattvamukhāni saṃpraharṣayamāṇān sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi pariśodhayamānān sarvadharmamukhāni abhidyotayamānān
S04bsu016_u:116_0_5: sarvāvaraṇamukhāni vinivartayamānān sarvakuśalamūlamukhāni saṃjayamānān dharmadhātuṃ spharayamāṇān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako
S04bsu016_u:117_0_1: pramuñcamānān sarvaratnākarānutsṛjyamānān sarvamaṇiratnākarān viśrāṇayamānān daridrān sadhanīkurvāṇān prāṇivadhāllokaṃ vinivartayamānān
S04bsu016_u:117_0_3: kāmamithyācārādvicchandayamānān brahmacarye pratiṣṭhāpayamānān mṛṣāvādādvinivartayamānān asaṃvivādaparamatāyāṃ niyojayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:117_21: daśa diśo dharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyat /
S04bsu016_u:118_22: evaṃ sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu aparimāṇasattvakāryaprayuktāni sarvasattvadharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇānyapaśyat sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:120_0_1: sarvabuddhānabhiṣṭavamānān sarvabodhisattvān praharṣayamāṇān aparimāṇasattvakāryaprayuktān daśa diśaḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇān
S04bsu016_u:121_0_1: anuvyañjanavicitragātratāṃ prabhāvayamānān anantamadhyaprabhāmaṇḍalameghān pramuñcamānān sarvabuddhānāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāmārabhya
S04bsu016_u:121_0_3: saṃdarśayamānān dānacaryāṃ lokasya saṃvarṇayamānān mātsaryamalaṃ vinivartayamānān sarvagrāhotsarge sattvānniyojayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:121_10: mahākaruṇāśīlaṃ saṃvarṇayitvā tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya buddhamārgapratipattiśīle sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:121_11: svapnopamāṃ bhavagatiṃ sattvānāṃ prabhāvayitvā svapnavidhisamavasaraṇatāyai viṣayaparigrahakleśavaśitāyāṃ sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:121_80: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe dharmadhātuṃ spharamāṇān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyat /
S04bsu016_u:122_11: prathamacittotpādikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pragraha kośopacayagarbhaṃ nāma dharmameghavarṣamabhipravarṣamāṇān,
S04bsu016_u:123_7_0: [Gv_76] kutaścidromamukharaśmijālamaṇḍalād yāni sarvabodhisattvacaryānirūpaṇāni yānyātmabhāvopādānāni ye kulopapattiparigrahāya
S04bsu016_u:123_11: yāni nṛpādhipatyāni, yāni naiṣkramyamukhāni, ye vratasamādānākalperyāpathāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:124_2: yathā caikatvaṃ dharmapadaṃ tathā sarvadharmapadāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni yāni sarvajagadupapattipratibhāsaiḥ kāyaiḥ paryeṣitāni,
S04bsu016_u:124_7: yāni ca sarvapraṇidhyabhinirhāramaṇḍalāni teṣu teṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu abhinirhṛtāni sarvasaṃsāradoṣāṇāṃ tasya tasya saṃsāradoṣasya pratipakṣeṇa,
S04bsu016_u:125_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣuṃ tathā samāhitamupanidhyāyantamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:125_12: ardhamāsamapi, māsadvayamapi, yāvat ṣaḍapi māsān ṣaḍ vā rātriṃdivāni sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ purato 'tināmayati /
S04bsu016_u:125_13: tataḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ māsānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca rātriṃdivānāmatyayena sāradhvajo bhikṣustasmātsamādhervyutthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:125_16_0: yāvadvipulo yāvadapramāṇaviṣayo yāvadacintyavikurvitavyūhaḥ yāvadatulyālokaḥ yāvadasaṃkhyeyavyūhaḥ yāvadasaṃhāryagocaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:125_23: ko nāma ārya eṣa samādhiḥ? āha - asti kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:125_27: āha - etāvatparamaḥ ārya asya samādherviṣayaḥ? āha - etaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ samāpannasya adhiṣṭhānaṃ lokadhātuvijñaptiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:125_51_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāvihārasāgarāvatīrṇānāṃ dharmadhātuviṣayamativiśuddhānāṃ sarvadharmagatyanusṛtijñānināṃ vipulabuddhyapramāṇaviṣayaspharaṇānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:125_52: guṇān vā vaktum, gocaro vā nidarśayitum, [Gv_78] viṣayo vā prabhāvayitum,
S04bsu016_u:125_56: samādhisroto va anusartum, cittaviṣayo vā jñātum, jñānaṃ vā samatā vā avagantum //
S04bsu016_u:126_0: gaccha kulaputra ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe samudravetāḍī nāma pratyuddeśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:126_1: tatra samantavyūhaṃ nāmodyānaṃ mahāprabhasya nagarasya pūrveṇa /
S04bsu016_u:126_2: tatra āśā nāmopāsikā prativasati suprabhasya manujendrasya bhāryā /
S04bsu016_u:126_3: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:127_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣorantikādāttasāraḥ
S04bsu016_u:127_0_2: viśuddhimukhānugatāloko digālokaprasṛtajñānaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:127_0_3: sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣumavalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punaravalokayan abhivilokayan nipatan praṇipatan namasyan avanaman manasikurvaṃścintayan
S04bsu016_u:127_0_4: bhāvayan pāribhāvayan udānamudānayan hākkāraṃ kurvan guṇānabhimukhīkurvan anugamayan anusmaran anusmārayan dṛḍhīkurvan avijahan
S04bsu016_u:127_0_5: manasā āgamayan upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran darśanamabhilaṣan svaranimittamudgṛhṇan dhārayan dhāraṇānugatacitto varṇasaṃsthānamanusmaran
S04bsu016_u:127_0_6: jñānaviśeṣamanuvicintayan samādhiviṣayaṃ samavataran praṇidhiviṣayamanuprabandhan gocaraviṣayaṃ vicārayan jñānāvabhāsaṃ saṃpratīcchan
S04bsu016_u:129_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitraguṇārādhitaḥ kalyāṇamitrasaṃpreṣitaḥ kalyāṇamitradarśanāveśāviṣṭaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṃ pratipadyamānaḥ kalyāṇavacanānyanusmaran,
S04bsu016_u:129_7: tasmin khalu punaḥ samantavyūhe mahodyāne daśa prāsādakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi sarvamahāmaṇiratnapratimaṇḍitaniryūhavyūhāni,
S04bsu016_u:129_10_0: daśa puṣkariṇīśatasahasrāṇi sarvaratnamayāni ratneṣṭakānicitāni saptaratnavicitrasopānāni nānāmaṇiratnavedikāparivṛtāni divyacandanavāriniṣyandagandhāni
S04bsu016_u:129_13_0: tasya codyānasya madhya vicitradhvajaṃ nāma mahāvimānaṃ sāgaragarbharatnapṛthivītalasaṃsthānaṃ vaidūryamaṇiratnastambhopaśobhitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:129_14_0: tasmiṃśca vicitradhvaje mahāvimāne 'parimitānyāsanāni prajñaptāni - yaduta padmagarbhāṇi digrocanamaṇiratnapadmagarbhāṇi
S04bsu016_u:129_15: tasya ca vicitradhvajasya mahāvimānasya aneke niryūhā acintyaratnamayā vicitraratnavyūhā acintyavarṇanirbhāsarucirasaṃsthānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:129_19_0: yaduta ratnagarbhakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ ratnacchatrajālaiḥ ratnabimbajālaiḥ sāgaragarbhamuktājālaiḥ nīlavaiḍūryamaṇiratnajālaiḥ siṃhalatājālaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:129_21_0: daśabhiśca mahāvabhāsaśatasahasrairavabhāsitam - yaduta jyotiraśmimaṇiratnāvabhāsena ādityagarbhamaṇiratnāvabhāsena candradhvajamaṇiratnāvabhāsena
S04bsu016_u:129_24_0: yatra āśopāsikā kāñcanagarbhamahābhadrāsanopaviṣṭā sāgaragarbhamuktājālālaṃkṛtā avabaddhamakuṭā divyātirekakanakakeyūravalayabāhuvyūhā
S04bsu016_u:129_25: tatra ye āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ sakāśamaparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:129_26_0: mahābrahmāṇo vā brahmapurohitā vā brahmakāyikā vā vaśavartino vā paranirmitavaśavartikāyikā vā sunirmitā vā nirmāṇaratikāyikā
S04bsu016_u:129_26_1: vā saṃtuṣitā vā tuṣitakāyikā vā suyāmā vā suyāmakāyikā vā devendrā vā trāyastriṃśatkāyikā vā yakṣendrā vā yakṣā vā gandharvendrā
S04bsu016_u:129_26_2: vā gandharvā vā kumbhāṇḍendrā vā kumbhāṇḍā vā nāgendrā vā nāgā vā asurendrā vā asurā vā garuḍendrā vā garuḍā va kinnarendrā
S04bsu016_u:129_26_3: vā kinnarā vā mahoragendrā va mahoragā vā yamā vā yamakanyā vā,
S04bsu016_u:129_27: pretamaharddhikā vā pretā vā manuṣyendrā vā manusyā vā /
S04bsu016_u:129_28: evaṃ ye dakṣiṇāyā vā paścimāyā uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyā pūrvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ paścimottarāyā adha [Gv_81] ūrdhvāyā diśa āgacchati /
S04bsu016_u:129_29_0: mahābrahmāṇo va brahmapurohitā vā brahmakāyikā vā vaśavartino vā vaśavartikāyikā vā yāvanmanuṣyendrā vā manuṣyā vā āgacchanti
S04bsu016_u:130_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantavyūhamudyānaṃ praviśya samantādanuvilokayan adrākṣīdāśāmupāsikāṃ bhadrāsane niṣaṇṇām /
S04bsu016_u:130_2: upetya āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya āśopāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya etadavocat - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:130_3: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:130_4: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:130_5: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:131_0: sā āha - ahaṃ kulaputra, aśokakṣemadhvajasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:131_1: sāhaṃ kulaputra amoghadarśanā amoghaśravaṇā amoghaparyupāsanā amoghaikavāsasaṃvāsanā amoghānusmaraṇā /
S04bsu016_u:131_2: nāhaṃ kulaputra, anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchāmi darśanavijñaptyā,
S04bsu016_u:131_4: mama kulaputra sahadarśanena sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu016_u:131_6: pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathāgatā āgatya iha ratnāsane niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu016_u:131_7: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ daśabhyo digbhyaḥ / sāhaṃ kulaputra avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena,
S04bsu016_u:131_9: yānyapīmāni kulaputra caturaśītiḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi iha samantavyūhe mahodyāne prativasanti,
S04bsu016_u:131_14: āha - kiyaccirotpāditaṃ tvayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam? āha - ahaṃ kulaputra pūrvenivāsamanusmarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:131_17: sa ca me tathāgataḥ pūjitaḥ, dharmadeśanā ca me tasyāntikādudgṛhītā /
S04bsu016_u:131_22: sa mayā ārāgitaḥ / tasya pareṇa meruśrīrnāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
