S04bsu016_u:131_29_0: anena kulaputra paryāyeṇa jātiparaṃparayā kalpaparaṃparayā buddhaparaṃparāmavatarantī anusmaramāṇā tathāgatānarhato 'nantaryatayā
S04bsu016_u:131_30: ye mayā ārāgitā upasthitāḥ pūjitā arcitāḥ yeṣāṃ mayā antikāddharmadeśanā śrutā,
S04bsu016_u:131_31: yeṣāṃ ca me śāsane brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam /
S04bsu016_u:131_38: apramāṇāḥ kulaputra, bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryayā sarvakṣetreṣu sarvakalpasamavasaraṇatayā,
S04bsu016_u:132_0_0: sudhana āha - kiyaccireṇa ārye tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase? āha - na khalu kulaputra ekasattvārambaṇatayā
S04bsu016_u:132_1_0: na sattvaśatasyārthāya, na sattvasahasrasya, na sattvaśatasahasrasya, na sattvakoṭeḥ, na sattvakoṭīśatasya, na sattvakoṭīsahasrasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_1_1: na sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasya arthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
S04bsu016_u:132_2_0: na sattvakaṅkarasyārthāya, na sattvabimbarasya, na sattvapravarasya, na sattvaparamasya, na sattvāvarasya, na sattvāsīnasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_1: na sattvānaupamyasya, na sattvanemasya, na sattvavipāsasya, na sattvamṛgavasya, na sattvavināhasya, na sattvavirāgasya, na
S04bsu016_u:132_2_2: sattvāvagamasya, na sattvavivagasya, na sattvasaṃkramasya, na sattvavisarasya, na sattvavijaṅgasya, na sattvavisrotasaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_3: na sattvavivāhasya, na sattvavibhakteḥ, na sattvavigdhantasya, na sattvatulanasya, na sattvātulasya, na sattvavaraṇasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_4: na sattvavivaraṇasya, na sattvavanasya, na sattvavivarṇasya, na sattvasāmyasya, na sattvavaraṇasya, na sattvavicārasya, na
S04bsu016_u:132_2_5: sattvavisārasya, na sattvavyatyastasya, na sattvābhyudgatasya, na sattvavisṛṣṭasya, na sattvadevalasya, na sattvaparibhedasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_6: na sattvavikṣobhasya, na sattvapaliguñjasya, na sattvaharitasya, [Gv_83] na sattvālokasya, na sattvendriyasya, na sattvahelukasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_7: na sattvadurbudasya, na sattvaharuṇasya, na sattvamālutasya, na sattvamailutasya, na sattvakṣayasya, na sattvākṣayamuktasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_8: na sattvailatāyāḥ, na sattvamālutāyāḥ, na sattvamaṇḍumāyāḥ, na sattvaviṣamatāyāḥ, na sattvasamatāyāḥ, na sattvapramantāyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:132_2_9: na sattvapramartāyāḥ, na sattvāmantrāyāḥ, na sattvānnamantrāyāḥ, na sattvasaṅgamantrāyāḥ, na sattvavimantrāyāḥ na sattvahimantrāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:132_3_0: na sattvamelāyāḥ, na sattvasaraḍasya, na sattvamārutasya, na sattvamerutasya, na sattvakhelutasya, na sattvamālutasya, na
S04bsu016_u:132_3_1: sattvamulutasya, na sattvājavasya, na sattvakamalasya, na sattvakamarasya, na sattvātarasya, na sattvaheluvasya, na sattvaveluvasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_3_2: na sattvajāvakasya, na sattvahavasya, na sattvahavalasya, na sattvabimbarasya, na sattvabimbahurasya, na sattvacaraṇasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_3_3: na sattvacaramasya, na sattvaparavasya, na sattvadhavarasya, na sattvapramadasya, na sattvavigamasya, na sattvodvartanasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_3_4: na sattvanirdeśasya, na sattvakṣayasya, na sattvasaṃbhūtasya, na sattvamamasya, na sattvavadasya arthāya, na sattvotpalasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_3_5: na sattvapadmasya, na sattvasaṃkhyāyāḥ, na sattvopāgamasya, na sattvagatyāḥ na sattvāsaṃkhyeyasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_8_0: na sattvāgaṇeyasya,na sattvāgaṇeyaparivartasya, na sattvātulyasya, na sattvātulyaparivartasya, na sattvācintyasya, na sattvācintyaparivartasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_9: na sattvāmāpyasya, na sattvāmāpyaparivartasya, na sattvānabhilāpyasya, na sattvānabhilāpyaparivartasya,
S04bsu016_u:132_18: na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya,
S04bsu016_u:132_19: api tu aśeṣaniḥśeṣānavaśeṣasarvalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya /
S04bsu016_u:132_71: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra sarvadharmasamavasaraṇā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā yaduta jñānānugamāya /
S04bsu016_u:132_73: tasyā mama kulaputra evaṃpraṇidheryanniṣṭhā kāma dhātuviśuddhiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:132_79: āha - ko nāma ārye eṣa vimokṣaḥ? āha - aśokakṣemadhvajo nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:132_81: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sāgarasamacittānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmasaṃpratīcchanatayā,
S04bsu016_u:132_90: śakropamānāṃ sarvajagadārakṣāpratipannatayā caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:133_0: gaccha kulaputra ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe samudravetālyāṃ nālayurnāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:133_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha / sa te kulaputra bodhisattvacaryāmupadekṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:134_1_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya āśāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:134_1_1: punaḥ punaravalokya praṇipatya aśrumukho rudan bodhiparamadurlabhatāmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:136_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvānuśāsanyanugatacitto bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanānugatacitto bodhisattvapuṇyabalavivardhanacitto
S04bsu016_u:136_1_0: tena ca samayena bhīṣmottaranirghoṣarṣiranyatamasminnāśramapade viharati sma asaṃkhyeyavicitradrumalatāvanaramaṇīye vividhavṛkṣapatrasaṃchanne
S04bsu016_u:136_2_0: adrākṣītsudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bhīṣmottaranirghoṣamṛṣiṃ daśaṛṣisahasraparivṛtaṃ candanatalāvabaddhāyāṃ kuṭyāṃ jaṭāmakuṭadhāriṇamajinadarbhacīvaravalkalavasanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:136_15: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalibhūtaḥ purataḥ sthitvā manojñopacāreṇa manojñāṃ vācamudīrayan evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:136_16: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:136_17: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:136_18: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:137_0: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣaṛṣistāni daśa māṇavakasahasrāṇyanuvilokya evamāhaanena māṇavakāḥ kulaputreṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:137_2_0: ayaṃ sa kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvahitasukhāya pratyupasthito jñānasāgarābhimukhaḥ [Gv_88] sarvatathāgatānāṃ dharmameghān dhātukāmaḥ
S04bsu016_u:137_2_2: mahājñānāloke candre udāgatya sarvakleśapratāpaṃ praśamayitukāmo sarvasattvakuśalamūlāni vardhayitukāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:138_0_0: atha khalu tāni daśa māṇavakasahasrāṇi nānāvarṇaiḥ suruciraiḥ sugandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamavakīrya abhyavakīrya
S04bsu016_u:138_0_1: abhivandya namaskṛtvā praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya evaṃ vācamudīrayāmāsuḥ - eṣa trātā bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:138_11: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ tān māṇavakānevamāha - yena māṇavakā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:138_14: anena māṇavakāḥ kulaputreṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:138_16: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra aparājitadhvajasya bodhisattvasya vimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:138_17_0: sudhana āha - ka etasya ārya aparājitadhvajasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? tato bhīṣmāttaranirghoṣaṛṣiḥ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ
S04bsu016_u:138_17_1: prasārya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ śirasi parimārjya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā paryagṛhṇāt /
S04bsu016_u:138_18: samanantaraparigṛhītaśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bhīṣmottaranirghoṣeṇa ṛṣiṇā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā,
S04bsu016_u:138_19: atha tāvadeva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyaddaśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi /
S04bsu016_u:138_20: teṣu ca daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti sma /
S04bsu016_u:138_34_0: kvacitsapta rātriṃdivāni, kvacidardhamāsam, kvacinmāsam,kvacitsaṃvatsaraṃ kvacidvarṣaśataṃ kvacidvarṣasahasraṃ kvacidvarṣaśatasahasraṃ
S04bsu016_u:138_34_1: kvacidvarṣakoṭiṃ [Gv_89] kvacidvarṣakoṭīśataṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭisahasraṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭyayutaṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭīniyutaṃ
S04bsu016_u:138_35_0: kvacitkalpaṃ kvacitkalpaśataṃ kvacitkalpasahasraṃ kvacitkalpaśatasahasraṃ kvacitkalpakoṭīṃ kvacitkalpakoṭīśataṃ kvacitkalpakoṭīsahasraṃ
S04bsu016_u:139_0: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyamuñcat /
S04bsu016_u:139_1: sa punarapi bhīṣmottaranirghoṣasya ṛṣeḥ purataḥ sthitamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti /
S04bsu016_u:139_2: taṃ bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣirāha - smarasi kulaputra? āha - smarāmi ārya kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhānena /
S04bsu016_u:139_3: āha - etamahaṃ kulaputra aparājitadhvajaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:139_4_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvajagadviśeṣajñānābhijñāvatārasamādhipratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakālacakravaśavartināṃ buddhalakṣaṇajñānābhinirhārakuśalānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:139_4_3: caryā jñātuṃ guṇā vā vaktuṃ praṇidhiviśeṣo vā sūcayituṃ kṣetrābhisaṃskāro vā jñātuṃ jñānaviṣayo avagāhituṃ samādhigocaro
S04bsu016_u:139_4_4: vā anusartuṃ ṛdvivikurvitaṃ vā avatarituṃ vimokṣavṛṣabhitāvikrīḍitaṃ vā anugantuṃ śarīravibhaktinimittaṃ vā udgrahītuṃ svaramaṇḍalaviśuddhirvā
S04bsu016_u:140_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe īṣāṇo nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:140_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:141_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhīṣmottaranirghoṣasya ṛṣeḥ pādau
S04bsu016_u:141_0_1: śirasābhivandya bhīṣmottaranirghoṣaṃ ṛṣimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya bhīṣmottaranirghoṣasya
S04bsu016_u:143_0_10: saṃpaśyan anantasattvaparipākavinayānugamaṃ saṃpaśyan anantasattvadikkālasaṃjñāgatavicitratāṃ saṃpaśyan kalyāṇamitrāṇyabhimukhīkurvāṇo
S04bsu016_u:143_1: tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ / tena ca samayena jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇa ugraṃ tapaḥ tapyati sarvajñatāmārambaṇīkṛtya /
S04bsu016_u:144_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:144_2: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:144_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam, śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:144_4: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:144_5: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / sa āha - gaccha kulaputra, etaṃ kṣuradhāramārgaṃ parvatamabhiruhya atra agnikhadāyāṃ prapata /
S04bsu016_u:145_0: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya etadabhavat - durlabhā aṣṭākṣaṇavinivṛttiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:145_3: durlabho buddhotpādaḥ / durlabhā avikalendriyatā / durlabho buddhadharmaśravaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:145_9: mā haivāyaṃ māro bhaviṣyati mārādhiṣṭhito vā mārakāyiko vā kalyāṇamitrapratirūpako vā bodhisattvakhaṇḍako vā,
S04bsu016_u:145_13: mā khalu māṃ viṣameṇa pathā praṇetukāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:145_14: mā khalu me dharmamukhāntarāyaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:145_15: tasyaivaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktasya daśa brahmasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - mā kulaputra evaṃ cetanāṃ dṛḍhīkārṣīḥ /
S04bsu016_u:145_16: eṣa kulaputra āryo vajrārciḥsamādhyavabhāsalabdhaḥ avivartyavīryo mahārambhottāraṇapratipannaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:145_24_0: etasya hi kulaputra, pañcatapastapyamānasya yāvantaḥ kecidbrāhmaṇāḥ kartṛtvamīśvaratvaṃ sarvalokajyeṣṭhatvamātmani manyante
S04bsu016_u:145_24_1: vividhadṛṣṭigatābhiniviṣṭāḥ tasya asamogratapovratasamādānaprabhāveṇa sarve svabhavaneṣu na ramante /
S04bsu016_u:145_26: tāneṣa āgatānṛddhayanubhāvenābhibhūya ugravratatapasā ca tebhyaḥ sarvadṛṣṭigatavinivartanāya sarvamānamadaprahāṇāya ca dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:146_0: daśa ca mārasahasrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe sthitvā divyairmaṇiratnairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:146_2: te vayaṃ saṃvegajātāḥ saparivārāḥ etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāma /
S04bsu016_u:146_4: yathā svacittapratilabdhā bodhāya cittamutpādya avinivartanīyā bhavāmo 'nuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:147_0: daśa ca vaśavartidevarājasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ - vayaṃ kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:147_1: asya pañcatapastapyataḥ svabhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:147_5_0: daśa ca sunirmitadevarājasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā divyasaṃgītaprayoganirnādamadhuranirghoṣeṇa pūjāṃ kṛtvā evamāhuḥ
S04bsu016_u:147_5_1: - etasya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhyastadrūpā prabhā niścarati,
S04bsu016_u:147_7: viśudhyanti, prabhāsvaratarāṇi bhavanti / imāni cābharaṇāni, imāścāpsarasaḥ, vayamapīdānīṃ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārā na kāmeṣu ratiṃ vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:147_8: na kāmasukhamabhinandāmaḥ / te vayaṃ prahlāditakāyacittāḥ etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:148_0: daśa ca saṃtuṣitadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsaragaṇoparivārāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā sarvagandhacūrṇameghavarṣamabhipravṛṣya pūjayitvā namaskṛtya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:148_4: saṃtuṣṭicittatāyai cittaparituṣṭitāyai kuśalamūlasaṃjananatāyai bodhicittotpādapratilābhāya yāvatsarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:149_0_0: daśa ca suyāmadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārāṇi divyāni māndāravakusumavarṣāṇyabhipravṛṣya evamāhuḥ - asya
S04bsu016_u:149_0_1: kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ divyasaṃgītiṣu ratirna bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:149_2: tata eṣo 'smākamupasaṃkrāntānāṃ sarvakāmarativinivartanatāyai yāvatsarvabuddhadharmapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:150_0_0: daśa ca śakradevendraśatasahasrāṇi pratyekaṃ dvātriṃśadbhirupendraiḥ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivāraiḥ sārdhaṃ divyavastraratnābharaṇakusumameghavarṣamabhipravṛtya
S04bsu016_u:150_5: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra asya saṃprekṣitena imāni meruśikharāṇi saṃprakampitāni /
S04bsu016_u:150_6: te vayaṃ vyathitasaṃvignacittāḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanadṛḍhatayā sarvajñatājñāne praṇidhimabhinirharāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:151_0_0: daśa ca nāgasahasrāṇi airāvatanandopanandanāgarājapramukhāni uparyantarikṣe gatāni divyakālānusāricandanameghairnāgakanyāsaṃgītinirnādamadhuranirghoṣairdivyagandhodakadhārāprasṛtapramuktairabhipravṛṣya
S04bsu016_u:151_0_1: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo mahāgniskandharāśibhya ābhāḥ pramuktāḥ sarvanāgabhavanānyavabhāsya vālikāvarṣasuparṇibhayānyapanayanti /
S04bsu016_u:151_1: krodhapravṛttiṃ caiṣāṃ praśamayitvā āśayaṃ prahlādya manaḥ prasādayanti /
S04bsu016_u:151_4: atyayaṃ deśayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04bsu016_u:152_0_0: daśa ca yakṣendrasahasrāṇi gaganatale sthitvā nānāvidhayā pūjayā pūjayitvā jayoṣmāyatanaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sudhanaṃ ca śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhuḥ
S04bsu016_u:152_0_1: - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmatpārṣadānāṃ manuṣyeṣu maitraṃ cittaṃ saṃjāyate /
S04bsu016_u:152_2: te maitracittā [Gv_93] aviheṭhanapratipannā asmatsakāśamupasaṃkrāmanti - vayamapīdānīṃ maitryādhipatyenābhibhūtāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:152_4: tadasmākamupasaṃkrāntānāmasya śarīraniryātā prabhā avabhāsya sarvaśarīraṃ sukhena spharati /
S04bsu016_u:152_5: sa eṣo 'smākaṃ prīṇitakāyacittānāṃ tathā dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu016_u:153_0_0: daśa ca gandharvendrasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asmākamapi kulaputra svabhavaneṣu vasatāmasya pañcatapastapyata
S04bsu016_u:153_1: te vayaṃ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭā acintyasukhasamarpitā etasyāntikamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:154_0: daśa ca asurendrasahasrāṇi mahāsamudrādabhyudgamya ākāśe dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalamavanāmyakṛtāñjalipuṭāni namasyamānāni evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:154_1: pañcatapastapyato 'smākaṃ sarve 'suralokāḥ sasāgarāṇi saśailāni ca mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalāni prakampante /
S04bsu016_u:154_2: tato vayaṃ save nihatamānamadadarpā vratatapobhibhūtā etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:154_3: upasaṃkrāntānāmeṣo 'smākaṃ sarvamāyāśāṭhyaprahāṇāya gambhīradharmakṣāntyavatārāya acaladharmatāpratiṣṭhānāya daśabalajñānapariniṣpattaye ca dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:155_0: daśa ca garuḍendrasahasrāṇi mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhāni udāraṃ māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:155_1: pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnirāśibhyaḥ prabhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsya saṃkampayati /
S04bsu016_u:155_3: sa eṣa kulaputra, asmān dharmadeśanayā mahāmaitryāṃ saṃniyojayati /
S04bsu016_u:155_9_0: daśa ca kinnarendrasahasrāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyato vāyusamīritābhyo 'smadbhavanagatatālapaṅktibhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:155_11: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo bodhāya praṇidadhāti /
S04bsu016_u:155_12: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo duṣkaraparityāgaṃ karoti /
S04bsu016_u:155_15: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmevaṃnāmā bodhisattvo savāhanaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S04bsu016_u:155_17: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma tathāgato 'navaśeṣabuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau [Gv_94] parinirvātīti /
S04bsu016_u:155_18: aparyantaḥ kulaputra bhavejjambudvīpe sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatrapalāśānāṃ paramāṇubhāgaśaḥ paricchinnānām,
S04bsu016_u:155_19: na tveva teṣāṃ tathāgatanāmnāṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhīnāṃ bodhisattvacaryāprasthānaviśeṣāṇām,
S04bsu016_u:155_21: śrotravijñaptimāgacchanti / te vayaṃ kulaputra, buddhasaṃghabodhisattvaprasthānapraṇidhicaryānāmanirghoṣeṇa mahāprītivegaharṣasaṃjātā etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:155_23: yadasmatpariṣadi aneke sattvā avivartyā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu016_u:156_0_0: aparimāṇāni ca kāmāvacaradevaputrasahasrāṇyudārodāravarṇānyākāśe sthitvā manomayyā pūjayā pūjayitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra
S04bsu016_u:156_1: yayā prabhayā avīciparyantān sarvanirayānavabhāsya sarvanairayikasattvaduḥkhāni pratiprasrabdhāni /
S04bsu016_u:156_3: te vayamasyopari cittāni prasādayitvā praṇīteṣu kāmāvacaradevanikāyeṣūpapannāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:156_4: ye vayamasya kṛtajñatayā darśanenāvitṛptāḥ sarvakāmaratimutsṛjya asya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:157_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ imamevaṃ rūpaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā
S04bsu016_u:157_0_1: jayoṣmāyanate brāhmaṇe bhūtakalyāṇamitrāsaṃjñāmutpādya jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evamāha - atyayamatyayato
S04bsu016_u:157_1: atha khalu jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:157_3: na kāṅkṣaye gurubhya ekadhā sthapitva mānasam /
S04bsu016_u:157_4: tato 'sya sarva artha bhonti te 'pi ca pradakṣiṇāḥ
S04bsu016_u:158_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ kṣuradhārācitaṃ parvataprapātamārgamabhiruhya tatra mahāgniskandhe prāpatat /
S04bsu016_u:158_1: tena prapatatā supratiṣṭhito nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:158_2: tena cāgnisparśanena praśamasukhābhijño nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:158_5: sa āha - ahaṃ kulaputra, aparyādattamaṇḍalasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:158_7_2: caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum? gaccha kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:158_9: tatra maitrāyaṇī nāma kanyā, rājñaḥ siṃhaketorduhitā, pañcakanyāśataparivārā / tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:159_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya jayoṣmāyatanaṃ brāhmaṇamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:161_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrācintyagocaraniryātaḥ udārādhimuktiviśuddho mahāyānābhimukho buddhajñānābhilāṣī
S04bsu016_u:161_0_1: buddhadharmasamavasaraṇaḥ kalyāṇamitrānubandhanābhikāṅkṣī dharmagocaravicārī asaṅgajñānābhimukho bhūtakoṭīsuviniścitaḥ jñānakoṭīsthitaviṣayaḥ
S04bsu016_u:161_0_5: vākpathopamāvatīrṇaḥ sarvarūpeṣu rūpapratibhāṣavijñaptiparamo 'nupūrveṇa yena siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya maitrāyaṇīṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_0_6: kanyāmanveṣamāṇaḥ parimārgamāṇo 'śrauṣīt - eṣā maitrāyaṇī kanyā rājñaḥ siṃhaketorduhitā pañcakanyāśataparivārā vairocanagarbhaprāsādatalābhirūḍhā
S04bsu016_u:161_0_7: uragasāracandanapāde suvarṇasūtrajālaścyote divyacīvaraprajñapte bhadrāsane upaviṣṭā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:161_1: śrutvā ca punaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ siṃhaketorgṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya rājño bahirdvāraśālāyāṃ pratyasthāt maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:161_4: dṛṣṭvā ca paripṛcchati - kva yūyaṃ gacchatha kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:161_5: kva vā āgacchatha? te 'vocan - maitrāyaṇyāḥ sakāśaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu016_u:161_7_0: iti sa prāviśat / praviṣṭo 'drākṣīttaṃ vairocanagarbhaṃ prāsādaṃ sphaṭikasaṃsthitatalāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vaiḍūryamayaiḥstambhairvajramayairbhittibhirjāmbūnadakanakakūṭaniryūhaśatasahasrālaṃkāramasaṃkhyeyamaṇiratnavicitrasahasragarbharatnādarśamaṇḍalaracitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_9: / sa tasyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:161_10: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:161_11: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:161_12: tadvadatu me āryā kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:161_13: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - prekṣasva kulaputra mama bhavanavyūhāniti /
S04bsu016_u:161_14_2: saprathamacittotpādān sacaryāpraṇidhānaviṣayān saniryāṇavyūhān sābhisaṃbodhivikurvitān sadharmacakrapravartanān saparinirvāṇadarśanān
S04bsu016_u:161_16: tathā sarvārambaṇebhyaḥ / tadyathāpi nāma udakasarasi svacche 'nāvile viprasanne gaganaṃ candrādityaṃ jyotirgaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ saṃdṛśyate pratibhāsayogena,
S04bsu016_u:161_19: so 'nuvilokya tadbuddhadarśanavyūhanimittaṃ saṃdhārayan prāñjalībhūto maitryāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā vacanaṃ saṃprekṣate sma /
S04bsu016_u:161_20: sā provāca - ahaṃ kulaputra samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:161_21: eṣa ca me samantavyūhaḥ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatanāmantikātparyanviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:161_22: te ca me tathāgatā nānāmukhapraveśairetaṃ samantavyūhaṃ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartamavatārayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:161_23_0: yaccaikena deśitam, na tad dvitīyena / āha - ka etasya ārye samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya viṣayaḥ? āha
S04bsu016_u:161_23_1: - etanmama kulaputra samantavyūhaṃ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartamabhimukhīkurvantyā upanidhyāyantyā anusarantyā vyavacārayantyā
S04bsu016_u:161_23_2: anuvicintayantyā ākārayantyā ādhārayantyā vyūhayantyā abhinirharantyāḥ samalaṃkurvantyāḥ pravicinvantyāḥ samantamukhā nāma
S04bsu016_u:161_24_0: yatra dhāraṇīmaṇḍale daśa dharmamukhāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyāvartante samavasaranti āmukhībhavanti abhipatanti parivartante
S04bsu016_u:161_24_1: - yaduta buddhakṣetramukhaṃ buddhamukhaṃ dharmamukhaṃ sarvasattvamukhamatītamukhamanāgatamukhaṃ pratyutpannamukhaṃ sthitakoṭīmukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_24_2: puṇyamukhaṃ puṇyasaṃbhāramukhaṃ jñānamukhaṃ jñānasaṃbhāramukhaṃ praṇidhānamukhaṃ praṇidhānavikalpamukhaṃ caryāmukhaṃ caryāviśuddhimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_24_3: caryāsamudayamukhaṃ caryāparipūrimukhaṃ karmamukhaṃ karmavirocanamukhaṃ karmasrotamukhaṃ karmābhisaṃskāramukhaṃ karmaviṣayamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_0: samyakkarmapratipattimukhaṃ karmavaśitāmukhaṃ sucaritamukhaṃ sucaritasamādāpanamukhaṃ samādhimukhaṃ samādhyanucāramukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_1: samādhivicāramukhaṃ samādhigocaramukhaṃ samādhivyutthānamukhamabhijñāmukhaṃ cittasāgaramukhaṃ cittaparyāyamukhaṃ cittalatāpariśuddhimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_2: cittagahanāvabhāsamukhaṃ cittasaraḥprasādanamukhaṃ cittasaṃbhavamukhaṃ cittavicāramukhaṃ sattvasaṃkleśapracāramukhaṃ kleśavāsanāmukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_3: kleśaprayogamukhamadhimuktimukhaṃ sattvacaryāmukhaṃ sattvacaryāvimātratāmukhaṃ lokasaṃbhavamukhaṃ sattvāśayamukhaṃ sattvasaṃjñāgatamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_4: diṅmukhaṃ dharmadiṅmukhaṃ mahākaruṇāmukhaṃ mahāmaitrīmukhaṃ śāntimukhaṃ vākpathamukhaṃ nayamukhamanugamamukhaṃ vibhaktimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_5: samavasaraṇamukhamasaṅgakoṭīmukhaṃ samantamukhaṃ buddhadharmamukhaṃ bodhisattvadharmamukhaṃ śrāvakadharmamukhaṃ pratyekabuddhadharmamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_25_6: lokadharmamukhaṃ lokasaṃbhavadharmamukhaṃ lokavibhavadharmamukhaṃ lokasaṃsthānadharmamukhaṃ lokadhātuviśuddhimukhaṃ lokadhātusaṃkliṣṭamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:161_28_4: sarvakālacakravaśavartināṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:162_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe trinayano nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:162_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:163_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya maitrāyaṇīṃ kanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:163_0_1: punaḥ punaravalokya maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ sakāśāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:165_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gambhīraṃ bodhisattvajñānavicāramanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:165_12_0: anupūrveṇa yena trinayano janapadastenopasaṃkramya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣuṃ mārgayamāṇo janapadavyavacāreṣu nagaravyavacāreṣu paṭṭanavyavacāreṣu
S04bsu016_u:165_12_1: nigamavyavacāreṣu grāmavyavacāreṣu ghoṣavyavacāreṣu ṛṣyāśramavyavacāreṣu deśapradeśavyavacāreṣu jalapathavyavacāreṣu giridarivyavacāreṣu
S04bsu016_u:165_12_2: mahāvanaṣaṇḍavyavacāreṣu so 'drākṣīt sudarśanaṃ bhikṣumanyatamasmin vanaṣaṇḍe caṃkramyamāṇaṃ daharaṃ taruṇamabhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ
S04bsu016_u:165_12_6: siṃhapūrvārdhakāyaṃ citāntarāṃsaṃ susaṃvṛtaskandhaṃ pralambabāhuṃ jālāvanaddhāṅguliṃ cakrāṅkitahastapādaṃ mṛdutaruṇopacitapāṇiīpādaṃ
S04bsu016_u:165_12_7: saptotsadaṃ vajrasadṛśamadhyaṃ bṛhadṛjugātraṃ suvartitoruṃ kośagatabastiguhyaṃ aiṇeyajaṅghaṃ dīrghāṅgulimāyatapādapārṣṇiṃ
S04bsu016_u:166_0: tasya khalu punaḥ sudarśanasya bhikṣoścaṃkramyamāṇasyābhimukhadigāvṛtā digdevatā diṅbhaṇḍalamāvartayanti /
S04bsu016_u:166_10: sadāvibodhanamaṇḍalā divasadevatā digrocanamaṇiratnadhvajagṛhītā gaganatale tiṣṭhanti ālokasaṃjananārthāya /
S04bsu016_u:167_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sudarśano bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ kramatalābhyāṃ nipatya sudarśanasya
S04bsu016_u:167_0_1: bhikṣoḥ kramatalaṃ paricumbya parilikhya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito
S04bsu016_u:167_1: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadāti,
S04bsu016_u:167_2: anuśāsanīmanuprayacchati / tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:167_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / sa āha - ahaṃ kulaputra daharo jātyā,
S04bsu016_u:167_4: navakastu pravajyayā / tena me kulaputra ekajanmanā aṣṭatriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmantike brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam /
S04bsu016_u:167_6_0: kvacitsapta rātriṃdivāni, kvacidardhamāsam, kvacinmāsam, kvacidvarṣam, kvacidvarṣaśatam, kvacidvarṣasahasram, kvacidvarṣaśatasahasram,
S04bsu016_u:167_7: kvacidantarakalpam, kvacidardhakalpam, kvacitkalpam, kvacinme tathāgate yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyān kalpān brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇamanayaiva kalpasaṃkhyayā /
S04bsu016_u:167_15: balasamatā caiṣāmavatīrṇā / śāsanaṃ caiṣāṃ saṃdhāritaṃ yāvatsaddharmaniṣṭhāparyantam /
S04bsu016_u:167_16: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāni svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtāni praṇidhimaṇḍalasamādhyabhinirhārabalena /
S04bsu016_u:167_17: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryā svacaryāpariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtā sarvacaryāvatārasamādhipratilambhabalena /
S04bsu016_u:167_18: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pāramitāviśuddhirabhinirhṛtā samantabhadracaryāniryāṇabalena
S04bsu016_u:167_19: / api tu khalu punarme kulaputra evaṃ caṃkramyamāṇasya sarvadiksrotomukhānyāvartante suvilokitajñānamukhatayā /
S04bsu016_u:168_0: gaccha kulaputra, idamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śramaṇamaṇḍale janapade sumukhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:168_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:169_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvavikramapratipadviśuddhiparamaḥ bodhisattvabalālokāvabhāsitacitto 'parājitabodhisattvavairyaparyādattahṛdayaḥ
S04bsu016_u:169_0_4: sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sudarśanasya
S04bsu016_u:171_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ sudarśanasya bhikṣoranuśāsanīmanumantrayan,
S04bsu016_u:171_1: pravartayan, anuprayacchan pravicinvan, prabhāṣamāṇaḥ pratibhāvayan udīrayan darśayan anuvicintayan abhyavacaran,
S04bsu016_u:171_2_0: nayaṃ vigamayan, taddharmanayamanuvicārayan avabhārayan samavasaran āvartayan saṃbhindan pradarśayan avabhāsayan anuvilokayan
S04bsu016_u:171_2_1: devanāgayakṣagandharvaparivāro 'nupūrveṇa yena śramaṇamaṇḍale janapade sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ
S04bsu016_u:171_3: tasyoparyantarikṣe gatā devanāgayakṣagandharvā ārocayanti - eṣa kulaputra indriyeśvaro dārako nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśe daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaḥ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍatīti /
S04bsu016_u:172_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:172_1: so 'drākṣīt indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaṃ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍantam /
S04bsu016_u:172_2_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryenendriyeśvaro dārakastenopasaṃkramya indriyeśvarasya dārakasya pādau śirasābhivandya indriyeśvaraṃ dārakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:172_2_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya indriyeśvarasya dārakasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:172_4: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyam śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:172_5: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:172_6: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:172_7: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - ahaṃ kulaputra mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena lipisaṃkhyāmudrāgaṇanānayaṃ śikṣayatā sarvaśilpābhijñāvabhāsajñānamukhamavatāritaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:172_8_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra, yāni imāni loke lipisaṃjñāgatāni saṃkhyāgaṇanāmudrānikṣepajñānavividhaśilpajñānānidhātutantrāṇi viṣayaprayogapratibhānakāni
S04bsu016_u:172_9_0: tāni sarvāṇi prajānāmi / teṣu ca sattvānavatārayāmi, niveśayāmi pratiṣṭhāpayāmi śikṣayāmi śīlayāmi dṛḍhīkaromi sārikaromi
S04bsu016_u:172_9_1: saṃtarāmi saṃbhāvayāmi saṃvartayāmi unnāmayāmi vivardhayāmi nimittīkaromi koṭīkaromi viśodhayāmi vimalīkaromi uttāpayāmi
S04bsu016_u:172_11: sa punaḥ katamaḥ? śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:172_12: koṭiḥ koṭīnāmayutam, ayutamayutānāṃ niyutam, niyutaṃ niyutānāṃ bimbaram, bimbaraṃ bimbarāṇāṃ kiṃkaram,
S04bsu016_u:172_13_0: kiṃkaraṃ kiṃkarāṇāmagaram, agaramagarāṇāṃ pravaram, pravaraṃ pravarāṇāṃ maparam, maparaṃ maparāṇāṃ taparam, taparaṃ taparāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:172_13_1: sīmam, sīmaṃ sīmānāṃ yāmam, yāmaṃ yāmānāṃ nemam, nemaṃ nemānāmavagam, avagamavagānāṃ mṛgavam, mṛga vaṃmṛgavānāṃ virāgam,
S04bsu016_u:172_14: vigavaṃ vigavānāṃ saṃkramam, saṃkramaṃ saṃkramāṇāṃ visaram,
S04bsu016_u:172_15: visaraṃ visarāṇāṃ vibhajam, vibhajaṃ vibhajānāṃ vijaṅgham,
S04bsu016_u:172_17: viśodhaṃ viśodhānāṃ vivāham, vivāhaṃ vivāhānāṃ vibhaktam, vibhaktaṃ vibhaktānāṃ vikhatam,
S04bsu016_u:172_18: vikhataṃ vikhatānāṃ ḍalanam, ḍalanaṃ ḍalanānāṃ avanam, avanaṃ avanānāṃ thavanam, thavanaṃ thavanānāṃ viparyam,
S04bsu016_u:172_19: viparyaṃ viparyāṇāṃ samayam, samayaṃ samayānāṃ vitūrṇam, vitūrṇaṃ vitūrṇānāṃ heturam, heturaṃ heturāṇāṃ vicāram, vicāraṃ vicārāṇāṃ vyatyastam,
S04bsu016_u:172_23: nilambaṃ nilambānāṃ haritam, haritaṃ haritānāṃ vikṣobham, vikṣobhaṃ vikṣobhāṇāṃ halitam,
S04bsu016_u:172_24: halitaṃ halitānāṃ hariḥ, hariḥ harīṇāmālokaḥ, ālokaḥ ālokānāṃ dṛṣṭvāntaḥ, dṛṣṭvāntaḥ dṛṣṭvāntānāṃ hetunam,
S04bsu016_u:172_25: samatā, samatā samatānāṃ visadam, visadaṃ visadānāṃ pramātram, pramātraṃ pramātrāṇāṃ amantram,
S04bsu016_u:172_34_0: delu delūnāṃ velu, velu velūnāṃ geluḥ, geluḥ gelūnāṃ kheluḥ, kheluḥ khelūnāṃ neluḥ, neluḥ, nelūnāṃ bheluḥ, bheluḥ bhelūnāṃ
S04bsu016_u:172_34_1: keluḥ, keluḥ kelūnāṃ seluḥ, seluḥ selūnāṃ peluḥ, peluḥ, pelūnāṃ meluḥ, meluḥ melūnāṃ saraḍaḥ, saraḍaḥ saraḍānāṃ bheruduḥ,
S04bsu016_u:172_35_0: kheluduḥ kheludūnāṃ māluduḥ, māluduḥ mālūdūnāṃ samulaḥ, samulaḥ samulānāmathavam, athavamathavānāṃ kamalam, kamalaṃ kamalānāmagavam,
S04bsu016_u:172_35_1: agavamagavānāmatarum, atarumatarūṇāṃ heluvaḥ, heluvaḥ hetuvānāṃ mirahuḥ, mirahuḥ mirahūṇāṃ caraṇam, caraṇaṃ caraṇānāṃ dhamanam,
S04bsu016_u:172_36: pramadaṃ pramadānāṃ nigamam, nigamaṃ nigamānāmupavartam, uparvatam, pavartānāṃ nirdeśam, nirdeśaṃ nirdeśānāmakṣayam, akṣayamakṣayāṇāṃ saṃbhūtam, saṃbhūtaṃ saṃbhūtānāṃ mamamam,
S04bsu016_u:172_37_0: mamamaṃ mamamānāṃmavadam, avadamavadānāmutpalam, utpalamutpalānāṃ padma, padmaṃ padmānāṃ saṃkhyā, saṃkhyā saṃkhyānāṃ gati,
S04bsu016_u:172_59: sa taṃ bālikārāśiṃ gaṇayaṃstulayan prasiñcan saṃkhyāmakārṣīt - iyantīmāni vālikāphalakāni,
S04bsu016_u:172_61: sa taṃ vālikārāśiṃ gaṇanāsaṃketanirdeśena nirdiśya evamāha - eṣa kulaputra gaṇanāyogo lokadhātuparaṃparayā supravartate bodhisattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:172_62: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātuprasarān gaṇayanti /
S04bsu016_u:172_63: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarayāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi /
S04bsu016_u:172_65: eṣa kulaputra gaṇanānayo daśasu dikṣu lokadhātunāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu pravartate bodhisattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:172_66: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu lokadhātunāmaparaṃparāṃ gaṇayanti /
S04bsu016_u:172_68: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu kalpanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu buddhanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu dharmanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu sattvanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu karmanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:172_69: eṣa eva gaṇanānayo yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu pravartate bodhisattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:172_72: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu sarvanāmaparaṃparāṃ gaṇayanti /
S04bsu016_u:172_74_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvajagatsaṃkhyānupraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavidhisaṃkhyānupraviṣṭānāṃ tryadhvasaṃkhyānupraviṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:172_74_2: bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:172_75_0: gocaro vā sūcayitum, viṣayo vā prabhāvayitum, balaṃ vā saṃvarṇayitum, āśayo vā nidarśayitum, saṃbhāro vā paridīpayitum, praṇidhānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:172_75_1: vā nirdeṣṭum, caryāṃ vā saṃdarśayitum, pāramitāpariśuddhirvā abhidyotayitum,
S04bsu016_u:173_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe samudrapratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:173_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:173_3_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitravacanaṃ śrutvā saṃharṣitatanuruho mahāprītivegasaṃjātaḥ pramuditamānasaḥ sudurlabhāścaryāśayaratnapratilabdho
S04bsu016_u:173_3_3: indriyeśvarasya dārakasya pādau śirasābhivandya indriyeśvaraṃ dārakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya
S04bsu016_u:175_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīmeghaṃ saṃpratīcchan,
S04bsu016_u:175_10: abhibhūḥ, anabhibhūtaḥ, tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva asurendragaṇapramardanaḥ anupūrveṇa yena samudrapratiṣṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ prabhūtāmupāsikāṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:175_11: tasya mahājanakāya upadarśayati - eṣā kulaputra prabhūtopāsikā madhye nagarasya svagṛhe tiṣṭhatīti /
S04bsu016_u:176_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena prabhūtāyā upāsikāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prāñjalībhūto dvāraśālāyāṃ pratyasthāt /
S04bsu016_u:176_1: sa paśyati prabhūtāyā upasikāyāḥ tadgṛhaṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ ratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ caturdikṣu vibhaktadvāramasaṃkhyeyāparimāṇaratnavyūhamacintyapuṇyavipākābhinirvṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:176_2_0: sa tadgṛhaṃ praviśya samantādanuvilokayannadrākṣītprabhūtāmupāsikāṃ ratnāsanopaviṣṭaṃ navāṃ daharāṃ taruṇīṃ prathamayauvanasamudgatāmabhirūpāṃ
S04bsu016_u:176_2_1: prāsādikāṃ darśaniyāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāṃ muktakeśīṃ nirābharaṇagātrāmavadātavastranivasanām /
S04bsu016_u:176_5: cittādhipatyena vā, tejasā vā, varṇena vā, śriyā vā / ye ca sattvāḥ prabhūtāmupāsikāṃ paśyanti devā vā manuṣyā vā,
S04bsu016_u:176_7: tasmiṃśca gṛhe daśāsanakoṭīsahasrāṇi prajñaptāni divyamānuṣyasamatikrāntāni bodhisattvakarmavipākapariniṣpannāni /
S04bsu016_u:176_8: na ca tasmin gṛhe paśyatyannapānanicayaṃ vā vastrābharaṇaparibhoganicayaṃ vā anyatraikapiṭharikāyāḥ purastānnikṣiptāyāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:176_9_0: daśa cāsyāḥ strīsahasrāṇi purataḥ sthitānyapaśyadapsarovarṇāni apsarorūpāṇi apsaraḥkalpāni apsaraśceṣṭāni apsaraḥparibhogāni
S04bsu016_u:176_10: tāḥ tasyāḥ striyaḥ kiṃkarā vacanapratikāriṇyaḥ purata upatiṣṭhanti upavicaranti saṃprekṣante upanidhyāyanti abhivandante ālokayanti avanamanti praṇamanti namasyanti /
S04bsu016_u:176_11: tāsāṃ ca gātrebhyo yo gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:176_14_0: te sarve 'vyāpannacittā bhavanti avairacittā avihiṃsācittā īrṣyāmātsaryavigatacittā amāyāśāṭhyacittā anunītā apratihatacittā
S04bsu016_u:176_14_1: anavalīnānunnatacittāḥ samacittā maitracittā hitacittāḥ saṃvarasthacittāḥ paraparigrahānabhilāṣacittā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:176_15: ye ca tāsāṃ svaraṃ śṛṇvanti, te sarve praharṣitapramuditapraṇatacittā
S04bsu016_u:176_16: bhavanti / ye ca tāḥ paśyanti, te vigatarāgamātmānaṃ saṃjānanti //
S04bsu016_u:177_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prabhūtāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya prabhūtāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjalīsthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
S04bsu016_u:177_2: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:177_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:177_4: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:177_5: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - ahaṃ kulaputra akṣayavyūhapuṇyakoṣasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:177_6: ito 'haṃ kulaputra, ekapiṭharikāyā nānādhimuktān sattvān yathābhipretabhojanaiḥ saṃtarpayāmi nānāsūpairnānārasairnānāvarṇairnānāgandhaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:177_7: ato 'haṃ kulaputra ekapiṭharikāyāḥ sattvaśatamapi saṃtarpayāmi yathābhiprāyairbhojanaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:177_8: sattvasahasramapi, sattvaśatasahasramapi, sattvakoṭīmapi, sattvakoṭīśatamapi, sattvakoṭīśatasahasramapi, sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasramapi,
S04bsu016_u:177_10_0: saṃpravārayāmi, saṃtoṣayāmi, saṃpraharṣayāmi, saṃpramodayāmi, pariprīṇayāmi, āttamanaskān karomi / na caiṣā piṭharikā hīyate,
S04bsu016_u:177_10_1: na parihīyate, nonībhavati, na kṣīyate, na paryādānaṃ gacchati, na sīmāmupaiti, na niṣṭhāṃ gacchati / anena kulaputra paryāyeṇa
S04bsu016_u:177_16_0: saṃpramodayāmi, pariprīṇayāmi, āttamanaskān karomi / na ca eṣā piṭharikā hīyate,na parihīyate, nonībhavati, na kṣīyate, na
S04bsu016_u:177_16_1: paryādānaṃ gacchati, na sīmāmupaiti, na niṣṭhāṃ na paryantaṃ na pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu016_u:177_17: sacet kulaputra daśadiksarvalokadhātuparyāpannāḥ sarvasattvā madantikamupasaṃkrameyurnānādhimuktā nānābhiprāyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:177_19_0: yāvadāttamanaskān kuryām / yathā nānābhojanaiḥ evaṃ nānāpānavidhibhiḥ nānārasāgraiḥ nānāśayanairnānāvasraiḥ nānāpuṣpairnānāmālyairnānāgandhairnānādhūpairnānāvilepanairnānācūrṇairnānāratnairnānābharaṇairnānāratnarathairnānāchatrairnānādhvajairnānāpatākābhirnānāvidhopakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:177_20: yāvadāttamanaskān kuryām / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ye kecit pūrvasyāṃ diśi [Gv_107] ekasmin,
S04bsu016_u:177_24: evaṃ ye lokadhātuśate, lokadhātusahasre, lokadhātuśatasahasre, lokadhātukoṭyām, lokadhātukoṭīśate, lokadhātukoṭīsahasre, lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasre, lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04bsu016_u:177_26: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakapratyekabuddhā antimadehadhāriṇaḥ śrāvakapratyekabodhiphalamanuprāpnuvanti,
S04bsu016_u:177_28: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāṃ adha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi /
S04bsu016_u:178_0: ye kecit, kulaputra, pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekasmin lokadhātau ekajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:178_1: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S04bsu016_u:178_3: evaṃ ye lokadhātuśate, lokadhātusahasre, lokadhātuśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭyāṃ lokadhātukoṭīśate lokadhātukoṭīsahasre lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasre,
S04bsu016_u:178_5: ye kecit kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:178_6: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S04bsu016_u:178_7: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadho diśi,
S04bsu016_u:178_8: ye kecit kulaputra, ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi ekasmin lokadhātāvekajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:178_9: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S04bsu016_u:178_11_0: evaṃ ye lokadhātuśate lokadhātusahasre lokadhātuśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭyāṃ lokadhātukoṭīśate lokadhātukoṭīsahasre lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasre
S04bsu016_u:178_11_1: lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasre ye jambūdvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturdvīpakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu sāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
S04bsu016_u:178_12: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S04bsu016_u:179_0: paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra imāni daśastrīsahasrāṇi mama parivāram? āha - paśyāmi [Gv_108] ārye /
S04bsu016_u:179_1_0: āha - etatpramukhāni kulaputra strīṇāṃ daśāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi mama sabhāgacaritāni ekapraṇidhānāni ekakuśalamūlāni ekaniryāṇavyūhāni
S04bsu016_u:179_1_1: ekādhimuktipathaviśuddhāni mama sabhāgasmṛtiviśuddhāni sabhāgagativiśuddhāni sabhāgabudhyapramāṇāni sabhāgendriyapratilabdhāni
S04bsu016_u:179_13: etāni kulaputra daśastrīsahasrāṇi ekakṣaṇena daśa diśaḥ spharanti,
S04bsu016_u:179_14: yadutaikajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān bhojanena pratipādanatāyai asyā eva piṭharikāyā bhojanamādāya /
S04bsu016_u:179_15: daśa diśaḥ spharanti asyā eva piṭharikāyā bhojanamādāya /
S04bsu016_u:179_16: daśa diśaḥ spharanti caramabhavikān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikān piṇḍapātena pratipādanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:179_18: sā ahaṃ kulaputra asyā eva piṭharikāyā devān devabhojanena saṃtarpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:179_20: asurānasurabhojanena, garuḍān garuḍabhojanena, kinnarān kinnarabhojanena, mahoragān mahoragabhojanena, manuṣyān manuṣyabhojanena, amanuṣyānamanuṣyabhojanena saṃtarpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:179_23: atha tāvadeva aparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ pūrveṇa gṛhadvāreṇa praviśanti sma yaduta prabhūtayopāsikayā pūrvapraṇidhānanimantritāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:179_24: evaṃ dakṣiṇena paścimeṇottareṇa gṛhadvāreṇa aparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ praviśanti sma yaduta prabhūtayopāsikayā pūrvapraṇidhānanimantritāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:179_27_0: āttamanaskān karoti / yathā nānābhojanaiḥ, evaṃ nānāpānavidhibhiḥ, nānārasāgraiḥ, nānāsanaiḥ, nānāśayanaiḥ nānāyānairnānāvastraiḥ
S04bsu016_u:179_27_1: nānāpuṣpairnānāmālyaiḥ nānāgandhairnānādhūpaiḥ nānāvilepanairnānācūrṇaiḥ nānābharaṇaiḥ nānāratnarathaiḥ nānāchatrairnānādhvajairnānāpatākābhiḥ
S04bsu016_u:179_29: nāgān yakṣān gandharvānasurān garuḍān kinnarān mahoragān manuṣyānamanuṣyān tattadeva bhojanena saṃtarpayati yāvadāttamanaskān karoti /
S04bsu016_u:179_30: na ca sā piṭharikā hīyate, na parihīyate, nonībhavati, na kṣīyate, na paryādānaṃ gacchati, na sīmāmupaiti, na niṣṭhāṃ na paryantaṃ na pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
S04bsu016_u:180_1: atha khalu prabhūtopāsikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - etamahaṃ kulaputra akṣayavyūhapuṇyakośaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:180_8: mahāpuṇyapradīpānāṃ sarvajagaddāridryāndhakāravidhamanatayā caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:181_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe mahāsaṃbhavaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:181_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:182_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prabhūtāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya prabhūtāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:184_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'kṣayavyūhapuṇyakośavimokṣāvabhāsapratilabdhaḥ taṃ puṇyasāgaramanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:184_1: tatpuṇyagaganamavalokayan, taṃ puṇyarāśimādadan, taṃ puṇyaparvatamabhirohan, taṃ puṇyanicayaṃ saṃgṛhṇan, taṃ puṇyaudhamavagāhayamānaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:184_3: taṃ puṇyanidhiṃ saṃpaśyan, taṃ puṇyanayamanusmaran, tāṃ puṇyanetrīṃ samanvāharan,
S04bsu016_u:184_5: anupūrveṇa yena mahāsaṃbhavaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parimārgati,
S04bsu016_u:184_23_0: vivardhamānena daśatathāgatabalāvabhāsena vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parigaveṣamāṇo adrākṣīnmadhye nagarasya śṛṅgāṭake saptaratnavyomakoparyasaṃkhyeyaratnamaye
S04bsu016_u:184_26: dṛṣṭvā ca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena vidvān gṛhapatistenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:184_27_0: upetya viduṣo gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ
S04bsu016_u:184_27_1: sthitvā evamāha - ahaṃ ārya sarvasattvānāmarthāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthito yaduta sarvasattvaduḥkhavyupaśamāya
S04bsu016_u:184_27_4: sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānatṛṣṇotpādanatāyai sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsārāṭavīkāntārasamatikramaṇatāyai sarvasattvānāṃ buddhaguṇadharmārāmaratisaṃjananatāyai
S04bsu016_u:184_28: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:184_30: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:184_31: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:184_32: kathaṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavanti sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:185_0: evamukte vidvān gṛhapatiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:185_3: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ parimārgayamāṇā na tṛpyante kalyāṇamitradarśanena /
S04bsu016_u:185_12: paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra, imaṃ mama parivāram? āha - paśyāmi ārya /
S04bsu016_u:185_13: āha - sarva ete kulaputra mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:185_24: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisattvāstrātāro bhavanti sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:185_27_0: pānārthibhyaḥ pānam, rasāgrārthibhyo rasāgram, khādyārthibhyaḥ khādyam, bhojyārthibhyo bhojyam, lehyārthibhyo lehyam, coṣyārthibhyaścoṣyam,
S04bsu016_u:185_27_1: vastrārthibhyo vastram, puṣpārthibhyaḥ puṣpam, mālyārthibhyo mālyam, gandhārthibhyo gandham, dhūpārthikebhyo dhūpam, vilepanārthibhyo
S04bsu016_u:185_28: pratiśrayam, āsanārthibhya āsanam, śayanārthibhyaḥ śayanam, glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārārthibhyo glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
S04bsu016_u:185_32: stryarthibhyaḥ striyaḥ, kumāryarthibhyaḥ, kumārīm, makuṭacūḍāmaṇyarthibhyo makuṭacūḍāmaṇīn,
S04bsu016_u:185_38: atha tāvadeva aparimāṇāḥ sattvā viduṣā gṛhapatinā pūrvapraṇidhānābhinimantritāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:185_39_0: nānādigbhyo nānājanapadapradeśebhyo nānānagarebhyo nānānigamebhyo nānāpaṭṭanebhyo nānākarvaṭebhyo nānāsattvajātibhyo [Gv_112]
S04bsu016_u:185_39_1: nānāsattvakulebhyo nānāsattvakulavimātratābhyo nānāgatiparivartebhyo nānāpratiṣṭhānasaṃjñānagatibhyo nānāyatanaviśuddhā nānāhārārthino
S04bsu016_u:185_39_2: nānāhārābhilāṣiṇo nānāśayā śucyannapānakāmā māṃsārthino vividhabhojanavimātratābhikāṅkṣiṇo vividhagativiśeṣopapatyāyatanasthitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:185_40: yathā manuṣyeṣu, evaṃ sarvagativicāreṣu nānābhojanapānārthina upasaṃkrāntāḥ yaduta bodhisattvānubhāvena asaṅgatyāgadundubhinirghoṣeṇa bodhisattvapraṇidhinimantritāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:185_41: tamupasaṃkramya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ yācante 'valokayanti nirīkṣante vijñāpayanti /
S04bsu016_u:186_0: atha khalu vidvān gṛhapatistān yācanakān saṃnipatitān viditvā muhūrtamanuvicintya gaganatalamavalokayati sma /
S04bsu016_u:186_1: tasya tato gaganatalādvividhā bhojanapānavidhayo nānārasā nānāvarṇā nānāgandhā avalambya hastatale pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04bsu016_u:186_2_0: sa tānyādāya tān yathāsaṃnipatitān yācanakān nānādhimuktān yathābhipretairbhojanapānavidhibhiḥ sarvopakaraṇaviśaiṣaiḥ saṃtarpayati
S04bsu016_u:186_3: āttamanaskān karoti / uttare vai nānāmiṣeṇa saṃtarpya tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu016_u:186_14: so 'nnārthina upasaṃkrāntān gaganatalānnānānnavidhīn gṛhītvā saṃtarpya tebhya āyurvarṇabalamukhapratibhānaṃ saṃpaśyan pratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu016_u:186_15_0: sa pānārthina upasaṃkrāntānnānāvidhaiḥ pānairudāraiḥ kalyāṇairanavadyairmanaḥsaṃpraharṣakaiḥ saṃtarpya tebhyaḥ saṃsāratṛṣṇārativinivartanatāyai
S04bsu016_u:186_18: sa yānārthino nānādiksrotobhyāgatānnānāvidhayānadānaiḥ saṃgṛhya tebhyo mahāyānādhirohaṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu016_u:186_19: sa nānādigāgatān vastrārthina upasaṃkrāntān viditvā muhūrtaṃ vicintya gaganatalamullokayati sma /
S04bsu016_u:186_22: sa taistān yācanakān pratipādya tebhyo 'nuttaratathāgatahrayapatrāpyasuvarṇavarṇacchavitāpratilābhaviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu016_u:186_23: pratyekameva sarvopakaraṇavidhibhiryathāgatān yācanakān pratipādya tebhyo yathārhaṃ dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu016_u:187_1: atha khalu vidvān gṛhapatiḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya tamacintyaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaviṣayamupadarśya evamāha - etamahaṃ kulaputra manaḥkośasaṃbhavavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:187_2: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ pariṣkāravaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ratnapāṇinā pratilabdhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:187_3: vikurvitaṃ vā nidarśayitum, ye te sarvalokadhātūnanavaśeṣaṃ pāṇinā saṃchādya buddhapūjāvidhānatāyai sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu nānāvarṇaratnameghān pravarṣanti /
S04bsu016_u:187_5: sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu sarvasattvabhavaneṣu yaduta sarvabuddhapūjopasthānatāyai sarvasattvadhātuparipākavinayāya ca /
S04bsu016_u:188_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe siṃhapotaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:188_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:189_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto viduṣi gṛhapatau dharmagauravācchiṣyabhāvamupadarśya
S04bsu016_u:189_8_0: kalyāṇamitrābhirādhanānuvartanacitto viduṣo gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:191_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tatpuṇyatoyaṃ saṃbhāvayan,
S04bsu016_u:191_4_0: tatpuṇyaskadhaṃ samādadat, tatpuṇyabalaṃ saṃjanayan, tatpuṇyavegaṃ vivardhayan, anupūrveṇa yena siṃhapotaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:191_5: tasya pādau śirasābhivandya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:191_6: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:191_7: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / tatsādhu me āryo bodhisattvamārgamupadiśatu,
S04bsu016_u:192_0: atha khalu ratnacūḍo dharmaśreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pāṇau gṛhītvā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamupadarśya evamāha - prekṣasva kulaputra mama niveśanam /
S04bsu016_u:192_1_0: so 'nuvilokayan adrākṣīttadgṛhaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaṃ vipulamudviddhaṃ rūpyaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ sphaṭikaprāsādasukṛtopaśobhitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:192_7_0: pañcame pure pañcamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmasaṃgītiratiprayuktānāṃ lokahitasukhacittaceṣṭānāṃ sarvaśāstrāṇyabhinirhārayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:192_7_1: dhāraṇīnayaṃ ca samādhisamudraṃ ca samādhivyutthānaṃ ca samādhivyavacāraṃ ca jñānālokaṃ ca abhinirhārayatāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:192_8_1: anāvaraṇagocarāṇām advayasamudācārāṇāṃ dharmasaṃgītiṃ kurvatāṃ prajñāpāramitāparivartanamanusaratāṃ vibhajatāmuttānī kurvatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:192_8_2: bodhisattvānāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt imāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni saṃgāyatām - yaduta śāntigarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitāmukham,
S04bsu016_u:192_22: itīmāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśa prajñāpāramitāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu016_u:193_1_0: kutaste iyamevaṃrūpā saṃpadviśodhitā? kutra te kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni yasya tava iyamīdṛśī vipākasaṃpat? sa āha - smarāmi
S04bsu016_u:193_1_1: kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa cakravicitre lokadhātāvanantaraśmidharmadhātusamalaṃkṛtadharmarājo
S04bsu016_u:193_2: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:193_3_0: sa khalu punastathāgato jñānavairocanapramukhena śrāvakakoṭīśatena jñānasūryatejaḥpramukhena ca bodhisattvakoṭīśatasahasreṇa
S04bsu016_u:193_4: tasya me tathāgatasya nagarapraviṣṭasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya tūryanādanirnāditaṃ kāritam /
S04bsu016_u:193_5: ekā ca gandhagulikā nidhūpitā tasya bhagavataḥ sabodhisattvaśrāvakasaṃghasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:193_6: tayā ca gandhagulikayā nidhūpitayā saptāhaṃ sarvajambudvīpo 'nantavarṇaiḥ sarvasattvakāyasadṛśairdhūpapaṭalameghaiḥ saṃchanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:193_7: tebhyaśca dhūpapaṭalameghebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - aciantyastathāgatatryadhvavipulena skandhena samanvāgataḥ,
S04bsu016_u:193_11: tebhyo dhūpapaṭalameghebhyo buddhādhiṣṭhānena ayamevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścacāra /
S04bsu016_u:193_12: tacca me kulaputra tathāgatādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃdarśanaprātihāryakuśalamūlaṃ triṣu sthāneṣu pariṇāmitam /
S04bsu016_u:193_13: katameṣu triṣu? yaduta atyantasarvadāridrayasamucchedāya saddharmaśravaṇāvirahitatāyai sarvabuddhabodhisattvakalyāṇamitradarśanaparipūraye ca /
S04bsu016_u:193_15: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāpramāṇaguṇaratnākarāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:193_20: ye te asaṃbhinnasamādhiviṣayāvatīrṇāḥ [Gv_116] ye te asaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvaikaghanakuśalamūlāḥ ye te asaṃbhinnatathāgatāvikalpavihāriṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:194_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe vetramūlako nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:194_1: tatra samantamukhe nagare samantanetro nāma gāndhikaḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:194_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:195_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako ratnacūḍasya dharmaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ratnacūḍaṃ dharmaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:197_0_4: samantamukhaṃ nagaraṃ parimārgan samantadigvidikṣu deśapradeśopacāreṣu nimnonnatasamaviṣameṣu aparikhinnāśayo 'viśraman samānacitto
S04bsu016_u:197_1: madhye vetramūlasya janapadasya daśānāṃ paṭṭanasahasrāṇāṃ nigamaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ dṛḍhaprākāramudviddhamaṣṭacatvaropaśobhitam /
S04bsu016_u:197_3: dṛṣṭvā ca yena samantanetro gāndhikastenopasaṃkramya samantanetrasya gāndhikasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:197_5: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:197_6: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yena te anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:197_7: ahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāṃ vyādhīn prajānāmi vātasamutthānapi,
S04bsu016_u:197_8: pittasamutthānapi, śleṣmasamutthānapi, sabhāgakṣubhitānapi, paropakramitānapi, amanuṣyavaikārikānapi, viṣamaparopakramikānapi, vividhamantraśastravetālaprayogāgnisamutthānapi,
S04bsu016_u:197_10: teṣāṃ ca sarvavyādhīnāṃ praśamaṃ prajānāmiyaduta snehanaṃ prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:197_11_0: vamanaṃ virecanamāsthāpanaṃ raktāvasecanaṃ nāsākarma karṣupariṇāhaṃ pariṣvedanamanulepanaṃ viṣapratighātaṃ bhūtagrahapratiṣedhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:197_11_1: bṛṃhaṇaṃ snapanaṃ saṃvāsanaṃ saṃvardhanaṃ varṇapariśodhanaṃ balasaṃjananaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:197_14: vyādhipraśāntāṃśca susnātānuliptagātrān kṛtvā yathārhābharaṇavibhūṣitāṅgān yathārhavastrasaṃchāditaśarīrān vividhabhojanarasāgraiḥ saṃtarpya aparimitadhanasamṛddhān karomi /
S04bsu016_u:197_15: uttare caiṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi aśubhopasaṃhāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:197_36: evaṃ caitān dharmadānena saṃgṛhya anantadhanaratnopacayopastabdhān kṛtvā visarjayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:197_37: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra sarvagandhadhūpavāsanānulepanayuktīḥ prajānāmi yaduta atulagandharājapramukhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:197_40: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvasaṃtoṣaṇasamantamukhabuddhadarśanapūjopasthānagandhabimbaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:198_8: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena ca sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakleśāḥ praśamanti,
S04bsu016_u:198_10: [Gv_119] yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā avakāśaṃ labhante buddhadharmeṣu,
S04bsu016_u:198_12: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā vigatabhayā bhavanti sarvasaṃsāragatibhyaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:198_13: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā abhayaprāptā bhavanti sarvajñatādigupanayatayā,
S04bsu016_u:198_14: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā na pratipatanti jarāmaraṇaśvabhraprapāteṣu,
S04bsu016_u:198_15: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā nirvṛtisukhaṃ pratilabhante dharmadhātusamatāsthānena /
S04bsu016_u:199_0: gaccha kulaputra, idamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe tāladhvajaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:199_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:200_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantanetrasya gāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya samantanetraṃ gāndhikaṃ śreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:200_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya samantanetrasya gāndhikaśreṣṭhino 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:202_3: kalyāṇamitrārakṣito 'smi na bhūyo vinivartiṣyāmi anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherityanuvicintayan pratyalabhata cittaprītim /
S04bsu016_u:202_4_0: cittaprasādaṃ cittaprāmodyaṃ cittatuṣṭiṃ cittapraharṣaḥ cittanandīṃ cittavyupaśamaṃ cittavipulatāṃ cittālaṃkāratāṃ cittāsaṅgatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:202_4_1: cittānāvaraṇatāṃ cittaviviktatāṃ cittasamavasaraṇatāṃ cittavaśitāṃ cittaiśvaryaṃ cittadharmānugamaṃ cittakṣetraspharaṇatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:202_5: so 'nupūrveṇa janapadena janapadaṃ grāmeṇa grāmaṃ deśena deśaṃ parimārgan yena tāladhvajaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya paripṛcchati sma - kutrānalo rājeti /
S04bsu016_u:202_6: tamanyo janakāya etadavocat - eṣa kulaputra analo rājā arthakaraṇe siṃhāsanopaviṣṭo rājakāryaṃ karoti /
S04bsu016_u:202_7: janapadān praśāsti / nigrahītavyānnigṛhṇāti, pragrahītavyān pragṛhṇāti, aparādhitān daṇḍaṃ praṇayati /
S04bsu016_u:202_8: vivadatāṃ vivādaṃ chinatti / dīnānāśvāsayati / dṛptān damayati / prāṇivadhādvinivartayati / adattādānādvicchandayati / pariparigṛhītābhilāṣād vyupaśamayati /
S04bsu016_u:203_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena analo rājā tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:203_5_1: vividhadivyaratnavitānavitate mahāratnasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaṃ navaṃ daharaṃ taruṇamabhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyamabhinīlapradakṣiṇāvartakeśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:203_5_3: samavahitasuśuklapūrṇacatvāriṃśaddantaṃ siṃhahanuṃ paripūrṇopacitakapolaṃ suruciracāpāyatabhruvaṃ śaśāṅkavarṇorṇayā kṛtatilakamāyatapramuktapralambakarṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:203_5_4: pūrṇacandrasaumyavadanaṃ kamburuciravṛttagrīvaṃ śrīvatsālaṃkṛtahṛdayaṃ siṃhapūrvārdhakāyaṃ citāntarāṃsaṃ susaṃvṛttoruskandhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:203_5_5: pralambabāhuṃ jālāvanaddhāṅgulicakrāṅkitahastapādaṃ mṛdutarūṇopacitapāṇipādaṃ saptotsadaṃ vajrasadṛśamadhyaṃ bṛhadṛjugātraṃ
S04bsu016_u:204_0_0: daśa cāsya kāraṇāpurūṣasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni purata upasthāpitāni narakapālasadṛśāni yamapuruṣakalpāni vikṛtapadadhārīṇi
S04bsu016_u:204_0_2: viṣamavikṛtaduḥsaṃsthitavadanaśarīrāṇi meghavarṇāni bhīmarūpacaṇḍasvaranirghoṣāṇi durnirīkṣyatejāṃsi mahābhayakarāṇi prāṇiśatasahasrahṛdayasaṃtrāsasaṃjananāni
S04bsu016_u:204_1_0: tatra bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi corāṇāṃ parasvāpahāriṇā parasattvabhogavipralopināṃ panthamoṣakāṇāṃ grāmanagaranigamaghoṣadāhakānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:204_1_1: kulaghātakānāṃ saṃdhicchedakānāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ garadāyakānāṃ ḍāmarikānāṃ manuṣyaghātakānāṃ paradārasevināṃ mithyāpratipannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:204_3_0: sa tatra rājño 'nalasyājñayā keṣāṃciddhastapādacchedaṃ keṣāṃcit karṇanāsācchedaṃ keṣāṃciccakṣurutpāṭanaṃ keṣāṃcidaṅgapratyaṅgaśīrṣacchedanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:204_4: evamanekavidhāstīvrāḥ kharāḥ kaṭukā amanāpāḥ prāṇahāriṇīḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇā apaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:204_7: tatra ca aṅgapratyaṅgaśirovikalāni mṛtakalevaraśatasahasrāṇi vṛkaśṛgālāśvakākagṛdhraśyenakurarabhairavākīrṇāni bhakṣyamāṇāni apaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:204_8: kānicinnīlāni ca nīlavarṇāni vipūyakāni vyādhmātakāni vipaṭumakāni paramavikṛtabībhatsānyapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:204_9: teṣāṃ ca vadhyānāṃ hanyamānānāṃ vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇānāṃ ghoramārtasvaraṃ krandatāṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamaśrauṣīt mahāsaṃvegodvegasaṃjananaṃ tadyathā saṃghāte mahānarake /
S04bsu016_u:205_0_0: tasya tadatidārūṇabhairavakaraṃ paramavaiśasaṃ dṛṣṭvaivametadabhavat - ahaṃ ca sarvasattvahitasukhahetoranuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthito
S04bsu016_u:205_0_1: bodhisattvacaryāparimārgaṇatatparaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi paripṛcchāmi - kiṃ bodhisattvena kuśalaṃ kartavyam,
S04bsu016_u:205_2_0: ayaṃ ca analo rājā kuśaladharmaparihīṇo mahāsāvadyakarmakārī praduṣṭamanaḥsaṃkalpaḥ parasattvajīvitoparodhāya pratipannaḥ
S04bsu016_u:205_3_1: [Gv_122] vipulakarūṇāsaṃbhūtacetasa upari gaganatale devatā ityevamārocayāmāsuḥ na smarasi kulaputra jayoṣmāyatanasyarṣeḥ
S04bsu016_u:205_3_2: kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīmiti? sa ūrdhvamukho gaganatalamavalokya evamāha - smarāmīti /
S04bsu016_u:205_6: samyak samena kalyāṇamitrāṇi praṇayanti na viṣameṇa /
S04bsu016_u:206_0: atha sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako devatāvacanamupaśrutya yena analo rājā tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:206_1: upetya analasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya analaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:206_3: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:206_4: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:206_5: tadvadatu me āryaḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:207_0: atha khalvanalo rājā rājakāryāṇi kṛtvā utthāya siṃhāsanāt sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvā tāladhvajaṃ rājadhānīṃ prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:207_1: so 'nupūrveṇa svaṃ gṛhamanupraviśya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamantaḥpuraṃ praveśya bhadrāsane niṣadya evamāha - vyavalokayasva kulaputra imaṃ mama gṛhaparibhogamiti /
S04bsu016_u:207_3_0: daśa cāsya strīkoṭīparivāramadrākṣīt abhirūpāṇāṃ prāsādikānāṃ darśanīyānāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ sarvakalāvidhijñānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:208_0: atha khalvanalo rājā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:208_1: api tu pāpakāriṇāmevaṃrūpaḥ karmavipāko 'bhinirvartate? evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvasaṃpat,
S04bsu016_u:208_2: evaṃrūpā parivārasaṃpat, evaṃrūpā mahābhogasaṃpat, evaṃrūpā mahaiśvaryādhipatyasaṃpat? āha - no hīdamārya /
S04bsu016_u:208_3: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra māyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:208_4_0: ime ca kulaputra [Gv_123] madviṣayavāsinaḥ sattvā yadbhūyasā prāṇātipātino 'dattādāyinaḥ kāmamithyācāriṇo mṛṣāvādinaḥ paiśunikāḥ
S04bsu016_u:208_4_1: pārūṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpino 'bhidhyālambā vyāpannācittā mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ pāpakarmāṇo raudrāścaṇḍāḥ sāhasikā vividhākuśalakarmakriyāparigatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:208_5: te na śakyante 'nyathā pāpacaryāyā nivārayituṃ vinivartayitumanuśāsitum /
S04bsu016_u:208_6: so 'haṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damanāya paripācanāya vinayena hite saṃniyojanārthaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ puraskṛtya nirmitairvadhyaghātakairnirmitān vadhyapuruṣān ghātayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:208_9: tacca dṛṣṭvā ete madvijitavāsinaḥ sattvā labhante saṃvegam,
S04bsu016_u:208_10: jāyate bhayam, jāyate saṃtrāsaḥ, bhavati caiṣāṃ chambhitatvam,
S04bsu016_u:208_12_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra imān sattvānanenopāyenodvignottrastacittātmavivignamanaso viditvā daśabhyo 'kuśalebhyaḥ karmapathebhyo
S04bsu016_u:208_12_1: vinivartya daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatān kṛtvā atyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme sarvaduḥkhopacchede sarvajñatāsukhe pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:208_13: nāhaṃ kulaputra kasyacit sattvasya viheṭhaṃ karomi kāyena vācā manasā va /
S04bsu016_u:208_15: ahaṃ kulaputra tiryagyonigatasya saṃmūḍhasya antaśaḥ kuntapipīlikasya ekacittotpādenāpi duḥkhoparodhaṃ neccheyam,
S04bsu016_u:208_21_2: samantasamavasaraṇasamādhipathaniryātānām anantāvartadhāraṇīvaśavartināṃ buddhagocaraviṣayānubaddhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān
S04bsu016_u:209_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe suprabhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:209_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:210_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ analasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya analaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:212_11_1: 'viśrāntaśarīro nikhilagaveṣī yena suprabhasya mahānagarasyopavicārastenopasaṃkramya paryapṛcchat - kva sa mahāprabho rājeti /
S04bsu016_u:212_12: tasya mahājanakāya upadarśayati - etatkulaputra suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yatra mahāprabho rājā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:213_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramyādrākṣīt suprabhaṃ mahānagaram /
S04bsu016_u:213_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta evamanucintayāmāsa - kutra kalyāṇamitraḥ prativasati? adya taṃ drakṣyāmi kalyāṇamitram /
S04bsu016_u:213_2_0: tataṃ śroṣyāmi bodhisattvacaryāṃ bodhisattvaniryāṇamukhamacintyāṃ bodhisattvadharmatām acintyān bodhisattvaguṇagocarān acintyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:213_2_1: bodhisattvavṛṣabhitām acintyāṃ bodhisattvasamādhivihāritām acintyaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣavikrīḍitam acintyāṃ bodhisattvamahārambhanistāraṇaviśuddhim /
S04bsu016_u:213_3: evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto yena suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:213_4: upetya suprabhaṃ mahānagaramavalokayāmāsa vicitradarśanīyaṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya ca,
S04bsu016_u:213_8_0: yaduta siṃhakāntavajraprākāreṇa aparājitavajraprākāreṇa nirvedhavīryavajraprākāreṇa duryodhanavīryavajraprākāreṇa asaṅgavajradṛḍhaprākāreṇa
S04bsu016_u:213_10: tasya ca mahānagarasya daśayojanāntarāṇyaṣṭau dvārāṇi vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni saptānāṃ ratnānām /
S04bsu016_u:213_11: tacca mahānagaraṃ vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ nānāṣṭāṅgasuvibhaktaṃ nīlavaiḍūryamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
S04bsu016_u:215_0: tasya ca suprabhasya mahānagarasya madhye rājño mahāprabhasya gṛhaṃ māpitamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:215_1_0: samantāccaturyojanaṃ parikṣepeṇa saptaratnamayaṃ saptabhirnānāratnamayībhirvedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:215_3: citro darśanīyo 'saṃkhyeyamaṇiratnācintyavyūhavirājito rājñā mahāprabheṇa saddharmagañjaḥ sthāpitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:216_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako ratnaparikhāsvananunītacitto ratnaprākāreṣvavismayamāno ratnatālapaṅktiṣvarajyamāno ratnaghaṇṭākiṅkiṇījālaghoṣamanāsvādayan
S04bsu016_u:216_1_0: upetya samantādanuvilokayan adrākṣīnmahāprabhaṃ rājānaṃ madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya caityagṛhasya nātidūre [Gv_126] mahāvyūhe
S04bsu016_u:216_23: anekāni ca gośatasahasrāṇi suvarṇaśṛṅgakhurāṇi kaṃsadohāni daridrāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃgrahāya sthāpitānyapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:216_24_0: anekāni ca kanyākoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi abhirūpāṇi prāsādikāni darśanīyāni sarvābharaṇavibhūṣitāni divyāmbaradharāṇi divyoragasāracandanānuliptagātrāṇi
S04bsu016_u:216_25_1: sarvopakaraṇaparipūrṇaiḥ sthāpitā yaduta sattvasaṃgrahāya sattvaparigrahāya sattvaprītisaṃjananāya sattvaprāmodyotpādanāya
S04bsu016_u:217_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprabhasya rājñaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya mahāprabhaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:217_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:217_1: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:217_2: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:217_3: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:217_4: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - ahaṃ kulaputra mahāmaitrīdhvajāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariśodhayāmi,
S04bsu016_u:217_5_0: paripūrayāmi / eṣā ca me kulaputra mahāmaitrīdhvajā bodhisattvacaryā anekeṣāṃ buddhaśatānāmanekeṣāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāmanekeṣāṃ
S04bsu016_u:217_5_1: buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyānāṃ [Gv_127] buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikāt paripṛṣṭā paripraśnīkṛtā
S04bsu016_u:217_5_2: viśodhitā vyūhitā vilokitā vicāritā anugaveṣitā paryanviṣṭā vicitritā vipulīkṛtā /
S04bsu016_u:217_6: so 'haṃ kulaputra asyāṃ mahāmaitrīdhvajāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitvā dharmeṇa rājyamanuśāsāmi /
S04bsu016_u:217_7: dharmeṇa lokamanugṛhṇāmi / dharmeṇa lokamanuvicarāmi / dharmeṇa sattvān praṇayāmi / dharmeṇa sattveṣu pratipadye /
S04bsu016_u:217_13_0: maitracittatāyāṃ mahāmaitryādhipatye maitrībale hitacittatāyāṃ sukhacittatāyāṃ dayācittatāyāmanugrahacittatāyāṃ sattvānugrahacittatāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:217_20: saṃsārasrotasa āvartayāmi / dharmadhātunayasamudreṣu cittāvidyāṃ caiṣāṃ nirdahāmi sarvabhavagatyupapattivyavacchedāya /
S04bsu016_u:217_23: evamāhaṃ kulaputra maitrīdhvajāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitvā dharmeṇa lokamanuśāsāmi /
S04bsu016_u:217_24: na khalu kulaputra madvijitavāsinaḥ sattvā mamāntikādbhayaṃ trāsaṃ chambhitatvaṃ romaharṣaṇaṃ vā nirgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:217_25: ye ca kulaputra daridrāḥ sattvā vividhopakaraṇavikalā māmupasaṃkrāmanti annārthino vā pānārthino vā vastrārthino vā yāvat sarvārthino vā,
S04bsu016_u:217_26_0: tānahaṃ pūrvaparicitāneva vivṛtān rājakośān gṛhṇīdhvamityapyanujānāmi yasyārthe yūyaṃ pāpakaṃ karma ārabhetha prāṇivadhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:217_26_1: vā adattādānaṃ vā kāmamithyācāraṃ vā mṛṣāvādaṃ vā paiśunyaṃ vā pāruṣyaṃ vā saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ vā abhidhyāṃ vā vyāpādaṃ vā
S04bsu016_u:217_26_2: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vā tadanyāni vā vividhāni dṛṣṭikṛtānyabhiniviśetha /
S04bsu016_u:217_27: ataḥ tasmāt suprabhānmahānagarānnagaradvārebhyo vīthirathyāmukhacatvaraśṛṅgāṭakebhyo yo yenārthī sa taṃ gṛhṇātu,
S04bsu016_u:217_29: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhamahānagarābhyantaranivāsinaḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:217_32_0: yaduta keṣāṃcit parīttaṃ keṣāṃcidvipulaṃ keṣācinmṛttikātalaṃ keṣācidvaiḍūryamaṇiratnasaṃstṛtatalaṃ keṣācinmṛttikāprākāraṃ
S04bsu016_u:217_35: bahirnagaranivāsināmapi śuddhāśayānāṃ kṛtakuśalamūlānāṃ paryupāsitabahubuddhotpādānāṃ sarvajñatābhimukhānāṃ sarvajñatāpratiśaraṇānāṃ ratnamayamābhāsamāgacchati /
S04bsu016_u:217_36: ye mayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caratā caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:217_38_0: [Gv_128] yadā ca kulaputra madvijatavāsinaḥ sattvā deśapradeśeṣu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu pañcakaṣāye loke kālasvabhāvasaṃkṣobhitān
S04bsu016_u:217_39: tadāhaṃ teṣāmanugrahāya mahāmaitrīpūrvaṃgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ
S04bsu016_u:217_40: samāpadye / samanantarasamāpannasya ca me kulaputra imaṃ samādhim,
S04bsu016_u:217_41_0: atha teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāni bhayāni te upasargāḥ tāni vairāṇi te vigrahavivādāḥ te cittasaṃkṣobhāḥ tāni vihiṃsācittāni praśamanti
S04bsu016_u:217_41_1: vyupaśamanti nivartante nirudhyante tadyathāpi tadasyaiva mahāmaitrīpūrvaṃgamasya lokendriyāvartasya bodhisattvasamādhidharmatāpratilābhena /
S04bsu016_u:217_42: api tu kulaputra, āgamaya muhūrtaṃ yāvat pratyakṣībhaviṣyasi /
S04bsu016_u:218_0: atha khalu mahāprabho rājā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāmaitrīpūrvaṃgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:218_1: samanantarasamāpannasya ca rājño mahāprabhasya imaṃ mahāmaitrīpūrvaṅgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
S04bsu016_u:218_2: atha tāvadeva suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ sadeśapradeśaṃ sagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparivāraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitam /
S04bsu016_u:218_3: tasya pracalataste 'pi ratnaprākārā ratnaprāsādā ratnagarbhāṇi ratnagṛhāṇi,
S04bsu016_u:218_4_0: ratnabhavanāni ratnavimānāni ratnakūṭāgārāṇi ratnaniryūhā ratnaharmyāṇi ratnagavākṣāḥ ratnavedikāḥ ratnatoraṇāni ratnārdhacandrā
S04bsu016_u:218_4_1: ratnasiṃhapañcarāṇi ratnakhoṭakāni ratnabimbāni ratnavitānāni ratnasūtrakiṅkiṇījālāni ratnaghaṇṭāḥ ratnadhvajāḥ ratnapatākāḥ
S04bsu016_u:218_5: te ca saṃghadṛmānā valgu manojñaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ śabdamanuravanto yena rājā mahāprabhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:218_6: tenāvanamanti sma, praṇamanti sma / ye ca te suprabhasya mahānagarābhyantaravāsinaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:218_7: sarve te prītiprāmodyaparisphuṭacetaso yena mahāprabho rājā tenābhimukhāḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇamanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:218_9: te 'pi sarve prahlāditakāyacittāḥ prītiprāmodyajātāḥ yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhimukhāḥ praṇemuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:218_11: te 'pi sarve anyonyamaitracittā hitacittā yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhipraṇatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:218_12: yāni ca parvataśikharāṇi tadanye cāpyunnatāḥ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:218_14: ye ca puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ patravṛkṣā bījagrāmabhūtagrāmaśasyatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vā,
S04bsu016_u:218_15: te 'pi sarve yena mahāprabho rājā tenābhinatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:218_17: tānyapi sarvāṇi yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhimukhaṃ vegaṃ prāmuñcan /
S04bsu016_u:219_23_0: asaṃkhyeyāni ca rākṣasendraśatasahasrāṇi jaladharanivāsīni cāturdvīpikalokadhātvadhiṣṭhānadharaṇitalanivāsīni ca māṃsarudhirabhakṣāṇi
S04bsu016_u:219_23_2: sarvāṇi paramamaitrahitacittāni suprasannamukhavarṇāni sarvajagadavihiṃsāviheṭhāparamāṇi paralokasāpekṣāṇi kṛtāñjalipuṭāni
S04bsu016_u:219_24: atulyaṃ ca kāyikacaitasikamudāraṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:219_25_1: paralokasāpekṣāṇi kṛtāñjalipuṭāni paramaprīticittāni yena rājā mahāprabhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:219_26: tenābhipraṇatānyabhūvan, atulyaṃ ca kāyikacaitasikamudāraṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:219_29_0: evaṃ sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvaddaśasu dikṣu daśalokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:220_0: atha khalu mahāprabho rājā tasmātsamādhervyūtthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - etamahaṃ kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:220_2: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāmaitryapramāṇacchatrāṇāṃ sarvalokadhātusukhāśayaspharaṇatayā,
S04bsu016_u:220_10: mahāmārutasadṛśānāṃ sarvajagatsamādhisamāpattibhavanasarvajñatāmahāpuraparisaṃsthāpanatayā caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:220_11: puṇyaparvato vā tulayitum, guṇajyotirgaṇagaganaṃ vā avalokayitum,
S04bsu016_u:221_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe sthirā nāma rājadhānī /
S04bsu016_u:221_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:222_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprabhasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya mahāprabhaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:223_2: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ suprabhānmahānagarānniṣkramya muhūrtaṃ mārgamanusṛtya mahāprabhasya rājño 'nuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:223_12_0: tamacintyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvakāryanidhyānālokanayamadhimucyamānaḥ pratilebhe cittaprītiprasādavegaṃ cittapraharṣaṃ cittotplavaṃ
S04bsu016_u:223_12_1: cittanandīṃ cittānāvilatāṃ cittaprabhāsvaratāṃ cittadṛḍhatāṃ cittavipulatāṃ cittāparyādanatām /
S04bsu016_u:223_13_0: sa evaṃ kalyāṇamitrānusmṛtimanasikāraprayukto 'śrūṇi pravartayan anuvicintayāmāsa - aho batedaṃ kalyāṇamitradarśanaṃ sarvaguṇaratnākarabhūtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:224_0_0: tasyaivaṃ rudataḥ krandataḥ paridevamānasya gagatalagatā devagaṇāḥ sadānubaddhāśca saṃcodakā buddhadūtā bodhisattvadevatā
S04bsu016_u:224_0_1: evamāhu - kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisattvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirādhitacittā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:224_6: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastataḥ samādhijñānālokād vyutthāya anupūrveṇa yena sthirā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya acalāmupāsikāṃ parimārgati parigaveṣate /
S04bsu016_u:224_7: tasya [Gv_132] mahājanakāya upadarśayati - eṣā kulaputra acalopāsikā svaniveśane mātāpitṛsabhāginī kumārabhūtā svajñātigaṇaparivṛtā mahato janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:225_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprītiprasādaprāmodyaparisphuṭacetā yena acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:225_1: upetya acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanadvāre sthito 'paśyat sarvaṃ taṃ niveśanaṃ suvarṇavarṇayā ābhayā sphuṭamavabhāsitaṃ kāyacittaprahlādinyā /
S04bsu016_u:225_2: samanantaraspṛṣṭasya ca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya tayā prabhayā,
S04bsu016_u:225_3_1: tathāgatakośasamādhipramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi samādhimukhaśatānyavakrāntāni saṃbhūtāni sūkṣmāṇi mṛdūni /
S04bsu016_u:225_6_0: tathārūpaṃ ca gandhamajighrat yo na devānāṃ na devakanyānāṃ na nāgānāṃ na nāgakanyānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ na yakṣakanyānāṃ na gandharvāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:225_6_1: na gandharvakanyānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ nāsurakanyānāṃ na garuḍānāṃ na garūḍakanyānāṃ na kinnarāṇāṃ na kinnarakanyānāṃ na mahoragāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:225_6_2: na mahoragakanyānāṃ na manuṣyāṇāṃ na manuṣyakanyānām /
S04bsu016_u:225_7: na sā strī daśadiśi loke saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:225_8: yā tasyā rūpeṇa samā, kutaḥ punaruttari / na sa varṇāvabhāso 'sti daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatavarṇāvabhāsam,
S04bsu016_u:225_11: kutaḥ punaruttari / nāsti tadātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānaṃ daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānam,
S04bsu016_u:225_14: kutaḥ punaruttari / nāsti sa prabhāvyūho daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataprabhāvyūham,
S04bsu016_u:225_17: kutaḥ punaruttari / nāsti sa gandho daśadiśi loke devabhavaneṣu vā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhavaneṣu vā yastasyā mukhakośavisṛtagandhena samaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:225_18: kutaḥ punaruttari / nāsti sa bhavanavyūhaparibhogo daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparibhogam,
S04bsu016_u:225_21: kutaḥ punaruttari / nāsti sā parivārasaṃpat daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparivārasaṃpadam,
S04bsu016_u:225_24: kutaḥ punaruttari / na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi
S04bsu016_u:225_26: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yaḥ acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena kleśo na vyupaśamaṃ gacchet /
S04bsu016_u:225_27: tadyathāpi nāma daśa śatasahasravaśavartino mahābrahmāṇaḥ kāmāvacarāḥ kleśānna samudācaranti,
S04bsu016_u:225_28: evameva sahadarśanena acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sattvānāṃ kleśā na samudācaranti /
S04bsu016_u:225_29: [Gv_133] na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yo acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena tṛptimāpadyeta sthāpayitvā prajñātṛptān /
S04bsu016_u:226_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'calāyā upāsikāyā acintyāṃ kāyādhipateyatām,
S04bsu016_u:226_2_0: acintyaṃ ca sarvakṣititalanagaramahāparvatāpratihataṃ raśmijālavyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ sattvārthakaraṇaṃ ca sarvaromakūpavisṛtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:226_2_1: gandhamāghrāya aparyantāṃ ca parivārasaṃpadamavalokya asaṃhāryaṃ ca bhavanavimānavyūhasaṃpadamudvīkṣya aparimāṇāṃśca guṇasamudrānavagāhya
S04bsu016_u:227_0: śīlaṃ sadā yadamalaṃ parirakṣitaṃ te kṣāntiryataḥ suvipulā paribhāvitā ca /
S04bsu016_u:227_1: vīryaṃ ca vajramiva yaddṛḍhamāsthitaṃ te tenodgatā jagati bhāsyacalendrakalpā // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:228_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāmupāsikāmanayā gāthayā abhiṣṭutya evamāhamayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:228_1: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:228_2: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:228_3: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:229_0: atha khalvacalopāsikā snigdhayā bodhisattvavācā manojñayā premaṇīyayā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pratisaṃmodya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:229_9: āha - ka etasya ārye duryodhanajñānagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣamukhasya viṣayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:229_10_1: ca dharmaparyeṣṭyaparikhedavyūhasamādhimukhasya ca viṣayaḥ? āha - duradhimokṣaṃ kulaputra idaṃ sthānam /
S04bsu016_u:229_11: āha - vada ārye, buddhānubhāvena kalyāṇamitraparigraheṇa ca adhimokṣye avatariṣyāmi vijñāsyāmi vicārayiṣyāmi anusariṣyāmi nidhyāsyāmi upanidhyāsyāmi pratyavekṣiṣye vibhāvayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:230_0: atha khalu acalopāsikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhabhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:230_1: atīte 'dhvani vimalaprabhe kalpe pralambabāhurnāma tathāgato loke udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:230_2: ahaṃ ca rājño vidyuddattasyaikā [Gv_134] duhitā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:230_3: tayā me rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ pihiteṣu rājapuradvāreṣu,
S04bsu016_u:230_7_0: śayanatalagatayā gaganatalagatāṃ jyotirgaṇavatīṃ rajanīṃ prekṣantyā uparyantarikṣe sa bhagavān pralambabāhustathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu016_u:230_8: tasya ca tathāgatasya sarvaromavivarebhyastathārūpo gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:230_10_0: śayanatalādutthāya daśanakhakṛtakarapuṭāñjalirdharaṇitalapratiṣṭhitā taṃ bhagavantaṃ pralambabāhuṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:230_10_1: namaskṛtvā mūrdhnā namasya avalokayamānā paryantaṃ nādhigacchāmi /
S04bsu016_u:230_13_0: tasyā mama kulaputra etadabhavat - kīdṛśaṃ karma kṛtvā iyamīdṛśī kāyasaṃpat pratilabhyate? lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasaṃpadā jāyate?
S04bsu016_u:231_0: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān pralambabāhustathāgato mamādhyāṃśayaṃ viditvā evamāha - duryodhanacittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
S04bsu016_u:232_0_0: sāhaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavataḥ pralambabāhostathāgasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādimāni evaṃrūpāṇi dharmanayānuśāsanīmukhāni
S04bsu016_u:232_0_1: śrutvā sarvajñajñānamabhikāṅkṣamāṇā daśabalabhāvamabhiprārthayamānā buddhasarasvatīmabhilaṣantī buddhaprabhāvyūhaṃ pariśodhayitukāmā
