S04bsu016_u:232_1: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya etena cittotpādena jambudvīpaḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairapi kāmān paribhoktum,
S04bsu016_u:232_3: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya ekapratighacittamutpādayituṃ svabāndhaveṣu,
S04bsu016_u:232_8: prāgeva samanvāharamāṇā / nābhijānāmi tāvadbhiḥ kalpairekabuddhadarśanamapi vismartum /
S04bsu016_u:232_11: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya sarvatathāgatadharmameghān saṃpratīcchamānā ekadharmapadavyañjanamapi manasā vismartum,
S04bsu016_u:232_13: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvato dharmasāgarān pibantī ekapadamapyanidhyātamavilokitam,
S04bsu016_u:232_14: antaśo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu / nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ dharmanayasāgarāṇāmekadharmanayadvāramapi yatra mayā na samādhirabhinirhṛtaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:232_16: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmacakraṃ saṃdhārayamāṇā yathāsaṃdhāritādekapadavyañjanamapyanusraṣṭam,
S04bsu016_u:232_18: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ buddhadarśanasamudrāṇāmekapraṇidhānamapi yanmayā na sarvasattvasāgaraviśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtam,
S04bsu016_u:232_22: 'bhinirhṛtā / nābhijānāmi tata upādāya ekasattvamapi cakṣuravabhāsamāgataṃ yo mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na samādāpitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:232_24_0: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairekapadavyañjane 'pi saṃśayamutpādayituṃ dvayasaṃjñāṃ
S04bsu016_u:232_24_1: vā vikalpasaṃjñāṃ vā nānātvasaṃjñāṃ vā agrahasaṃjñāṃ vā hīnapraṇītasaṃjñāṃ vā anunayapratighasaṃjñāṃ vā utpādayitum /
S04bsu016_u:233_0: sāhaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādavirahitā abhūvaṃ buddhotpādaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:233_14: etaṃ ca me kulaputra duryodhanajñānagarbhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣasukham,
S04bsu016_u:233_19: icchasi tvaṃ kulaputra, pratyakṣo bhavitum? āha - icchāmyārye /
S04bsu016_u:234_1_2: ca daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi vyavalokayati anuvicārayati anusarati nidhyapayati /
S04bsu016_u:234_3: apaśyat sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārako daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyaparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampamānān,
S04bsu016_u:234_5: ekaikasmiṃśca lokadhātau koṭīśate cāturmahādvīpakānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ koṭīśataṃ tathāgatānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:234_10: ekaisya ca tathāgatasya sarvadharmacakrodyotanaṃ sarvasattvaśrotravijñapanaṃ svaramaṇḍalamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:235_0: atha khalvacalopāsikā tataḥ samādhervyutthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:235_2_0: śrutaṃ vijñātam / āha - evamahaṃ kulaputra, dṛḍhasamādānāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāmanuśikṣamāṇā sarvadharmaparyeṣṭyaparikhedavyūhasamādhisamāpannā
S04bsu016_u:235_3: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum? ye te dvijarṣabhā iva gaganatale 'niketacāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:235_4: ye te mahāgaruḍendrā iva sattvasāgaramavagāhante paripakvabodhisattvoddharaṇatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:235_5: ye te vaṇija iva sarvajñatāratnadvīpe 'nuvicaranti daśabalajñānaratnābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:235_6: ye te balavatkaivartā iva saṃsārasāgare 'nuvicaranti ruciradharmacakramaṇḍalajālahastāḥ tṛṣṇodbhavasattvaparipācanābhyuddharaṇatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:235_7: ye te 'surendrā iva tribhuvanapuraṃ spharitvā vicaranti kleśāsurasaṃkṣobhodvṛttasaṃśamanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:235_8: ye te dinakaramaṇḍalamiva dharmadhātugaganatale samudāgacchanti sattvatṛṣṇāsalilakleśapaṅkocchoṣaṇatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:235_12: ye te cakravartina iva loke vicaranti catuḥsaṃgrahavastupariṣkāropakaraṇasarvajagatsaṃgrahaṇatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:235_13: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe 'mitatosale janapade tosalaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:235_15: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:236_0_0: atha khalu sughanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya acalāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:238_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāmupāsikāmāmukhīkṛtya acalāyā upāsikāyā anuśāsanīmanusmaran,
S04bsu016_u:238_1: yadacalayopāsikayā darśitaṃ śrāvitaṃ deśitaṃ saṃvarṇitaṃ yojitaṃ vibhaktaṃ prabhāvitaṃ visṛtaṃ tatsaṃbhāvayan,
S04bsu016_u:238_2_0: anusaran, anuvicintayan avataran bhāvayan nigamayan nidhyāyan avabhāsayan samīkurvan anupūrveṇa deśena deśaṃ janapadena janapadamanucaṃkraman
S04bsu016_u:238_3: upetya tosalaṃ nagaraṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa tosalaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:238_4_0: sūryāstaṃgamanakāle sa tosalaṃ nagaramanupraviśya madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya sthitvā vīthīmukhena vīthīmukhaṃ catvareṇa catvaraṃ
S04bsu016_u:238_4_1: rathyayā rathyāṃ sarvagāminaṃ parivrājakaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo vyavacārayan adrākṣīdrātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ tosalasya nagarasyottare
S04bsu016_u:238_6: tasya tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā udāraprītivegasaṃjātasya etadabhavat - asaṃśayamahamatra parvataśikhare kalyāṇamitraṃ drakṣyāmīti /
S04bsu016_u:238_8_0: tenopetya sulabhaṃ parvatamabhiruhya yena tanmahāvabhāsaṃ parvataśikharaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmannadrākṣīddūrata eva sarvagāminaṃ
S04bsu016_u:238_8_1: parivrājakaṃ mahābrahmātirekavarṇaṃ śriyā dedīpyamānaṃ daśabhirbrahmasahasraiḥ parivṛtaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyamāṇam /
S04bsu016_u:238_9: sa tasya pādau śirasābhivandya tamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:238_10: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:238_11: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:238_12: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:238_13: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:238_14_0: ahaṃ kulaputra sarvagāmī sarvatrānugatāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitaḥ samantamukhavyavacāraṇālokena samādhimukhena abhāvapratiṣṭhitayā
S04bsu016_u:238_15_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra sarvasattvabhājanalokavyavacāreṣu sarvasattvagativyavacāreṣu sarvasattvacyutimukheṣu sarvasattvopapattimukheṣu
S04bsu016_u:238_15_1: sarvabhavagatisaṃbhedeṣu vividhopapattyāyatanavicitre lokasaṃniveśe vicitravarṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānāvidhopapattisaṃyojanānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:238_15_2: nānāprayogāṇāṃ vicitrādhimuktānāṃ yaduta devagatiparyāpannānāṃ nāgagatiparyāpannānāṃ yakṣagatiparyāpannānāṃ gandharvagatiparyāpannānāmasuragatiparyāpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:238_16_1: vividhadṛṣṭigatiniśritānāṃ śrāvakayānādhimuktānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānādhimuktānāṃ mahāyānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ karomi
S04bsu016_u:238_17: yaduta keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ vividhalaukikaśilpaśikṣaṇatayā arthaṃ karomi sarvaśilpajñānabhedavatīdhāraṇyālokena /
S04bsu016_u:238_18: [Gv_138] keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ catuḥsaṃgrahavastuprayogeṇa arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvajñajñānopanayanāya /
S04bsu016_u:238_19: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ pāramitāsaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvajñatāpariṇāmajñānanayālokasaṃjananatayā /
S04bsu016_u:238_20: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ bodhicittasaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta bodhibījāvipraṇāśopastambhasaṃjananatayā /
S04bsu016_u:238_21: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ sarvākārabodhisattvacaryāsaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanasarvasattvaparipākapraṇidhisaṃjananatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:238_23: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ mahāprītisaṃjananatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvatathāgatāvaropitadakṣiṇāniyatasarvajñatāphalaparyavasāne 'bhyudīraṇatayā /
S04bsu016_u:238_24: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ sarvatathāgataguṇavarṇasaṃprakāśanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta buddhaguṇaśarīrābhilāṣasarvajñatāpraṇidhisaṃjananatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:238_25: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ buddhamāhātmyasūcanayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta avivartyānābhogāpratiprasrabdhabuddhakāryānuṣṭhānasaktabuddhakāyapratilambhābhilāṣasaṃjananatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:238_26: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ buddhādhipateyatāsaṃdarśanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta anabhibhūtabuddhātmabhāvasaṃpatpratilābhābhilāṣasaṃjananatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:239_1_0: iha nagare tosale sarvarathyāsu sarvacatvareṣu sarvaśṛṅgāṭakeṣu sarvavīthīmukheṣu sarvagṛheṣu sarvaśreṇiṣu sarvakuleṣu sarvakulaparivarteṣu
S04bsu016_u:239_1_1: yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ yathāśayānāṃ yathāprayogāṇāṃ yathādhipateyānāṃ yathāvyavacārāṇāṃ tatsabhāgāni
S04bsu016_u:239_2: na ca te sattvā avabudhyante kenedaṃ deśitam,
S04bsu016_u:239_3: kuto vāyamiti / anyatra śrutvā tathatvāya pratipadyante /
S04bsu016_u:239_4: ye 'pīme kulaputra jambudvīpe ṣaṇṇavatiyo pāṣaṇḍā vividhadṛṣṭigatābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:239_6: yathā ca kulaputra ahamiha tosale nagare sattvānāmarthaṃ karomi,
S04bsu016_u:239_8: yathā jambudvīpe, tathā sarvatra cāturdvīpake lokadhātau,
S04bsu016_u:239_9: evaṃ sāhasre dvisāhasre trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
S04bsu016_u:239_10_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu, aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu, sarvasattvapatheṣu sarvasattvapratiṣṭhāneṣu sarvasattvaniketeṣu sarvasattvanilayasaṃjñāgateṣu
S04bsu016_u:239_10_1: sarvasattvaparivarteṣu sarvasattvasamavasaraṇeṣu sarvasattvasamudreṣu sarvasattvavaṃśeṣu sarvasattvadikṣu sarvasattvavidikṣu
S04bsu016_u:239_12: etāmahaṃ kulaputra sarvagāminīṃ sarvatrānugatāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:239_14: sarvajagatkuśalādhānābhimukhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
S04bsu016_u:240_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe pṛthurāṣṭraṃ nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:240_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:241_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvagāminaḥ parivrājakasya pādau śirasābhivandya sarvagāminaṃ parivrājakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:241_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sarvagāminaḥ parivrājakasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:243_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'napekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca,
S04bsu016_u:243_14: tāṃśca anyāṃśca sarvabodhisattvaguṇān saṃpaśyan anupūrveṇa yena pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadastenopasaṃkramya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:243_16_0: upetya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau sirasābhivandya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:243_16_1: utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ sarvabuddhasamajñānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ
S04bsu016_u:243_16_2: sarvabuddhapūrṇapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ sarvabuddharūpakāyaṃ draṣṭukāmaḥ sarvabuddhadharmakāyaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmaḥ
S04bsu016_u:243_17: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:243_18: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / kathaṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo niryāti sarvajñatāyām? āha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:243_33_0: saṃbhavato 'pi utpādato 'pi prādurbhāvato 'pi pariniṣpattito 'pi pariśuddhito 'pi parihārato 'pi prayogato 'pi paribhogato
S04bsu016_u:244_0: asti kulaputra manuṣyaloke nāgasaṃkṣobhasaṃbhavahastigarbho nāma gandhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:244_1: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadaṃ mahāgandhaghanābhrajālasaṃchannaṃ kṛtvā saptāhaṃ sūkṣmagandhodakadhārāvarṣamabhipravarṣati /
S04bsu016_u:244_2: tatra yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śarīre vā cīvare vā gandhodakadhārā nipatanti,
S04bsu016_u:244_6: ye 'pi sattvāsteṣāṃ gandhameghajālānāṃ mārutasamīritānāmantarbhavanagatā gandhaṃ jighranti,
S04bsu016_u:244_9: na caiṣāṃ śarīre vyādhirutpadyate dhātusaṃkṣobhajo vā aparaparikramiko vā /
S04bsu016_u:244_11: na samudācarati bhayaṃ vā trāsaṃ vā cchambhitattvaṃ vā manaḥsaṃkṣobho vā vyāpādo vā /
S04bsu016_u:244_12: sarve ca te sattvā anyonyaṃ maitracittā bhavanti harṣaprītisaṃjātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:244_13: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra harṣaprītisaṃjātānāmāśayaviśuddhimārabhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu016_u:245_0: asti kulaputra malayaparvatasaṃbhavaṃ gośīrṣaṃ nāma candanam,
S04bsu016_u:245_2: asti kulaputra sāgarakacchasaṃbhavo aparājito nāma gandhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_3: yenānuliptāyā bheryāḥ śaṅkhasya vā nirghoṣeṇa sarvaparacakraṃ parājayaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu016_u:245_4: asti kulaputra anavataptahṛdatīrasaṃbhavaṃ padmagarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaru,
S04bsu016_u:245_5: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gandhena spharati /
S04bsu016_u:245_8: asti kulaputra himavatparvatarājasaṃbhavā aruṇavatī nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_12: asti kulaputra rākṣasalokasaṃbhavā sāgaragarbhā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_14: yayā dhūpitamātrayā caturaṅgo balakāyo rājñaścakravartino gaganatale pratiṣṭhate /
S04bsu016_u:245_15: asti kulaputra, sudharmadevasabhāsaṃbhavā śobhanavyūhā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_19: teṣāmupasaṃkrāntānāṃ suyāmo devarājo dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu016_u:245_20: asti kulaputra tuṣitabhavane sindhuvāritā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_21_0: yā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇasya ekajātipratibaddhasya bodhisattvasya purato dhūpitā mahāgandhameghena sakalaṃ dharmadhātuṃ spharitvā
S04bsu016_u:245_22: asti kulaputra sunirmitadevarājabhavane manoharā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:245_25_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakāmoccalitānāṃ kleśamārapāśavipramuktānāṃ sarvabhavagativyativṛttānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:245_25_2: sarvālayaniketāniśritānāṃ sarvabhavālayaniketacāriṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:245_26: vā paridīpayitum, anavadyacaraṇaṃ vā prabhāvayitum, avyāpādakāyavāṅbhanaḥsamudācāro vā deśayitum //
S04bsu016_u:246_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe kūṭāgāraṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:246_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:246_3_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:248_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kūṭāgāranagarābhimukhaṃ mārgaṃ pratipadyamāno 'nuvicaran,
S04bsu016_u:248_1_0: mārganimnatāṃ mārgonnatatāṃ mārgasamatāṃ mārgaviṣamatāṃ mārgasarajaskatāṃ mārgavirajaskatāṃ mārgakṣematāṃ mārgagahanatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:248_1_1: mārgānāvaraṇatāṃ mārgakuṭilatāṃ mārgarjukatāmanuvilokya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - idaṃ khalu me tasya kalyāṇamitrasyopasaṃkramaṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:248_9_0: sa evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto durāsadasamudācāro 'nupūrveṇa yena kūṭāgāraṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya vairaṃ dāśaṃ parimārgan
S04bsu016_u:248_9_1: parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīnmahānagaramukhe sāgarāvatāratīre vairaṃ dāśaṃ vaṇikūśatasahasrairanekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasrairvicitrāṃ
S04bsu016_u:248_9_2: kathāṃ śrotukāmaiḥ parivṛtaṃ samudrakathāsaṃprakāśanatayā buddhaguṇasamudrān sattvānāmārocayamānam /
S04bsu016_u:248_10_0: dṛṣṭvā ca yena vairo dāśaḥ, tenopajagāma / upetya vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:248_10_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vairasya dāśasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāhamayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:248_11: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:248_12: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:248_13: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:248_14: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya mahājñānapratilambhasaṃbhavahetuṃ paripṛcchasi /
S04bsu016_u:248_16: mahāsāgaratīrakūṭāgāre mahānagare prativasāmi mahākaruṇādhvajāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariśodhayan /
S04bsu016_u:248_17: so 'haṃ kulaputra jambudvīpe daridrān sattvānavalokya eṣāmarthāya tathā tapastapyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:249_0: evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto 'haṃ kulaputra iha sāgaratīrakūṭāgāranagare pravicarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:249_3_0: sarvanāgabhavanāni sarvanāgasaṃkṣobhān sarvayakṣabhavanāni sarvayakṣasaṃkṣobhān sarvarākṣasabhavanāni sarvarākṣasabhayapraśamanāni
S04bsu016_u:249_6_0: gamanāgamanaviśeṣatāṃ kṣemākṣematāṃ yānapātrayantrakriyādṛḍhatāṃ yānaparihāraṃ yānavāhanaṃ mārutasaṃgrahaṇaṃ mārutotpādanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:249_7_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra evaṃjñānasamanvāgataḥ satataṃ sattvārthakāryaprayukto vaṇiggaṇaṃ dṛḍhena yānena kṣemeṇa śivenābhayena yathāpraharṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:249_9: na ca mama kulaputra kadācit kiṃcid yānapātraṃ vipannapūrvam /
S04bsu016_u:249_11: ye ca sattvā mama dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:250_0: etasya ahaṃ kulaputra mahākarūṇādhvajasya amoghadarśanaśravaṇaṃ saṃvāsānusmṛtirnāma nadīnirghoṣasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:250_1_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasaṃsārasāgaravicāriṇāṃ sarvakleśāsāgarānupaliptānāṃ sarvadṛṣṭigatasāgarasaṃgrahagrāhabhayavigatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:250_1_3: sarvajagatsāgaravinayakālānatikrāntānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:251_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe nandihāraṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:251_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:252_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:252_0_1: punaḥ punaravalokya aśrumukho rudan kalyāṇamitradarśanābhilāṣāvitṛpto vairasya dāśasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:254_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāmaitryapramāṇasattvadhātuspharaṇacitto mahākaruṇāsnehābhiṣyanditasaṃtāno vipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāravyūhopacitaḥ
S04bsu016_u:254_0_4: akṣuṇṇasarvajñatāpurapraveśābhimukhaḥ bodhisattvamārgamabhikāṅkṣamāṇo yena nandihāraṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya jayottamaṃ
S04bsu016_u:254_0_5: śreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīt pūrveṇa nadihārasya nagarasya paryante vicitradhvajāyāmaśokavanikāyāmanekagṛhapatisahasraparivṛtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:254_0_6: vividhāni nagarakāryāṇi pariniṣṭhāpayantaṃ tadāgamya ca dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayantam,
S04bsu016_u:254_10: bodhisattvaprajñābalasaṃdarśanatayā bodhisattvasmṛtibalaviśuddhyuttāraṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ yaduta bodhicittotpādābhirocanāya /
S04bsu016_u:255_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastatkathāparyavasānamāgamayitvā jayottamasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pādayoḥ praṇipatya suciramabhināmya
S04bsu016_u:255_2: tadvadatu me āryo yathāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣeyam /
S04bsu016_u:256_0: atha khalu jayottamaḥ śreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:256_15_0: adharmaṃ pratijahāmi / vivādaṃ praśamayāmi / vigrahaṃ vyāvartayāmi / kalahaṃ vyupaśamayāmi / yuddhaṃ nivārayāmi / raṇamupaśamayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_15_1: vairamuparamayāmi / bandhanāni cchinadmi / cārakāṇi bhinadmi / bhayāni vinivartayāmi / akuśalakarmābhisaṃskārān samucchinadmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_17: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pārūṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādabhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ sattvānnivārayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_25: sarvabuddhadharmārocanatāyai yāvadbrahmaloke 'pi sarvarūpadhātukān devānabhibhūya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_27: tathā daśasu dikṣu daśānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_28: buddhadharmān deśayāmi / bodhisattvadharmān śrāvakadharmān pratyekabuddhadharmān deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_31: tiryagyoniṃ deśayāmi / tiryagyonigatisaṃbhedaṃ tiyagyonigatigāminīṃ pratipadaṃ tiryagyonyupapattiduḥkhaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_32: yamalokaṃ deśayāmi, yamalokagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yamalokaduḥkhaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_33: svargalokaṃ deśayāmi, svargalokagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ svargalokaratyupacāraparibhogaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_34: manuṣyalokaṃ deśayāmi, manuṣyalokagatigāminīṃ pratipadaṃ manuṣyalokasukhaduḥkhānubhavavaicitryaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:256_39_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvābhijñānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakṣetratalamāyāgatajñānaśarīraspharaṇānāṃ samantacakṣurjñānabhūmipratilabdhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:256_40: sarvatathāgatādvayākalpācintyaśarīraparamāṇāṃ sarvatryadhvānusṛtajñānakāyānāṃ gaganatalavipulāpramāṇagocaraviṣayāṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:257_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śroṇāparānteṣu janapadeṣu kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:257_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:258_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayottamasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya jayottamaṃ śreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:258_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya jayottamasya śreṣṭhino 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:260_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena śroṇāparānte janapade kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram,
S04bsu016_u:260_1: tenopajagāma / upetya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ pratisattvaṃ paripṛcchan yato yataḥ paryaṭati,
S04bsu016_u:260_2: tena tenaiva anekāni kumāraśatāni anekāni kumārikāśatāni rathyācatvaraśṛṅgāṭakebhyaḥ saṃbhūya anubadhnanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:260_3_0: anekāni ca puruṣaśatāni anekāni ca strīśatānyarocayāmāsuḥ - eṣā kulaputra siṃhavijṛmbhitā bhikṣuṇī ihaiva kaliṅgavane nagare
S04bsu016_u:260_3_1: jayaprabhānupradatte sūryaprabhe mahodyāne prativasati aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya dharmaṃ prakāśayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:261_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānaṃ tenopasaṃkramya samantādanuvicaran anuvilokayan adrākṣīttasmin
S04bsu016_u:261_0_1: mahodyāne candrodgatān nāma vṛkṣān kūṭāgārasaṃchannānarcirvarṇārcirnirbhāsān samantādyojanamābhayā spharamāṇān,
S04bsu016_u:261_15: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūleṣu vicitramanojñarūpāṇi ratnasiṃhāsanāni prajñaptāni acintyānekavividharatnavyūhāni,
S04bsu016_u:261_32: mahābrahmavihāramasaṃkhyeyalokadhātvadhiṣṭhānākāśakośavipulāpramāṇāvakāśaṃ tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānamapaśyat siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā mahatā acintyarddhiprabhāvabalādhānena /
S04bsu016_u:262_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imānevamapramāṇācintyaguṇasamuditān mahodyānavyūhān bodhisattvakarmavipākapariniṣpannān
S04bsu016_u:262_1_0: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūlagateṣu mahāsiṃhāsaneṣu siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃniṣaṇṇāṃ mahāparivāraparivṛtāṃ prāsādikenātmabhāvena
S04bsu016_u:262_1_1: praśānteryāpathāṃ śāntendriyāṃ śāntamanasaṃ suguptāṃ jitendriyāṃ nāgamiva sudāntāṃ hradamiva acchānāvilaviprasannacittāṃ
S04bsu016_u:262_4_0: manoharagandharājamiva jagaccittaprahlādanakarīṃ himacandanamiva kleśaparidāhapraśamanakarīṃ sudarśanabhaiṣajyarājamiva sarvajagadduḥkhavyupaśamanakarīṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_1_0: sa kvacidāsanaparivāre maheśvaradevaputrapramukhānāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmakṣayavimokṣasaṃbhedaṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_2_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre rucirabrahmapramukhānāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantatalabhedaṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_3_1: sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ bodhisattvāśayaviśuddhivaśitāvyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_4_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre sunirmitadevarājapramukhānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_5_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre saṃtuṣitadevarājapramukhānāṃ tuṣitakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_6: kvacidāsanaparivāre suyāmadevarājapramukhānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanantavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_7_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre śakradevarājapramukhānāṃ trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_8_1: nāgakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ buddhaviṣayaprabhāvyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_9_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre vaiśravaṇamahārājapramukhānāṃ yakṣendrāṇāṃ sayakṣakanyāyakṣakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_12: kvacidāsanaparivāre mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhānāṃ garuḍendrāṇāṃ sagaruḍakanyāgarūḍakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ bhavasāgarasaṃtrāsaviṣayaṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_14_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre drumakinnararājapramukhānāṃ kinnarendrāṇāṃ sakinnarakanyākinnarakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_15_1: siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ buddhaprītisaṃbhavaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_16: kvacidāsanaparivāre 'nekeṣāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāśatasahasrāṇāṃ [Gv_151] saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānaviśeṣagamanaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_17_1: siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kṛpāsaṃbhavaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_18: kvacidāsanaparivāre śrāvakayānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānaviśeṣaprabhāvaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāpaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_19: kvacidāsanaparivāre pratyekabuddhayānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmudārabuddhaguṇāvabhāsaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_20: kvacidāsanaparivāre mahāyānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantamukhaṃ nāma samādhijñānālokamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_21: kvacidāsanaparivāre prathamacittotpādikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhikūṭaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_22: kvacidāsanaparivāre dvitīyabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ virajomaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_23: kvacidāsanaparivāre tṛtīyabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ praśāntavyūhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_24: kvacidāsanaparivāre caturthībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ sarvajñatāvegaviṣayasaṃbhavaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_25: kvacidāsanaparivāre pañcamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ cittalatākusumagarbhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_26: ṣaṣṭhībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ vairocanagarbhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_27: kvacidāsanaparivāre saptamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantabhūmyalaṃkāraṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_28_0: kvacidāsanaparivāre aṣṭamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ dharmadhātupañjarasuvibhaktaśarīraviṣayaṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_29: kvacidāsanaparivāre navamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanilambhabalanilayavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_30: kvacidāsanaparivāre daśamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanāvaraṇamaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_31: kvacidāsanaparivāre saṃniṣaṇṇasya vajrapāṇiparṣanmaṇḍalasya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānavajranārāyaṇavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:263_32: iti hi yāvatyaḥ sarvopapattyāyatanasaṃbhedeṣu sattvaprajñaptayaḥ sattvagatayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:263_33: tāsu ye sattvāḥ paripakvā vainayikā bhājanībhūtāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:263_34_0: teṣāṃ tasmin mahodyāne samavasṛtya pratyekamāsanaparivārasaṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ nānāśayānāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ niyatāśayānāṃ ghanarasaśraddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:263_34_1: siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ [Gv_152] tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayamānāmapaśyat,
S04bsu016_u:263_36_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tatsiṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samantacakṣurupekṣāvatīpramukhāni sarvabuddhadharmanirdeśapramukhāni
S04bsu016_u:263_37: ye ca tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānaṃ bodhisattvāstadanye vā sattvāḥ praviśanti siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā darśanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu016_u:263_38: bhikṣuṇyāḥ prathamaṃ kuśalamūladharmasamudāneṣu niyojitā yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheravivartyāḥ kṛtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:264_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā imāmevaṃrūpāmudyānasaṃpadaṃ vihārasaṃpadaṃ caṃkramasaṃpadaṃ
S04bsu016_u:264_0_2: dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ ca dharmanayaṃ śrutvā vipuladharmameghābhiṣyanditacittaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā abhimukhamāśayaviśuddhisaṃpadaṃ
S04bsu016_u:264_1: atha siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ sarvaṃ tanmahodyānaṃ saparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭamavabhāsitam /
S04bsu016_u:264_2: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evaṃ saṃjānāti - pradakṣiṇīkurvaṃśca samantādabhimukhaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:264_3: sa purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
S04bsu016_u:264_5: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:264_6: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:264_7: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:265_0: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:265_1: āha - ka etasya ārye sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? āha - eṣa kulaputra tryadhvagatavyūhaikacittakṣaṇakoṭivijñaptisvabhāvo jñānālokaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:265_2: āha - ka etasya ārye jñānālokasya viṣayaḥ? āha - etanmama kulaputra jñānālokamukhamāyūhatyā niryūhatyāḥ sarvadharmopapanno nāma samādhirājāyate,
S04bsu016_u:265_3_0: yasya samādheḥ sahapratilābhena manomayaiḥ kāyaiḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tuṣitabhavanagatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:265_7: ye ca sattvā mamedaṃ buddhapūjopasthānakarma prajānanti,
S04bsu016_u:265_8: te sarve niyatā bhavanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:265_15: sarvatathāgatān paśyāmi, na ca manye dharmaśarīraparijñānatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:265_18: sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharāmi, na ca manye māyāgatadharmatāvabuddhatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:265_20: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmanantamadhyadharmadhātvavatīrṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:265_21: ye te sarvadharmamanyanāvihāriṇaśca ekaparyaṅkena ca sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti /
S04bsu016_u:266_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:266_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:267_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:267_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā antikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:269_10: taṃ sarvabodhisattvakarmasmṛtyupādānārambhanistīraṇapraṇidhiṃ paripūrayan anupūrveṇa yena durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrānto vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīṃ parimārgan /
S04bsu016_u:269_11: tatra ye puruṣā vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇānabhijñā jñānagocarāvidhijñāśca,
S04bsu016_u:269_12_0: teṣāmetadabhavat - kimasya evaṃ śāntadāntendriyasya evaṃ saṃprajānasya evamabhrāntasya evamavikṣiptamānasasya evaṃ yugamātraprekṣiṇaḥ
S04bsu016_u:269_12_1: evaṃ vedanābhiraparyādattacittasya evamanimittagrāhiṇaḥ sarvarūpagateṣu utkṣiptacakṣuṣaḥ evamavyagramānasasya gambhīraceṣṭasyābhirūpasya
S04bsu016_u:269_12_2: sāgarakalpasya akṣobhyānabalīnacittasya vasumitrayā bhāgavatyā kāryam? na hīdṛśā rāgaratā bhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:269_14: nedṛśāḥ kāmadāsā bhavanti / nedṛśāḥ strīvaśagā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:269_15: nedṛśā māragocare caranti / nedṛśā māraviṣayaṃ niṣevante /
S04bsu016_u:269_17: nedṛśā mārapāśairbadhyante / nākāryakāriṇo bhavanti / ye punarvasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇaviśeṣābhijñā jñānagocarapratyakṣā vā,
S04bsu016_u:269_19: sulabdhāste lābhāḥ, yastvaṃ vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīṃ paripraṣṭavyāṃ manyase /
S04bsu016_u:269_24: eṣā kulaputra vasumitrā bhāgavatī nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasyottareṇa svagṛhe tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:270_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka idaṃ vacanamupaśrutya tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā niveśanam,
S04bsu016_u:270_1: tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamadrākṣīdvipulaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca daśaratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ daśaratnatālapaṅktiparivṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:270_5_0: sa tatrāpaśyadvasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāṃ suvarṇavarṇacchavimabhinīlakeśīṃ
S04bsu016_u:270_7_0: tayā ca sarvaṃ tadgṛhaṃ sarvaratnabhavanavimānavyūhaṃ svaśarīraniryātayā premaṇīyayā kāyaprahlādasukhasaṃjananyā cittaudbilyaprītikaraṇyā
S04bsu016_u:271_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
S04bsu016_u:271_2: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:271_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:271_4: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:271_5: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / sā avocat - mayā kulaputra virāga koṭīgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:271_9: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra sarveṣāṃ rāgavirāgatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:271_10: te ca taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā rāgavirāgatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S04bsu016_u:272_1: kīdṛśaṃ ca karmopacitam, yasyāstaveyamīdṛśī saṃpat? āha - smarāmi kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:272_2: atīte 'dhvani atyuccagāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:272_3: tasya kulaputra atyuccagāminastathāgatasya sattvānāmanukampārthaṃ sumukhāṃ nāma rājadhānīṃ praviśataḥ indrakīlamākrāmataḥ sarvaṃ tannagaraṃ prākampata /
S04bsu016_u:272_4: vipulavistīrṇaṃ ca anekaratnamayaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt anekaratnaprabhāvyūhaṃ vividharatnapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ nānādivyatūryapramuktanirghoṣam /
S04bsu016_u:272_6: ahaṃ ca kulaputra tena samayena sumatirnāma śreṣṭhibhāryā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:272_7: tato me buddhaprātihāryasaṃcoditayā svāminā sārdhaṃ pradhāvitvā tasya tathāgatasya vīthīmukhamupasaṃkrāntasya udāraprasādajātayā ekā ratnakākaṇiḥ pratipāditā /
S04bsu016_u:273_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śubhapāraṃgamaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:273_1: tatra veṣṭhilo nāma gṛhapatiścandanapīṭhaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ pūjayati /
S04bsu016_u:273_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:274_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:274_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā antikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:276_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena śubhapāraṃgame nagare veṣṭhilasya gṛhapaterniveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:276_1: upetya veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:276_2: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:276_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:276_4: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:276_5: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / so 'vocat - āhaṃ kulaputra aparyādattakoṭīgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:276_6: na mama kulaputra saṃtānāttathāgataḥ parinirvṛto na parinirvāti na parinirvāsyati sarvalokadhātuṣu atyantaparinirvāṇena anyatra vainayikasattvavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu016_u:276_8: tacca me caityadvāramuddhāṭayato 'kṣayabuddhavaṃśavyūho nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:276_9: etaṃ cāhaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadye /
S04bsu016_u:277_0_0: āha - ka etasya ārya samādherviṣayaḥ? āha - etaṃ mama kulaputra samādhiṃ samāpannasya asmin lokadhātuvaṃśe buddhaparaṃparayā
S04bsu016_u:277_1: buddhadarśanānusaṃdhau buddhaparaṃparānupacchedena cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe buddhaśataṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_4: evaṃ buddhakoṭīṃ buddhakoṭīśataṃ buddhakoṭīsahasraṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasraṃ buddhakoṭyayutaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaṃ buddhakoṭīkaṅkaraṃ buddhakoṭībimbaram /
S04bsu016_u:277_23: saṃdhārayāmi, smṛtyā codgṛhṇāmi / gatyā pravicinomi / bhaktyā pravibhajāmi / buddhyānugacchāmi / prajñayā prakāśayāmi / anāgatabuddhaparaṃparāṃ ca maitreyapramukhānavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_29: / matyā pravibhajāmi / buddhyā anugacchāmi / prajñayā prakāśayāmi / yathā ceha lokadhātuvaṃśe pūrvāntāparāntaparyāpannānāṃ buddhaparaṃparāṃ paśyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:277_30: avatarāmi, tathā daśasu dikṣu anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu atītānāgateṣu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvatathāgataparaṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_33_1: bodhisattvaiḥ pratyutpannānāṃ ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu vairocanapramukhānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ paraṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_38: taṃ tadā paśyāmi / yacca taibuddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitaṃ bhāṣante bhāṣiṣyante,
S04bsu016_u:277_39_0: tatsarva śṛṇomi / śrutvā codgṛhṇāmi / smṛtyā saṃdhārayāmi / gatyā pravicinomi / matyā pravibhajāmi / buddhyā anugacchāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_39_1: prajñayā prakāśayāmi / etamahaṃ kulaputra aparinirvāṇakoṭīgataṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:277_40_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ tryadhvaikakṣaṇajñānapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣaṇakoṭīsamādhivyūhavihāriṇāṃ tathāgatadivasāvakrāntānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:278_0: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe potalako nāma parvataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:278_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:278_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / tasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:279_0: gaccho hi sūdhana śirījalarājamadhye girirājapotalaki śobhani śūrabhāge /
S04bsu016_u:279_2: tasmiṃśca parvatavare viharāti dhīro avalokiteśvaru vidū jagato hitāya /
S04bsu016_u:279_3: taṃ gaccha pṛccha sudhanā guṇa nāyakānāṃ deśiṣyate vipulaśobhi nayapraveśam // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:280_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya veṣṭhilaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ
S04bsu016_u:282_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateranuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:282_9_0: tadacintyaṃ tathāgatakarmābhimukhīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena potalakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramya potalakaṃ parvatamabhiruhya avalokiteśvaraṃ
S04bsu016_u:282_9_1: bodhisattvaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīdavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ paścimadikparvatotsaṅge utsasaraḥprasravaṇopaśobhite
S04bsu016_u:282_9_2: nīlataruṇakuṇḍalakajātamṛduśādvalatale mahāvanavivare vajraratnaśilāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā upaviṣṭaṃ nānāratnaśilātalaniṣaṇṇāparimāṇabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:282_9_3: dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ sarvajagatsaṃgrahaviṣayaṃ mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāmukhodyotaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayantam /
S04bsu016_u:282_10_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ praharṣitavikasitānimiṣanayanaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ kalyāṇamitraprasādavegānugatāvikṣiptacetāḥ
S04bsu016_u:283_0: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dūrata eva āgacchantamavalokya āmantrayāmāsa - ehi /
S04bsu016_u:284_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya avalokiteśvara bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:284_0_1: avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ [Gv_160] pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:284_2: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:284_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:284_4: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:285_0_0: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo jāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇaṃ vicitrāprameyaprabhājālavāhavyūhameghapramuñcanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ
S04bsu016_u:285_0_2: mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:285_2: ahaṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ nāma bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:285_4: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambabodhisattvacaryāmukhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pādamulānna vicalāmi,
S04bsu016_u:285_11: tena mayā kulaputra idaṃ mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ pariśodhayatā sarvajagatpratiśaraṇapraṇidhirutpāditaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:285_18: so 'haṃ kulaputra, anenopāyena sattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimocya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya avivartyān karomi buddhadharmapratilābhāya /
S04bsu016_u:285_20_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāṃ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāgatiṃgatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:285_20_3: sarvasattvakuśalacittasaṃvardhanasrotānāṃ sarvasattvasaṃsārasrotovinivartikarasrotānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:287_0: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇu stavitva ca gauraveṇa prakānta dakṣiṇapathaṃ sudhanaḥ sudāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:287_2: vajrāmaye giritaṭe maṇiratnacitre siṃhāsane padumagarbhi niṣaṇṇa dhīro /
S04bsu016_u:287_4: dṛṣṭvopajāta atulā sudhanasya prīti upagamya vandati kramau guṇasāgarasya /
S04bsu016_u:287_5: ovāca dehi mama ārya kṛpāṃ janitvā śikṣāṃ tu ahu labhe ima bhadracaryām // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:287_6: bāhuṃ praṇamya vimalaṃ śatapuṇyacitraṃ prabhameghajāla vipulaṃ śubha muñcamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:287_7: mūrdhni sthihitva sudhanasya viśuddhasattvo avalokiteśvaru vidū vacanaṃ bhaṇāti // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:287_8: ekaṃ vimokṣamukha jānami buddhaputra sarvajināna karuṇāghanajñānagarbham /
S04bsu016_u:287_9: saṃbhūta sarvajagatrāyaṇasaṃgrahāya sarvatra vartati mamāpyatha ātmaprema // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:287_10: trāyāmi sarvajanatāṃ vyasanairanekaiḥ ye gāḍhabandhanagatāriṣu hastaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:287_11: gātreṣu viddha tatha cārakasaṃniruddhā mucyanti bandhanagatā mama nāma śrutvā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:287_13: utsṛṣṭaḥ vadhya nṛpatīna kṛtāparādhāḥ kṣiptā iṣu na ca kramanti śarīri teṣām /
S04bsu016_u:287_14: chidyanti śastra parivartati tīkṣṇa dhārā ye nāmadheyu mama tatra anusmaranti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:287_15: rājāna madhyagata ye ca vivādaprāptā vijinanti sarvaripavo 'tha śubhe labhante /
S04bsu016_u:287_16: vardhanti sarva yaśa mitrakule dhanāni bhontī adharṣiya smaritvana mahya nāma // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:287_18: gacchanti nirbhaya jinitvana sarvaśatrūn ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:287_19: kṣiptā manāgiritaṭītu praduṣṭacittairaṅgārakarṣu jvalitā api co vadhārtham /
S04bsu016_u:287_20: padmāṅkurā jalanidhi jvalanā bhavanti ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:287_21: prakṣipta sāgarajale na marenti tatra nadyāṃ na cohyati na dahyati cāgnimadhye /
S04bsu016_u:287_22: sarve anartha na bhavantyapi cārthasiddhiḥ nāmaṃ mamā anusmaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:287_23: haḍidaṇḍabandhanigaḍāśca tathā kudaṇḍā avamānanā tatha vimānana ṭhambhanāśca /
S04bsu016_u:287_24: ākrośatāḍanavibhartsanatarjanāśca mama nāmadheyu smaramāṇa labhanti mokṣam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:287_25: ye vairiṇo vivarachidragaveṣiṇaśca nityapraduṣṭamana ye ca avarṇavādī /
S04bsu016_u:287_26: sahadarśanena tada maitramanā bhavanti bheṣyanti varṇi śruta mahya smaritva nāma // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:287_27: vetālamantratha kakhorda sadā prayuktā ghātārtha teṣa ripavaḥ stimitā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:287_29: teṣa śarīri na kramanti viṣā aśeṣā ye nāmadheṣu mama kecidanusmaranti // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:287_31: ojoharairbhayakaraiḥ supināntare 'pi śāmyanti sarvi mama nāma anusmaritvā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:287_33: na dhanakṣayo nāpi upaiti daridrabhāvaṃ nāmaṃ mamā anusaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:287_34: na ca gacchati cyuta ito narakaṃ avīciṃ na tiraścayoni na ca preta na cākṣaṇāni /
S04bsu016_u:287_35: deve manuṣya upapadyati śuddhasattvo yo nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:287_36: na ca andhakāṇabadhirā na pi carcigātrā na ca raudra khañjā atha cāṭaka prekṣaṇīyā /
S04bsu016_u:287_37: sarvendriyairavikalā bahukalpakoṭyo bhontī narā mama smaritvana nāmadheyam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:287_38: avalokiteti mama te sugatiṃ vajranti yo puṣpamuṣṭi mama okirate śarīre /
S04bsu016_u:287_39: dhūpāṃśca dhūpayati yaśca dadāti chatraṃ vistārikai puja karoti prasannacitto
S04bsu016_u:287_40: mama buddhakṣetri sa ca bheṣyati dakṣiṇīyaḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:287_41: upapadyate itu cyavitvana śuddhasattvo buddhāna saṃmukha daśaddiśi lokadhātau /
S04bsu016_u:287_42: buddhāṃśca paśyati śṛṇoti ca teṣa dharmaṃ ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:287_43: ete tathānya kṣayituṃ nimituṃ na śakyā yāvaccupāyi ahu sattva vinemi loke /
S04bsu016_u:287_44: eko vimokṣa mama bhāvitu buddhaputra nāhaṃ guṇān guṇadharāṇa vijāni sarvān // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:287_46: aṣṭāpadākṛtu daśaddiśi lokadhātau kalyāṇamitra samupāsita sūdhanena /
S04bsu016_u:287_47: na ca tṛptu dharma śruṇamāṇu jinaurasānāṃ kasmānna prīti bhavati śruṇamāna dharmam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:288_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananyagāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaganatalenāgatya sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pratyaṣṭhāt /
S04bsu016_u:288_1: samantarapratiṣṭhāpitau ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pādau,
S04bsu016_u:288_4: tathārūpā ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena kāyāt prabhā pramuktā,
S04bsu016_u:288_14: tasmiṃśca potalake parvate 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:289_0: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamiha parṣanmaṇḍale saṃprāptam? āha - paśyāmi ārya /
S04bsu016_u:289_1: āha - etaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:290_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:292_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya jñānagāthālabdhacitto 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasyāvitṛpto
S04bsu016_u:292_0_1: darśanena vāṇīmaprativahan yena ananyagāmī bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya ananyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:292_0_2: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:292_1: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:292_2: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:292_3: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:293_0: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra samantamukhanirjavanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:293_1_0: āha - katamasya tvayā ārya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ? kiyaddūre
S04bsu016_u:293_1_1: vā sa ito lokadhātuḥ? kiyacciroccalito vāsi tato lokadhātoḥ? āha - durvijñeyametatkulaputra sthānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena
S04bsu016_u:293_1_2: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikayā prajayā - yaduta bodhisattvaparākramī bodhisattvavīryānivartyatā bodhisattvavīryasaṃhāryatā /
S04bsu016_u:293_2_1: prajñācakṣuvirahitaiḥ śrotuṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā avatarituṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:293_3: āha - vadatu me āryaḥ / adhimokṣyāmi śraddhāsyāmi buddhānubhāvena kalyāṇamitraparigraheṇa ca /
S04bsu016_u:293_4: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātorāgacchāmi samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt /
S04bsu016_u:293_5: tasya me kulaputra samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:293_6: tataśca me kulaputra śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātoruccalitasya anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ kalpāḥ kṣīṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:293_9: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi avirahitāni tathāgataiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:293_11: anuttarayā manomayyā anabhisaṃskāradharmadhātumudrāmudritayā tathāgatānujñātayā sarvabodhisattvapraharṣasaṃjananyā tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:293_14: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmindriyacakraṃ parijñāya yathāśayādhimuktito rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:293_18: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:293_21_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvatrānugatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samatādigabhimukhānāmasaṃbhinnajñānaviṣayāṇāṃ sarvadharmadhātusuvibhaktaśarīrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:294_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe dvāravatī nāma nagarī /
S04bsu016_u:294_2: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ - bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:295_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nanyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:295_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya ananyagāmino bodhisattvasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:297_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vipulabodhisattvacaryānugatacitto 'nanyagāmino bodhisattvasya jñānagocaraṃ spṛhayamāṇarūpo
S04bsu016_u:297_0_2: pratipadyamānaḥ samādhibhūmiṃ vicārayamāṇo dhāraṇībhūmau pratiṣṭhamānaḥ praṇidhānabhūmimavataran pratisaṃvidbhūmāvanuśikṣamāṇobalabhūmiṃ
S04bsu016_u:297_0_3: niṣpādayamāno 'nupūrveṇa yena dvāravatī nagarī tenopasaṃkramya mahādevaṃ paryapṛcchat /
S04bsu016_u:297_1: tasya mahājanakāya ārocayāmāsa - eṣa kulaputra mahādevo nagaraśṛṅgāṭake devāgāre audārikeṇātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:297_2_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena mahādevastenopasaṃkramya mahādevasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā
S04bsu016_u:297_2_1: evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:297_3: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:297_4: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:297_5: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:298_0_0: atha khalu mahādevo devaścaturdiśaṃ caturaḥ pāṇīn prasārya caturbhyo mahāsamudrebhyaḥ paramaśīghrajavena vāryānīya svamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:298_0_1: prakṣālya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavakīrya evamāha - sudurlabhadarśanā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:298_2: pratiśaraṇabhūtā lokasya, pratiṣṭhānabhūtā jagataḥ, mahāvabhāsakarāḥ sattvānām, kṣemapathadarśakāḥ saṃmūḍhamārgāṇām,
S04bsu016_u:298_5: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - durdṛṣṭighātanaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yena nirmalacittānāṃ svakāyapratibhāsaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu016_u:298_10: āha - ka etasya ārya meghajālasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:299_0_0: atha khalu mahādevoḥ devaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya purato mahāparvatamātraṃ suvarṇarāśimupadarśya rūpyarāśiṃ vaiḍūryarāśiṃ
S04bsu016_u:299_0_1: sphaṭikarāśiṃ musāragalvarāśiṃ aśmagarbharāśiṃ jyotirasamaṇiratnarāśiṃ vimalagarbhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ vairocanamaṇiratnarāśiṃ
S04bsu016_u:299_0_2: samantadigabhimukhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ cūḍāmaṇiratnamakuṭarāśiṃ vicitramaṇiratnarāśiṃ keyūrarāśiṃ kuṇḍalavibhūṣaṇarāśiṃ valayarāśiṃ
S04bsu016_u:299_0_3: mekhalarāśiṃ nūpūrarāśiṃ vividhamaṇiratnarāśiṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgavibhūṣaṇarāśiṃ cintārājamaṇiratnarāśiṃ sarvapuṣpāṇi sarvagandhān
S04bsu016_u:299_0_4: sarvadhūpān sarvamālyāni sarvavilepanāni sarvacūrṇāni sarvavastrāṇi sarvacchatrāṇi sarvadhvajān sarvapatākāḥ sarvatūryāṇi
S04bsu016_u:299_1: [Gv_168] asaṃkhyeyāni ca kanyākoṭīśatasahasrāṇyupadarśya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - itaṃ kulaputra gṛhītvā dānāni dehi,
S04bsu016_u:299_2: puṇyāni kuru, tathāgatān pūjaya, sattvān dānena saṃgrahavastunā saṃgṛhya tyāgapāramitāyāṃ niyojaya,
S04bsu016_u:299_5: evamaparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ dānacetanāniruddhānāṃ tyāgavāsitāṃ saṃtatiṃ karomi /
S04bsu016_u:299_6: buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu bodhisattvakalyāṇamitreṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:299_7: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra kāmaratipramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ viṣayaparibhogaparigṛddhānāṃ tān viṣayānaśubhānadhitiṣṭhāmi /
S04bsu016_u:299_8: krodhāviṣṭānāṃ mānamadadarpagarvitānāṃ vigrahavainayikānāṃ raudrarākṣasavikṛtabhayānantaśarīrān māṃsarudhirabhakṣānātmabhāvānupadarśya taṃ sarvaṃ stambhasaṃrambhamupadarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:299_10: evaṃ taistairupāyaiḥ sarvākuśalacaryābhyo vinivartya sarvakuśaladharmapratipattau saṃniyojayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:299_14_0: bodhisattvānāṃ kleśāsurapramardakānāṃ vārikalpānāṃ sarvajagadduḥkhāgniskandhanirvāpayitṝṇāṃ tejaḥskandhakalpānāṃ sarvajagattṛṣṇāsalilasaṃśoṣaṇakarāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:299_14_1: vāyukalpānāṃ sarvagrāhābhiniveśaparvatavikiraṇānāṃ vajrakalpānāṃ dṛḍhātmasaṃjñāśailanirdāraṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:300_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva jambudvīpe magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe sthāvarā nāma pṛthvīdevatā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:300_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:301_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahādevasya pādau śirasābhivandya mahādevaṃ devamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya mahādevasya devasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:303_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe sthāvarā pṛthvīdevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:303_1: daśapṛthivīdevatāśatasahasrāṇi anyonyamevaṃ vācamudīrayāmāsuḥ - ayaṃ sa āgacchati,
S04bsu016_u:303_9_0: atha tāni sthāvarāpramukhāni daśapṛthivīdevatāśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīcālaṃ kṛtvā gambhīrajaladharanirnādaṃ janayitvā sarvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:304_0: atha sthāvarā pṛthivīdevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - svāgataṃ te kulaputra /
S04bsu016_u:304_1: ayaṃ sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra te sthitvā kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni yatrāhaṃ pratyakṣā /
S04bsu016_u:304_2_0: kimicchasi tadvipākaphalaikadeśaṃ draṣṭum? atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:304_2_1: sthāvarāṃ pṛthivīdevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha
S04bsu016_u:305_0_0: atha khalu sthāvarā pṛthivīdevatā pādatalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ parāhatya asaṃkhyeyamaṇiratnanidhānakoṭīśatasahasrapratimaṇḍitāmupadarśya
S04bsu016_u:305_1: tava purojavāni, tava yathecchopabhogyāni, tava puṇyavipākanirjātāni, tava puṇyabalarakṣitāni / tebhyastvaṃ gṛhītvā yatkārthaṃ tatkuruṣva /
S04bsu016_u:305_2: api tvahaṃ kulaputra jñānaduryodhanagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:305_3: sā ahametena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā dīpaṃkaratathāgatamupādāya bodhisattvasya nityānubaddhā satatamārakṣāpratipannā /
S04bsu016_u:305_4: tataḥ prabhṛti ahaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya cittacaritaṃ vyavacārayāmi,
S04bsu016_u:305_8_2: [Gv_170] sarvasattvaparipācanavinayajñānanayaṃ sarvabuddhavikurvitasaṃdarśananayaṃ ca anugacchāmi saṃdhārayāmi saṃpratīcchāmi /
S04bsu016_u:306_0_0: eṣa ca me kulaputra jñānaduryodhanagarbho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa candradhvajāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:306_1: sā ahaṃ kulaputra imaṃ jñānaduryodhanagarbhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamāyūhantī niryūhantī saṃvardhayantī vipulīkurvāṇā avirahitābhūvaṃ tathāgatadarśanena yāvad bhadrakalpāt /
S04bsu016_u:306_2: atra ca mayā anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:306_3: sarveṣā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu016_u:306_4: sarveṣāṃ ca ahaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kuśalamūleṣu sākṣībhūtā /
S04bsu016_u:306_6_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvatathāgatānubaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhakathānudhāriṇāṃ sarvatathāgatajñānagahanapraviṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:307_0: gaccha kulaputra, idamihaiva jambudvīpe magadhaviṣaye kapilavastu nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:307_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:308_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sthāvarāṃ pṛthivīdevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:308_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:310_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ tāṃ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyā anuśāsanīmanusmaran,
S04bsu016_u:310_10: sa kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa praviśya madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya asthāt /
S04bsu016_u:310_11_0: acirāstamite sūrye sarvabodhisattvānuśāsanīṣu pradakṣiṇagrāhī vāsantyā rātridevatāyā darśanaparitṛṣitaḥ kalyāṇamitreṣu buddhajñānapratilambhaniścitabuddhiḥ
S04bsu016_u:310_12_0: mahājñānacakṣuḥprasṛtāvahitāśayo 'drākṣīdvāsantīṃ rātridevatāṃ kapilavastuno mahānagarasyordhvaṃ gaganatale vicitrānupamamaṇikūṭāgāre
S04bsu016_u:310_14: yāvantaśca tayā vipule sattvadhātau akṣaṇāpāyadurgativinipātebhyaḥ sattvāḥ parimocitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:311_0_0: sa tān nānopāyasaṃprayuktān dharmanayasāgarān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto vāsantyā
S04bsu016_u:311_0_1: rātridevatāyāḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya utthāya vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāsantyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:311_0_2: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā khalu devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:311_1: [Gv_172] so 'haṃ kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhānān sarvabuddhaguṇān saṃpaśyan kalyāṇamitrāśritamātmānaṃ karomi /
S04bsu016_u:311_2: darśaya me devate sarvajñatāmārgaṃ yatra pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo niryāti daśabalabhūmau /
S04bsu016_u:312_0: evamukte vāsantī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:312_1: yastvamevaṃ kalyāṇamitrāveśāviṣṭaḥ kalyāṇamitravacanāni śuśrūṣuḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyāṃ pratipadyase /
S04bsu016_u:312_2: niyamena tvaṃ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṃ pratipadyamānaḥ āsannībhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:312_13: evaṃ cittamanasikāraprayuktā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra anena sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā /
S04bsu016_u:313_0_0: ye sattvā andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau parikrānteṣu manuṣyeṣu bhūtasaṃghānucaritāyāṃ taskaragaṇasaṃkīrṇāyāṃ viṣamacāritrasattvadikcaritāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:313_1_0: sthalagatā vā parvatagatā vā aṭavīkāntāragatā vā vanāntaragatā vā deśāntaragatā vā grāmāntaragatā vā digantaragatā vā vidigantaragatā
S04bsu016_u:313_1_1: vā mārgāntaragatā vā mahāsāgaragatā vā vipannayānapātrā bhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:313_2: sthalagatā vā vihanyante, parvatagatā vā mahāprapāteṣu prapatanti,
S04bsu016_u:313_10_0: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra sattvānāṃ nānopāyamukhairlayanabhūtā bhavāmi - yaduta sāgaragatānāṃ kālikāvātameghavikiraṇatāyai kaluṣodakātikramaṇatāyai
S04bsu016_u:313_12_0: kasyacidrājarūpeṇa jagarājarūpeṇa kūrmarājarūpeṇa asurarājarūpeṇa garuḍarājarūpeṇa kinnararājarūpeṇa mahoragarāgarājarūpeṇa
S04bsu016_u:313_13: tacca kuśalamūlamevaṃ pariṇāmayāmi - sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhaveyaṃ sarvaduḥkhaskandhavinivartanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:313_14_0: sthalagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ mohāndhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau veṇukaṇṭakaśarkarakaṭhallākīrṇāyāṃ ghoraviṣoragasaṃkīrṇāyāṃ nimnonnataviṣamapracārāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:313_14_2: dharaṇyāṃ diksaṃmūḍhānāṃ sattvānāmādityarūpeṇa udgatacandrarūpeṇa maholkāpātarūpeṇa vidyunmālāniścāraṇarūpeṇa ratnābhārūpeṇa
S04bsu016_u:313_14_3: grahamaṇḍalarūpeṇa nakṣatrajyotirgaṇavimānaprabhārūpeṇa devarūpeṇa bodhisattvarūpeṇa sattvānāṃ trāṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:313_15: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvakleśāndhakāravidhamanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:313_16: parvataprapātagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇabhayabhītānāṃ jīvitapratilambhāya yaśaskāmatāvaśagatānāṃ kīrtiśabdadhvajakāmānāṃ bhogārthikānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:313_17_1: vividhaduḥkhabhayopadrutānāṃ nānopāyamukhaiḥ śaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi - yaduta giriguhāsaṃsthānābhinirhāreṇa phalamūlabhojanābhinirhāreṇa
S04bsu016_u:313_18: giriguhādarivivaragatānāṃ vividhaduḥkhopadrutānāṃ timirāndhakāravinivartanatāyai samapṛthivītalābhinirhāreṇa śaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:313_19: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathā ahameṣāṃ parvatagatānāṃ sattvānāmārakṣāṃ karomi,
S04bsu016_u:313_22: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena vividhadṛṣṭigahanagatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇājālasaṃsaktān vicitrasaṃsāraduḥkhabhayopadrutān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:313_23_0: aṭavīkāntāragatānāmapyahaṃ sattvānāmandhakāraprāptānāṃ nānopāyamukhaiḥ sukhaṃ saṃjanayya mārgaṃ saṃdarśya etānabhayakṣeme
S04bsu016_u:313_23_1: pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena saṃsāraṭavīkāntāraprāptān sattvān durgatipathapratipannān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:313_24_0: deśajanapadāviṣṭānapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvānabhiniveśādhikārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavamānān vividhairudbadhyamānopāyaistato
S04bsu016_u:313_24_1: janapadābhiniveśāduccālya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān skandhālayābhiniveśāduccālya anālayasarvajñajñāne
S04bsu016_u:313_25_0: grāmagatānapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvān gṛhaniketabandhanabaddhānandhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau vividhagṛhāpadduḥkhitān nānodvegamukhairudbadhya
S04bsu016_u:313_25_1: saṃjanitasaṃvegacittān dhanadānena saṃgṛhya samyak prīṇayitvā anikete dharme pratiṣṭhāpya
S04bsu016_u:313_26: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān svāyatanagrāmasaṃniśritān saṃsāragativiṣayagocarāduccālya sarvajñatāgocare pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:314_1: ye ca kulaputra andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrāvekaikaśaḥ pūrvādidigvidikṣu sarvadiksaṃmūḍhā bhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:314_3: unnateṣvavanatasaṃjñinaḥ, avanateṣūnnatasaṃjñinaḥ, teṣāmahaṃ digmārgadeśasaṃmūḍhānāṃ nānāvidhairupāyairavabhāsaṃ kṛtvā niṣkramitukāmānāṃ dvāraṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:314_9: samaviṣamān pṛthivīpradeśān vividhāni ca rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:314_12: priyaviprayogotkaṇṭhitānāṃ mātāpitṛputradāramitrāmātyajñātisālohitān vividhāni ca manāpāni rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:314_13: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāmandhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau timiropahatanetrāṇāṃ diksaṃmūḍhānāmālokaṃ karomi,
S04bsu016_u:314_15_1: anitye nityasaṃjñināṃ duḥkheduḥkhasaṃjñināṃ anātmani ātmasaṃjñinām aśubhe śubhasaṃjñināṃ dṛḍhātmasattvajīvapoṣapudgalagrahasaṃniśritānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:314_16_1: mātāpitṛvipratipannānāmānantaryakarmakāriṇāṃ mahāprapātābhimukhānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahāprajñālokena avidyāndhakāraṃ vidhūya anuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:314_16_2: samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpya samantabhadreṇa mahāyānena daśabalajñānabhūmimārgaṃ saṃdarśayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:314_17_0: tathāgatabhūmimapi tathāgataviṣayamapi sarvajñajñānanayasāgaramapi buddhajñānagocaramapi buddhaviṣayamapi daśabalapariniṣpattimapi
S04bsu016_u:315_0_0: glānānāmapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvānāṃ dīrghavyādhiparikhinnānāṃ durbalaśarīrāṇāṃ jīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ jarābhibhūtānāmanāthānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:315_0_1: kṛpaṇānāṃ ca daridrāṇāṃ vilayagatānāṃ videśaprāptānāṃ vidikpratipannānāṃ bandhanagatānāṃ kāraṇāprāptānām aparādhināṃ rājabandhotsṛṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:315_1: sāhaṃ kulaputra glānānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvopāyairvyādhyapanayanāya pratipadyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:315_4: kṛpaṇadaridrāṇāṃ dhanakanakaskandhena saṃgrahaṃ karomi [Gv_175] vinipātagatānāṃ samānārthatayā saṃgrahaṃ karomi /
S04bsu016_u:315_10: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhabhayopadravaparitrāṇe pratiśaraṇaṃ bhavāmi,
S04bsu016_u:315_21: laukikāyāṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpya divyamānuṣikāyāṃ saṃpattau saṃniyojayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:315_23: evamahaṃ sarvasattvānārye lokottare pāramitāmārge pratiṣṭhāpya sarvajñatāyāmavaivartyān kṛtvā samantabhadreṇa mahāpraṇidhānena sarvajñatāyāmupanayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:316_0_0: atha khalu vāsantī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣadiśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:316_0_1: bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:317_1: kālamavekṣya jagatsukhanetā eṣa vimokṣanayo mama śāntaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:317_2: maitri mamā vipulā suviśuddhā kalpa ananta subhāvita pūrve /
S04bsu016_u:317_3: apāya pharitva prabhāsami lokaṃ eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:317_4: karuṇasamudra mamāmita loke saṃbhavu yatra triyadhvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:317_6: yena jagasya dukhaṃ praśamemī eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:317_7: lokasukhānyabhinirharamāṇā saṃskṛta ārya sukhāni ca yāni /
S04bsu016_u:317_8: prīti udagra pramodami tena otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:317_10: buddhabalaṃ pariśodhayamānā otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:317_11: cakṣu mamā vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ yena daśaddiśi paśyami kṣetrā /
S04bsu016_u:317_12: teṣu ca kṣetrataleṣu svayaṃbhūn paśyami bodhidrumendraniṣaṇṇān // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:317_15: teṣu ca kṣetrapatheṣu ya sattvāḥ sarvacyutīupapattimukheṣu /
S04bsu016_u:317_16: paśyami te gatisāgari bālāḥ saṃsaramāṇa svakarmanubhonti // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:317_17: srotasamudra mamātiviśuddho yatra samosari śabda aśeṣāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:317_18: sarvajagasya ya mantrasamudrā sarva śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:317_20: yo hi pravartati cakru jinānāṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:317_24: jihva mamā vipula suprabhūtā tāmratanū ratanābha viśuddhā /
S04bsu016_u:317_25: yāya jñapemi yathāśaya sattvān otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:317_29: tatra samosari sarvanarendrān no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:317_30: kṣetrataleṣu acintiya sattvāḥ teṣa prajānami cittasamudrān /
S04bsu016_u:317_31: indriyaāśaya jānami teṣāṃ no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:317_32: ṛddhi mamo vipulā susamāptā kampayi kṣetra acintiyāya /
S04bsu016_u:317_33: kāyaprabhāya prabhāvatu yeno sarva sudurdama sattva damemi // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:317_34: puṇya mamo vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ akṣayakoṣa samantaviyūham /
S04bsu016_u:317_35: yena pravartayi pūja jinānāṃ bhoti ca sarvajagatyupajīvyam // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:317_36: prajña mamo vipulā suviśuddhā yāya prajānami dharmasamudrān /
S04bsu016_u:317_37: saṃśaya chindami sarvajanānāṃ otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:317_39: buddhasamudra ahaṃ avatīrṇā sarvi triyadhvi nayottaramānā /
S04bsu016_u:317_40: teṣu ca otaramī praṇidhānaṃ eṣa nayo atulaḥ susamāptaḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:317_41: sarvaraje ahu kṣetrasamudrān paśyami caiva triyadhvapraveśān /
S04bsu016_u:317_42: tatra ca paśyami buddhasamudrā teṣa samantatalaṃ nayabhūmim // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:317_43: paśya virocana bodhivibuddhaṃ sarvadiśāsu spharitvana kṣetrā /
S04bsu016_u:318_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? kiyacciraṃ pratilabdhaśca te 'yaṃ vimokṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:318_1_0: yasya pratilambhāttvamevaṃrūpayā sattvārthakriyayā pratyupasthitā? evamukte vāsantī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha
S04bsu016_u:318_1_1: - bhūtapūrvaṃ jinaputra atīte 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa praśāntaprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūtpañcabuddhakoṭīśataprabhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:318_3: tasyāṃ khalu punarlokadhātau ratnacandrapradīpaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikā /
S04bsu016_u:318_5: tatra rājadhānyāṃ sudharmatīrtho nāma rājābhūt dhārmiko dharmarājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:318_6: sa tāmakaṇṭakāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ sasāgaragiriparyantāṃ dharmeṇābhinirjitya adhyāvasati sma /
S04bsu016_u:319_0: tasya sudharmatīrthasya rājño dharmamaticandrā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:319_1: sā rātryāḥ pūrve yāme madanamattā ratikrīḍāpariśrāntā madhyame yāme 'ntaḥpuramadhyagatā prasuptā /
S04bsu016_u:319_2_0: atha tasyāḥ padmaprabhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgataḥ sarvavyūhaprabhāmaṇirājaśarīre
S04bsu016_u:319_3: tenāsau sarvo ratnaśrīsaṃbhavo lokadhāturanekavarṇayā udārayā prabhayā sphuṭāvabhāsito 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:319_4: tasyāṃ ca padmaprabhayāṃ rājadhānyāṃ suviśuddhacandrābhā nāma rātridevatā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:319_5_0: sā tāṃ dharmamaticandrāṃ rājabhāryāmupasaṃkramya ābharaṇasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena prabodhya evamāha - yatkhalu rājapatni jānīyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:319_5_1: - śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:319_6: sā tasyā rājabhāryāyāḥ purato vistareṇa buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ buddhavikurvitaṃ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaṃ ca saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:319_7: [Gv_179] sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra rājabhāryā tathāgataprabhāvabhāsitādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitā /
S04bsu016_u:319_9: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:319_10: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:320_0: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tenābhilāṣikeṇa cittotpādena tena ca tathāgatāvaropitena kuśalamūlena sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairna jātu durgatiṣūpapannā /
S04bsu016_u:320_1_0: na narake, na tiryagyonau preteṣu vā, na jātu hīnakuleṣūpapannā / na jātvindriyavikalābhūvam / na jātu duḥkhitābhūvan / sadā
S04bsu016_u:320_1_1: ahaṃ deveṣu devamāhātmyaṃ pratilabhya manuṣyeṣu ca manuṣyamāhātmyaṃ na jātu kalyāṇamitravirahitā abhūvaṃ yaduta buddhabodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:320_3: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra buddhānubuddheṣu kuśalamūlānyavaropayamāṇā sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān sukhena śamena kṣemeṇa mārgeṇa āgatā /
S04bsu016_u:321_0_0: teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāmatikrāntānāmito bhadrakalpātpūrvaṃ daśānāṃ kalpasahasrāṇāṃ prathamastena kālena
S04bsu016_u:321_1: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra rajovimalatejaḥśrīrlokadhātuḥ kliṣṭaviśuddho 'bhūt pañcabuddhotpādaśataprabhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:321_2_0: teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ prathamaḥ sumerudhvajāyatanaśāntanetraśrīrnāma tathāgato loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S04bsu016_u:321_2_1: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:321_3: ahaṃ ca prajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvaṃ vighuṣṭakīrteḥ śreṣṭhino duhitā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
S04bsu016_u:321_4: sā ca suviśuddhacandrābhā rātridevatā praṇidhānavaśena virajovatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitradhvajāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ viśuddhanetrābhā nāma rātridevatā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:321_5_0: tayā me rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ śayitayormātāpitrostadgṛhaṃ kampayitvā udāreṇāvabhāsena svarūpaṃ saṃdarśya buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ bhāṣitvā
S04bsu016_u:321_6: sā ahaṃ sārdhaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mahatā ca jñātisaṃghena tāṃ suviśuddhacandrābhāṃ rātridevatāṃ puraskṛtya tasya tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:321_7: tato mayā tasya tathāgatasya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sahadarśanena jagadvinayabuddhadarśanaprabhavo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:321_9: yasya pratilambhānmayā te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ kalpā anusmṛtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:321_11: tayā me tasya tathāgatasyāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā eṣa sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukho nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:321_16: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:322_0: sa ca me vimokṣaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ vivardhate /
S04bsu016_u:322_1: tadvimokṣacittānantareṇa cittena lokadhātuśataparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:322_2: tadanantareṇa cittena lokadhātusahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:322_3: tadanantareṇa cittena lokadhātuśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:322_8: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā,
S04bsu016_u:322_20: guṇān vā vaktum, gocaro vā avatartum, vimokṣavikrīḍitaṃ vā saṃdarśayitum /
S04bsu016_u:323_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhā nāma rātridevatā prativasati,
S04bsu016_u:323_2: punaḥ punaśca saṃcoditā / tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:324_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmābhigārthābhirabhyaṣṭauṣīt -
S04bsu016_u:325_1: paśyami kāyu tavādya viśuddhaṃ lakṣaṇacitritu meru yathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:325_4: yatra samosari loka aśeṣaḥ saṃbhavate 'tha vibhoti asaṅgam // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:325_6: romamukheṣu ca paśyami tubhyaṃ tārakasaṃgha sajyotiṣacandrān // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:325_7: cittu tavā vipulaṃ suviśuddhaṃ yena sphuṭaṃ gaganaṃ va diśāsu /
S04bsu016_u:325_8: yatra samosari sarvanarendrā jñānamakalpamalaṃ varu tubhyam // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:325_9: kṣetrarajopama megha vicitrā niścariṣū tava romamukheṣu /
S04bsu016_u:325_10: te ca pharanti daśaddiśi buddhān sarvaviyūha pravarṣayamāṇāḥ // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:325_11: sarvajagopama kāya anantā niścariṣū tava romamukheṣu /
S04bsu016_u:325_12: te ca daśaddiśi loku pharitvā nānaupāya viśodhayi sattvān // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:325_14: ye tvaya śodhita sattvagatīṣu teṣa yathāśayasaṃbhuta sarvān // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:325_15: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ ye tava nāma śṛṇonti udagrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:325_17: ye 'tha ca darśanameṣi narāṇāṃ bodhipathābhimukhāśca bhavanti // 29 //
S04bsu016_u:325_18: kalpa acintiya vāsu apāye darśanahetu tavotsahitavyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:325_19: yatti śraveṇa praharṣitacittā darśanamātra śamesi ca kleśān // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:325_21: varṇa bhaṇettava romamukhasya varṇakṣayo 'sya bhavenna kadācit // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:326_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya vāsantyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:326_0_1: vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya avitṛpta eva kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanena vāsantyā
S04bsu016_u:328_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantyā rātridevatāyāḥ prathamasthānabodhisattvacittamaṇḍalapariśuddhimanugacchan,
S04bsu016_u:328_11_0: tenopasaṃkramya samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāṃ rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:328_11_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya devate,
S04bsu016_u:328_13: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvacaryābhūmau carati,
S04bsu016_u:328_14: kathaṃ niryāti, kathaṃ pariniṣpadyate? āha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:328_16: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ pariniṣpannā bhavanti bodhisattvacaryāyām /
S04bsu016_u:328_27: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ pariniṣpannā bhavanti bodhisattvacaryāyām /
S04bsu016_u:329_0: ahaṃ khalu kulaputra śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:329_1: tasyā mama kulaputra tryadhvaprāptāḥ sarvatathāgatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:329_4: pūrvayogasamudrānapi, nāmasamudrānapyavatarāmi / teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ dharmacakrapravartanavimātratāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:329_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? agatikā hi te tathāgatāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:329_9: sarvalokagatiniruddhatvāt / anāgatikā hi te tathāgatāḥ, [Gv_184] svabhāvāsaṃbhūtatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:329_11: aniruddhā hi te tathāgatāḥ, anutpādalakṣaṇatvāt / asatyā hi te tathāgatāḥ, māyāgatadharmadarśanavijñaptyā /
S04bsu016_u:330_0: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra evaṃ sarvatathāgatānavataramāṇā etaṃ śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ tathāgatadhyānamaṇḍalāvabhāsena vipulīkaromi,
S04bsu016_u:330_1_0: pravistarāmi avatarāmi anugacchāmi samīkaromi abhinirharāmi samatalīkaromi praveśayāmi vivardhayāmi nidhyāyāmi upanidhyāyāmi
S04bsu016_u:330_1_1: ākārayāmi gocarīkaromi dṛḍhīkaromi avabhāsayāmi prabhāsayāmi vyūhayāmi vibhajāmi saṃbhārayāmi saṃbhāvayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:330_2_0: tatra ca sarvasaṃkalpāsamudācārāyāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvaparitrāṇasamudācāracittaikāgratāyai prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:331_0: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā nānopāyaiḥ sattvān paripācayāmi yaduta rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ ratipramattānāṃ sattvānāmaśubhasaṃjñāṃ saṃjanayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:331_3: te ca sattvāstaccittaṃ paribhāvayantaḥ sarvakāmaratiṣvanabhiratā dharmārāmaratiṃ pravārayamāṇā agārādanāgārikaṃ niṣkrāmanti /
S04bsu016_u:331_9_0: mārgaṃ saṃdarśayāmi / ālokaṃ karomi / tamondhakāraṃ vidhamāmi / bhayamantardhāpayāmi / naiṣkramyaṃ saṃvarṇayāmi / buddhavarṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:332_2: [Gv_185] anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya utpannānāṃ ca pāpakānāṃ saṃkalpānāmantardhānāya pratyayamupasaṃharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:334_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva mamānantaraṃ vairocanabodhimaṇḍe pradakṣiṇena pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā nāma rātridevatā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:334_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvakarmasu prayoktavyam /
S04bsu016_u:335_0_0: atha khalu samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:335_0_1: bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:336_1: teṣu cakṣu vipulaṃ viśudhyate yena otariṣu buddhasāgarān // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:336_2: paśyahī jinaśarīru nirmalaṃ lakṣaṇehi samalaṃkṛtaṃ śubham /
S04bsu016_u:336_3: tacca paśyahi jine vikurvitaṃ dharmadhātupharaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇam // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:336_5: dharmadhātu vipulaṃ spharitvanā cakru vartayi jage yathāśayam // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:336_7: buddhiyā jinu svabhāvadharmatāṃ niḥśarīra supraśānta advayām /
S04bsu016_u:336_8: rūpakāyu śubhalakṣaṇaiścitaṃ darśayī jagu pharitva śeṣataḥ // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:336_9: buddhakāyu vipulo acintiyo dharmadhātu phari yenaśeṣato /
S04bsu016_u:336_10: so ca dṛśyati samantataḥ samaṃ sarva darśayi samantato jinān // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:336_14: te spharitva jaga sarvaśeṣato kleśatāpa śamayanti prāṇinām // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:336_16: dharmadhātu vipulaṃ spharitvanā durgatīdukha śamenti prāṇinām // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:336_18: dharmavarṣa vipula pravarṣaṇo bodhiāśayu janeti prāṇinām // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:336_19: saṃgṛhīta anena pūrvato kalpasāgara caritva cārikām /
S04bsu016_u:336_23: anyamanya adhimuktigocaraste na śakyamapi sarvi jānitum // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:336_25: tadvimokṣanaya ye acintiyāste na śakyamapi sarvi jānitum // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:336_26: eṣa devata mamā anantaraṃ lokanāthabhimukhā pramodate /
S04bsu016_u:336_27: jyotirarcinayaneti nāmato eta pṛccha katha bodhicārikām // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:337_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:337_0_1: rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā antikāt
S04bsu016_u:340_0_0: atha khalu pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūyasyā mātrayā kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇakuśalamūlasaṃbhārasaṃbhavaparipākamupādāya
S04bsu016_u:341_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāravīryaparākrameṇa kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
S04bsu016_u:341_9: sarvadharmadhātunayārambaṇānuccalitena sakaladharmadhātuspharaṇena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena yena pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:342_0_0: so 'paśyat pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāṃ bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale puṣpagarbhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇāṃ samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajaṃ
S04bsu016_u:343_0_1: abhimukhaṃ sarvavratasamādānākampyatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān sattvadhātusamaṃ nānātapovratamaṇḍalamudyotayamānān sarvasarvalokaniśrayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:344_0: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca sarvasattvadhātusamāpannān nānāvarṇātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgacchedādhivāsanatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:344_7: visaṃsthitadurvarṇāśrayaśarīratāṃ vyāvartayamānān sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ tathāgatavarṇaviśuddhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:346_0: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇasaṃsthānān vividhātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā nānopāyaiḥ sattvānāṃ prītiṃ saṃjanayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:346_15_0: cittakalyatāmāvahayamānān, cittakarmaṇyatāṃ kurvāṇān, āśayaṃ viśodhayamānān, indriyāṇyuttāpayamānān, kāyasukhaṃ saṃjanayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:350_0: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvajagaccittasamān kāyanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā sarvasattvābhimukhasthitānaparyantaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhārabalaṃ saṃdarśayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:351_12: cittaṃ prasādayamānān prāmodyamutpādayamānān harṣaṃ saṃjanayamānān daurmanasyaṃ vinivartayamānān cittaṃ viśodhayamānān cittakalyatāmāvartayamānān,
S04bsu016_u:352_0: yathā ca pāramitācaryāsaṃdarśanena loke sattvān paripākaṃ vrajato 'paśyat,
S04bsu016_u:352_1_0: tathā sarvabodhisattvadharmanigarjanena ye ca pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ prathamacittotpādasaṃbhārāḥ [Gv_192]
S04bsu016_u:352_12: yāḥ sarvavīryapāramitācaryāḥ ye dhyānapāramitāsaṃbhārāḥ dhyānapāramitābhiyogāḥ dhyānapāramitāpariniṣpattiviśuddhicaryāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:352_26: ye jñānapāramitānayāḥ, ye jñānapāramitāprayogāḥ, ye jñānapāramitāviśuddhinayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:352_27: yā jñānapāramitādiśaḥ, ye jñānapāramitānugamāḥ, ye jñānapāramitāprasarāḥ, yāni jñānapāramitānayasamavasaraṇāni,
S04bsu016_u:352_31: ye jñānapāramitāpravistarāḥ, ye jñānapāramitākāyāḥ, ye jñānapāramitāsamudranayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:352_34_0: ye jñānapāramitāsamavasaraṇanayasaṃprayuktā dharmādharmasaṃgrahadharmajñānānugamāḥ karmajñānānugamāḥ kṣetrajñānānugamāḥ kalpajñānānugamāḥ
