S04bsu016_u:352_71: evaṃ yāvadvajrapāṇisādṛśātmabhāvameghaniścaritān daśa diśaḥ spharitvā dharmadhātunayaprasareṣu sarvasattvasaṃmukhībhāvasthitān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:353_4: tāni asyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyo nirmāṇakāyameghānniścaritvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:353_5: saṃprakāśayamānān dyotayamānān saṃdarśayamānān udīrayamānān pravibhajamānān pravistaramānān gaṇayato nirdiśyamānān vijñāpayamānān upasaṃharamāṇānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:354_11: keṣāṃcit sarvasattvakāyanānārutaiḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyā vimokṣaviṣayaṃ sattvānāṃ prabhāvayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:355_0: tasyā ekaikena nirmāṇarūpameghena praticittakṣaṇamanabhilāpyānabhilāpyāni daśadiśi loke buddhakṣetrāṇi viśodhyamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:355_5: praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyān sattvasamudrān daśabhūmāvāvartamānān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paśyati sma,
S04bsu016_u:355_6_0: śṛṇoti vyavacārayati avacarati pratividhyati nidhyāyati anugacchati anusarati anupraviśati samatayādhitiṣṭhati yaduta pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā
S04bsu016_u:356_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahābodhisattvaprītivegasāgarāvabhāsapratilabdho daśadiktathāgatādhiṣṭhitaḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā
S04bsu016_u:356_0_1: rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyaṣṭauṣīt
S04bsu016_u:357_1: daśadiśi loki anupūrvaṃ rūpa yathāśayaṃ jagu pharitvā // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:357_3: ṛddhyā anekavidha kāyaiśvarya vidarśatva jagu vinesi // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:357_6: na ca skandhaāyatanadhātau niśrayu tubhya vidyati kadācit /
S04bsu016_u:357_10: na ca tubhya iñjana kadācinmanyana syandanā na ca prapañcā /
S04bsu016_u:357_19: sattvānāmāśayavaśā tvaṃ devata rūpu darśayasi loke // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:358_1_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya etadavocat
S04bsu016_u:358_1_1: - kiyacciraṃ saṃsthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? kiyaccirapratilabdhaścāyaṃ tvayā devate samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajo
S04bsu016_u:359_0: atha khalu pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:360_9: jambudhvajaṃ sakalu sarva spharati prabhāya so gaganacārī // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:360_11: koṭī amātya paripūrṇā paṇḍita dakṣa viddha medhāvī // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:360_13: tāḥ sniogdhacitta hitacittā maitramanā upasthihiṣu rājñaḥ // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:360_15: catvāra dvīpa susamṛddhā dharmabalena āvasati sarvān // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:360_18: astaṃ gate dinakararaśmi svapiti nṛpe saputraparivāraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_20: rātrimadhyamaki yāme buddha utpannu bhū śirisamudraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_21: tasmin vikurvita anantā darśi jino daśaddiśi pharitvā // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:360_23: nānāvikurvitaśarīrān yehi pharī diśo daśa aśeṣāḥ // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:360_25: pṛthivī prakampita saśailā ghoṣa nigarji te jina utpanno /
S04bsu016_u:360_26: devāsurā manujanāgāḥ sarvi praharṣi te jina utpannaḥ // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:360_28: te co daśaddiśi pharitvā loki yathāśaye bhaṇiṣu dharmam // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:360_29: tāṃśco vikurvita anantān supini jino nidarśi mama sarvān /
S04bsu016_u:360_30: gambhīra garjita śruṇitvā prīti mamā abhūṣi supinānte // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:360_31: daśa rātridevatasahasrā upari mama sthitā nabhatalasmin /
S04bsu016_u:360_32: varṇānudīryanta jinasya divyarutena māṃ bhaṇi prabodhya // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:360_33: uttiṣṭha devamatibhārye eṣa jinopapanna tava rājye /
S04bsu016_u:360_34: kalpāna sāgaraśatebhi durlabha saṃpaśyan sukhi viśuddho // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:360_35: ahu prītisaṃbhuta vibuddhā paśyami ābha nirmala viśuddhām /
S04bsu016_u:360_38: abhyudgato yatha sumeru dakṣiṇavāmato jina samantāt // 29 //
S04bsu016_u:360_40: praṇidhiśca me kṛtu udāro buddhavikurvitaṃ vipula dṛṣṭvā // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:360_41: pratibodhitaḥ sa maya rājā istrigaṇaśca yo 'sya parivāram /
S04bsu016_u:360_42: buddhaprabhā vipula dṛṣṭvā sarvi abhūṣi prīṇitaśarīrāḥ // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:360_45: pūjā kṛtā mayi jinasyo varṣasahasra viṃśati anūnā /
S04bsu016_u:360_46: niryātitā ratana sapto pṛthivī sasāgarā ca sugatasya // 33 //
S04bsu016_u:360_49: sā rātridevata hitārthaṃ bodhayi māṃ tadā karuṇajātā /
S04bsu016_u:360_50: tasyāṃ mama spṛha utpannā īdṛśa bhūtva bodhayi pramattān // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:360_53: daśa buddhakoṭinayutāni ye mama pūjitā janiya śraddhām /
S04bsu016_u:360_58: jina pañcamaḥ kusumagarbhaḥ ṣaṣṭhu jino asaṅgamaticandraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_62: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā naravarendrā /
S04bsu016_u:360_63: na ca tāva labdha maya cakṣuryeni mamottari nayasamudram // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:360_65: kalpaśca devaśirināmā tatra utpanna buddha śatapañca // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:360_70: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_73: atra lokadhātu suvicitraḥ kalpa tadāsi brahmaprabhanāmā // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:360_74: tasmin jinā aparimāṇāḥ te maya pūjitāḥ saparivārāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_75: sarveṣa teṣa sugatānāṃ dharma śruto mi gauravi janitvā // 47 //
S04bsu016_u:360_80: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrā /
S04bsu016_u:360_81: na ca meṣa dharmata vibuddhā yenima otari jinasamudrān // 50 //
S04bsu016_u:360_83: kṣetrā sa buddhamati nāmnā tatra abhūcca somaśirikalpaḥ // 51 //
S04bsu016_u:360_91: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā sugata sarve /
S04bsu016_u:360_92: na tu tāva labdha maya jñānaṃ saddharmasamudra yenavatareyam // 55 //
S04bsu016_u:360_99: jinu pañcamaḥ karuṇatejā ṣaṣṭha abhū jino vratasamudraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_102: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrā // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:360_103: na ca meṣa dharmata vibuddhā gaganasamā svabhāvapariśuddhā /
S04bsu016_u:360_108: te nāyakā bhaṇiya dharmā so maya dhārita smṛtibalena // 63 //
S04bsu016_u:360_114: te sarvi pūjita narendrā mārgu na caiṣa śodhitu asaṅgaḥ // 66 //
S04bsu016_u:360_118: sārocayaśca tada kalpastatra utpanna buddha śatapañca /
S04bsu016_u:360_119: te sarvi satkṛta svayaṃbhū eta vimokṣa samabhilaṣatyā // 68 //
S04bsu016_u:360_123: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ti pūjitā maya narendrāḥ // 70 //
S04bsu016_u:360_124: mārgu viśodhitu jinānāṃ yatra samosarī jina aśeṣā /
S04bsu016_u:360_125: na ca tāva labdha maya kṣāntiryā imamotare nayu jinānām // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:360_129: te sarvi pūjitā maya narendrā mārgu viśodhito jinavarāṇām // 73 //
S04bsu016_u:360_132: dharmadhvajo 'tha vacanaśrīḥ paścimu teṣu jñānamati buddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:360_133: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā suranarendrāḥ // 75 //
S04bsu016_u:360_139: teṣāṃ ca paścimaku āsīt siṃhavinardito vidupradīpaḥ // 78 //
S04bsu016_u:360_140: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā sugatacandrā /
S04bsu016_u:360_141: na ca tāva labdha maya kṣāntiryā imamotare nayasamudram // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:360_154: sūtraṃ nigarjasu narendraḥ śrutva mi dhāritaṃ smṛtibalena // 85 //
S04bsu016_u:360_157: jātaṃ hi me karuṇagarbhā maitrinayaṃ samantaprabhamegham /
S04bsu016_u:360_173: api cāpyahaṃ sugataputra carya samantabhadra avakrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:361_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena viśāṃpatirnāma rājābhūccakravartī buddhavaṃśānupacchedāya sthitaḥ? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:361_1: mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tena kālena tena samayena viśāṃpatirnāma rājā abhūccakravartī buddhavaṃśānupacchedāya pratipannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:361_4: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena bhadramatirnāma cakravartibhāryā abhūt strīratnam? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:361_5: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena bhadramatirnāma [Gv_202] cakravartibhāryā abhūvaṃ strīratnam /
S04bsu016_u:361_6: sāhaṃ tayā rātridevatayā pratibodhyaṃ buddhadarśane samādāpitā /
S04bsu016_u:361_7: iyaccirotpāditaṃ me kulaputra anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam /
S04bsu016_u:361_8: sāhaṃ tena cittotpādena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān na jātu durgativinipāteṣu upapannā /
S04bsu016_u:361_11: yāvanme bhagavato ratnaśrīpradīpaguṇaketostathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sahadarśanādayaṃ samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:362_1_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvajñatāprasthānamahāvegasāgarapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaprasthānamukheṣu
S04bsu016_u:362_9: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya vimaladharmacakrasaṃpratyeṣaṇasaṃdhāraṇakuśalānāṃ sarvatryadhvatathāgatavikurvitanayasāgarāvataraṇakuśalānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:363_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalasamanantaraṃ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī nāma rātridevatā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:364_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ
S04bsu016_u:364_0_1: rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyā antikāt
S04bsu016_u:366_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakoḥ tat pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamadhimucyamāno 'vataran,
S04bsu016_u:366_1_0: adhigacchan praviśan prasaran spharamāṇo 'nugacchan anusaran pratilabhamāno bhāvayan paribhāvayan kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṃ pratipadyamāno
S04bsu016_u:367_1: sa sarvalokamavabhāsya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni nipatya sarvaśarīramanuspharati sma /
S04bsu016_u:367_3: atha tāvadeva atyantavirajomaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratyalabhata,
S04bsu016_u:367_4_0: yasya pratilābhātpramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaśca rātridevatāyā mārgāntare yatpṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ
S04bsu016_u:367_4_1: tatra yāvanti tejaḥparamāṇurajāṃsi vā apsu paramāṇurajāṃsi vā pṛthivīparamāṇurajāṃsi vā vajraparamāṇurajāṃsi vā vividhamahāmaṇiratnarajaḥparamāṇurajāṃsi
S04bsu016_u:367_4_2: vā puṣpagandhacūrṇaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā ratnavyūhaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā sarvārambaṇaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā,
S04bsu016_u:367_5: teṣu sarveṣu paramāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn saṃvartamānān vivartamānāṃścāpaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:367_6_0: sāpskandhān satejaḥskandhān savāyuskandhān sapṛthivīskandhān samalokadhātusattvān sādhiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān saṃpratiṣṭhānān
S04bsu016_u:367_6_1: nānāpṛthivītalavyūhān nānāparvataparivārān nānānadītaḍāgavyūhān nānāsāgaraparisaṃsthānān nānādivyavibhaktibhavanavyūhān nānāvṛkṣasaṃsthānān
S04bsu016_u:367_7: sadevanagarabhavanālaṃkārān sanāganagarabhavanālaṃkārān sayakṣanagarabhavanālaṃkārān sagandharvanagarabhavanālaṃkārān sāsuranagarabhavanālaṃkārān sagaruḍanagarabhavanālaṃkārān,
S04bsu016_u:367_18: kāṃścidvyatyastasaṃsthānān, teṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvagatiṣu sarvasattvopapattiṣu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāṃ prativineyasattvasarvasattvābhimukhāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:369_0: yaduta aṇḍajānāṃ sattvānāṃ jarāyujānāṃ saṃsvedajānāmupapādukānāṃ rūpiṇāmarūpiṇāṃ saṃjñināṃ naivasaṃjñināṃ nāsaṃjñināṃ sarvasattvaparitrāṇapraṇidhānabalābhinirhṛtatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:370_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyā idamacintyaṃ sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanabodhisattvavimokṣavṛṣabhitāvikurvitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:370_0_1: dṛṣṭvā praharṣajāto mahāprītivegasāgarapratilabdhaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya ūrdhvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:370_1: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātrīdevatā tāṃ bodhisattvarūpalakṣaṇaviśuddhisaṃpadamantardhāpya rātridevatārūpeṇa sarvavikurvitāni pravartayamānā adhyatiṣṭhat /
S04bsu016_u:370_2: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:371_0: dṛṣṭo mayā vipulakāyu tavā varalakṣaṇo ratanaābharaṇa /
S04bsu016_u:371_5: raśmīmukhe rucirapadmasthitāḥ tava nirmitā jagi sameti duḥkham // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:371_7: puṣpā pravarṣanta samantamukhaṃ spharati dharmadhātugata sarvajinān // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:371_10: tava sūryameghapaṭalā vipulā sada niścaranti vadanādvimalāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:371_12: tava candrajyotiṣaprabhā vimalā nayanebhi megha sada niścariṣu /
S04bsu016_u:371_13: te co daśaddiśi spharitva jagaṃ dyotanti loki timiropahatā // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:371_16: tava kāyu dṛśyati hi dikprasaraiḥ sarvajagābhimukha prītikaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:371_19: yada preṣitastava sakāśamahaṃ samupasthito guṇa vicintayatā /
S04bsu016_u:371_20: tada raśmimaṇḍala śubhā vimalā bhrumukhāntarātu tava niścariṣu // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:371_21: obhāsayan diśa samudraśatānāloka loki vipulāṃ janiya /
S04bsu016_u:371_22: nānāvikurvita vidarśya bahūnastaṃgatā mama śarīri tadā // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:371_23: yada raśmiṇḍala mamā nipatī tada saukhyamadbhutamudāramabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:371_24: okrānta dhāraṇi samādhiśatā paśyāmi dikṣu ca jinānamitā // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:371_25: kramavikrame yada dharā kramataḥ paramāṇusaṃkhyanayu jñātu mayā /
S04bsu016_u:371_27: rajasi sthitā pṛthaganekavidhā nekāntakliṣṭa bahu kṣetraśatā /
S04bsu016_u:371_29: saṃkliṣṭaśuddha puna kṣetra bahūn alpaṃ sukhaṃ vipula yatra duḥkha /
S04bsu016_u:371_30: samudenti yeṣu jina kāruṇika jinaśrāvakā api pratyekajināḥ // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:371_32: naranārimaṇḍita sudarśanīyāḥ jinavaṃśu yatra sthihatī ruciraḥ // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:371_33: kṣetrasamudra vipula vimalā rajasi sthitā samatalānugatā /
S04bsu016_u:371_34: vairocane caritā hi purā pariśodhitā vipulakalpaśataiḥ // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:371_36: bodhi vibuddhyayu vikurvayato cakraṃ pravartyaṃ vinayanti jagat // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:371_37: paśyāmi tvāmanugatāmapi tāṃ vairocanasya viṣaye vipule /
S04bsu016_u:371_38: pūjā sahasranayutaiḥ amitaiḥ sarvān jinān samabhipūjayantī // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:372_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - āścaryaṃ devate,
S04bsu016_u:372_2_0: kiṃ nāma ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ? kiyaccirapratilabdhaścāyaṃ tvayā? kathaṃ ca pratipadyamāno bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:372_2_1: pariśodhayati? āha - durabhisaṃbhavaṃ kulaputra etatsthānaṃ sadevakena lokena saśrāvakapratyekabuddhena /
S04bsu016_u:372_3_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānānugatānāṃ hi bodhisattvānāmeṣa gocaro mahākaruṇāgarbhāṇāṃ sarvajagatparitrāṇapratipannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:373_1_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa vairocanatejaḥśriyāṃ lokadhātau virajomaṇḍalo
S04bsu016_u:375_0_0: tasyāḥ khalu punarvairocanaśriyo lokadhātoḥ pūrveṇa cakravālānusaṃdhau ratnakusumapradīpadhvajā nāma cāturdvīpikā bhūmiśuddhisaṃkliṣṭā
S04bsu016_u:376_2_0: sarvāśca tā nadyo vicitradivāpuṣpaughasaṃkaravāhinyo divyatūryasaṃgītimanojñamadhuranirghoṣāḥ sarvaratnadrumatīrasuruciravyūhāḥ
S04bsu016_u:376_3: ekaikasyāṃ ca nadyantarikāyāṃ daśa nagarakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃsthitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:376_6: tasyāṃ khalu punaścāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpasya madhye ratnakusumapradīpā nāma madhyamā rājadhānyabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:376_7: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanadevamanuṣyā ca daśakuśalakarmapathasamāttānāṃ sattvānāmālayaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:376_8_0: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍo nāma rāja abhūta cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:376_9: pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasramabhūt putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ sarvākārasuparipūrṇavarāṅgānām /
S04bsu016_u:376_10_0: daśa cāsya strīkoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyantaḥpuramabhūt sarvāsāṃ cakravartisabhāgakuśalamūlasaṃbhavānāṃ sabhāgacaritānāṃ saharatnakāyālaṃkārāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:377_0: tasya khalu vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma bhāryā abhūt strīratnam,
S04bsu016_u:377_2: abhinīlakeśī abhinīlanetrā suvarṇavarṇacchavirbrahmasvarā satatapramuktaprabhāśarīrā samantādyojanasahasramanekavarṇayā divyagandhaprabhayā spharati sma /
S04bsu016_u:377_5: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra rājñaścakravartino darśanena na kaścit tṛpyati,
S04bsu016_u:377_6: evameva tasyāḥ padmabhadrābhirāminetraśriyaścakravartiduhiturna kaściddarśanena tṛptimāpadyate sthāpayitvā prajñātṛptān /
S04bsu016_u:377_7: tena ca kālena tena samayena amitāyuṣaḥ sattvā abhūvan na niyatāyuṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:377_8: nāsti antareṇa kālakriyā / tena ca kālena sattvānāṃ saṃsthānanānātvamapi prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:377_9_0: varṇanānātvamapi svaranānātvamapi nāmadheyanānātvamapi kulanānātvamapi āyuṣpramāṇanānātvamapi ārohapariṇāhavimātratāmapi
S04bsu016_u:377_10: tatra ye sattvāḥ suvarṇā abhūvannudārādhimuktikāḥ saṃpūrṇagātrā abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:377_11: ta evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa suvarṇatarastvatsakāśāditi /
S04bsu016_u:377_14: te tena anyonyāvamānanāsamuditena akuśalamūlena āyuḥpramāṇādapi parihīyante sma,
S04bsu016_u:378_0_0: tasyāṃ khalu ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāmuttareṇa samantāvabhāsanadharmameghanirghoṣadhvajo nāma bodhimaṇḍavṛkṣo 'bhūt
S04bsu016_u:379_0: tasya khalu bodhimaṇḍasya purato ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣaṃ nāma gandhodakasaro 'bhūddaśaratnadrumakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivāram /
S04bsu016_u:379_1: sarve ca te ratnavṛkṣā bodhivṛkṣasaṃsthānā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:379_2: tasya khalu punā ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣasya mahāgandhodakasarasaḥ sarvamaṇiratnasuvibhaktanicitāni kūlānyabhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:380_1: tatra mahāpadme samantajñānārciśrīguṇaketudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prādurbabhūva teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:380_3: so 'nekavarṣasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇena sattvān paripācya daśavarṣasahasraṃ raśmyavabhāsavikurvitena paripācayāmāsa tatra daśabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgataḥ prādurbhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:380_5: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ saṃjānanti sma - daśabhirvarṣasahasraistathāgata utpatsyata iti,
S04bsu016_u:380_8: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvarūpāṇi sūkṣmāṇyapaśyan - aṣṭābhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_9: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvasattvakarmavipākanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:380_10: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ svakasvakān karmasamudrānavataranti sma,
S04bsu016_u:380_11: karmasmṛtijñānaṃ ca pratyalabhanta - saptabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_12: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:380_13: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ paripūrṇā avikalasarvendriyāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sma - ṣaḍbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_15: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ udārātiśayatayā vikurvanti sma - pañcabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_17: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvākārāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadrākṣuḥ caturbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_18: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvatathāgataviṣayāsaṃbhedapradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
S04bsu016_u:380_19: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya sarvatrānugatavikurvitamavataranti sma - tribhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_21: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatamabhimukhamadhimucyāpaśyan - dvābhyāṃ varṣasahasrābhyāṃ sa tathāgata utpasyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_22: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt tryadhvajñānavidyutpradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra satathāgatapūrvayoganirghoṣā nāma,
S04bsu016_u:380_23: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvayogasamudrānavakalpayāmāsuravataranti
S04bsu016_u:380_24: sma - varṣasahasreṇa sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_26: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ samantacakṣuṣkatāṃ pratyalabhanta sarvatathāgatavikurvitabuddhakṣetrasarvasattvadarśanatāyai - varṣaśatena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_28: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatotpādasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhanta - saptāhena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:380_30: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ buddhadarśanamahāprītivegasaṃjātā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:380_31_0: iti hi kulaputra ebhirevaṃrūpairapramāṇaiḥ raśmiparipācananayairdaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sattvān paripācya saptame divase pūrṇe
S04bsu016_u:380_31_1: [Gv_210] sarvaṃ taṃ lokadhātumapramāṇaiḥ saṃkampananayaiḥ saṃkampya ekāntapariśuddhāmadhyatiṣṭhat yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:380_32: tāmapi sarvāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tatra buddhakṣetranānāvidhācintyavyūhān saṃdarśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:380_33: atha paścime saptāhe ye tatra lokadhātau sattvā buddhadarśanaparipakvāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:381_0_0: atha khalu tasmin lokadhātau sarvacakravālebhya sarvasumerubhyaḥ sarvaparvatebhyaḥ sarvanadībhyaḥ sarvasāgarebhyaḥ sarvavṛkṣebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:381_0_1: sarvapṛthivītalebhyaḥ sarvanagarebhyaḥ sarvaprākārebhyaḥ sarvabhavanebhyaḥ sarvavimānebhyaḥ sarvavastrābharaṇaparibhogebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:381_0_2: sarvavādyavṛkṣebhyaḥ sarvatūryasaṃgītibhyaḥ sarvanirmāṇavyūhebhyaḥ ekaikasmādārambaṇāt sarvatathāgataviṣayaprabhavaṃ nigarjamānāḥ
S04bsu016_u:381_1: teṣāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmaparivārāṇāṃ mahāratnapadmānāṃ kesarakarṇikāsu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni mahāmaṇiratnagarbhāṇi siṃhāsanāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:381_2: teṣu ca maṇiratnagarbheṣvāsaneṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvāḥ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ prādurbabhūvuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:382_0: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhasya tasya bhagavataḥ samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājñaḥ tathāgatasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,
S04bsu016_u:382_1: atha tāvadeva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātutathāgatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:382_2: tena tato lokadhātoraprameyāḥ sattvāḥ sarvadurgativinipātebhyo vinivartitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:382_20_0: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ praticittakṣaṇamanantāprameyāḥ sattvā
S04bsu016_u:382_20_1: dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ pañcabhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ saptamyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ navamyām,
S04bsu016_u:382_24: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayamagamat /
S04bsu016_u:382_25: tasmiṃśca lokadhātau sarvasattvā yathāśayāstasya tathāgatasya nānātmabhāvopāyakauśalyapramuktāṃ dharmadeśanāmājānanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:383_0_0: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpavarṇaviṣayaparibhogamadamattānāṃ sattvānāmanyonyamavamanyamānānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:383_0_1: vinayavaśaṃ samupādāya samantabhadro bodhisattva udāravarṇarūpagatamabhinirmāya tāṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:383_3: yā ca rājñaścakravartino vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya svaśarīraniryātā prabhā,
S04bsu016_u:383_4: yā ca strīratnasya prabhā, yā ca ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ prabhā, yā ca mahāmaṇiratnasya prabhā,
S04bsu016_u:383_7: sā ca sarvā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:383_8: tadyathāpi nāma āditye udite vigate 'ndhakāre na candragrahanakṣatrajyotiṣāṃ nāgnerna maṇīnāṃ prabhā prajñāyate sma,
S04bsu016_u:383_9: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya prabhayābhibhūtāḥ tatra jambudvīpe sarvaprabhā na prajñāyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:383_10: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadakanakabimbasya purato maṣivigraho na śobhate na bhāsate na tapati na virocate,
S04bsu016_u:383_11: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpakāyā na śobhante,
S04bsu016_u:384_0: teṣāmetadabhavat - ko 'nvayaṃ bhaviṣyati devo vā brahmā vā,
S04bsu016_u:384_2: na bhāsāmahe, na tapāmo na virocāmahe kāyena vā prabhayā vā śubhayā vā varṇena vā tejasā vā? na cāsya śaknumo nimittamudgrahītum /
S04bsu016_u:385_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā madhye vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya rājñaścakravartino
S04bsu016_u:385_0_1: vimānasyoparyantarikṣe sthitvā taṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaṃ rājānaṃ cakravartinametadavocat - yat khalu mahārāja
S04bsu016_u:386_0_0: atha khalu samantajñānārcipadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā rājaduhitā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya rūpakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhāvikurvitamābharaṇanirghoṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:386_0_1: ca śrutvā mahāprītiprāmodyavegajātā tasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - yanme kiṃcidupacitakuśalamūlaṃ tenāhamīdṛśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:386_1: [Gv_212] īdṛśamalaṃkāram, īdṛśāni lakṣaṇāni, īdṛśamīryāpatham, īdṛśīmṛddhim / yathā anenāndhakārāyāṃ rātrau sattvānāmavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayya buddhotpādaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:386_3: yatra yatra cotpadyeyam, sarvatrāvirahitā syāmanena kalyāṇamitreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:387_0: atha khalu kulaputra vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaścakravartī sādha caturaṅgena balakāyena,
S04bsu016_u:387_1: sārdhaṃ saptabhī ratnaiḥ, sārdhaṃ strīgaṇaparivāreṇa, sārdhaṃ putrāmātyanaigamairjānapadaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:387_2_0: mahatyā rājarddhyā, mahatā rājānubhāvena tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā uccālya yojanamūrdhvaṃ vihāyasyabhyudgamya
S04bsu016_u:387_2_1: sarvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ sarvāvatīṃ cāturdvīpikalokadhātuṃ mahāvabhāsena spharitvā sarvasattvānāṃ buddhadarśanasamādāpanārthaṃ
S04bsu016_u:387_2_2: sarvaratnaparvateṣu pratibhāsaṃ saṃdarśya sarvacāturdvīpikalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ sthitvā tadbuddhadarśanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:389_1_0: atha khalu rājā vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaścābhirgāthābhiḥ svavijitavāsinaḥ sarvān sattvān saṃcodya daśabhirvividhapūjāmeghasahasraiścakravartikuśalamūlapariniṣpannaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:389_1_1: samantāvabhāsadharmameghanirghoṣadhvajaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ samantādabhipravarṣan yena sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ
S04bsu016_u:389_11_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ samantajñānaratnarciśrīguṇaketurājasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:390_0_0: atha khalu samantajñānaratnārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā cakravartiduhitā svānyābharaṇāni kāyānnirmucya tairābharaṇaistaṃ
S04bsu016_u:390_1_0: atha tānyābharaṇāni tasya bhagavataḥ upari mūrdhasaṃdhau mahāmaṇiratnābharaṇacchatraṃ saṃsthitamabhūvan vicitramaṇiratnajālaparikṣiptaṃ
S04bsu016_u:390_2: tasya madhye dharmadhātuprabhavasarvaratnamaṇiśākhāpralambaṃ nāma mahābodhivṛkṣamadrākṣīt anantamadhyavyūhanirdeśaṃ pradakṣiṇanānāvyūhasaṃdarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:390_3_0: tatra vairocanaṃ nāma tathāgatamadrākṣīt anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ sarvaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:390_14: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣvekaikasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūnadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:390_15: sasaṃdhivyūhān, sapratiṣṭhānān, sasaṃsthānān, saśarīrān, sanānāvyūhapariśuddhān, nānāvyūhameghaparisaṃchannān,
S04bsu016_u:390_16: nānākalpanāmasaṃkhyeyān, nānātathāgatavaṃśanirdeśān, nānātryadhvanayāvatārān, nānādikprasarapraveśān, nānādharmadhātuprasaraparyāpannān [Gv_214] nānādharmadhātutalapraveśān,
S04bsu016_u:390_22: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā mahāprītiprasādavegān pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:391_1: tasyāstaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyavakrāntāni mṛdūni sukhasaṃsparśanāni /
S04bsu016_u:391_2: tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrāntasya garbhasya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānam,
S04bsu016_u:392_0_0: sā sūkṣmasamāhitacittā aniñjanacittā praharṣitacittā samāśvāsitacittā anābhāsacittā kalyāṇamitreṣvanugatacittā gambhīrasarvajñatārambaṇacittā
S04bsu016_u:392_0_2: akṣubhitacittā anīritacittā apratihatacittā abhinnacittā anunnatacittā anavanatacittā akhinnacittā anivartyacittā asaṃsīdanacittā
S04bsu016_u:392_2: daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ praṇidhānasamudraiḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānaṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirharati sma,
S04bsu016_u:393_0: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ pūrvakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati sārīkaroti avipraṇāśatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:394_0_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani tataḥ pareṇa daśame kalpe maṇisūryacandravidyotitaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau candradhvajaśrīketoḥ
S04bsu016_u:394_3: sā tena kuśalamūlena avinipātadharmiṇī sadā devendrakuleṣu manuṣyendrakuleṣu copapannā,
S04bsu016_u:394_4: sarvatra cābhirūpābhūt prāsādikā darśanīyā paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
S04bsu016_u:394_6: tenaiva ca kalyāṇamitreṇa tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau paripācitā saṃcoditā smāritā /
S04bsu016_u:394_7: etarhi ca punastayā samantabhadro bodhisattva ārāgito 'tyantāvirāgaṇatayā /
S04bsu016_u:395_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājacakravartī? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:395_1: maitreyaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:395_2: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma rājabhāryābhūt? na khalu evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:395_4_0: yā mamānantaraṃ saṃniṣaṇṇā / tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā
S04bsu016_u:395_4_1: nāma rājaduhitā abhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:395_5: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:395_6: yanme dārikābhūtayā indradhvajaketostathāgatasya pravacane pralugnastathāgatavigrahaḥ padmodgataḥ pratisaṃskāritaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:395_8: yadā cāsmi samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
S04bsu016_u:395_9: sa me kulaputra prathamacittotpādo bodhāya abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:395_10: yadā ca sa me bhagavān samantajñānārciḥśrīguṇaketurājaḥ tathāgata upasaṃkramya ābharaṇairavakīrṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:395_11: tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaśca me tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:395_13: sarve ca te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:395_16: sa me sarvaṃ śrutaḥ / teṣāṃ cāsmi tathāgatānāmavavādānuśāsanīṣu pratipannā /
S04bsu016_u:395_17_0: teṣu ca me tathāgateṣu tīvraṃ gauravaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathārūpeṇa gauraveṇa ekacittakṣaṇe tān sarvāṃstathāgatāṃstāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni
S04bsu016_u:396_0: tasyāṃ ca vairocanaśriyāṃ lokadhātau saṃvṛttāyāṃ tatra ca virajomaṇḍale kalpe nirgate 'nantare maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhā nāma lokadhāturmahāprabhaśca nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:396_2: tāni mayā sarvāṇyārāgitāni / tasmiṃśca khalu mahāprabhe kalpe mahākaruṇameghadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prāthamakalpiko 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:396_6: tena ca me sarvabuddhotpādasaṃbhavo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_7: sa ca me śrutaḥ udgṛhītaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ jvalanārciḥparvataśrīvyūho nāma tathāgata utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_9: tena ca me tryadhvāvabhāsagarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_10: sa ca me śrutaḥ udgṛhītaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ sarvadharmasamudrābhyudgatavegarājo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:396_12: tena ca me sarvadharmadhātutalajñānabhedo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ pañcasūtrāntaśataparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_13: sa ca me śrutaḥ udgṛhītaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ gambhīradharmaśrīsamudraprabho nāma tathāgata utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_15: tena ca me prītisāgaravivardhanavego nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśasūtrāntakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_16: sa ca me śrutvodgṛhītaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ ratnaśikharārciḥparvatapradīpo nāma tathāgataḥ utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_17: sa ca me sāgaradevatābhūtayā ratnapadmameghavarṣairupasaṃkramya pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_18: tena ca me dharmadhātusāgaranayaprabho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_19: sa ca me śrutvodgṛhītaḥ, smṛtyā ca saṃdhāritaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ guṇasamudrāvabhāsamaṇḍalaśrīrnāma tathāgata utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_20: sa me pañcābhijñaṛṣibhūtayā maharddhivikurvitena ṣaṣṭiṛṣisahasraparivṛtayā upasaṃkramaya gandhapuṣpaśikharameghānabhipravarṣantyā pūjitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_21: tena ca me anālayadharmapradīpo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ ṣaṣṭisūtrāntasahasraparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_22: sa ca me śrutvodgṛhītaḥ, tasyānantaraṃ vairocanaśrīgarbho nāma tathāgata utpannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_23: ahaṃ ca samatārthasaṃbhavā nāma pṛthivīdevatā abhuvam /
S04bsu016_u:396_24: sā ahamaprameyapṛthivīdevatāparivārā sarvaratnadrumakośebhyo ratnapuṣpameghavarṣāṇyutsṛjamānā sarvaratnahārameghān pravarṣamāṇā upasaṃkrāntā tasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:396_25: tena ca me sarvatathāgatasaṃbhavajñānākaragarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito 'prameyasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:396_26: sa ca me śrutvā dhārito na vipraṇāśitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:397_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātugaganapūrṇaratnaśikharaśrīpradīpo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:397_1: ahaṃ ca tena kālena abhirāmaśrīvakrā nāma [Gv_217] naṭadārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:397_2: sā ahaṃ tasya tathāgatasya nagarapraveśasamaye nāṭake pravṛtte buddhānubhāvena ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale sthitvā gāthāsahasreṇa taṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭuvantī upasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:397_3: tena ca me dharmadhātuvidyotitavyūhaṃ nāma raśmimūrṇakośādutsṛjya sarvakāyo 'vabhāsitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:397_4: tayā ca me raśmyā samanantaraspṛṣṭayā dharmadhātunayāvartagarbho nāma vimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:398_0: iti hi kulaputra etān pramukhān kṛtvā yāni tatra maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāprabhe kalpe pañca buddhaśatānyutpannāni,
S04bsu016_u:398_1: tāni mayā sarvāṇyārāgitāni, pūjā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kṛtā /
S04bsu016_u:398_3: taṃ sarvaṃ smarāmi / ekapadavyañjanamapi me tato dharmanayānna vipramuṣitam /
S04bsu016_u:398_4: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmantyā aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto buddhadharmasaṃvarṇanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:398_5_0: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasya antikāt tryadhvajñānagarbhadharmadhātuvipulo nāma dharmadhātuśarīrasāgaraḥ sarvajñatāvidyudavabhāsaḥ
S04bsu016_u:398_7: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sahadarśanāt sarvajñatāvidyudavabhāsā āśaye 'vakrāntā apratilabdhapūrvā adṛṣṭapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:399_0_0: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tameva sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:399_0_1: bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:400_0: śṛṇu sūdhanā vacanametu mamā gambhīra durdṛśa durāvagaham /
S04bsu016_u:400_2: yatha saṃbhuta prathama cittu mamā bodhāya buddhaguṇaprārthanayā /
S04bsu016_u:400_3: yatha bodhivimokṣu ayu labdhu maṃyā etaṃ śṛṇohi pravibhāganayam // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:400_6: kalpo abhū virajamaṇḍalu yo acchinnu yatra jinavaṃśu abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:400_9: dharmadhvajaḥ śirisumeru jino guṇakeśarīśvaru caturtha jinaḥ // 34 //
S04bsu016_u:400_11: jinabhāskaraḥ śaśimukho bhagavānete daśa prathama atra naye // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:400_15: padmodgato navamu kāruṇiko jinu dharmadhātukusumo daśamaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:400_16: buddhosamudra paridīpayato eṣā daśā dvitiya atra naye // 37 //
S04bsu016_u:400_19: vikrāntadevagati nāma jino tatha dharmadhātupadumo daśamaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:400_20: evaṃ nayaṃ vipula darśayato tṛtiyā daśā bhavati atra naye // 39 //
S04bsu016_u:400_26: varalakṣaṇaḥ śiri babhūva jino bratamaṇḍalaśca svaśarīraprabhaḥ // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:400_28: aparājitavratadhvajo bhagavān drumaparvato daśamu teṣa jinaḥ // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:400_38: abhyudgatābhu abhu tatra jinastadanantaraṃ samaśarīru jinaḥ // 48 //
S04bsu016_u:400_54: ete jinā pramukha tatra abhūdupapadyi ye jina pradīpakarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:400_57: te sarvi pūjita mayā sugatā etaṃ vimokṣanayamotariyā // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:400_58: kalpānananta ahu cīrṇa purā etaṃ vimokṣanayu bhāvayatī /
S04bsu016_u:400_59: tvamapi śruṇitva pratipadya laghu pratilapsyase nayamimaṃ nacirāt // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:402_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe praśāntarutasāgaravatī nāma rātridevatā,
S04bsu016_u:402_2: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:403_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:403_0_1: rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokyaṃ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyā antikāt
S04bsu016_u:405_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāstaṃ sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:405_0_1: bhāvayan avataran adhimucyamāno 'vagāhayamāno vipulīkurvāṇaḥ spharan prasaran vaśīkurvan avabhāsayamānaḥ samavasaran yena
S04bsu016_u:405_0_2: praśāntarutasāgaravatī rātridevatā tenopasaṃkramya praśāntarutasāgaravatyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ
S04bsu016_u:405_0_3: rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praśāntarutasāgaravatyā rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha
S04bsu016_u:405_1_0: so 'haṃ kalyāṇamitrasaṃniśrayeṇa bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvacaryāmavataran bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ pratipadyamāno
S04bsu016_u:405_2: tadvadasva me ārye devate kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:406_0: atha khalu praśāntarutasāgaravatī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:406_4_0: kiṃviṣayāsi, kiṃprayogā kiṃvyavacārā? ka etasya vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:406_4_1: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra cittāśayasāgarapariśuddhisamatāpratipannā sarvalokarajomalavimalābhedyavyūhasaṃpratipannā avaivartyāpratyudāvartyārambhacittā
S04bsu016_u:406_45: janapadapradeśagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabodhimārgasamatikramāya tathāgatabhūmipratiṣṭhāpanatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:407_0_0: evamahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvān dharmadānena saṃgṛhya sarvaduḥkhadurgatipathebhyo vinivartayamānā devamanuṣyasaṃpattisukhāni
S04bsu016_u:407_0_1: saṃdarśayamānā traidhātukāduccālayamānā sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayamānā vividhairupāyamukhaiḥ paripācayamānā mahāprītivegasamudrāvabhāsapratilabdhā
S04bsu016_u:407_1_0: pramodāmi, āttamanaskā bhavāmi / api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra sarvadigvidikṣu bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudrānavalokayamānā
S04bsu016_u:408_0: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya lakṣaṇapratimaṇḍitāmacintyāṃ rūpakāyapariśuddhimavataramāṇā labhāmi udāraprītiprasādaprāmodyam /
S04bsu016_u:409_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyādekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān mahāraśmisamudrān niścaramāṇān,
S04bsu016_u:409_1_1: praśamayamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe mahāprītivegasamudrān pratilabhe /
S04bsu016_u:410_0_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya uttamāṅgādaṃsakūṭābhyāṃ ca praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:410_0_1: sarvaratnārciḥparvatameghān niścaramāṇān sarvadharmadhātuspharaṇān dṛṣṭvā udārān mahāprītivegasamudrān pratilabhe /

S04bsu016_u:424_0_2: sthitvā brahmasvararutanirghoṣeṇa dharmaṃ deśayamānān dṛṣṭvā udārān dharmadhātuvipulāṃścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvajñatāsahagatān
S04bsu016_u:425_2: nāvatīrṇapūrvānavatarāmi / na sphūṭapūrvān spharāmi / na dṛṣṭapūrvān paśyāmi / na ca śrutapūrvān śṛṇomi / tatkasya hetoḥ? kiṃcāpi dharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇaparijñeyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:426_1: api tu anantamadhyaḥ khalveṣa vimokṣo dharmadhātunayasamudrāvatāraṇatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:427_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - kathaṃ pratipadyamānasya devate bodhisattvasya
S04bsu016_u:427_0_1: ayamevaṃrūpo vimokṣaḥ saṃpadyate? āha - daśeme kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsaṃbhārā mahāvitānadharmā mahāvisphārā mahādyutayo
S04bsu016_u:427_0_2: mahāvabhāsā mahāprabhāvabhāsā mahābhāgā mahāvibhāgā mahāsaṃbhavā mahāvibhavāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:427_2: katame daśa? yaduta dānaṃ bodhisattvasya yathāśayasarvasattvasamudrasaṃtoṣaṇaprasṛtaṃ mahāvitānadharmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:427_12: ime kulaputra daśa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsaṃbhārāṃ mahāvitānadharmāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:427_14: viśudhyati saṃbhavati saṃvardhate samudeti prādurbhavati saṃvartate sārībhavati vipulībhavati pariniṣpadyate saṃtiṣṭhate /
S04bsu016_u:428_0_0: sudhana āha - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? sā avocat - asti kulaputra asya kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkārasya
S04bsu016_u:428_0_1: lokadhātusamudrasya pūrveṇa daśalokadhātusamudrasahasrāṇyatikramya pareṇa sarvaratnavimalaprabhāvyūho nāma lokadhātusamudraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_2_0: tasya madhye kanakavimalaprabhāvyūho nāma lokadhātuḥ sarvaratnameghavicitra adholokadhātau sarvaratnahārajālasāgarapratiṣṭhitaḥ
S04bsu016_u:428_6: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena tasmin bodhivṛkṣe puṇyapradīpasaṃpatketuprabhā nāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:428_7: tayā me tasya tathāgatasya abhisaṃbodhivikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:428_8: tasya ca me tathāgatasya sahadarśanena tathāgataguṇasamudrāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_9: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau samantasaṃpūrṇaśrīgarbhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmadrumaparvatatejo nāma tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_10: ahaṃ ca tataścyutvā tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānaśrīpuṇyaprabhā nāma rātridevatā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:428_11: tayā me tasya bhagavato dharmadrumaparvatatejastathāgatasya dharmacakrapravartanavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajagatsaṃdarśanasamatāvabhāsaviṣayo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_12: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_13: tasya me sahadarśanena sarvadharmabhūmisaṃvardhanasthāno nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_14: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe ratnaraśmipradīpadhvajarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:428_15: tasya me sahadarśanena samantavṛkṣaprabhamegho nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_16: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe guṇasumeruprabhatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_17: tasya me sahadarśanena buddhasamudrāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_18: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmameghanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_19: tasya me sahadarśanena dharmasāgarapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_20: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānolkāvabhāsarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgito devakanyābhūtayā /
S04bsu016_u:428_21: tasya me sahadarśanena sarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanapratibhāsapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_22: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe [Gv_227] dharmavikurvitavegadhvajaśrīrnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_23: tasya me sahadarśanena tryadhvatathāgatasaṃprasthānāvabhāsagarbho nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_24: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmapradīpavikramajñānasiṃho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_26: nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānabalaparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_27: tasya me sahadarśanena tryadhvasarvasattvacaryendriyaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_28: iti hi kulaputra tasmin samaye mayā kanakavimalaprabhe lokadhātau tasmin samantāvabhāsadhvajakalpe daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_29_0: keciddevendrabhūtayā kecinnāgendrabhūtayā kecidyakṣendrabhūtayā kecidgandharvendrabhūtayā kecidasurendrabhūtayā kecidgaruḍendrabhūtayā
S04bsu016_u:428_29_1: kecitkinnarendrabhūtayā kecinmahoragendrabhūtayā kecinmanuṣyendrabhūtayā kecidbrahmendrabhūyatā keciddevabhūtayā kecinmanuṣyabhūtayā
S04bsu016_u:428_30: sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitā yathāsaṃprāptaiḥ pūjāpariṣkāraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:428_32: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā śrutā /
S04bsu016_u:429_0_0: sā ahaṃ tataścyutvā tasminneva lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā tataścyutvā iha
S04bsu016_u:429_2: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvāndhakāravirajapratibhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:429_4: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvakṣetrasāgarāvabhāsānugataspharaṇo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:429_6: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvasattvamantrasamudranigarjanasvaranirghoṣo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:429_8: tadbodhimaṇḍe tathāgatābhisaṃbodhivikurvitamukhasamudrān praticittakṣaṇe saṃdarśayamānān dṛṣṭvā mayā eṣa vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:429_11: teṣu ca sarvadharmadhātunayasamudrāntargateṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni sarvaparamāṇurajāṃsi,
S04bsu016_u:429_13_0: teṣu ca sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre bhagavantaṃ vairocanaṃ bodhimaṇḍavaragataṃ praticittakṣaṇamabhisaṃbodhivikurvitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:429_13_1: saṃdarśayamānānekaikena ca abhisaṃbodhivikurvitena sarvadharmadhātunayasāgarān spharantaṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:429_14: teṣāṃ ca sarvatathāgatānāmekaikasya ca tathāgatasya pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjāne /
S04bsu016_u:429_15: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu te tathāgatā bodhimaṇḍagatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu016_u:429_16_0: taṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇomi / ye ca teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nirmāṇasamudrāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyo niścarya dharmameghasamudrān nigarjamānān
S04bsu016_u:429_16_1: nānāvikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānān [Gv_228] sarvadharmadhātudiksamudrāntargateṣu kṣetrasamudreṣu sarvalokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu
S04bsu016_u:429_17: taṃ sarvaṃ saṃdhārayāmi, pratipadye, nidhyāyāmi / sarvārthapadavyañjanodgrahavegavikramayā dhāraṇyā udgṛhṇāmi sarvadharmamaṇḍalaviśuddhigarbhānugamayā prajñayā pariśodhayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:429_65: [Gv_229] teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ prathamacittotpādamādāya yāvatsaddharmāntardhānaṃ sarvamavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:430_0: yatpunarevaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyaṃ vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣa iti /
S04bsu016_u:430_1: yanmayā vibuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ buddhakalpānāṃ pareṇa kanakavimalaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau puṇyapradīpasaṃpatsamantaketuprabhā bodhivṛkṣadevatā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:430_2_0: tayā avaivartyadharmadhātunirghoṣasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya tān vibuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:430_2_1: kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadya krakucchandapramukhāḥ śākyamuniparyavasānā bhadrakalpikāstathāgatā
S04bsu016_u:430_5: pūjayiṣyāmi / adyāpi hi kulaputra sā kanakavimalaprabhā lokadhātustiṣṭhati acchinnabuddhavaṃśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:430_6: tasmāttarhi kulaputra iha naye mahatā bodhisattvavikrameṇa prayoktavyam /
S04bsu016_u:431_0_0: atha khalu praśāntarutasāgaravatī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:431_0_1: bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:432_0: śṛṇu sūdhanā vacanametu mamā yathayaṃ vimokṣa pratilabdhu śubham /
S04bsu016_u:432_1: śrutvā ca prītibalu saṃjaniyā etaṃ vimokṣanayamotarahi // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:432_2: bahu kalpasāgara purā caritā cittāśayaṃ svaku viśodhayati /
S04bsu016_u:432_4: śrutvā triyadhvaparamā sugatānadhimukti teṣu vipulāṃ janiya /
S04bsu016_u:432_5: sarvaiḥ sukhaiḥ saparivāra mayā te upasthitāḥ sabahukalpaśatān // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:432_6: dṛṣṭvā mayā purimakāḥ sugatāḥ saṃpūjitā janahitāya caran /
S04bsu016_u:432_7: dharmaśca me nirupamo 'yu śrutaḥ prītibalaṃ vipulaṃ saṃjaniyā // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:432_9: mātā pitā gurujanaḥ satataṃ maya satkṛtā hitasukhena tadā /
S04bsu016_u:432_11: jīrṇāturā dhanavihīna narā vikalendriyā dukhi anātha bahū /
S04bsu016_u:432_12: te me sukhe sthapiya maitramanā sudhanā sanātha kṛta jātiśatān /
S04bsu016_u:432_15: kleśapratāpita sadā tribhave karmaiḥ prabhāvita tathā aśubhaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:432_18: jātījarāmaraṇarogabhayā loke mayā śamita te nikhilā // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:433_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe bhagavato vairocanasya parṣanmaṇḍale sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrīrnāma rātridevatā /
S04bsu016_u:433_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:434_1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:435_1: paśyāmi te āsanu saṃniṣaṇṇā anantamadhyena samucchrayeṇa // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:435_3: na hīnasattvairviparītadarśibhiḥ śakyastava jñātumayaṃ hi gocaraḥ // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:435_4: jñātuṃ na lokena sahadevakena tvadvarṇarūpasya nimitta śakyam /
S04bsu016_u:435_5: kalpānanantān samudīkṣatāpi tathā hi te rūpamanantadarśanam // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:435_6: skandhālayāduccalitāsi devi pratiṣṭhitā nāyataneṣu ca tvam /
S04bsu016_u:435_7: lokavyatītā ca vitīrṇakāṅkṣā saṃdṛśyase loki vikurvamāṇā // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:435_10: kāyo hi te dharmaśarīragarbhaḥ cittaṃ ca te jñānamayaṃ asaṅgam /
S04bsu016_u:435_12: cittādanantaṃ samudeti karma vicitritaḥ karmaṇa sarvalokaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:435_13: cittasvabhāvaṃ ca jagadviditvā jagatsamān darśayasi svakāyān // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:435_15: svapnopamaṃ lokamimaṃ viditvā buddhāṃśca sarvān pratibhāsakalpān /
S04bsu016_u:435_17: tryadhvasthitasyāpi janasya devi pratikṣaṇaṃ darśayasi svakāyam /
S04bsu016_u:435_18: dvayapravṛttirna ca te 'sti citte dharmaṃ vadasyeva ca sarvadikṣu // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:436_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:438_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhāvayan saṃbhāvayan praśāntarutasāgaravatyā
S04bsu016_u:438_2_0: smṛtāvupanibadhnan, matyā pravicinvan, gatyā anugacchan, buddhyā vipulīkurvan, kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharan, avataran, anupraviśan,
S04bsu016_u:438_3_1: sarvadiksattvajagadabhimukhenakāyena sarvajagadrūpasamena kāyena sarvasattvābhimukhena kāyena sarvajagadanuliptena kāyena
S04bsu016_u:438_3_2: sarvajagatsamaśarīreṇa kāyena sarvajagadabhyudgatena kāyena sarvajagatparipākavinayākūlena kāyena samantadiṅnigarjanena kāyena
S04bsu016_u:438_3_3: sarvajagadasaṃkrāntena kāyena sarvāvaraṇātyantasamuddhāṭitena kāyena tathāgatasvabhāvena kāyena sarvajagadvinayaniṣṭhāparyavasānena
S04bsu016_u:439_0_0: dṛṣṭvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ pādau
S04bsu016_u:439_0_2: rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahaṃ khalu devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:439_1: tadvadasva me devate kathaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carannupakārībhūto bhavati sattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:439_5: evamukte sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:439_8_0: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā asaṅgamahādharmabhāṇakapaṭṭabaddhādhyālambanaprayogā sarvatathāgatadharmakośaviśrāṇanapraṇidhānā
S04bsu016_u:440_0_0: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpaṃ sarvasattvavijñāpanaṃ dharmālokamukhaṃ pariśodhayamānā kuśalamūlopacayasaṃbhārapratyupasthitāṃ
S04bsu016_u:440_11: ebhirahaṃ kulaputra daśabhirākāraiḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ vyavalokayāmi anugacchāmi prasarāmi sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhāropacayāya buddhamāhātmyāvataraṇatāyai acintyabuddhaviṣayānugamāya /
S04bsu016_u:441_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ahamevaṃ tathāgatamāhātmyānugatairmanasikārairdaśabhirdhāraṇīmaṇḍalaparivartasahasraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:441_1: katamairdaśabhiḥ? yaduta sarvadharmasamudrasamavasaraṇena ca nāmnā dhāraṇīmaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:441_11: etāni ca kulaputra daśa dhāraṇīmaṇḍalāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā daśabhirdhāraṇīmaṇḍalaparivartasahasraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:442_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra śrutamayyā prajñayā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu016_u:442_1: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:442_21: etatpramukhairahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyairdeśanānayābhinirhāraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:442_23: ekaikena ca vimokṣaviṣayabhāvanānayena praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:443_0: sudhana āha - āścaryaṃ devate yāvadgambhīra eṣa bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:443_1_0: kiyaccirapratilabdhaḥ tvayāyamārye bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ? āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātuparivartaparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:444_0: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra lokadhātau vimalaprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamatathāgataprabhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:444_1: tasyāṃ ca dharmārcinagarameghāyāṃ lokadhātau madhyamā vicitradhvajā nāma cāturdvīpikābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:444_3: tasyā rājadhānyā nātidūre dharmarājabhavanapratibhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:444_4: tatra bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājo nāma tathāgata udapādi teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:444_5: tena ca samayena vimalavakrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:444_6: tena tasya bhagavataḥ sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājñastathāgatasyāntikāt sarvadharmasāgaro nāma sūtrānta udgṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:444_9_0: [Gv_236] śāsanāntardhānakāle ca sahasradhā bhinne śāsane daśanayaśatabhinnāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmanantarakalpakaṣāye pratyupasthite
S04bsu016_u:444_9_1: sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāṃ kalahavigrahavivādamāpannānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ ca buddhaśāsanaguṇānarthikānāṃ viṣayaratiparāyaṇānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:444_9_3: kṛto 'bhūt - aho bateyamanekakalpasamudānītā mahādharmolkā antardhāsyatīti saṃvegajananīyā kathā kṛtā /
S04bsu016_u:444_10_0: sa ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale saptatālamātramabhyudgamya anantavarṇānarcimeghānniścārya nānāvarṇān mahāraśmijālavyūhān kāyādutsṛjya
S04bsu016_u:444_10_1: anekavarṇayā prabhayā loke kleśatāpaṃ śamayitvā anantamadhyān sattvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:445_0: tena ca samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūt tasyaiva vimalacakrabhānuprabhasya cakravartino duhitā bhikṣuṇīśatasahasraparivārā /
S04bsu016_u:445_1: sā taṃ saṃvegaśabdaṃ śrutvā tacca mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā saparivārā bodhāya cittamutpādayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:445_4: sarvatathāgatadharmacakranirmāṇaprabhaṃ ca nāma dhāraṇī sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāṃ ca nāma prajñāpāramitāṃ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:445_5: dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā ca bhikṣuṇī sarvatathāgataśāsanasaṃbhavāvabhāsapradīpaṃ ca nāma samādhim,
S04bsu016_u:445_6: etaṃ ca manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ ca bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ sūkṣmamṛdukaṃ pratyalabhata,
S04bsu016_u:446_0_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho nāma rājābhūccakravartī yena tatsarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājñastathāgatasya
S04bsu016_u:446_2: mahādharmolkā ca jvalitā? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:446_3: samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūccakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:446_4_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabhasya rājñaścakravartino dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā
S04bsu016_u:446_4_1: nāma duhitā bhikṣuṇyabhūdbhikṣuṇīśatasahasraparivārā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:446_5: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūvam? mayā tattasya sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājñastathāgatasya śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
S04bsu016_u:446_8: sarvatathāgatadharmacakravajraprabhāyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
S04bsu016_u:447_0: tasya ca mayā tathāgatasyānantaraṃ vimaladharmaparvatajñānaśikharābho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:447_59: nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ raśmiguṇamakuṭajñānaprajñāprabho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:448_0: iti hi kulaputra etadbuddhaśataṃ pramukhaṃ kṛtvā tasmin vimalābhe kalpe sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā utpannā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:448_1: teṣāṃ punaḥ kulaputra sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātunagarābhajñānapradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:448_2: te khalu mayā kulaputra sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājapūrvaṃgamā dharmadhātunagarābhajñānapradīparājapaścimāḥ sarve pūjitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:448_5: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmahaṃ tathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā /
S04bsu016_u:448_6: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
S04bsu016_u:448_7: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśo bodhisattvavimokṣo vividhaiḥ pratilābhanayaiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:448_8: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādanantamadhyāḥ sattvasāgarāḥ paripācitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:448_10: sarve te mayā tathāgatāḥ dharmapratipattyā pūjitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:448_11: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya saṃsārarātrigateṣu sattveṣu ajñānanidrāprasupteṣu jāgarmi,
S04bsu016_u:449_0: etamahaṃ kulaputra manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ lokasaṃbhinnapralāpavinivartanamadvayabhaṇitāviniyojanaṃ satyapratiṣṭhāpanaparyavasānaṃ jānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:449_3: anuttaro bodhisattvakarmasamārambhaprayogo vā bodhisattvasūkṣmajñānānugamo vā bodhisattvadharmanidhānakośavibhaktavṛṣabhitā bodhisattvakarmasāṃkathyasiṃhāsanākramaṇaṃ vā jñātum /
S04bsu016_u:449_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te satpuruṣāḥ sarvadharmabhūmimaṇḍaladhāraṇyavakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:450_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā nāma rātridevatā saṃnipatitā,
S04bsu016_u:450_1: yā mamānantaraṃ saṃniṣaṇṇā / tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣante,
S04bsu016_u:450_2: kathaṃ ca pratipadyamānāḥ sarvasattvān sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
S04bsu016_u:451_1_0: atha khalu sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:451_1_1: bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:452_3: saṃvardhanāmapi samanta asaṅgavegam avagāha maitriṣu triyadhvanayaṣpatheṣu // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:452_4: iti buddhakṣetraparivartarajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānamādigatamāsa purā hi kṣetram /
S04bsu016_u:452_5: dharmārcimeghanagaraḥ śirilokadhātu kalpo babhūva vimalābha mahāprabhaśca // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:452_6: tatraiva kalpi jinavaṃśi anūpachinne buddhāḥ sumeruparamāṇusamā upannāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:452_7: dharmasamudraprabhagarjitarāja buddhaḥ purvaṃgamaḥ prathamakalpika āsi teṣām // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:452_8: jinu dharmameghanagarābhapradīparājo yaḥ sarvapaścimu abhūtsugatāna teṣām /
S04bsu016_u:452_9: te sarvi pūjita mayā upasaṃkramitvā dharmaśca teṣa mi śruto janayitva prītim // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:452_10: dṛṣṭo mayā prathamu kāñcanavarṇaraśmiḥ dharmaḥ samudraprabhagarjitaghoṣarājaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:452_11: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇavicitritu merukalpo dṛṣṭvā ca me matirabhūtsugato bhaveyam // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:452_12: sahadarśanena mama tasya tathāgatasya prādurbabhūva balavajjinacittamādyam /
S04bsu016_u:452_14: yena triyadhvagata sarvi sphuṭāḥ samantāt buddhāśca tatsutasamudravṛtā aśeṣāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:452_16: kṣetrārṇavā api samudra sarve āsan kṛpāmṛtamahodadhi saṃbhaveta // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:452_17: kāyena sarvi spharaṇārthamaśeṣa kṣetrā kāyaṃ yathāśayajagadvinidarśanāya /
S04bsu016_u:452_18: kṣetrāṇyaśeṣamavabhāsanakampanāya pākāya caiva jagatāṃ janitaṃ mano me // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:452_19: dvitīye yajjinasya upasaṃkramaṇe 'pi dṛṣṭāḥ kṣetrārṇaveṣu daśasu sthita ye jinendrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:452_20: kṣetrāḥ samudraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kṣetrārṇaveṣu jina paścimake mi dṛṣṭāḥ // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:452_21: sarvāntakṣetraparivartarajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye jina upanna jagatpradīpāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:452_22: te sarvi pūjita mayā upasaṃkramitvā evaṃ vimokṣanayasāgaru śodhayeyam // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:453_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabdhaḥ anantamadhyasamādhimukhasamudrāvatīrṇo
S04bsu016_u:454_0: prajñā hi te vipula dharmasamudracārī cīrṇā ca me bhavasamudra anantamadhyān /
S04bsu016_u:454_1: dīrghāyu nirjvara sujñānaśarīragarbhe tvaṃ devi rocasi imāṃ pariṣāmupetya // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:454_3: ārambaṇāni tulayasyapi cāvikalpā cittakṣaṇena api tāni acintiyāni // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:454_5: buddhyā vimokṣa sugabhīra vigāhamānā sarvān vinesi paripācayase 'prameyān // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:454_10: tvaṃ dharmadhātugata sarvi spharitva sattvān dharmaṃ prakāśya bhaya sarvi śamesi loke // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:454_12: sarvatra jinabalaṃ pratipadyamānā saṃpaśyase jinavikurvita sarvakṣetraiḥ // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:454_13: cittaṃ durāsadu tavā gaganaprakāśaṃ sarve kileśamali nirmalamādiśuddham /
S04bsu016_u:454_14: yasmin samosari triyadhvaga sarvakṣetrā buddhāśca sātmajagaṇāḥ saha sarvasattvaiḥ // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:454_16: kalpārṇavānapi sanāmasamudrasaṃkhyān saṃjñodadhīn jagatāṃ vidarśayasi kṣaṇena // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:454_17: diśatāsu yāvata tu sattvacyutopapādā ye rūpiṇāmapi ca saṃjñiasaṃjñināṃ ca /
S04bsu016_u:454_18: vyavahārasatyanaya otaramāṇā teṣāṃ mārgaṃ vidarśya varabodhipathe praṇesi // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:454_20: tvaṃ dharmakāyapariśuddha asaṅgacittā rūpaṃ vidarśayami loki yathāśayānām // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:455_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyo
S04bsu016_u:455_0_1: rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:457_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā prabhāvayamānaḥ
S04bsu016_u:457_0_1: saṃbhāvayamāno vipulīkurvan yena sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:457_1: so 'paśyat sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāṃ rātridevatāṃ ratnadrumāṅkuragarbhe siṃhāsane sarvagandharatnadrumaśākhe kūṭāgāre saṃniṣaṇṇāṃ daśarātridevatāsahasraparivārām /
S04bsu016_u:458_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ
S04bsu016_u:458_0_1: sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:458_1: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caritavyam,
S04bsu016_u:458_2: kathaṃ śikṣitavyam / tadvadasva me devate, kathaṃ bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caranti,
S04bsu016_u:458_3: kathaṃ śikṣante, kathaṃ caritvā kathaṃ śikṣitvā niryānti sarvajñatāyām /
S04bsu016_u:459_0_0: evamukte sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - mama kulaputra anubhāvena sahe
S04bsu016_u:459_2: pathotpathagatāḥ sattvā rātristhāne cetanābahulāḥ sarvajagatpālanābhimukhā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:460_0_0: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra naranārīgaṇānāṃ daharāṇāṃ taruṇānāṃ yauvanamadamattānāṃ nṛtyagītavādyaratipramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:460_10: āvaraṇavaśagatān sattvān karmakleśaprapīḍitān puṇyajñānabalaparihīṇān bodhisattvabalapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:461_0: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra vipulaprītisaṃbhavasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:461_1_0: sudhana āha - ka etasya devate vipulaprītisaṃbhavatuṣṭyavabhāsasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya [Gv_244] viṣayaḥ? āha - tathāgatapuṇyasattvaṃsaṃgrahajñānopāyāvabhāsa
S04bsu016_u:461_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? yatkiṃcit kulaputra sattvāḥ sukhamanubhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:461_3_0: sarvaṃ tattathāgatapuṇyaprabhāvena tathāgatānuśāsanīpathena tathāgatavacanapratipattyā tathāgatānuśikṣaṇena tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena
S04bsu016_u:461_4: tathāgatagotraśuklakarmamaṇḍalaprabhayā hi kulaputra sattvānāṃ sukhāni saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:461_5_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kulaputra ahametaṃ vipulaprītisaṃbhavasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamavatarantī bhagavato
S04bsu016_u:461_5_1: vairocanasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvabodhisattvacaryāsamudraṃ samanusmarantī avatarantī avagāhayamānā
S04bsu016_u:461_6_2: kleśasamākulacittān mahatsaṃsāraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ saṃsāradāridryaduḥkhaprapīḍitān buddhadarśanavimukhān sattvān dṛṣṭvā
S04bsu016_u:462_0_0: sa evaṃ yathābhūtasarvadharmasvabhāvāvatīrṇacetāḥ sarvasattvadhātau mahāmaitrīsamatāpratipannaḥ sarvajaganmahākaruṇāmeghaspharaṇaprayogaḥ
S04bsu016_u:463_0_0: evaṃ hi kulaputra bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caran puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravirahite lokasaṃniveśe akṛtajñasattvaparipūrṇe
S04bsu016_u:463_0_3: mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya vipulān pāramitācaryāmeghānabhinirhṛtya kuśalamūladṛḍhapratiṣṭhānaṃ saṃvarṇayan sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāradāridryaduḥkhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:463_0_6: sarvabuddhaśāsanadiśaṃ saṃdhārayan sarvākuśaladharmadiśaṃ vinivartayan sarvajñatāsaṃbhāradiśaṃ saṃvarṇayan sarvasattvadhātuṃ
S04bsu016_u:463_5: sarvatathāgatavikurvitamukheṣu cainānavatārya atyantamupadhiśeṣasukhasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhya tathāgatamāhātmyābhimukhān kṛtvā bodhisattvasaṃgrahajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:464_0_0: sudhana āha - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - durabhisaṃbhavaṃ kulaputra etatsthānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:464_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? tattathāgatajñānaviṣayaṃ hi kulaputra etatsthānamanākrāntaṃ sarvabodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:464_5: atha ca punastathāgatādhiṣṭhānena nirdekṣyāmi ājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmāśayasamyagviśuddhaye,
S04bsu016_u:465_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā tryadhvaprāptatathāgataviṣayaṃ vyavalokya imā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:466_0: gambhīru bauddho viṣayo anantā yaṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu buddhaputra /
S04bsu016_u:466_1: acintiyakṣetrarajopamānaiḥ kalpairna śakyaṃ sa hi sarva vaktum // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:466_2: na lubdhasattvairna ca duṣṭacittaiḥ śakyaṃ na mohāndhatamovṛtaiśca /
S04bsu016_u:466_3: na mrakṣamānopahatāśayaiśca vijānituṃ śānta jināna dharmatā // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:466_5: na kleśakarmāvaraṇāvṛtaiśca śakyo hyayaṃ jānitu buddhagocara // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:466_7: na dṛṣṭisaṃjñāviparītacittaiḥ śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabhūmiḥ // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:466_8: durjñeya śānto viṣayo jinānāṃ svabhāvato nirmalanirvikalpaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:466_10: saṃsārasaktaina bhavāśritaiśca śakyaṃ samājñātumayaṃ hi dharmaḥ // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:466_14: munerbalārambaṇacittameghāḥ kṣāntiṃ labhante ta idaṃ niśāmya // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:466_18: aśeṣasattvānugatā ca maitrī naye jinānāṃ ta ihāvatīrṇāḥ // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:466_19: anāgrahā ye khalu hṛṣṭacittāḥ sarvāstidānābhiratāḥ sadaiva /
S04bsu016_u:466_31: gatiṃ gatā ye jinadharmadhātau prajñāpradīpāna nayeṣa teṣām // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:466_39: vibuddhya bodhiṃ vinayanta sarvān asaṅganetrāna nayeṣa teṣām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:466_41: dharmārthiko dharmagaveṣyakhinnaḥ śrutvā ca taṃ dhārayituṃ samarthaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:467_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocano nāma lokadhātusamudro 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:467_1: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocanalokadhātusamudre jñānaparvatadharmadhātudikpratapanatejorājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:467_2_0: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputra jñānaparvatadharmadhātudikpratapanatejorājonāmnā tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sa
S04bsu016_u:467_10: ekaikasmiṃśca sūtrānte lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ anantamadhyasattvavinayanirdeśā nānāyānanayaiḥ pravartitā nānāvikurvitaprātihāryavinayatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:468_0: tasmin khalu punarmaṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocane lokadhātusamudre samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūho nāma madhyamo lokadhātuvaṃśo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:468_1: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūhe madhyame lokadhātuvaṃśe sarvaratnavarṇasamantaprabhāsaśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:468_4: teṣāṃ ca sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ cāturdvīpakānāṃ sarvaratnaśikharadhvajo nāma madhyamaścāturdvīpako 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:468_5: tasmin khalu punaḥ sarvaratnaśikharadhvaje cāturdvīpake lokadhātau aprameyayojanaśatasahasrāyāmavistārāścatvāro dvīpā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:468_7: tasmiṃśca khalu punaḥ cāturdvīpake jambudvīpakasya madhye ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpā nāma rājadhānyabhūddaśanagarasahasraparivārā /
S04bsu016_u:468_8: tasmin khalu punarjambudvīpe daśa varṣasahasrāṇi manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:468_9: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
S04bsu016_u:468_12: sapta putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ sudarśanānāṃ mahātejasāṃ mahābalānām /
S04bsu016_u:468_13: tasya khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ sarvo jambudvīpa ekacchatro 'bhūnnihataparacakrapratyarthikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:469_1_0: tena ca samayena lokadhātāvantarakalpakṣaye pratyupasthite pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣvantarhiteṣu
S04bsu016_u:469_2_0: te daśākuśalakarmapathasamādānahetoḥ parīttāyuṣo 'bhūvan alpabhogā virūpā vivarṇā duḥsaṃsthitaśarīrā alpasukhasamudācārā
S04bsu016_u:469_2_1: duḥkhavedanāsamudācārabahulā anyonyavisaṃvādavacanaśīlā anyonyabhedapratipannāḥ paruṣavacanasamudācārāḥ prakīrṇavacaso viṣayalobhābhibhūtāḥ
S04bsu016_u:469_3: teṣāmadharmarāgaraktānāṃ viṣamalobhābhibhūtānāṃ mithyādharmaparigatānāṃ na devaḥ kāle vāridhārā udasṛjat yena pṛthivyāṃ bījagrāmāḥ sasyagrāmā viroheyuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:470_0: tena khalu punaḥ sattvāḥ śuṣkeṣu tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanodyānadrumeṣu nānāvyādhispṛṣṭā digvidiśo vidhāvanti sma aparāyaṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:470_1: te samāgamya sarva eva yena ratnasālavyūhameghapradīparājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya tāṃ samantādanuparivārya kecidūrdhvabāhavaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:470_2: kecitkṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ, kecit saṃkampitaśarīrāḥ, kecidabhyudgatāṅgāḥ, kecidadhomukhaṃ prapatitāḥ, kecitsarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:470_5: kecinnagnā nirvasanāḥ, kecidvikṛtavadananayanāḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño 'bhimukhaṃ mahāntamārtasvaramutkrośamakārṣuḥ - upadrutāḥ sma /
S04bsu016_u:470_7: vividhabhayopataptāḥ sma / trāṇavirahitāḥ sma / deva aśaraṇā aparāyaṇāḥ sma /
S04bsu016_u:470_10: ye ca tasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ kṣutpipāsāprapīḍitā nirābharaṇagātrā nagnanirvasanā duṣṭavivarṇā rūkṣaparuṣagātrā duḥkhitā durmanaso 'nāttamanaskāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:470_12_0: te sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ rājānaṃ mahājñānapuruṣaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtaṃ śaraṇamupāgatāḥ sarvasukhapratilambhasaṃjñayā
S04bsu016_u:471_0: aśrauṣīdrājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ tasya mahataḥ samantādyācanakasamūhasya taṃ mahāntamārtasvaramutkrośanaśabdam /
S04bsu016_u:471_2: sa mahākaruṇānayacetanānidhyapticitto muhūrtamekāgratāmanubhūya daśa mahākaruṇopasaṃhitāni vacanapadānyudīrayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:471_3: katamāni daśa? aho bata anālambanāḥ sattvā mahāsaṃsāraprapātaprapatitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:471_4: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ saṃsāramahāprapātaprapatitānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ tathāgatalayanabhūmipratiṣṭhāpanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_6: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vividhakleśabhayopadrutānāṃ sattvānāmatrāṇānāṃ [Gv_251] trāṇabhūtā bhaviṣyāmo 'navadyakarmāntapratiṣṭhāpanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_7: aho bata aśaraṇāḥ sattvā loke jarāmaraṇabhayāviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:471_8: katā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayamaśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayavinivartanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_10: katā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vividhalokabhayopadrutānāmaparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo 'tyantayogakṣeme sarvajñatāmārge pratiṣṭhāpanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_14: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ mahājñānālokakarā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ vitimirajñānamukhasaṃdarśanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_18: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ nāyakabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ karmasamudranayāvataraṇatayā /
S04bsu016_u:471_20: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vināyakabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvākāraparipākavinayatathāgatādhiṣṭhānakālānatikramaṇena /
S04bsu016_u:472_0: sa imāni daśa mahākaruṇopasaṃhitāni vacanapadānyudīrya tasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇamakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:472_3: tena sarvajambudvīpe sarvarājadhānīṣu sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadapattaneṣu sarvopakaraṇakośā vivṛtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:472_11: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathābhilaṣitasarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇārthaṃ teṣu gṛheṣu pratyekamātmabhāvasadṛśamupādāya kāyamabhinirmāya sthāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:472_13: yathārhavividhopakaraṇapūrṇāni ca nānāratnavicitrabhājanānyupasthāpayāmāsa - yaduta vajramaṇibhājanāni nānāgandhamaṇiratnaparipūrṇāni,
S04bsu016_u:472_16_0: vividhāṃśca rathān rājārhān sarvaratnābharaṇaparibhogāṃśca sarvāsanavidhīṃśca nānāratnavicitrān vividhavitānavitatān [Gv_252]
S04bsu016_u:473_1_0: yastasyā ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa maṇiśikharatejonāmno nagaradvārasya purataḥ samavipulāyāmaḥ paramavistīrṇadharaṇītalapraveśo
S04bsu016_u:473_4_1: yatra sa rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S04bsu016_u:473_4_3: gūḍhadṛḍhapārśvanibaddhasaṃdhiḥ sarvāṅgaparipūrṇaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ samantaśobhanaḥ sarvākāravaropeto mahādharmarājakaroditaḥ
S04bsu016_u:473_5_0: tasya khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño mahāsiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇasyopari mūrdhasaṃdhāvantarikṣe mahācchatramaṇḍalaṃ
S04bsu016_u:473_6: sa khalu rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo ratnavālavyajanaiḥ saṃvījyamānaḥ śakradevendrātirekeṇa tejasā jvālayannupaśobhate sma /
S04bsu016_u:473_7: tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin siṃhāsane sarvo janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjaliḥ sthito 'bhūttameva rājānaṃ namasyan /
S04bsu016_u:474_0_0: atha khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño 'saṃkhyeyeṣu prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu nānāyācanakeṣu
S04bsu016_u:474_0_1: nānāvastuparigrāhakeṣu nānopakaraṇādhimukteṣu nānājātiṣu nānāgatiparyāpanneṣu nānābhilāṣacitteṣu nānāśayābhiprāyeṣu nānādiksaṃnipatiteṣu
S04bsu016_u:474_1: tamekaṃ mahāpuṇyasumerumullokayamāneṣu ayamevaiko mahājñānapuruṣa iti niścitacetaneṣu,
S04bsu016_u:474_3: bodhisattvapraṇidhicetanānipatiteṣu bodhisattvapraṇidhicetanānirmiteṣu taṃ mahāntaṃ yācanakasaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yācanakānāmantike 'bhūccittaprema cittaprītiḥ cittaprasādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:475_0_0: sa khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena āttamanaskataro 'bhūt na trisāhasracakravartirājyapratilambhena
S04bsu016_u:475_11_1: [Gv_254] aṭavīkāntāravipranaṣṭasya taddarśanakāmasya teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītiradhyavasānamutpadyate taddarśanāvitṛptatayā,
S04bsu016_u:475_12: evameva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:475_21_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktakasya sarvajñatādharmatāpratiśaraṇasya
S04bsu016_u:475_22_0: mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā duṣkarakārakasaṃjñā bahukarasaṃjñāparamopakārakasaṃjñā bodhimārgopastambhasaṃjñā
S04bsu016_u:475_23_0: sa tān sarvayācanakān yathāgatān yathāsaṃprāptān yathākālasaṃnipatitān yathādigdeśasthitān yathāvastuyācanakān yathārucīn
S04bsu016_u:475_23_1: yathābhiprāyān yathābhikāṅkṣiṇo yathābhilāṣiṇo yathāvastuparyeṣakān saṃtarpayāmāsa apratihatena mahāmaitrīmaṇḍalena yācanakajanāparāṅbhukhatayā
S04bsu016_u:475_25: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ puṣpāṇi puṣpārthikebhyaḥ prādāt /
S04bsu016_u:475_28: sarvakośānapi vivṛtya vibhajya arthikebhyaḥ prādāt yasya yenārthaḥ sa taṃ gṛhṇātu iti /
S04bsu016_u:475_31: sa tān sarvayācanakān sarvāstiparityāgatayā sarvasattveṣu samapratipannaḥ sarvavastuparityāgairabhicchādayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:476_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā ṣaṣṭikanyāparivārā tasminneva mahāyajñavāṭe saṃnipatitābhūt,
S04bsu016_u:476_3_0: guruṣu sagauravā, paramasaṃprajanyacāriṇī gambhīraceṣṭā meghāsaṃpannā dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇacāraṇapratibodhiṣu pūrvasukṛtakuśalamūlā
S04bsu016_u:476_4: sā khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño mahāsiṃhāsanasya pradakṣiṇena nātidūre sthitābhūt prāñjalistaṃ rājānaṃ namasyantī,
S04bsu016_u:476_5: na ca kiṃcidgṛhṇāti / ekāntasthitā caivaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - sulabdhā me lābhā,
S04bsu016_u:476_7_1: māyāśāṭhyāpagatena cittena paramodāraprītiprasādaprāmodyavegapratilabdhā svānyābharaṇāni kāyādavamucya yena rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:476_8: tenābhimukhamakṣaipsīt / tāni tasya siṃhāsanavedikāmadhye adhaḥ pṛthivīmaṇḍale pratiṣṭhitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:476_9: sā tānyābharaṇāni pravikīrya evaṃ praṇidhimutpādayāmāsa - yathaiṣa rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo 'nāthānāṃ sattvānāmandhakāraprāptānāṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtaḥ,

S04bsu016_u:479_1: atha khalu rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo ratnaprabhāṃ śreṣṭhidārikāmavalokya evamāha - sādhu sādhu dārike,
S04bsu016_u:479_5_0: na śakyaṃ dārike tamovṛtairakṛtajñasattvaiḥ buddhivipannaiḥ kṣubhitacittairlulitasaṃtānaistamaścetobhiḥ prakṛtivinaṣṭāśayaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:479_5_1: pratipatticyutaiḥ parasattvaguṇaviśeṣānabhijñairbodhisattvaguṇā avatārituṃ tathāgataguṇā vā kalpayituṃ sarvaguṇajñānaviśeṣābhijñā
S04bsu016_u:479_8: udārasattvābhijñatayā jambudvīpe 'mogho 'smākaṃ sattvasaṃgrahavikramo yeṣāṃ no vijite tvamevaṃrūpajñānasamanvāgatā utpannā /
S04bsu016_u:479_9_0: atha khalu rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo 'nardhaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ jyotiḥprabhamaṇiratnavicitraṃ ca anarghaṃ
S04bsu016_u:479_9_1: vastraratnaṃ svena pāṇinā ādāya ratnaprabhāyāḥ śreṣṭhidārikāyāḥ prādāt /

S04bsu016_u:479_13_0: atha khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā saparivārā ubhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dharaṇitale praṇipatya tadvastraratnaṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya

S04bsu016_u:479_15: sā tadvastraratnaṃ prāvṛtya rājānaṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ pradakṣiṇamakarot sārdhaṃ svena dārikāparivāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:479_16: tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ teṣu vastraratneṣu sarvanakṣatrajyotirbimbāni vidyotamānānyadarśan /

S04bsu016_u:480_0_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:480_0_1: sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:480_1: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastena kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma /
S04bsu016_u:480_2_0: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaprabhā nāma devyabhūdrājño jyotiṣprabhasya bhāryā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya
S04bsu016_u:480_3: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena padmaprabhā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:480_4: yayā sa upapādukaḥ kumāraḥ utsaṅge pratigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:480_5: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūtsarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ pitā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:480_6: śuddhodanaḥ sa rājā tena kālena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:480_7: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:480_8: na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam / ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:480_9: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anye tena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:480_10: ye tatra jambudvīpe upapannāḥ rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇa caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:480_11: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve ihaiva bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamavasṛtā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:487_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:487_2: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā praṇamya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān darśananayānanusmaramāṇo 'ntaradharaṇitale praṇipatya suciramatināmayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:488_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tasmāddharaṇitalādutthāya prāñjalībhūtaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:488_0_1: kāyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo daśa saṃjñāviśuddhīḥ pratilabhate sma,
S04bsu016_u:488_2: katamā daśa? yaduta - kalyāṇamitreṣu svacittasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhata sarvajñatāsamārambhavīryasarvālambanasaṃvāsāya /
S04bsu016_u:488_13: yāsāṃ pratilābhāt sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvasabhāgatāḥ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:488_98_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prasannacittaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ rātridevatāmavalokayan āsāṃ daśānāṃ saṃjñāviśuddhīnāṃ
S04bsu016_u:489_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamadarśanatayā
S04bsu016_u:489_1: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
