S04bsu016_u:490_21: ācāryabhūtā mi guṇāprameye sarvajñadharmeṣu mama praṇetrī /
S04bsu016_u:490_22: na kalpakoṭīnayutairasaṃkhyaiḥ śakyaṃ mayā te pratikartumārye // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:491_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - saṃdarśitastvayā
S04bsu016_u:491_1: vadasva me devate - ko nāmāyaṃ vimokṣaḥ? kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? kiyaccireṇa vā tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase?
S04bsu016_u:492_0: evamukte sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sarvasattvaparipākasaṃcodanakuśalasaṃbhavo nāma kulaputra ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:492_1_0: ahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā sarvadharmasvabhāvavasamatāmanubuddhya sarvadharmaprakṛtimavatīrya anālayaṃ dharmaṃ
S04bsu016_u:492_1_1: niśritya sarvalokoccālitā suvibhaktarūpatāṃ dharmāṇāmavatīrya avisabhāgavarṇā avaivartavarṇā avikalpavarṇā anīlavarṇā apītavarṇā
S04bsu016_u:492_1_2: alohitavarṇā anavadātavarṇā dharmatāmavatīrya anekavarṇavibhaktirūpātmabhāvā nānātvavarṇā avisabhāgā anānātvā avaimātryā
S04bsu016_u:492_2_0: anekavarṇā aprameyavarṇā viśuddhavarṇā sarvavyūhapramuñcanavarṇā samantadarśanavarṇā sarvajagatsadṛśavarṇā sarvalokābhimukhātirekavarṇā
S04bsu016_u:492_3_8: sarvadharmadhātunayasāgarān spharitvā darśanavaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇavaineyānāmanusmṛtivaineyānāṃ dharmacakranirmāṇābhinirhāravaineyānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:493_1_3: tathāgatotpādān saṃdarśayitvā ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya anantamadhyāni vikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānā pūrvakāṇi kuśalamūlāni
S04bsu016_u:493_5: praticittakṣaṇaṃ ca anantamadhyaṃ sattvadhātumanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:494_0_0: yatpunaḥ kulaputra evaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirasaṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? kiyanti kalpaśatānyupādāya bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S04bsu016_u:494_2: na tatra saṃsāradīrghatā vā saṃsārahrasvatā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate /
S04bsu016_u:494_3: kalpasaṃkliṣṭatā vā kalpaviśuddhatā vā kalpaparīttatā vā kalpamahadgatatā vā kalpabahutvaṃ vā kalpanānātvaṃ vā kalpanānākaraṇaṃ vā kalpavimātratā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate vā /
S04bsu016_u:494_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? prakṛtisvabhāvapariśuddhaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasaṃjñājālanirmuktaṃ sarvāvaraṇaparvatasamatikrāntamāśaye udeti /
S04bsu016_u:494_6: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍale rātriṃdivaṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate,
S04bsu016_u:494_7: na saṃvasati / astaṃgamite sūryamaṇḍale rātriḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:494_8: udāgate ca sūryamaṇḍale divasaḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:494_9: evameva kulaputra avikalpe bodhisattvajñānamaṇḍale sarvakalpavikalpaparikalpā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:494_11: atha ca punarbodhisattvāśayoditā vikalpajñānamaṇḍalaprabhena sarvasattvaparipākakālavaśena kalpasaṃvāsasaṃsārasaṃjñāgatagaṇanāsaṃkhyā prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:494_13_0: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gaganatalagataṃ sarvaratnaparvateṣu sarvaratnadrumeṣu sarvaratnarājeṣu sarvaratnākareṣu
S04bsu016_u:494_13_1: sarvasāgareṣu sarvotsasaraḥsu sarvasvacchajalabhājaneṣu sarvajagaccitteṣu ca pratibhāsaprāptaṃ vijñāyate /
S04bsu016_u:494_19: na ratnākareṣvanugacchati / na sāgareṣvavatarati / na sarvodakabhājaneṣvanupraviśati /
S04bsu016_u:494_21_0: evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva uccalito bhavasamudrādudgatastathāgatadharmadhātugagane dharmasvabhāvagaganagocaravihārī
S04bsu016_u:494_21_1: śāntagagananilayaḥ sarvabhavagatyupapattiṣu saṃdṛśyate sarvasattvasadṛśaiḥ kāyaiḥ sattvānāṃ paripākavinayamupādāya /
S04bsu016_u:494_24: na cāsya kalpe dīrghasaṃjñā bhavati na hrasvasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:495_0: tadyathā kulaputra mahānadyādiṣu yānapātraṃ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya prayuktamapratiprasrabdhaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:495_1: yāvajjīvaṃ na cāsya apārime tīre 'bhiniveśo bhavati na pārime,
S04bsu016_u:495_2: na codakamadhye saṃtiṣṭhate, evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāpāramitāyānapātrabalena saṃsāranadīsrotasaḥ sarvasattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:495_3: na cāsya apārime tīre utrtrāso bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:495_4: na pārime tīre kṣemasaṃjñā / atha ca punaḥ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:496_0_0: tadyathā kulaputra dharmadhātuvipulamākāśadhātugaganamaṇḍalaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu saṃvartamāneṣu vivartamāneṣu vyativṛtteṣu
S04bsu016_u:496_1: evameva kulaputra bodhisattva āśayajñānagaganatalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānavātamaṇḍalīparivṛtaṃ sarvadurgatiprapātebhyaḥ sattvān saṃdhārayamāṇaḥ na parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:497_0: tadyathā kulaputra māyāgatanivṛttasya puruṣasya sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparipūrṇasya daśa śarīrasthā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:497_1: katame daśa? yaduta āsaritaṃ vā niḥsaritaṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:497_2: śītaṃ voṣṇaṃ vā, kṣudhā vā pipāsā vā, harṣo vā manyuvṛtabhāvo vā, jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ vā pīḍā vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:497_3_1: sarvakalpān saṃvasamānasya daśa dharmā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:497_4_0: katame daśa? yaduta saṃsārābhilāṣo vā saṃsārabhavagatyupapattinirvedo vā viṣayaratyanunayo vā pratighātacittatā vā upabhoktukāmatā
S04bsu016_u:497_4_1: vā sarvakleśaparitāpo vā duḥkhavedanānubhāvo vā viṣayagatyupapattibhayaṃ vā bhavābhilāṣo vā abhiniveśo vā /
S04bsu016_u:497_5: api tu khalu kulaputra nirdekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena anāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ vipulabodhisattvapraṇidhānabalavivardhanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:498_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:498_1: tasyāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputra ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:498_2: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:498_3_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu016_u:498_3_1: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
S04bsu016_u:498_5: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye [Gv_273] cāturdvīpakasya rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā nātidūre upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:498_6: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:498_7: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:498_8: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:498_9: yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:498_10: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:498_11: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
S04bsu016_u:498_12_0: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ
S04bsu016_u:498_12_1: paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:499_0: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:499_1_0: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:499_1_1: saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāmadharmarāgaraktānāṃ viṣamalobhābhibhūtānāṃ mithyādharmaparigatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:499_2: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:499_3: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:499_4_0: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake praviśya adrākṣīttāṃścārakagahanaprakṣiptān
S04bsu016_u:499_4_2: viṣamavātopahataśarīrān dhamanīsaṃtatagātrān kṣutpipāsāparipīḍitān nagnān nirvasanān pāṃśurajaḥsaṃmrakṣitaśarīrāṃśca keśābhicchāditakāyān
S04bsu016_u:499_4_3: urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān kāraṇān paridevavipralāpān pramuñcamānān /
S04bsu016_u:499_5: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya /
S04bsu016_u:499_6: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
S04bsu016_u:499_7: te mucyeran / atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati? ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño vadhāya parākrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:499_9: vadhārhā hyete / vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:500_1: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
S04bsu016_u:500_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? yadyahametān sattvānasmādbandhanānna śaknomi mocayitum,
S04bsu016_u:500_7_0: tatkathaṃ śakyaṃ traidhātukabandhanāgāragatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇāpāśavinibaddhān avidyāgahanagatān mohāndhakāraprakṣiptān dāridryaduḥkhaprapīḍitān
S04bsu016_u:501_0: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena /
S04bsu016_u:501_1: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
S04bsu016_u:501_2: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ rājakośo vilupyate /
S04bsu016_u:501_4: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:501_6: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān /
S04bsu016_u:501_7_0: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī
S04bsu016_u:501_7_1: pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa - pramuñca
S04bsu016_u:501_9: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
S04bsu016_u:501_11: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
S04bsu016_u:501_12: tasya janetryā rājā jayaprabho 'rdhamāsaṃ yācito darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:501_13: tato yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyaḥ / bhavatu tattatheti rājñānujñatām /
S04bsu016_u:501_14: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam /
S04bsu016_u:501_15: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
S04bsu016_u:501_16: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:502_2_0: sa ca bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ sattvaparipākavinayakālamāgamayya taṃ yajñavāṭamupasaṃkrānto
S04bsu016_u:502_2_2: garuḍendrapūjāvidhibhirabhiprakīrṇaḥ prītimanobhiḥ kinnarendaiḥ paripūjitaḥ stutisaṃgītisaṃcodito mahoragendrasaṃprekṣitāvalokitavadanaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:502_3_0: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:502_3_1: samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ guptaṃ jitendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ
S04bsu016_u:502_3_2: hradamivācchaṃ viprasannamanāvilaṃ mahatā buddhavikurvitaprātihāryeṇa mahatyā buddhavṛṣabhitayā virocayamānaṃ buddhādhipateyenābhibhavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:502_3_4: spharamāṇaṃ buddharaśmibhiravabhāsayamānaṃ sarvaromavivarebhyo gandharatnārciścakrāṇi pramuñcamānaṃ buddhakṣetraprakampanena
S04bsu016_u:502_3_5: sarvalokaṃ saṃkampayamānaṃ sarvavyūhameghapravarṣaṇena buddhavikrameṇa sarvasattvakleśaprajahanena buddheryāpathena sarvasattvaprītivegavivardhanena
S04bsu016_u:503_0_0: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumāraḥ sa ca mahān janakāyastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ tathāgataṃ
S04bsu016_u:503_0_1: dūrādeva pratyudgamya prasannacittaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya pādau śirasābhivandya anekavidhayā pūjayā saṃpūjya evaṃ vācamabhāṣata
S04bsu016_u:503_3: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastasya bhagavato 'grāsanamupadarśayan evamāha - niṣīdatu bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:503_4: idamāsanaṃ prajñaptam / tato bhagavata upasaṃkrāmatastadāsanaṃ śucigarbhaśarīrakāyikābhirdevatābhirbuddhānubhāvena gandhamaṇirājapadmagarbhamadhiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu016_u:503_7: tasya sahadarśanena tasyāṃ parṣadi sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśāntāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:504_0: atha khalu bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgatastān sattvān bhājanabhūtān viditvā anupūrveṇa kathāmakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:504_3: atha tāvadeva tataḥ parṣado 'śītīnāṃ prāṇiniyutānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam /
S04bsu016_u:504_7: evaṃ tasya bhagavato mahābuddhavikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānasya daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ sattvā mahāyāne vinayamagaman /
S04bsu016_u:504_10: vijitāvī ca rājakumāra imaṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:505_0: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī rājakumāro 'bhūt,
S04bsu016_u:505_1_0: yena tatsvakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya sarvadhanaskandhaparivāraṃ parityajya sarvamānuṣyakaṃ ca jīvalokasukhaṃ parityajya te bandhanagatāḥ
S04bsu016_u:505_1_1: sattvāḥ tasmādbandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ? sa ca nirargalo mahāyajño yaṣṭaḥ? sa ca bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgato
S04bsu016_u:505_1_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ārāgitaḥ? tasya ca tathāgatasya sahadarśanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam? eṣa ca sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo
S04bsu016_u:505_1_3: bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:505_2: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:505_3_0: mayā tadvijitāvīrājakumārabhūtena mahākaruṇāprapīḍitena sarvajagaddhitapratipannena traidhātukāniśritena vipākāpratikāṅkṣiṇā
S04bsu016_u:505_3_1: yaśaskīrtināmānabhinandinā ātmānamanutkarṣayatā paramapaṃsayatā sarvavastvanabhiniviṣṭena bhavasaṃjñoccalitena traidhātukānabhinandinā
S04bsu016_u:506_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tāni tena samayena pañcāmātyaśatānyabhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:506_1: yaiḥ sa rājā jayaprabho vitathaṃ vijñāpya mama vadhāyodyojitaḥ? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:506_2: imāni tāni pañca puruṣaśatāni yāni devadattena bhagavato vadhāyodyojitāni /
S04bsu016_u:506_3_0: tāni ca bhagavatā vinīya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni - bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:506_3_1: ekasmin suprabhanāmadheye kalpe pañca buddhaśatāni nānābuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāni nānājanmakulagotrasaṃbhavāni nānāmātāpitṛvyapadeśāni
S04bsu016_u:506_4: yeṣāṃ prāthamakalpiko mahākāruṇiko nāma tathāgato ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu016_u:506_5: tasyāmeva lokadhātau dvitīyaḥ sarvajagaddhitapraṇidhānacandro nāma tathāgata utpatsyate /
S04bsu016_u:507_0_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anye te tena kālena tena samayena aparādhinaḥ puruṣā rājakilbiṣakāriṇo 'bhūvan ye te mayā vadhyaghātavaśagatāḥ
S04bsu016_u:507_0_1: svakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya tato bandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:507_2: tadanyāni ca daśaḥ bodhisattvāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi yairbhagavato 'nantabalavighuṣṭanirnāditaśrīsaṃbhavamatestathāgatasya darśanena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:508_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:508_1: satyakaḥ sa mahāvādī tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:508_2: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājaparivāro 'bhūdantaḥpurastryāgāradauvārikapārṣadyā vā anuyātrikā vā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:508_6: tāni ca sarvāṇi bhagavatā vyākṛtānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:509_0_0: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumāro mātāpitṛbhyāmanujñātastān bandhanagatān sattvān parimocya sphītāṃ vasumatīṃ
S04bsu016_u:509_0_1: dhanakanakaratnasamṛddhāmapahāya putradāraṃ cotsṛjya tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasyāntike
S04bsu016_u:509_14: sa evaṃ dharmasamanvāgataḥ praticittakṣaṇe daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyākrāmati sma /
S04bsu016_u:509_15: ekaikasyāṃ ca lokadhātau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe daśa buddhasahasrāṇi pūrvāntāparāntato 'nusmarati sma /
S04bsu016_u:509_16: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśa buddhanirmāṇasamudrasahasrāṇi daśadikprasṛtānyavataranti sma /
S04bsu016_u:509_18: nānāgatyupapannāṃścyavata [Gv_278] upapadyamānān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān suvarṇān durvarṇān yathākāmopagatān /
S04bsu016_u:509_20: cittaparivartān cittacaritāni cintānantaryatāmāśayanānātvamindriyasāgarānapi prayogaprasarānapi karmāvasānamapi paripākavinayakālamapi avatarati sma /
S04bsu016_u:510_0: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumārastataścyutvā tatraiva jambudvīpe rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tasminneva rājakule upapadya cakravartirājyaiścaryaṃ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:510_1: tena cakravartirājabhūtena tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ dharmagaganābhyudgataśrīrājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_2: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe śakrabhūtena devendragarbho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_3: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva lokadhātau suyāmadevarājabhūtena dharaṇīśrīparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_4: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau saṃtuṣitadevarājabhūtena dharmacakraprabhanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_5: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau sunirmitadevarājabhūtena gaganakāntarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_7: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātāvasurendrabhūtena sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_8: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau brahmendrabhūtena dharmacakranirmāṇasamantapratibhāsanirghoṣo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_9: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāmeva ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau tasminneva suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyudapadyanta /
S04bsu016_u:510_10: sarve ca te tathāgatā vijitāvinā rājakumāreṇārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_11: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhasya mahākalpasyānantaraṃ suraśmirnāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:510_13: ahaṃ ca tasmin kalpe mahāmatirnāma rājā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:510_14: tena me rājabhūtena lakṣaṇaśrīparvato nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_15: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gṛhapatibhūtena saṃvṛtaskandho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_16: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe amātyabhūtena vimalavatso nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_17: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe 'surendrabhūtena veśadhārī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_18: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vṛkṣadevatābhūtena lakṣaṇasumerurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_19: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe sārthavāhabhūtena vimalabāhurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_20: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe nagaradevatābhūten siṃhavikrāntagāmī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_21: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vaiśravaṇabhūtena devendracūḍo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_22: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gandharvarājabhūtena dharmodgatakīrtināma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:510_23: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe kumbhāṇḍendrabhūtena avabhāsamakuṭī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:511_0: iti hi kulaputra mayaitān daśa tathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tatra suraśmikalpe ṣaṣṭirbuddhakoṭya ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:511_1: nānopapattikāyikayā sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:511_2: ekaikaṃ [Gv_279] ca tathāgatamupasaṃkrāmantyā anantamadhyaḥ sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:511_6: yathā ca tatra suraśmikalpe tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:511_8: ye 'pi tadanyebhyo lokadhātubhya āgatya tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayamāsuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:511_10: śrutvā ca saṃdhāritā / sarve ca mayā te tathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:511_11: teṣāṃ ca me buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
S04bsu016_u:511_12: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānāpratilābhanayanānāvimokṣanayamukhaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:512_0: atha khalu sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetaṃ vimokṣanayaṃ paridīpayantī saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:513_0: acintyametaṃ paramaṃ vimokṣaṃ māṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu yatprapītaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_3: sarvānatikramya babhūva ramyā ratnaprabhā yā khalu lokadhātuḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:513_5: ārāgitāste khalu me munīndrā vimokṣametaṃ paribhāvayantyā // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:513_11: vadhāya sṛṣṭāni nṛpeṇa tena tadā sahasrāṇyaparādhināṃ hi /
S04bsu016_u:513_12: dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ kṛpayā parītastān vipramokṣāya nṛpaṃ yayāce // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:513_13: śrutvā nṛpo 'mātyagaṇaṃ tadānīmāhūya teṣāṃ nikhilaṃ tadāha /
S04bsu016_u:513_14: te procurenaṃ praṇipatya sarve tvaddhātanāyaiṣa nṛpa prayogaḥ // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:513_17: śrutvā vadhotsṛṣṭamathāsya mātā sāntaḥpurārtā nṛpatiṃ yayāce /
S04bsu016_u:513_18: muñcārdhamāsaṃ nṛpate kumāraṃ dātuṃ pradānānyakhilāni loke // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:513_19: dattābhyanujñaśca nṛpeṇa tena prādātsa dānāni yathocitāni /
S04bsu016_u:513_21: pāṣaṇḍināṃ yasya yadīpsitaṃ tat tasmai dadāti sma vadhāya sajjaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_22: muktārtanādātha vinirjagāma sā rājadhānyā janatā samagrā // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:513_24: pakvāni jñātvā jagadindriyāṇi taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ kṛpayā jagāma // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:513_28: anantamadhyāṃ janatāṃ vinīya sa vyākaroti sma tadāgrabodhau /
S04bsu016_u:513_30: ārāgya buddhaṃ vipulaṃ ca tasmai vidhāya pūjāṃ mudito babhāṣe /
S04bsu016_u:513_31: dvīpo bhaveyaṃ jagatāṃ vinetā trāṇaṃ śaraṇyaśca parāyaṇaṃ ca // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:513_32: sa prāvrajattasya muneḥ samīpe saṃbodhimārgaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_33: dharmasvabhāvaṃ suparīkṣamāṇo yatra sthitaḥ kalpaśatāni cīrṇaḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:513_35: saṃbodhimārgaṃ paribhāvayitvā labhate tadānīṃ sa vimokṣametam // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:513_36: ye tatra kalpe sugatā babhūvurārāgya tānapyakhilān prasannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_37: pūjāṃ ca teṣāmakarodudārāṃ saṃdhārayāmāsa ca dharmacakram // 29 //
S04bsu016_u:513_40: ahaṃ sa āsaṃ vijitāvināmā dṛṣṭvā narāṃścārakabandhanasthān /
S04bsu016_u:513_41: tadvipramokṣāya visṛjya dehaṃ labdho mamāyaṃ hi tadā vimokṣaḥ // 31 //
S04bsu016_u:513_45: dṛṣṭāśca me kecana ye munīndrāḥ prāptaśca yaṃ me nikhileṣvavāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_49: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu spharanti kāyena asajjamānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:513_52: vidarśayantyeva ca te jineṣu svakāyameghān pratibimbabhūtāḥ // 36 //
S04bsu016_u:513_54: vyūhānaśeṣānabhivarṣamāṇāḥ pūjāṃ prakurvanti ca te jinānām // 37 //
S04bsu016_u:513_57: sarvāsvaśeṣāsu ca dikṣu yānti cakṣuṣpathe te jinamaṇḍaleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:513_67: yatra pratiṣṭhāya caranti caryāṃ kṣetreṣu sarveṣvaparāntakalpān // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:513_73: acchambhi te varṇamahāsamudrān vimokṣametaṃ pratilabhya śāntam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:514_1_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvalokagatisamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvalokopapattipratibhāsaprāptānāṃ [Gv_284] sarvajñajñānāvaraṇaparvatavikiraṇaprayuktānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:514_1_3: caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇasamudrān vā avatartuṃ jñānavikramo parijñātuṃ cintāvasthānaṃ vā prajñātuṃ samādhivaśitā vādhigantuṃ vimokṣavikurvitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:515_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva jambudvīpe lumbinīvane sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrnāma lumbinīvanadevatā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:515_1_0: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule? kathamālokakarā bhavanti lokānām? kathamaparāntakoṭīgatān
S04bsu016_u:516_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:516_0_1: rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvya vanditvā namaskṛtya prāñjalīkṛto 'valokayamānaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā
S04bsu016_u:518_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāstāmanuśāsanīmanusmaran taṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:518_0_1: paribhāvayan vipulīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena lumbinīvanaṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:518_1_0: upetya lumbinīvanaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāṃ parigaveṣamāṇo 'paśyatsutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:518_1_1: lumbinīdevatāṃ lumbinīvaneṣu sarvaratnadrumaśākhāmaṇḍalakūṭāgāre maṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāṃ viṃśatyā vanadevatāniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu016_u:518_1_2: parivṛtāṃ puraskṛtāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāṃ sarvabodhisattvajanmasamudranirdeśaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāṃ tathāgatagotrābhijātānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:518_3: upetya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīlumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:518_4: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule,
S04bsu016_u:519_0_0: evamukte sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - daśemāni kulaputra bodhisattvajanmāni
S04bsu016_u:519_0_1: yaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakuleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:519_2: na vitiṣṭhante na viṣīdanti na vivartante na pratiprasrabhyante na parikhidyante na saṃsīdanti na muhyanti nāvalīyante na paritrasyanti na praṇaśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:519_12: katamāni daśa? yaduta - sarvabuddhopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma /
S04bsu016_u:520_0_0: tatra kulaputra katamatsarvabuddhopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:520_0_1: ādita eva buddhopasthānāya prapūjyate sarvabuddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan upatiṣṭhan ārāgayan avirāgayan
S04bsu016_u:520_1: anivartayā śraddhayā [Gv_286] puṇyaṃ samārjayan atṛptaḥ sarvatathāgatapūjāsaṃbhārasamudānayanaprayukto 'pratiprasrabdhaprayogo bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:520_2: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapūjopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma sarvajñatāsaṃbhārakuśalamūlasaṃbhavasamārjanatāyai saṃvartate /
S04bsu016_u:521_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati /
S04bsu016_u:521_12: idaṃ kulaputra bodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma /

S04bsu016_u:523_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ pariśuddho bhavatyadhyāśayadhātau /

S04bsu016_u:524_1_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:524_11: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma /
S04bsu016_u:525_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo jāto bhavati tathāgatakule 'nujāto bhavati,

S04bsu016_u:526_9: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma /
S04bsu016_u:527_0_1: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ kumārabhūta eva bodhisattvavyavasthānavyavasthito bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:527_2: ekaikatra jñānanayamukhe 'prameyāḥ kalpāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuraprameyaṃ bodhisattvagocaraṃ nirdiśataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:527_9: aprameyāṃ ca dharmatāṃ parīttāṃ mahadgatāṃ vā pratividhyati /
S04bsu016_u:528_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe nānāvyūhāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhitiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:528_12: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma navamaṃ bodhisattvajanma /
S04bsu016_u:529_0_0: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo
S04bsu016_u:529_6: sarvakalpasaṃvartavivartakalpānāṃ ca pūrvāntāparāntapratyuatpannānāṃ sanāmnāṃ sopadeśānāmānantaryaṃ prajānāti /
S04bsu016_u:529_9: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma /
S04bsu016_u:530_0: imāni kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bodhisattvajanmāni yeṣu bodhisattvā jāyante upapadyante samarjayanti saṃvardhayanti pratipūrayanti saṃbhavanti parisaṃbhavanti pariniṣpadyante /
S04bsu016_u:531_0_0: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva bodhisattvajanmārthamabhidyotayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena
S04bsu016_u:531_0_1: daśa diśo vyavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:532_0: adhyāśayena vimalena anāvilena paśyanti ye jina na jātu bhavanti tṛptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:532_1: sarvān jināna aparāntaviyūhameghān praṇidhyenti te prathamajanmasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:532_2: sarvatriyadhvagamaśeṣa spharitva lokaṃ kṣetrāṇi sarva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhān /
S04bsu016_u:532_4: ye dharmamegha pibamāna na jātu tṛptāḥ nidhyaptimānasa triyadhvaasaṅgakāyāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:532_5: ākāśadhātuvimalā samacittakāyāḥ janmaṃ tṛtīyamidamapratimaṃ hi teṣām // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:532_7: sarvajñatānayasamudra viśāhamānāḥ teṣāṃ caturthamiha janma nararṣabhāṇām // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:532_8: ye maitrayā daśasu dikṣu jagatspharitvā abhinirharantyamalapāramitāsamudrān /
S04bsu016_u:532_9: paripācayanti jagu dharmaprabhābhiranta imu janmu pañcamu mahāpuruṣāṇa teṣām // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:532_11: ye dharmadhātunayasāgaramotaranti ṣaṣṭhaṃ idaṃ vipula janma vidūna teṣām // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:532_12: ye dharmakāya pariśuddha asaṅgacittāḥ kṣetrāṇyaśeṣatu spharitva svakaiḥ śarīraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:532_16: sarvaṃ samādhinayasāgara otaranti janmāṣṭamaṃ matamidaṃ tathatāśrayāṇām // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:532_18: bauddhā vikurvitaviyūha vidarśayanti teṣāmidaṃ navamu janma mahāśayānām // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:532_19: ye te yathābala jināna tathā praviṣṭāḥ sarvajñatāvipulavegavivardhamānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:533_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra bodhisattvo daśabhirjanmabhistathāgatakule jāta evamālokakaro bhavati sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:533_1: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ahamaprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:533_2_0: āha - ka etasya devate aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? āha
S04bsu016_u:533_3: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya vipulaṃ janmasamudramavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:533_4_0: yaduta asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvajanma avataramāṇā bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe lumbinīvane
S04bsu016_u:534_1: katamāni daśa? yaduta - sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvana samaṃ saṃsthitamapagatanimnonnataviṣamamapagataśvabhraprapātam /
S04bsu016_u:534_7_0: punaḥ sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ divyasamatikrāntagandhāṅkuraprarūḍhaṃ sarvacūrṇakośasaṃbhūtaṃ sarvadhvajameghapaṭalamaṇḍalajātaṃ
S04bsu016_u:534_11: [Gv_291] punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvavṛkṣeṣu mahāmaṇiratnakośā abhinirvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:534_13: punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvanalinīṣu sarvāṇi jalajaratnapuṣpāṇi śuṅgībhūtāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vārisamudgatāni samavāsthiṣanta /
S04bsu016_u:534_15: punaryāvanta iha lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā lokendrajagadindrā vā,
S04bsu016_u:534_16: te 'pyasmin lumbinīvane sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sthitā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:534_18: punaryāvanta iha cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau devakanyā vā nāgakanyā vā yakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragakanyā vā,
S04bsu016_u:534_19: tāḥ sarvāḥ pramuditamānasāḥ sarvapūjāvidhiparigṛhītahastāḥ plakṣaśākhābhimukhāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ sthitā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:534_21: punardaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇā bodhisattvajanmavikurvitapradīpā
S04bsu016_u:534_22: nāma raśmayo niścaritvā sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanamavabhāsya tiṣṭhanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:534_23: teṣu ca sarvaraśmimukhamaṇḍaleṣu teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ janmavikurvitāni pratibhāsaprāptāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:534_24: saṃprasavavikurvitāḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇāśca buddhasvarasaṃprayuktāstebhyo raśmimukhamaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇāḥ śrūyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:534_26: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni bodhisattvajanmakālasamaye pratyupasthite,
S04bsu016_u:534_27: yeṣāṃ prādurbhāvādvitarkamabhavat sarvalokendrāṇāṃ bodhisattvo janiṣyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:534_28: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ daśānāṃ pūrvanimittānāṃ darśanādacintyaṃ prītivegaṃ pratilabhe /
S04bsu016_u:535_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyādevyāḥ kapilavastuno mahānagarānniṣkramantyā iha lumbinīvane daśa mahāvabhāsapūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:535_2: katame daśa? yaduta - dharaṇītalagateṣu sarvaratnakūṭāgāragarbheṣvavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:536_1_0: tatra kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ plakṣadrumanilayagatāyāḥ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarvalokendrāṇāṃ sarvakāmadhātukānāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:536_1_1: sāpsarogaṇadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:536_1_2: saparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ bodhisattvapūjāsaṃprayuktānāṃ māyādevyāstejasā śriyā varṇena rūpeṇa sarvapūjāvyūhāḥ kāyāścāvabhāsitā
S04bsu016_u:536_2: asyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāḥ prabhāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:536_4_0: sarvaromavivaravisṛtāśca māyādevyāḥ prabhāvabhāsāstadanyābhiḥ prabhābhiranupahatā anāvṛtā apravyāhṛtā asaṅgāḥ sarvadiśaḥ
S04bsu016_u:536_4_1: spharitvā sarvāṇi nairayikāṇi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tairyagyonikāni duḥkhāni sarvāṇi ca yāmalaukikāni duḥkhāni sarvabhavagatiparyāpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:536_4_2: ca sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni saṃkleśāṃśca praśamayitvā tiṣṭhanti bhāsante tapanti virocante sma /
S04bsu016_u:536_5: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane prathamaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:537_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yasmin samaye māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣau sarvāvatīyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhāturantargatā pratibhāsaprāptā saṃdṛśyate sma,
S04bsu016_u:537_1_0: tasyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau koṭīśatacāturdvīpikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sarve jambudvīpeṣu nānānāmadheyāsu rājadhānīṣu
S04bsu016_u:537_1_1: nānānāmadheyeṣu vanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāvṛkṣamūleṣu māyādevī upagatā evameva saṃdṛśyate sma sarvalokendraparivṛtā bodhisattvajanmapratyupasthānā
S04bsu016_u:537_2: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane dvitīyaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:538_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromamukhādyāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:538_1: te sarve saṃdṛśyante sma / yaśca taistathāgatairdharmo deśitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:538_2: sa sarvastebhyo romavivarebhyo buddhasvarāṅgasaṃprayukto nikhilena śrūyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:538_3_0: tadyathāpi nāma vārirāśe rajasi kanakaparamāṇurajasi vā ādarśamaṇḍale vā svacche suprasanne vā udake gaganamaṇḍalamādityacandrajyotigrahagaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:538_4: evameva kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhamaṇḍaleṣu pūrvatathāgatavikurvitāni saṃdṛśyante sma sarvadharmadeśanānirghoṣāṇi /
S04bsu016_u:538_5: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane tṛtīyaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:539_0_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvakāyātsarvaromamukhamaṇḍalebhya ekaikasmādromavivarādyāvatsu sarvakṣetreṣu yāvatsu
S04bsu016_u:539_0_1: lokadhātusamudreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣu bhagavān bodhisattvacārikāmakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:539_1_0: yatpratiṣṭhāneṣu kṣetreṣu yatsaṃsthāneṣu yadvyūheṣu yaccharīreṣu yatparvatālaṃkāreṣu yadgrāmanagaranigamajanapadapaṭṭanālaṃkāreṣu
S04bsu016_u:539_1_1: yadudyānanadīhṛdataḍāgasāgarālaṃkāreṣu yadgaganameghālaṃkāreṣu yatsattvanilayeṣu yadyānanirdeśeṣu yatkalpanāmasaṃkhyāsu yadbuddhotpādaprabhaveṣu
S04bsu016_u:539_2: te sarve buddhakṣetraprasarā māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhebhyaḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:539_6: sarveṣu ca teṣu tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu māyādevī bodhisattvasya jananī babhūva /
S04bsu016_u:539_7: sarve ca te bodhisattvakāyā māyāyā devyā romavivareṣu vikurvitapratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:539_8: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane caturthaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:540_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvadbhiḥ kāyairbhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāmacarat yadvarṇairyatsaṃsthānairyadākārairyatparibhogairyatsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedībhiryajjātiparivartaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:540_1: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kāye sarvaromamukheṣu pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:540_2: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:541_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:541_1_0: hastapādaparityāgā vā karṇanāsāparityāgā vā jihvādaṃṣṭrāparityāgā vā nayanottamāṅgaparityāgā vā māṃsaśoṇitaparityāgā vā asthimajjāparityāgā
S04bsu016_u:541_1_1: vā vakṣohṛdayaparityāgā vā chavicarmaparityāgā vā bāhyādhyātmikavastuparityāgā vā putraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgā vā ātmabhāvaparityāgā
S04bsu016_u:541_1_2: vā bhogaratnaparityāgā vā grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparityāgā vā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraparityāgā vā maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataparityāgā
S04bsu016_u:541_1_3: vā vividharatnābharaṇaparityāgā vā śayyāsanaparityāgā vā gṛhavimānaparityāgā vā sarvopabhogaparityāgā vā,
S04bsu016_u:541_2: te ca dāyakabodhisattvavigrahakāyai rūpaiḥ parityajanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:541_3: te ca pratigrāhakāyai rūpaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:541_5: te ca deśapradeśāḥ, te ca bodhisattvaparivārāḥ, sarve te māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:541_6: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya ṣaṣṭhaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:542_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ....................... lumbinīvanaṣaṇḍe samavasṛtā abhijātajagadvijñānā prādurabhavat /
S04bsu016_u:542_1: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya saptamaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:543_1_0: yaduta sarvamaṇirājakūṭāgāraparibhogā vā maṇirājavimānaparibhogā vā maṇirājajālaparibhogā vā maṇirājavigrahaparibhogā vā
S04bsu016_u:543_1_1: maṇirājabimbaparibhogā vā maṇirājavyūhā vā sarvābharaṇaparibhogā vā sarvagandharājaparibhogā vā śubhāpratikūlasarvārambaṇaparibhogā
S04bsu016_u:543_2: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeranyonyāsaṃbhinnā niścaritvā iha lumbinīvane samantavyūhāḥ samavāsthiṣanta /
S04bsu016_u:544_1_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeḥ prathamataraṃ daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
S04bsu016_u:544_1_1: bodhisattvā bhagavato vairocanasya sadṛśarūpavarṇasaṃsthānāḥ sadṛśalakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkārāḥ sadṛśaprabhāḥ sadṛśaraśmipramuñcanāḥ
S04bsu016_u:544_1_2: sadṛśaliṅgalīlāḥ sadṛśavikramāḥ sadṛśavirocanavikurvitāḥ sadṛśaparivārāḥ sadṛśavyūhā niścaranti sma bhagavato varṇasamudrānudīrayamāṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:544_2: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya navamaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:545_0_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pravṛtte māyāyā devyāḥ purastādadho vajratalānmahāpṛthivīmabhinirbhidya
S04bsu016_u:545_2: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśamaṃ janmavikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:546_0: imāni kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśa janmavikurvitāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:546_1: tataḥ paścādbodhisattvo 'cintyāpramāṇaprabhāsecanakadarśano māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhyudgataḥ sūryamaṇḍalamiva gaganatalāt,
S04bsu016_u:546_5: ityevaṃ bodhisattvo māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhiniṣkramaṇaṃ saṃdarśayāmāsa māyāgatarūpavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā anāgatadharmatayā anutpādānirodhalokavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā /
S04bsu016_u:547_0: ityevamahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi iha lumbinīvane viharamāṇā /
S04bsu016_u:547_1: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra syāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:547_2: tathā sarvāvatyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ sarvatra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:547_3: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya koṭīśataṃ janmavikurvitānāmavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:547_4_1: praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:547_5: tadanantareṇa cittena buddhakṣetrasahasraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ekaikatra buddhatatsamānyeva bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:547_6: etena nayena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajontargateṣu [Gv_295] buddhakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvāṇi bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:547_7_0: na ca paryantamupaimi / sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparaṃparāṇāṃ na ca paryantamupaimi sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin
S04bsu016_u:547_9_0: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena sarvākārāṇi sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmyapratiprasrabdhyadhiṣṭhānayogena /
S04bsu016_u:548_0_0: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāmevamāha kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyaṃ devate aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:548_0_1: saṃdarśayamāno bodhisattvajanmavimokṣaḥ? āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetrakoṭīparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:548_0_2: pareṇa parataramīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:548_0_3: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau samāpadyate kalpe 'śītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhave /
S04bsu016_u:548_1: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitravyūhaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_2: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya meruviśuddhavyūhadhvajā nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_3: tasyāṃ khalu rājadhānyāṃ ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_4: rājñaḥ khalu kulaputra ratnārcinetraprabhasya rājñaḥ suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_5: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe māyādevī bhagavato vairocanasya janetrī,
S04bsu016_u:548_6_0: evameva kulaputra tena kālena tena samayena tasyāṃ vicitravyūhaprabhāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe suharṣitaprabheśvarā
S04bsu016_u:548_6_1: nāma tasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_7: yathā teṣāmaśītibuddhakoṭīniyutānāṃ pūrvaṃgamasya prāthamakalpikasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_8: sā khalu kulaputra suharṣitaprabheśvarā devī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye viṃśatyā strīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalaṃ nāma mahodyānaṃ niryayau,
S04bsu016_u:548_9: yatra tamīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajaṃ kumāraṃ janayāmāsa acintyena bodhisattvavikurvitena /
S04bsu016_u:548_10: tena khalu punaḥ samayena suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalasya nāma mahodyānasya madhye śubharatnavicitrakūṭaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_11: tasmin kūṭāgāre sarvakāmaṃdadavṛkṣaśākhāmadhyālambatayā suharṣitaprabheśvarāyā devyāḥ sa bhagavānīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajastathāgato janitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:548_12: tena khalu samayena tasya bhagavato janmakāle vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma dhātrī pratyupasthitābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:548_13_1: tadarhābhiśca acintyāsaṃkhyeyābhiruttamābhiḥ pūjābhirabhipūjya tasyā vimalasaṃbhavaprabhāyā dhātryā aṅke prāyacchan /
S04bsu016_u:548_14: parigṛhītamātre ca tasmin bodhisattve tayā dhātryā ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmaṃse ca,
S04bsu016_u:548_15: tatkṣaṇameva sā dhātrī mahāprītiprāmodyavegapratilabdhā samantacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ pratyalabhata,
S04bsu016_u:548_16: yasya samādheḥ [Gv_296] sahapratilābhāttasmāddaśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātusthitā aprameyāstathāgatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamagaman /
S04bsu016_u:548_18: bodhisattvavimokṣo 'vakrāntaḥ susūkṣmaḥ tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrānte mātuḥ kukṣau garbhavijñānam,
S04bsu016_u:549_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūt? na khalu punastvayā evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:549_1: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:549_2: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tena kālena tena samayena viṃśatistrīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:549_5: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūdīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya kumārasya janetrī? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:549_6: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:549_7: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:549_8: na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam / ayaṃ sa rājā śuddhodanaḥ tena kālena tena samayen ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:549_9_0: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya sarvacittakṣaṇeṣvavirahitā abhūvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarāvataraṇatayā
S04bsu016_u:550_0_0: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya mahāpraṇidhānasamudrasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:550_3: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarānavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:550_4: yathā ca asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaparamāṇurajaḥprasaraparaṃparāvatāreṇa samyaksaṃbuddhabodhisattvajanmābhimukhībhāvagatān buddhaguṇānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:551_0_1: paridīpayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:552_0: buddhaputra śṛṇu mahya bhāṣitaṃ yasmi pṛcchasi janitva gauravam /
S04bsu016_u:552_4: kalpa ādiriva ananta nāyako yatrāśītinayutā jinānabhūt // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:552_6: jānamāna maya draṣṭu nāyakaḥ svarṇapuṣpaprabhave vanottame // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:552_7: nāmato vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā tasya āsi ahu dhātri paṇḍitā /
S04bsu016_u:552_8: lokapāla mama aṃsi taṃ sthapī jātamātra kanakottamaprabham // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:552_9: aṃsi taṃ grahiya agrapudgalaṃ mūrdhnimasya na prabhomi prekṣitum /
S04bsu016_u:552_10: * * * * taṃ acintiyaṃ prekṣamāṇa na ca antu paśyami // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:552_11: lakṣaṇebhi pratimaṇḍitaṃ śubhaṃ kāyamasya vimalaṃ sudarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:552_12: dṛṣṭa me ratanabimbasādṛśaṃ prītivega atulā vivardhitāḥ // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:552_13: cintayitva guṇa tasya me 'mitān puṇyasāgara ameya vardhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:552_14: dṛṣṭva tasya ca vikurvitodadhīn bodhicittavipulaṃ mi saṃbhutam // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:552_20: śrutva dharmamatha tasya tāyino labdhimaṃ varavimokṣamaṇḍalam /
S04bsu016_u:552_22: yeṣu yāntakupapanna nāyakā te aśeṣa mayi sarvi pūjitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:552_23: śāsanaṃ ca maya teṣu dhāritaṃ śodhanā imu vimokṣasāgaram // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:552_26: buddhakṣetri raja yāvato iho tān rajāgraprasarābdhi paśyatī /
S04bsu016_u:552_27: ekameki raji kṣetrasāgarān pūrva śodhita jinena paśyatī // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:552_28: teṣu kṣetraprasareṣu nāyakān jāyato vanavareṣu paśyami /
S04bsu016_u:552_30: paśyami kvaci ca kṣetri nāyakān prārthayanta varabodhimuttamām /
S04bsu016_u:552_37: janma yātuka jināna paśyami prekṣamāṇa raji kṣetrasāgarān /
S04bsu016_u:552_38: janmi janmi bahukāyakoṭibhiḥ pūji teṣa karuṇāmupāgami // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:552_40: teṣu sarvajagadāmukhā ahaṃ dharmamegha vipulān pravarṣami // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:552_42: kalpakoṭinayutairacintiyairyaṃ na śakya ayu sarva darśitum // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:553_1_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvakalpaprasthānagarbhasaṃbhūtacittānāṃ sarvadharmanayanidhyaptijātinidarśakānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:553_1_3: sarvakṣetraprasaravikurvitameghasaṃdarśakānāṃ sarvajagadgatijātikulapratibhāsaprāptānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:554_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva kapilavastuni mahānagare gopā nāma śākyakanyā prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:554_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaritavyam /
S04bsu016_u:555_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:555_0_1: lumbinīvanadevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:557_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikādapakramya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ
S04bsu016_u:557_0_2: vipulīkurvan anutiṣṭhan uttāpayan parijayan paricintayan pravicinvan anupūrveṇa yena dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabho bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu016_u:557_1_0: tasyopasaṃkramaṇasya aśokaśrīrnāma bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā daśabhirgṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pratyudgamya sudhanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:557_3: nacireṇa tvamanuttaratathāgatakāyavākcittālaṃkāraviśuddhiṃ pratilabdho lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapratimaṇḍitena kāyena daśabalajñānālokālaṃkṛtena cittena lokaṃ vicariṣyasi /
S04bsu016_u:557_6: tathā hi tvaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇadarśanaparyupāsanānuśāsanīḥ saṃpratīcchaṃstadguṇapratinayeṣu prayujyamāno na parikhidyase,
S04bsu016_u:557_7: na vinivartase, na paritapasi / na ca te kaścidantarāyo vā āvaraṇaṃ vā nivaraṇaṃ vā prasahate,
S04bsu016_u:557_9: tena acirādeva tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prītikaro bhaviṣyasi /
S04bsu016_u:558_0: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'śokaśriyaṃ bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatāmetadavocat - tathāstu devate yathā vadasi /
S04bsu016_u:558_1: ahaṃ khalu devate sarvasattvakleśasaṃtāpavyupaśamena paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
S04bsu016_u:558_2: sarvasattvaviṣayakarmavipākavinivartanena sarvasattvasukhasaṃbhavena sarvasattvānavadyakarmapratipattyā paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
S04bsu016_u:558_3: yadā ca devate sattvā vividhaviṣayakarmakleśaprayogākṣiptacittā durgatiṣu prapatanti sugatiṣu vā,
S04bsu016_u:558_6: tadyathāpi nāma devate puruṣasyaikāntatṛṣṇācaritasya ekaputrako bhavet priyo manāpaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:558_7: sa tasyāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu cchidyamāneṣu ekāntatṛṣṇācaritatvāt paramadurmanāḥ syādanāttamanaskaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:558_8: evameva devate bodhisattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvān karmakleśavaśena tisṛṣu durgatiṣu patitān dṛṣṭvā durmanā bhavati paramadurmanāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:558_9: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye sattvāḥ kāyavāṅbhanaḥsucaritasamādanahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante,
S04bsu016_u:558_11: paramasukhī tasmin samaye bodhisattvo bhavati sumanā āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ [Gv_301] prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:558_12: na khalu punardevate bodhisattvā ātmārthāya sarvajñatāmabhiprārthayante /
S04bsu016_u:558_13: na vicitrasaṃsāraratisukhaprabhavanārthaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ vividharativyūhaprārthanayā saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśena na saṃyojanabandhanānuśayaparyavasthānavaśagatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:558_17: api tu khalu punardevate bodhisattvā bhavasamudragatānāmaparimitaduḥkhaprapīḍitānāṃ sattvānāmantike mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayitvā sarvajagatsaṃgrahamahāpraṇidhimabhinirharanti /
S04bsu016_u:558_18: te mahākaruṇāpraṇidhyabhinirhārabalavegena sattvaparipākavinayaprayuktāḥ saṃsāre bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:558_21: te bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃkliṣṭāni kṣetrāṇi saṃpaśyantaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanapraṇidhimabhinirharanti
S04bsu016_u:558_25: vikalāyatanānapariśuddhacetasaḥ sarvān saṃpaśyamānāḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni pariśodhayamānā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto na parikhidyante /
S04bsu016_u:558_26: evaṃ hi devate bodhisattvā anantamadhyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'parikhinnacittāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:558_27: evaṃ caranto 'laṃkārabhūtā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya devamanuṣyasaṃpattisaṃjananatayā /
S04bsu016_u:558_49: evaṃ khalu devate pratipadyamānā bodhisattvāḥ priyā bhavanti sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu016_u:559_0_0: atha khalu aśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sārdhaṃ tairdaśabhiḥ gṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ divyasamatikrāntaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:560_9: na niśrayaste loke 'sminna niketo na saṃstavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:561_0: atha khalvaśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubadhnāti sma dharmakāmatayā /
S04bsu016_u:561_1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabhabodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādamupasaṃkramya anupraviśya samantādanuvilokayāmāsa gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:561_2_0: so 'paśyadgopāṃ śākyakanyāṃ dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabhasya bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādasya madhye sarvabodhisattvasya gṛhāvasanapratibhāsamaṇipadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:561_2_1: strīṇāṃ caturaśītyā sahasraiḥ parivṛtāṃ sarvāsāṃ pārthivakulasaṃbhavānāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāsabhāgakuśalamūlānāṃ pūrvadānasaṃgrahasaṃgṛhītānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:561_3_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇyavaivartikānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhisattvapāramitānayāvatīrṇāni sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāsu
S04bsu016_u:562_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena gopā śākyakanyā tenopasaṃkramya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ kramatalayoḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya
S04bsu016_u:562_0_1: utthāya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:562_1: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
S04bsu016_u:563_0: evamukte gopā śākyakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:563_1: yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpāṃ caryāṃ dharmatāṃ paripraṣṭavyāṃ manyase,
S04bsu016_u:563_3: tena hi kulaputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S04bsu016_u:563_4: bhāṣiṣye buddhānubhāvena / daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
S04bsu016_u:563_5_0: katamairdaśabhiḥ? yaduta udārakalyāṇamitrasaṃniśrayeṇa vipulādhimuktipratilābhena udārakalyāṇāśayaviśuddhyā vipulapuṇyajñānasamudropastabdhacittatayā
S04bsu016_u:563_6: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
S04bsu016_u:564_0: tatra kulaputra avivartyavīryā bodhisattvā etān dharmān pratilabhya akṣayākārābhinirhāreṇa bhāvayanto bahulīkurvantaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇyārāgya daśabhirākārairabhirādhayanti /
S04bsu016_u:564_1_0: katamairdaśabhiḥ? yaduta kāyajīvitānapekṣatayā saṃsāropakaraṇānarthikatayā sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatānugamena sarvajñatāpraṇidhānāvivartyatayā
S04bsu016_u:565_0: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etamevārthanayaṃ saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:566_2: adhimukti yeṣa vipulā gaganaprakāśā yasyāṃ samosarati sarvatriyadhvalokaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:566_3: kṣetrāśca sattva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhāsteṣāmiyaṃ cariya jñānaprabhaṃkarāṇām // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:566_4: yeṣāśayo gaganakalpa anantamadhyaḥ saṃkleśanirmalatayā paramaṃ viśuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:566_7: te puṇyasāgaraśarīraviśuddhagarbhā loke caranti na ca lokamalena liptāḥ // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:566_8: sarvasvarāṅgarutaghoṣanayairjinānāṃ ye dharmagarjita śṛṇonta na yāni tṛptim /
S04bsu016_u:566_10: ye te daśaddiśi tathāgata aprameyān sarvatra cittakṣaṇi otari anyamanyān /
S04bsu016_u:566_12: paśyanti ye pariṣado vipulā jinānāṃ teṣāṃ samādhinayasāgaramotaranti /
S04bsu016_u:566_17: ye te mahākaruṇamaṇḍalajñānasūryā dṛṣṭvā jagadvyasanaprāptamudenti dhīrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:566_18: dharmābhayā jagati moha vidhūya teṣāmiyaṃ cari divākarasādṛśānām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:566_19: dṛṣṭvā prajāṃ bhavagatau parivartamānāṃ saṃsārasrotapravilomasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:566_21: te 'tra śikṣita nayehi anantamadhyān kāyān yathāśaya jagatyupadarśayitvā /
S04bsu016_u:566_22: pratibhāsabimbasadṛśairapi taiḥ svakāyaiḥ paripācayanti janatāṃ bhavasāgareṣu // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:566_23: maitrīnayaiḥ suvipulairjanatāṃ spharitvā nānādhimuktiṣu janeṣu cariṃ vidarśya /
S04bsu016_u:566_24: dharmaṃ yathāśaya jagatyabhivarṣamāṇā bodhāya sattvanayutān vinayanti dhīrāḥ // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:567_0_0: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ khalu kulaputra sarvabodhisattvasamādhisāgaranayavyavalokanaviṣayasya
S04bsu016_u:567_1_0: sudhana āha - ka etasya ārye sarvabodhisattvasamādhisāgaranayavyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? āha - etamahaṃ
S04bsu016_u:567_3: tān prajānāmi / yāvanti ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cyutyupapattimukhāni,
S04bsu016_u:567_6: tā api prajānāmi / kuśalamapyeṣāṃ karmasamādānaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:567_7_0: akuśalamapi nairyāṇikamapi anairyāṇikamapi niyatamapi aniyatamapi mithyātvaniyatamapi sānuśayamapi niranuśayamapi kuśalamūlasaṃpannamapi
S04bsu016_u:568_0: teṣu ca anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye buddhā bhagavantaṃ utpannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:568_2: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_9: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sattvaparipākavinayasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_13: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktīrapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_14: teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye śrāvakāsteṣāṃ niryāṇanayamapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_18: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāstānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_19: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_20: ye ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyekabodhyadhigamāstānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_21: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śāntavihāravikurvitavimokṣamukhāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_22: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vividhavikurvitāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_25: tāmapi prajānāmi / yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāmanantasamādhivihāravividhavimokṣakrīḍitāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_26: yacca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ tadapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_27: ye ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāstānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:568_52: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ nānāsamādhisamudrapratilābhānapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:569_0: yathā ca ahaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ lokadhātau atītavartamānān kalpasamudrān nānāvidhānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:569_14: yathā cāsya samantadikprabhāsavairocanasya lokadhātuvaṃśasya daśadigānantaryaparaṃparāvasthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:569_15: evamiha sarvāvati kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāreṣu lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudrāntargateṣu lokadhātuprasareṣu prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:569_16_0: evaṃ lokadhātunayeṣu lokadhātucakreṣu lokadhātumaṇḍaleṣu lokadhātuvibhāgeṣu lokadhātunadīṣu lokadhātvāvarteṣu lokadhātuparivarteṣu
S04bsu016_u:569_16_1: lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudgateṣu lokadhātupadmeṣu lokadhātuvṛkṣeṣu lokadhātukhārakeṣu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣvapi prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:570_0: yathā ca asmin kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:570_1: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:570_33: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:571_0: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi,
S04bsu016_u:571_1: evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:571_3: tatkasya heto? eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:572_1_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyamārye bodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayo
S04bsu016_u:572_1_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ? āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā
S04bsu016_u:572_2: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:572_3: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:572_4: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:572_7: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta,
S04bsu016_u:572_8: pibata, khādata, dharmaṃ carata, bodhicittamutpādayata, avinivartanīyabhūmivaśitāmadhigacchata /
S04bsu016_u:573_0: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_3_0: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ prāsādikānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:573_4: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:573_9: samaṃ nikṣipati, nikṣipaṃśca sarvāvatpādatalābhyāṃ samaṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃspṛśati /
S04bsu016_u:573_10: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
S04bsu016_u:573_13: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī,
S04bsu016_u:573_18: samuddharati sma / mṛdūni cāsya [Gv_310] hastapādatalānyabhūvan kācilindikātirekasukhasaṃsparśāni /
S04bsu016_u:573_19: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:573_22: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_26: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau,
S04bsu016_u:573_31: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
S04bsu016_u:573_34: khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro maṇiphalakavisṛṣṭātirekadyutigātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_40: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_42: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:573_43: tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_47: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
S04bsu016_u:573_49: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:573_50: yairasyāhāraṃ paribhuñjānasya nābhūtsaṅgo vā parisaṅgoparudvaṅgo(?) vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:573_51_0: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto
S04bsu016_u:573_52: suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ susaṃsthitavicitradaṃṣṭraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_54: [Gv_311] prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā laghuparivartinī mukhamaṇḍalasaṃchādanī tathyapathyārthavyañjanapadaniruktyadhiṣṭhānasaṃprayuktā /
S04bsu016_u:573_58: sarvaṃ ca anuravati / abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro
S04bsu016_u:573_60: gopakṣmo sa kumāro 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_61: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā /
S04bsu016_u:573_62_0: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ koṭīśatasahasrapatraratnapadmasaṃdarśitaṃ
S04bsu016_u:573_64: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
S04bsu016_u:573_67: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu016_u:573_68: ūrdhvāṅgaromā ca sa kumāro 'bhūdavinivartanīyaromā apratyudāvartanīyaromā asaṃsṛṣṭaromā /
S04bsu016_u:573_70_0: sa kumāro 'bhūt / tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ
S04bsu016_u:573_71: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:573_73: pṛṣṭhato 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi atṛptikaramanāpacārudarśano 'bhut /
S04bsu016_u:573_74_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt sarvasattvāpratikūladarśanaḥ
S04bsu016_u:574_0: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam,
S04bsu016_u:574_1_0: tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena naranārīgaṇaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:574_2_0: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato 'pagataśarkarakaṭhallotsado jātarūparajatasarvaratnarājadhātusaṃcitabhūmitalapratiṣṭhānaḥ
S04bsu016_u:575_0: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham /
S04bsu016_u:575_7_0: keṣucidvyomakeṣu vividhojjvalavicitraraṅgaraktāni nānācitrabhaktivinyāsavirājitāni paramamahārhāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sukumārakāntavarṇāni
S04bsu016_u:575_8: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:575_9: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:575_10_0: keṣucidvyomakeṣu nāryo 'bhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ sarvābharaṇasvalaṃkṛtā
S04bsu016_u:576_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā /
S04bsu016_u:576_1_0: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā
S04bsu016_u:576_1_1: nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā
S04bsu016_u:576_1_2: dakṣā analasā sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā
S04bsu016_u:576_2_0: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ
S04bsu016_u:576_2_1: tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvraṃ rāgacittamutpādayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:576_3_0: sā tejodhipate rājakumārasyāntike 'dhimātraṃ saṃjātasnehānubaddhā asvatantracittā mātaraṃ sudarśanāmetadavocat - yatkhalu
S04bsu016_u:576_3_1: amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
S04bsu016_u:576_10: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:576_12: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:577_0_0: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:577_2: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:577_3: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:577_4_0: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato dharmameghodgataprabhāse
S04bsu016_u:577_6_0: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā rātridevatā aruṇodgatadevatā vanadevatā
S04bsu016_u:577_6_1: vṛkṣadevatā auṣadhidevatāḥ sasyadevatā nagaradevatāḥ padagāminīdevatā bodhimaṇḍadevatāḥ śarīraraśmidevatāḥ sattvanikāyadevatā
S04bsu016_u:577_6_2: gaganadevatā sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti /
S04bsu016_u:578_0: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:579_0: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:579_3: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:579_4: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:579_5: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
S04bsu016_u:579_6: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:579_7: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
S04bsu016_u:579_8: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
