S04bsu016_u:595_5: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistejodhipatiṃ kumārametadavocat - kena te kumāra ayamarthaṃ ārocito devena vā manuṣyeṇa vā? sa prāha - sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyā dārikayeti /
S04bsu016_u:596_0_0: atha khalu rājā dhanapatirbuddhotpādaśravaṇena mahānidhānapratilābhasaṃjñī sudurlabhabuddharatnaparilābhasaṃjñī tathāgatadarśane
S04bsu016_u:596_1: sa taṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasrairyena bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:596_2: upetya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ purastānnyaṣīdat sārdhaṃ svakena parivāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:597_0_0: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgato dhanapatiṃ rājānaṃ sarvāvacca parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya tasyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:597_1_0: sā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya sarvalokendrānabhimukhaṃ parisaṃsthāpya acintyāni buddhavikurvitāni [Gv_328] saṃdarśya
S04bsu016_u:597_1_1: buddhavainayikānāṃ sattvānāmāśayān viśodhya tasyāṃ velāyāmacintyena buddhādhipateyena sarvalokābhyudgatena buddhakāyena sarvasvarāṅgasāgarasaṃprayuktena
S04bsu016_u:597_2: atha rājño dhanapatestaddhāraṇīmukhaṃ śrutvā sarvadharmeṣu mahān dharmāvabhāsaḥ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:597_3: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:597_5: daśānāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
S04bsu016_u:598_0: rājñaśca dhanapatermahādharmāvabhāsapratilabdhasya etadabhavat - na śakyamagāramadhyāvasatā imā evaṃrūpā dharmā adhimoktum,
S04bsu016_u:598_3: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
S04bsu016_u:599_0: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasyāntike prāvrajat sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:599_1: tena acireṇa pravrajitena sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpaṃ dhāraṇīmukhaṃ saparivāraṃ niṣpāditaṃ bhāvitam,
S04bsu016_u:599_5: asaṅgagocarā ca nāma kāyapariśuddhiḥ daśadiktathāgatopasaṃkramaṇeṣu pratilabdhā /
S04bsu016_u:599_6: sa tasya bhagavato dharmacakraṃ pratīcchitavān saṃdhāritavān,
S04bsu016_u:599_9_0: śāsanaparigrahaṃ cākārṣīt / abhijñāpratilābhabalena ca sarvāvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāyaṃ saṃdarśya
S04bsu016_u:599_9_1: etaṃ buddhotpādaṃ prabhāvayan tāṃ sarvatathāgatasamudayadharmatāmabhidyotayan tāṃ pūrvayogasaṃpadaṃ saṃprakāśayan taṃ buddhavikurvitaprabhāvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:600_0: tejodhipatinā ca rājaputreṇa tatraiva divase pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ sapta ratnāni pratilabdhāni /
S04bsu016_u:600_1_0: tasyopariprāsādatalagatasya strīgaṇaparivṛtasya purastādapratihatavegaṃ nāma śatasahasrāraṃ sarvaratnasamalaṃkṛtaṃ divyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:600_5: sā ca sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrī dārikā strīratnaṃ prādurabhavat /
S04bsu016_u:600_7: vimalanetraṃ ca nāma pariṇāyakaratnaṃ saptamaṃ prādurabhavat /
S04bsu016_u:600_8: sa saptaratnasamanvāgato rājābhavaccakravartī caturdvīpeśvaro dhārmiko dharmarājo vijitāvī janapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:600_9: pūrṇaṃ khalu punarasya sahasraṃ putrāṇāmabhūcchūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu016_u:600_10_0: sa [Gv_329] imāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ sasāgaragiriparyantāmakhilāmakaṇṭakāmanītikāmanupadravāmṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ kṣemāṃ subhikṣāṃ ramaṇīyāmākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:601_0_0: sa tasmin jambudvīpe caturaśītirājadhānīsahasreṣu ekaikasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pañca vihāraśatāni kārayāmāsa sarvākāravaropetāni
S04bsu016_u:601_2: sarvāsu ca tāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ bhagavantaṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ saparivāramupanimantrayāmāsa nagarapraveśāya /
S04bsu016_u:601_3: sarvāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ tathāgataṃ sarvākārayā acintyayā tathāgatapūjayā pūjayan praveśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:601_4: sa buddhanagarapraveśaprātihāryavikurvitena apramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayamāsa /
S04bsu016_u:601_19_0: ityevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpārthasiddhiṃ saṃpraveśya tejodhipatī rājā sarvāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ
S04bsu016_u:601_19_1: praveśayāmāsa acintyena buddhavikurvitaprātihāryasaṃdarśanena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ paripākavinayāya /
S04bsu016_u:602_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt? na khalu punastvayaivaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:602_1: ayaṃ sa bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt,
S04bsu016_u:602_3: sa ca sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:602_4: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya pitā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:602_5: ratnakusumaprabho nāma tathāgatastena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:602_6_0: ya etarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātau sāgaraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ pareṇa dharmadhātugaganapratibhāsameghanāmni
S04bsu016_u:602_7: tena ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvadharmadhātugaganapratibhāsamegho lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:602_8: yāvantaśca tasmin lokadhātusamudre tathāgatā utpannāśca utpadyante ca utpatsyante ca,
S04bsu016_u:602_9: te sarve ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāścaratā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:603_0_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya
S04bsu016_u:603_0_1: mātā caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhānām? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:603_1_0: eṣā sā kulaputra māyādevī bhagavato mātā bodhisattvajananī samantāvabhāsānāvaraṇavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā asaṃkhyeyasarvatathāgatasamudrāgamapratyakṣā
S04bsu016_u:603_1_1: sarvabodhisattvajanmasaṃdarśanavidhijñā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājño dhanateragramahiṣyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:603_2: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikā abhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:603_3: eṣā sā sunetrā nāma daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya bhāryā mama mātā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:603_4: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma gaṇikādārikābhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:603_5: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrgaṇikādārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:603_6: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipate rājñaḥ parivāro 'bhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:603_7_0: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaparipūryāṃ bhagavatā pratiṣṭhāpitā asminneva parṣanmaṇḍale
S04bsu016_u:603_8: sa khalu kulaputra sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastejodhipatinā cakravartinā ca mayā ca yāvajjīvamupasthito 'bhūt cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:604_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ tasyāmeva lokadhātau prasannagātro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:604_2: tasyānantaraṃ sarvagātrajñānapratibhāsacandro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:604_48: nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ / tasyānantaraṃ dharmodgatanabheśvaro nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:604_53: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyutpannāni [Gv_332] abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:605_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra ṣaṣṭerbuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvapaścimo vipuladharmādhimuktisaṃbhavatejo nāma tathāgata utpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:605_1_0: tasya bhagavato nagare praviṣṭasya mayā rājabhāryābhūtayā sārdhaṃ svāminā sarvākārapūjāmukhaṃ prayuktayā tathāgatapūjayā
S04bsu016_u:605_1_1: pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvatathāgatotpattisaṃbhavapradīpo nāma tathāgatadharmaparyāyastasya bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:606_0: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānāgatān bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇā /
S04bsu016_u:606_1: teṣu ca me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu anantamadhyāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:606_6: na ca me jātu bodhisattvasya kāyo jñātaḥ - kiṃpramāṇaḥ kīdṛksaṃsthānaḥ kīdṛgvarṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:606_7: na kāyakarma jñātaṃ na vākkarma na manaskarma jñātaṃ na jñānadarśanaṃ na jñānagocaraṃ na jñānasamādhiviṣayo jñātaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:606_8: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasyāntike 'nunayacittamutpādayāmāsuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:606_10: sarve te bodhisattvena laukikalokottarairvividhairupāyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya parivārā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:606_11: te bodhisattvasya bodhisattvacaryāṃ carataḥ parivārasaṃvāse na avaivartikā bhavanti sma anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:607_0_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhya bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānāgatā etaṃ vimokṣaṃ saṃbhāvayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:607_1: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu tathāgatā utpannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:607_2: sarve te mayā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ pūjitā upasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:607_3: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā śrutā,
S04bsu016_u:607_4_0: śrutvā udgṛhītā saṃdhāritā / sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādeṣa vimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānānayairvā nānāsūtrāntanayanirghoṣairnānāvimokṣaśarīrairnānāvimokṣadvārairnānāvimokṣavicārairnānādhvajapraveśaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:607_6_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśatalapraveśāpramāṇā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ sarvasattvasaṃjñāgatatalāpramāṇāḥ
S04bsu016_u:607_7: tathāgataviṣayasamaśarīrā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:608_0: sā ahaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetraparmāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvaśarīraṃ prekṣamāṇā atṛptaiva darśanena /
S04bsu016_u:608_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ekāntarāgacaritayoḥ strīpuruṣayoranyonyasamāgame saṃketakṛtayorapramāṇā ayoniśomanasikāraprabhavāḥ
S04bsu016_u:608_2_0: evameva kulaputra mama bodhisattvasya śarīraṃ prekṣamāṇāyā ekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyāpramāṇanirdeśā lokadhātuvaṃśaprasarā
S04bsu016_u:608_2_1: nānāpratiṣṭhānā nānāsaṃdhivyūhā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāparvatavyūhā nānāpṛthivītalavyūhanirdeśā nānāgaganameghasaṃchannālaṃkārā
S04bsu016_u:608_4: nānābodhimaṇḍālaṃkārā nānādharmacakrapravartanavikurvitā nānāsūtrāntanirghoṣavikurvitāḥ apratisrabdhayogena praticittakṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:609_0_0: sā ahaṃ kulaputra teṣu buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu bodhisattvasya ekaikasmādromavivarātpraticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyān
S04bsu016_u:609_2: na pratilabdhapūrvaṃ pratilabhe yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatasyāpyahaṃ kulaputra sarvārthasiddhasya strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvimokṣanayasāgarāvatāraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:611_0: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle vividharatnavyūhamahāmaṇirājapadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvajanetrī māyā nāma devī /
S04bsu016_u:611_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'nupaliptā bhavanti sarvalokadharmamalaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:612_0: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etameva vimokṣamukhanayaṃ saṃdarśayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:613_1: prasannacittāḥ pratighātino vā vrajanti te saṃgrahamasya sarve // 90 //
S04bsu016_u:613_2: yāvanti hi kṣetraśate rajāṃsi smarāmi kalpāniha tāvato 'ham /
S04bsu016_u:613_9: śūrāṇi vīrāṇyatha rūpavanti pañcābhavan putraśatāni tasya /
S04bsu016_u:613_11: rājā saputraḥ sugate prasannaḥ pūjāmakārṣīdvipulāṃ jinasya /
S04bsu016_u:613_15: rājyaṃ parityajya nṛṇāṃ sa pañcakoṭīvṛtaḥ pravrajitastadānīm /
S04bsu016_u:613_16: sa pravrajitvā dṛḍhavīryayuktaḥ saṃdhārayāmāsa jinasya dharmam // 97 //
S04bsu016_u:613_21: piṇḍāya dhīmān sa puraṃ viveśa prāsādikeryāpathaśāntaveṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:613_24: tasyāhamāsaṃ duhitā manāpā bhānuprabhā nāma sucārurūpā // 101 //
S04bsu016_u:613_28: yadā gṛhadvāragato mamābhūt pātre pradatto 'sya maṇistadā me /
S04bsu016_u:613_31: ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni nāgāṃ kalpottamāyāṃ khalu jātvapāyān // 104 //
S04bsu016_u:613_32: deveṣu devendrakuleṣu jātā narendraputrī manujeṣu cāham /
S04bsu016_u:613_37: ātmānamasyaiva nivedayitvā bhūtāsmi vaśyā khalu tasya bhāryā // 107 //
S04bsu016_u:613_38: saṃpūjitastena mayā sahābhūt sa sūryagātrapravaro maharṣiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:613_39: prasannayā caiva tamīkṣya buddhamutpāditaṃ me varabodhicittam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:613_40: pūrṇā jinānāṃ khalu ṣaṣṭikoṭyastatraiva kalpe susamutthitānām /
S04bsu016_u:613_48: dṛṣṭvā manasteṣu na sajjate me kliṣṭeṣu naiva pratihanyate ca // 112 //
S04bsu016_u:613_49: kṣetreṣu teṣveva ca bodhimaṇḍe paśyāmi buddhān nikhileṣvaśeṣān /
S04bsu016_u:613_53: caryāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāṃ dharemi bhūmīnayāṃścāvatarāmyaśeṣān /
S04bsu016_u:613_55: saṃprekṣatī satpuruṣasya kāyaṃ kalpānanantāṃścaratī ca caryām /
S04bsu016_u:613_63: dharmābhidhānairjanatāṃ vinītāṃ teṣveva paśyāmi jinān prayuktān // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:613_64: na kāyakarmāsya mayāvabuddhaṃ na vāgna cittaṃ na tayośca karma /
S04bsu016_u:613_65: ṛddhirna naivāsya pṛthagvikurvā kalpāṃścarantyā vipulāṃ sucaryām // 120 //
S04bsu016_u:614_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya gopāṃ śākyakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:614_0_1: punaḥ punaravalokya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā antikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:616_0_0: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya māyāyā devyāḥ sakāśaṃ gamanābhimukhasya buddhagocaravicārajñānapratipannasya etadabhavat
S04bsu016_u:616_3_2: darśanamārāgayituṃ saṃmukhībhāvatāmanuprāptuṃ samavadhānaṃ cāptuṃ nimittaṃ codgrahītuṃ ghoṣamaṇḍalaṃ vā vijñātuṃ mantravyavacārān
S04bsu016_u:617_0_0: tamevaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktaṃ ratnanetrā nāma nagaradevatā gaganadevatāgaṇaparivṛtā gaganatalagatamātmānamupadarśya nānāvibhūṣaṇavibhūṣitaśarīrā
S04bsu016_u:617_30: evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhyabhiyuktena te kulaputra bodhisattvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalasamārjanamanuprāptum /
S04bsu016_u:617_31_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvasya evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhasya sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante buddhadarśanāvaraṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:617_31_1: vā dharmaśravaṇāvaraṇaṃ vā tathāgatapūjopasthānāvaraṇaṃ vā sattvasaṃgrahaprayogāvaraṇaṃ vā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyāvaraṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:617_32: sarvāvaraṇavigatena hi kulaputra cittādhyāśayena kalyāṇamitraparyeṣṭyabhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya alpakṛcchreṇa kalyāṇamitrāṇyābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:618_0_0: tatra dharmapadmaśrīkuśalā śarīrakāyikadevatā hrīśrīmañjariprabhāvā aparimāṇadevatāgaṇaparivṛtā māyāyā devyā varṇamudīrayamāṇā
S04bsu016_u:618_0_1: bodhimaṇḍānniṣkramya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyābhimukhaṃ gaganatale sthitvā svakasvakebhyo 'nekaratnavarṇāni raśmijālāni
S04bsu016_u:618_1_0: tāni vipulāni kṣetrāṇyavabhāsya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya sarvatrānugataṃ samantābhimukhaṃ sarvatathāgatakāyaṃ saṃdarśayitvā
S04bsu016_u:618_1_1: sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhasaṃdhau nipatanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:618_4: atha tāvadeva virajaḥprabhāsaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe,
S04bsu016_u:618_27_0: atha khalu sunetro nāma rākṣasendro bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadvārapālo daśānāṃ rākṣasasahasrāṇāṃ pramukhaḥ sabhāryaḥ saputraḥ
S04bsu016_u:618_27_1: sasvajanaparivāraḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ nānāvarṇamanojñagandhaiḥ kusumairabhyavakīrya evamāha - daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:618_38: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva āsanno bhavati sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:618_39: daśabhiśca samādhinidhyaptimukhairvyavalokayan bodhisattvaḥ saṃmukhībhāvaṃ pratilabhate sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:619_0: evamukte sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gaganatalamavalokya evamāha - sādhu sādhu ārya,
S04bsu016_u:619_2_0: tatsādhvamasmākaṃ samyagupāyamukhamupadiśan kathaṃ parikramāti? katamāṃ diśamabhimukhaṃ nirjavāmi? kasminnadhiṣṭhāne parimārgayāmi?
S04bsu016_u:619_2_1: katamadārambaṇamupanidhyāyāmi kalyāṇamitradarśanāya? āha - tena hi kulaputra samantadikpraṇipatitena śarīreṇa sarvārambaṇena
S04bsu016_u:619_2_2: kalyāṇamitrasmṛtyupanibaddhenāśayena samantanirjavena samādhyanugamena svapnopamena cittajavena pratibhāsopamena manaḥśarīravicāragamanena
S04bsu016_u:620_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yathānuśiṣṭaḥ sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa pratipadyamāno 'drākṣītpurato dharaṇitalānmahāratnapadmasamudgataṃ
S04bsu016_u:620_1_0: tasyāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmakarkaṭikāyāṃ dharmadhātudiksamavasaraṇagarbhaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramapaśyaccitraṃ darśanīyaṃ vajravairocanadharaṇitalasaṃsthānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:621_35: adhiṣṭhānena rūpeṇa, saṃsārāvinivṛttiparameṇa viśuddhena rūpeṇa tathatāsamanirvikalpena /
S04bsu016_u:621_36: ityevaṃprakāreṇa rūpeṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmadrākṣīdarūpeṇa rūpapratibhāsena avedanena rūpeṇa lokaduḥkhavedanāpraśāntiparameṇa,
S04bsu016_u:621_41_0: saṃsāre saṃtāpaniruddhena rūpeṇa dharmakāyaparamaśītībhāvopagatena yathāśayajagadrūpakāyasaṃdarśanīṃ sattvāśayavaśena sarvajagatsadṛśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:622_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrūpasaṃjñāpagataḥ parasattvāśayānavataran sarvasattvacittāśayagateṣu māyādevīmapaśyat
S04bsu016_u:622_2: māyādevīmapaśyat / sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yatpramāṇā māyādevī tatpramāṇaṃ svakāyamadhiṣṭhāya samantadigabhimukhāṃ māyādevīṃ sarvatrānugatena kāyena praṇipatitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:622_4_0: sa tāni samādhimukhāni vyavalokya animittīkṛtvā prabhāvayitvā sārīkṛtvā anusmṛtya spharitvā prasaritvā avalokayitvā vipulīkṛtvā
S04bsu016_u:622_4_1: abhinirhṛtya mudrayitvā tebhyaḥ samādhimukhebhyo vyutthāya [Gv_345] māyādevīṃ saparivārāṃ sabhavanāsanāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:622_4_2: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanena
S04bsu016_u:622_6: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ pariniṣpanno bhavati sarvajñatāyām /
S04bsu016_u:622_7: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:622_8_0: sāhaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā yāvanti iha lokadhātusamudre bhagavato vairocanasya sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvajambudvīpeṣu
S04bsu016_u:622_9: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ caramabhavikānāṃ bodhisattvānāmahaṃ jananī /
S04bsu016_u:622_10: sarve te bodhisattvā mama kukṣau saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:622_12_0: ihaiva tāvadahaṃ kulaputra bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya kulabaddhakalpena siddhārthaṃ
S04bsu016_u:623_0: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tadā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhagatā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:623_1_2: lokadhātumavabhāsya mama śarīre nipatya mūrdhānamupādāya sarvaromakūpeṣvanuprāviśan /
S04bsu016_u:623_3: atha tāvadeva mama kāye bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalābhivijñaptāḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitanayavyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma antargatena parivāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:623_5: atha tāvadeva yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalāni vijñaptāni janmanayavikurvitāni pravartante,
S04bsu016_u:623_7: yaduta bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatā buddhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalaparivṛtā lokendrābhipūjitā dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:623_8: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhistathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:623_11: yāni ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nirmāṇamaṇḍalāni praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti,
S04bsu016_u:623_13: tasyā mama kulaputra kāye tābhirbodhisattvaraśmibhiranupraviṣṭābhiḥ sarvajagadabhyudgataḥ kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S04bsu016_u:623_16: te sarve mama kāye 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ sarve saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:624_2_6: tuṣitabhavanāccyutvā sārdhaṃ saparivāreṇa mama kukṣau prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:625_0: te sarve mama kukṣau trisāhasralokadhātuvipulena yāvadanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuvipulena ākramavikrameṇa anuvicaranti sma /
S04bsu016_u:625_1_0: sarvāṇi ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni praticittakṣaṇamanabhilāpyāni
S04bsu016_u:625_1_1: mama kukṣau samavasaranti sma bodhisattvagarbhāvāsavikurvitaṃ draṣṭum /
S04bsu016_u:625_2_1: sma darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya sāṃkathyānubhāvanāya /
S04bsu016_u:625_3: na cāyaṃ mama kukṣistāvanti parṣanmaṇḍalāni pratīcchan vipulībhavati /
S04bsu016_u:625_4: na cāsmānmanuṣyāśrayādayaṃ mama kāyo viśiṣṭataraḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
S04bsu016_u:625_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tadasyaiva mahāpraṇidhānamāyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya subhāṣitatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:626_0: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe bodhisattvaṃ kukṣiṇā saṃpratīcchāmi,
S04bsu016_u:626_1: evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikājambudvīpeṣu saṃpratīcchāmi anena ca vikurvitavyūhena /
S04bsu016_u:626_2: na cāyaṃ mama kāyo dvayībhavati nādvayībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:626_4: yathāpi nāma tadasyaiva mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya subhāṣitatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:626_5: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asya bhagavato vairocanasya mātā abhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:626_7: yatra bodhisattvo loka upapāduka upāpadyata padmagarbhe,
S04bsu016_u:626_10: yatrotsaṅge prādurbabhūva, tatrāhamasya jananyabhūvam / yatra buddhakṣetre prādurbhavati,
S04bsu016_u:626_12: iti hi kulaputra yāvadbhirupāyamukhaiścaramabhavikā bodhisattvā loka upapattiṃ saṃdarśayanti,
S04bsu016_u:627_0: yathā ahaṃ kulaputra iha lokadhātau asya bhagavataḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśaneṣu janetryabhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:627_3: tathā sarveṣāṃ bhadrakalpikānāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ janetrī bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:627_4_0: tadyathā maitreyasya bodhisattvasya tuṣitabhavanagatasya cyutisaṃdarśanakāle pravṛtte sarvabodhisattvopapattisaṃbhavagarbhasaṃvāsavikurvitasaṃdarśanaprabhāsāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:627_4_1: raśmyāmutsṛṣṭāyāṃ prabhāsiteṣu sarvadharmadhātunayataleṣu yāvanti mama dharmadhātunayatalāni cakṣuṣo 'vabhāsamāgamiṣyanti,
S04bsu016_u:627_5: yeṣu maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena manuṣyaloke manuṣyendrakuleṣu janmopapattisaṃdarśanena sattvā vinayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:627_9_0: tathā pradyotasya ketoḥ sunetrasya kusumasya kusumaśriyaḥ tiṣyasya puṣyasya sumanaso vajrasya virajasaḥ candrolkādhāriṇo
S04bsu016_u:627_9_1: yaśaso vajraśuddhasya ekārthadarśino sitāṅgasya pāraṃgatasya ratnārciḥparvatasya maholkādhāriṇaḥ padmottarasya vighuṣṭaśabdasya
S04bsu016_u:627_9_2: aparimitaguṇadharmasya dīpaśriyo vibhūṣitāṅgasya suprayāṇasya maitraśriyo nirmitasyāniketasya jvalitatejaso 'nantaghoṣasya
S04bsu016_u:627_9_3: aninemasya aninetrasya vimativikiraṇasya pariśuddhasya suviśālābhasya yaśaḥśuddhoditasya meghaśriyo vicitrabhūtasya sarvaratnavicitravarṇamaṇikuṇḍalasya
S04bsu016_u:627_9_4: sāgaramateḥ śubharatnasya anihatamallasya paripūrṇamanorathasya maheśvarasya indraśriyo 'gniśriyaḥ candanameghasya sitaviśālākṣasya
S04bsu016_u:627_9_6: vajrajñānaparvatasya śrīgarbhasya kanakajālakāyavibhūṣitasya suvibhaktasya īśvaradevasya mahendradevasya anilaśriyo viśuddhanandino
S04bsu016_u:627_9_7: 'rciṣmato varuṇaśriyo viśuddhamateragrayānasya nihitaguṇoditasya ariguptasya vākyanudasya vaśībhūtasya guṇatejasya vairocanaketorvibhavagandhasya
S04bsu016_u:627_9_8: vibhāvanagandhasya vibhaktāṅgasya suviśākhasya sarvagandhārcimukhasya vajramaṇivicitrasya prahasitanetrasya nihatarāgarajasaḥ
S04bsu016_u:627_9_9: pravṛddhakāyarājasya vāsudevasya udāradevasya nirodhanimnasya vibuddherdhūtarajasaḥ arcirmahendrasya upaśamavato
S04bsu016_u:627_10_0: viśākhadevasya vajragiro jñānārcijvalitaśarīrasya kṣemaṃkarasya aupagamasya śārdūlasya paripūrṇaśubhasya rucirabhadrayaśasaḥ
S04bsu016_u:627_10_1: parākramavikramasya paramārthavikrāmiṇaḥ śāntaraśmerekottarasya gambhīreśvarasya bhūmimaterasitasya ghoṣaśriyo viśiṣṭasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_2: vibhūtapatervibhūtabhūtasya vaidyottamasya guṇacandrasya praharṣitatejaso guṇasaṃcayasya candrodgatasya bhāskaradevasya bhīṣmayaśaso
S04bsu016_u:627_10_3: raśmimukhasya śālendraskadhasya yaśasaḥ auṣadhirājasya ratnavarasya vajramateḥ sitaśriyo nirghautālayasya maṇirājasya mahāyaśaso
S04bsu016_u:627_10_4: vegadhāriṇo 'mitābhasya mahāsanārciṣo mohadharmeśvarasya nihatadhīrasya devaśuddhasya dṛḍhaprabhasya viśvāmitrasya vimuktighoṣasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_5: vinarditarājasya vākyacchedasya campakavimalaprabhasya anavadyasya viśiṣṭacandrasya ulkādhāriṇo vicitragātrasya anabhilāpyodgatasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_6: jaganmitrasya prabhūtaraśmeḥ svarāṅgaśūrasya karuṇāvṛkṣasya dhṛtamatitejasaḥ kundaśriyo 'rciścandrasya anihitamateranunayavigatasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_7: anilambhamaterupacitaskandhasya apāyapramathanasya adīnakusumasya siṃhavinarditasya anihānārthasya anāvaraṇadarśinaḥ paragaṇamathanasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_8: anilanemasya akampitasāgarasya śobhanasāgarasya [Gv_348] aparājitameroranilayajñānasya anantāsanasya ayudhiṣṭhirasya caryāgatasya
S04bsu016_u:627_10_10: nihatatejaso viśvavarṇasya animittaprajñasya acaladevasya acintyaśriyo vimokṣacandrasya anuttararājasya candraskandhārcitabrahmaṇo
S04bsu016_u:627_11_0: iti hi kulaputra etān maitreyapramukhānanāgatāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā sarveṣāṃ bhadrakalpikānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:627_11_1: samyaksaṃbuddhānāmahameva jananī bhaviṣyāmi asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu016_u:627_12_0: yathā ca iha lokadhātau, tathā daśasu dikṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu anantamadhyān dharmadhātunayānavataramāṇā yathā ca maitreyasya
S04bsu016_u:627_13: evamanabhilāpyaguṇaviśeṣaiḥ siṃhasya evaṃ yāvadrocamasya tathāgatasya jananī bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:627_15_0: evamasmin sarvāvati kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre sarvalokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu
S04bsu016_u:627_15_1: sarvajambudvīpeṣvaparāntakoṭīgatān kalpān samantabhadrāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caramāṇā sarvakalpeṣu sarvasattvaparipākavinayamadhiṣṭhāya
S04bsu016_u:628_0_0: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayā ayamārye mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūho
S04bsu016_u:628_0_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ? āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani acintyānāṃ cittaviṣayasamatikrāntānāmabhijātabodhisattvacakṣuṣpathavijñaptānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:628_1: tasmin khalu punaḥ śubhaprabhe kalpe merūdgataśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūdviśuddhasaṃkliṣṭānekaratnamayī sacakravālasumerusāgarā pañcagatipracārā citrā darśanīyā /
S04bsu016_u:628_2: tasyāṃ khalu merūdgataśriyāṃ lokadhātau daśa cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānyabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:628_3: teṣāṃ khalu daśānāṃ cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānāṃ madhye siṃhadhvajāgratejo nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt,
S04bsu016_u:628_5: teṣāṃ khalu aśītīnāṃ rājadhānīkotīśatānāṃ madhye dhvajāgravatī nāma madhyamarājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:628_7: tasyāṃ khalu punardhvajāgravatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ citramañjariprabhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:628_9: tasmin khalu punaścitramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe vimaladhvajo nāma bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sarvajñatādharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:628_10: tasya sarvajñatādharmādhigamāntarāyāya suvarṇaprabho nāma māro mahāsainyaparivāro 'ntardhitakāya upakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:628_12: sa tato mahāsainyādvipulataramugrataraṃ ca mahāntaṃ balakāyamabhinirmāya taṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ samantādanuparivārayāmāsa mārasainyaparājayāya /
S04bsu016_u:628_14: tena ca bhagavatā vimaladhvajena tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā /
S04bsu016_u:628_15_0: atha khalu netraśrībodhimaṇḍadevatā mahātejaḥparākramasya cakravartino 'ntike putrasaṃjñāmutpādya tasya tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ
S04bsu016_u:628_15_1: praṇipatya praṇidhānamakārṣīt - yatra yatrāhaṃ bhagavan utpadyeyam,
S04bsu016_u:628_16: tatra tatraiṣa me mahātejaḥparākramaścakravartī putro bhavet /
S04bsu016_u:628_19: saivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasminneva citramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe tasminneva śubhaprabhe kalpe daśa nayutāni tathāgatānāmārāgayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:629_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena netraśrīrnāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūt? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:629_1: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena netraśrīrnāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:629_2_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo nāma cakravartyabhūdbodhisattvavaśitāpratilabdho
S04bsu016_u:629_2_1: maharddhikavikurvitaniryāto yena sā mahatī mārasenā vikīrṇā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:629_3: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo nāma rājā cakravartyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:629_4: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya yatratatropapannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:629_5_0: sarvatra eṣa mama putratvamupāgataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sarvagatimukheṣu sarvopapattimukheṣu sarvakuśalamūlamukheṣu
S04bsu016_u:629_5_1: sarvabodhisattvacaryāvicāraparākrameṣu sarvajātakanayeṣu sarvadevendrajanmasu sarvalokendragateṣu sarveśvarabhūmiṣu sarvagatiprabhāgeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:629_8: carame ca bhave 'sya ahameva sarvatrānugatā jananyabhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:629_12: pratyutpannānāmapi daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāmaparimāṇānāṃ tathāgatānāmahameva jananītvaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:629_13: yāvatāṃ ca tathāgatānāmahaṃ carame bhave bodhisattvamātā abhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:629_14: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo raśmayo niścaritvā mahākāyamāsanaṃ cāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:629_16_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ mahākaruṇāgarbhāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajñatāparipākavinayāparitṛptakukṣīṇāṃ sarvatathāgatavikurvitaromamukhaniryātanidarśanavaśavartinā
S04bsu016_u:630_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva tridaśendrabhavane surendrābhā nāma devakanyā smṛtimato devaputrasya duhitā /
S04bsu016_u:630_1: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:631_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyāyā devyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya māyādevīmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya māyādevyā antikātprakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:633_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tridaśendrabhavanaṃ yena ca surendrābhā devakanyā smṛtimato devaputrasya duhitā,
S04bsu016_u:633_1_0: tenopajagāma / upetya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya surendrābhāṃ devakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu016_u:633_1_1: surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitva evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:633_2: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:633_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:633_4: tadvadasva me devate kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:634_0: evamukte surendrābhā nāma devakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:634_1: sā ahaṃ kulaputra abhijānāmi - utpalako nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:634_4_0: pūjā kṛtā, ārāmāśca kṛtāḥ paribhogāya / yaśca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvabhūtairmātuḥ kukṣigatairjāyamānaiḥ sapta
S04bsu016_u:634_4_2: dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānaiḥ sarvabuddhavikurvitaṃ vā saṃdarśayadbhiḥ sattvaparipākavinayaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:634_5: tatsarvaṃ prathamacittotpādāya yāvatsaddharmaparyantaniṣṭhaṃ prajānāmi smarāmi anusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi anusarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:634_6: subhūtirnāma kalpo 'bhūt / tatra me daśa gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_7: subhago nāma kalpo 'bhūttatra me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_9: suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt tatra me jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_12: uttaptaśrīrnāma kalpobhūt, tatra me gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_13: sūryodayo nāma kalpo 'bhūt, tatra me 'śītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_14: jayaṃgamo nāma kalpo 'bhūt, tatra me ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_15: sucandro nāma kalpo 'bhūt, tatra me saptatirgaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_16: iti hi kulaputra anenopāyena gaṅgānadīvālukāsamān kalpānanusmarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:634_18: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādayamasaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_19: śrutvā ca ārāgitaḥ yathoktaṃ ca pratipannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:634_20_0: evaṃ cāhaṃ vimokṣaṃ satatasamitamanupraviṣṭā yacca teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyantaniṣṭhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:634_20_1: buddhavikurvitaṃ tatsarvamanena asaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūhena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇānusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi
S04bsu016_u:634_22_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vigatatamondhakārāṇāṃ saṃsārarātriprabhāvitānāṃ [Gv_351] vigatanivaraṇānāmanidrāgamānāṃ vigatastyānamiddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:634_22_1: prasrabdhakāyasaṃskārāṇāṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvānubodhasuviśuddhānāṃ daśabalaviśuddhibodhayitṝṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:635_0: gaccha kulaputra, kapilavastuni mahānagare viśvāmitro nāma dārakācāryaḥ prativasati /
S04bsu016_u:635_1: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:636_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'cintyakuśalamūlavegasaṃvardhitaḥ surendrābhāyā

S04bsu016_u:638_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako tridaśendrabhavanādavatīrya anupūrveṇa yena kapilavastuni mahānagare viśvāmitro dārakācāryastenopajagāma /

S04bsu016_u:666_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa dharmagrāmaṃ gatvā yena śivarāgro brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:666_1: tenopasaṃkramya śivarāgrasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:666_2: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:666_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadādīti /
S04bsu016_u:666_4: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:667_1: yena satyena satyavacanena tryadhvasu na kaścidbodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervivṛttaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:667_2: na vivartate, na vivartiṣyati, tena satyavacanādhiṣṭhānena idaṃ ca me kāryaṃ smṛdhyatviti /
S04bsu016_u:667_6: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ satyānuparivartanī vākpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:668_0: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe sumanāmukhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:668_2: śrīmatiśca nāma dārikā / tāvupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:669_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahādharmagauravamutpādya śivarāgrasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya śivarāgraṃ brāhmaṇamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:671_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa sumanāmukhanagaraṃ gatvā yena śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā /
S04bsu016_u:671_1: tāvupakramya tayoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā āryau anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:671_2: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:671_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / śrutaṃ ca me āryau bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ datta iti /
S04bsu016_u:671_4: tadvadatāṃ me āryau - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:672_0: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocatām - iha āvābhyāṃ kulaputra māyāgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:672_1: tāvāvāṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatau māyāgataṃ sarvalokaṃ paśyāvo hetupratyayamāyāsaṃbhūtam /
S04bsu016_u:672_12: kimāvābhyāṃ śakyamanantakarmamāyāviṭhapajālānugatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum /
S04bsu016_u:673_0: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacintyena kuśalamūlavegena abhiṣyandayitvā svaṃ ca vimokṣaviṣayaṃ śrāvya etadavocatām - gaccha kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:673_3_0: tatra vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbho nāma mahākūṭāgāro bodhisattvakuśalamūlavipākābhinirvṛto bodhisattvacetanāmanasikārasaṃbhūto
S04bsu016_u:673_4: tatra maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati janmabhūmikānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmanugrahāya /
S04bsu016_u:673_9: [Gv_361] sarvatrānugatāṃ ca bodhisattvopapattivaśitāṃ prabhāvayan sarvasattvajanmasaṃdarśanābhimukhatayā ca sattvaparipākāriñcanatāyai /
S04bsu016_u:673_13: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryā paripraṣṭavyā,
S04bsu016_u:673_24: paryupāsitavyāni / tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi kulaputra maitreyo bodhisattvo 'vatīrṇaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu gatiṃgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:673_35: sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitro 'bhiṣyandayiṣyati sarvakuśalamūlāni vivardhayiṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:673_44: na ca te kulaputra ekakuśalamūlatanmayena bhavitavyaṃ naikadharmamukhālokāvabhāsaparameṇa naikacaryāparisaṃtuṣṭena naikapraṇidhānābhinirhāraparameṇa naikavyākaraṇena,
S04bsu016_u:673_50: tatkasya hetoḥ? apramāṇāni hi kulaputra bodhisattvena kuśalamūlāni samudānetavyāni /
S04bsu016_u:673_53: apramāṇā nayāḥ śikṣitavyāḥ / apramāṇāḥ sattvadhātuḥ parinirvāpayitavyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:673_147: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra sarvasattvasamoktā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvaparipācanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:674_0: tasmāttarhi kulaputra na te parikheda utpādayitavyaḥ kalyāṇamitraparimārgaṇāsu /
S04bsu016_u:674_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? kalyāṇamitrādhīnāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāḥśravāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:674_46: kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:674_55: lokadharmaiḥ / kalyāṇamitraparyupāsitā bodhisattvā asaṃpramoṣacāriṇo bhavanti sarvacaryāsu /
S04bsu016_u:674_60: tatkasya hetoḥ? viśodhakāni kulaputra kalyāṇamitrāṇyāvaraṇīyānāṃ vinivartakāni /
S04bsu016_u:674_65: niṣkrāmayitāraḥ saṃsārāt / utkhāṭayitāro lokaniketāt / nirmocayitāro mārapaśebhyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:674_78: ākhyātāraḥ caryāyāḥ / avavāditāraḥ pāramitāsu / pratiyāpayitāraḥ bhūmiṣu / vibhajitāraḥ kṣāntīnām / saṃbhāvayitāraḥ sarvakuśalamūlānām /
S04bsu016_u:675_0: api ca kulaputra mātṛbhūtāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi buddhakuleṣu janayitrīṇi /
S04bsu016_u:676_0: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanāpariṇamanatayā /
S04bsu016_u:677_1: kalyāṇamitreṣu vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:677_6: kalyāṇamitreṣu nāvikasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu tīrthasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu nausaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S04bsu016_u:677_16: kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S04bsu016_u:677_27_0: / tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ kalyāṇamitrādhyāśayapariśuddhā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrājñāsu pratipadyamānā vivardhante
S04bsu016_u:677_31: abhyudgatā bhavanti lokāt, sumeruriva sāgarāt / anupaliptā bhavanti lokadharmaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:677_32: padmamiva jalen / saṃvasanti sarvaduścaritaiḥ, mahāsāgara iva pūtikuṇapena /
S04bsu016_u:677_33: vivardhante śukladharmaiḥ, candra iva śuklapakṣe / avabhāsayanti dharmadhātuṃ sūrya iva jambudvīpam /
S04bsu016_u:677_35: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṣu pratipannā bodhisattvā daśānabhilāpyaguṇakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratigṛhṇanti /
S04bsu016_u:677_46_0: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra sarvabodhisattvacaryāḥ sarvabodhisattvapāramitāḥ sarvabodhisattvabhūmayaḥ sarvabodhisattvasamādhimukhāni
S04bsu016_u:677_50_0: kalyāṇamitrādhīnāḥ kalyāṇamitramūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraprabhavāḥ kalyāṇamitrayonikāḥ kalyāṇamitrāyadvārāḥ kalyāṇamitrasaṃjātāḥ
S04bsu016_u:678_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kalyāṇamitrāguṇavarṇānuśāsanīṃ bodhisattvacaryāpramāṇatāṃ buddhadharmavistīrṇatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:678_0_1: ca śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śrīsaṃbhavasya dārakasya śrīmatyāśca dārikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:678_0_2: śrīsaṃbhavaṃ dārakaṃ śrīmatīṃ dārikāṃ ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya śrīsaṃbhavasya dārakasya
S04bsu016_u:680_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyabhiṣyanditacitto yena samudrakaccho janapadastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ tāmeva bodhisattvacaryānuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:680_10_0: evaṃcittaḥ evaṃmanasikāraḥ evaṃyoniśaḥprayuktaḥ sarvabodhisattvaprasādasamāropitayā śraddhayā sarvabodhisattvāśayasamāropitena
S04bsu016_u:680_16_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ evaṃ gauravacitrīkārapūjāstavapraṇipātodīkṣamāṇādhiṣṭhānapraṇidhānasaṃjñānugatamānasaḥ evamapramāṇajñānagocarabhūmiprasṛtena
S04bsu016_u:680_16_1: jñānacakṣuṣā vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya purastāddvāramūle sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_17: sa imamevaṃrūpamabhinirhāraprayogaṃ muhūrtaṃ vicārya adhimuktiśraddhāsamutthitena adhyāśayapraṇidhyabhinirhārabalena apratiprasrabdhamātmānamadhyatiṣṭhat sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu,
S04bsu016_u:680_18_0: evaṃ sarvabodhisaṃmukhībhāveṣu sarvakalyāṇamitrabhavaneṣu sarvatathāgatacaityeṣu sarvatathāgatavigraheṣu sarvabodhisattveṣu
S04bsu016_u:680_21_3: yathākarmasamutthitaṃ vipākamadhimucyamāno yathāhetusamutthitaṃ phalamadhimucyamāno yathopacayasamutthitāṃ sarvakriyāmadhimucyamānaḥ
S04bsu016_u:680_22_3: pariṇāmanājñānena śāśvatasaṃjñāvibhūtena anutpādajñānena hetukriyādṛṣṭivigatena samyakkriyādṛṣṭivigatena samakriyādṛṣṭivigatena
S04bsu016_u:680_30: evaṃ jñānapraveśābhinirhṛtena saṃjñāmanasikāreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako [Gv_370] vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya purastāt praṇipātitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_31_0: suciramatinamayya acintyakuśalamūlavegābhiṣyanditasaṃtānaḥ prahlāditakāyacittaḥ tataḥ kūṭāgāradvāramūlādutthāya muhūrtamanimiṣābhyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:680_31_1: netrābhyāṃ vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhaṃ mahākūṭāgāraṃ saṃprekṣya kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'nekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya evaṃsaṃjñāmanasikārasaṃpreṣitacitto
S04bsu016_u:680_45: teṣāmayaṃ vihāraḥ / ye te lokaniketoccalitāśca sarvajagadbhavaneṣu saṃdṛśyante sarvasattvaparipācanāya
S04bsu016_u:680_46: / ye te sarvakṣetrāniśritāśca sarvakṣetreṣu ca anuvicaranti tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:680_47: ye te sarvakṣetrāṇi ca anuvicaranti sarvabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigrahaṇatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:680_48: na ca sthānādvicaranti / ye te sarvatathāgatapādamūlagatāśca buddhasaṃjñābhiniveśavigatāśca /
S04bsu016_u:680_54: ye te sarvalokadhātvantargatakāyā na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_81: na ca dṛṣṭigatasaṃniśritāḥ / ye te ānimittagocarāśca nimittacaritasattvanayābhimuktāśca /
S04bsu016_u:680_89: ye te maitrīvihāriṇaśca, na kvacidanunayavihāriṇaḥ / ye te karuṇāvihāriṇaśca, na kvacidanusaṃśayadarśanavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_96: ye te trivimokṣavihāriṇaśca, na ca śrāvakavimuktisparśavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_108: na ca mārakalpanavihāriṇaḥ / ye te ṣaḍāyatanasamatikrāntavihāriṇaśca,
S04bsu016_u:680_110: ye te tathatāvihāriṇaśca, na ca bhūtakoṭyāyatanavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:680_112: na ca mahāyānacyavanavihāriṇaḥ teṣāmayaṃ sarvaguṇavihāriṇāṃ vihāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:681_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:682_0: iha so mahākaruṇa lābhi viśuddhabuddhirmaitreya maitraśiri lokahitābhiyuktaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_2: abhiṣekabhūmisthita jyeṣṭhasuto jinānāṃ viharāti buddhaviṣayaṃ anucintayantaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:682_3: sarveṣa yo jinasutāna mahāyaśānāṃ mahājñānagocara vimokṣapratiṣṭhitānām /
S04bsu016_u:682_4: ye dharmadhātu vicaranti asajjamānā āvāsu teṣamayamapratipudgalānām // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:682_10: na karonti niśrayu kvacidgagane va pakṣī teṣāṃ vihāru ayu jñānaviśāradānām // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:682_11: ye rāgadoṣamatha mohasvabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitāṃ vitathapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:682_12: nirvikalpayanti ca virāgamayīha teṣāṃ śāntapraśāntyumagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:682_14: praparīkṣamāṇa na patanti vidū praśāntiprajñāupāyakuśalānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:682_15: ye te anāvaraṇajñānadiśaṃ praviṣṭā jinakṣetra sattvaparikalpavikalpaśāntā /
S04bsu016_u:682_16: bhāvasvabhāvarahitā na vimṛṣanti dharmān āvāsu teṣamaya śāntiparāyaṇānām // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:682_17: ye te asaṅgacaritā ima dharmadhātuṃ vicaranti bhāvavigatā khagavāyubhūtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_20: ye dṛṣṭidurgatigatāṃ janatāmakhinnāṃ duḥkhāntarāṃ kaṭuka vedana vedayantīm /
S04bsu016_u:682_21: maitraprabhāya śamayanti apāya sarvān āvāsu teṣamaya maitrakṛpāśayānām // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:682_23: ye prekṣya lokamiha mokṣapathe praṇenti sārthātivāhasadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:682_27: parimocayanti vipulāṃ karuṇāṃ janitvā mahavaidyarājadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:682_28: ye te niśāmya janatāṃ dukhitāmatrāṇāṃ śokākare patita mṛtyusamudragāmi /
S04bsu016_u:682_29: tārenti kṛva mahatīṃ śubhadharmanāvaṃ teṣāṃ vihāramaya dāśasutopamānām // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:682_38: yatha eki sattvi tatha sarvajagatyaśeṣam āvāsu teṣamaya lokaparāyaṇānām // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:682_39: ye ekakṣetraprasare aparāntakalpān vicaranti cārika jagārthamakhinnavīryāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_40: yatha ekakṣetri tatha sarvadaśaddiśāsu āvāsu teṣamaya vajradṛḍhāśayānām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:682_41: ye dharmamegha sugatāna daśaddiśāsu ekāsane sthita pibanti asaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_43: ye kṣetrasāgara vrajanti anābhilāpyān praviśanti co pariṣasāgara nāyakānām /
S04bsu016_u:682_44: ye pūjasāgara vicitra jine karonti teṣāmasaṅgacaraṇānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:682_46: bahukalpasāgara caranti jagaddhitārthā teṣāṃ vihāru ayu sarvaguṇākarāṇām // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:682_47: ye eki vālapathi uttaramāna kṣetrāt buddhāṃśca sattva tatha kalpa anantamadhyān /
S04bsu016_u:682_48: praviśanti enta na punā ca upenti sīmāṃ teṣāmasaṅganayanānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:682_49: ye ekacittakṣaṇi kalpamahāsamudrān praviśanti kṣetra tatha buddhajagatpracārān /
S04bsu016_u:682_52: ye sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajān gaṇitvā bindupramāṇa tulayitva jalaugha sarvam /
S04bsu016_u:682_55: abhinirharanti vicaranti anantakalpān iha te praviṣṭa sugatāna sutāḥ smṛtīmāḥ // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:682_56: iha te sthitā jinasutā vividhā vicitrā abhinirharanti bahuśāstrakathārthayuktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_57: saukhyāvahāni jagatāmiha śilpasthānānyanucintayanta viharanti satāṃ vihāraḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:682_58: iha te sthitā mahaabhijñaupāyajñāne yāvanta sattvagatibheda daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu016_u:682_59: sarvatra janmacyutibheda vidarśayanti māyāgate sthita vimokṣa asaṅgacaryāḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:682_60: iha te sthitā prathamacittasamudbhavādyāṃ darśenti dharmacaryāṃ vasudharmaniṣṭhām /
S04bsu016_u:682_62: ye ekacittaprasareṇa vibuddha bodhiṃ praviśanti jñānamatikarma anantamadhyā /
S04bsu016_u:682_63: saṃmohaketvavraji loku ya cintayāna evaṃ durāsadagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:682_70: iha te kṛpāśayamatī sthitvā jagadīkṣya duḥkhaśokahatam /
S04bsu016_u:682_75: iha te sthitā jinasutāḥ sarvajinānāṃ ca pādamūleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:682_79: iha te praviṣṭa śūrāḥ sarvaṃ jinagocaraṃ tulayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:682_93: iha sarvakṣetrasaṃkhyāṃ kalpānāṃ caiva dharmasaṃkhyāṃ ca /
S04bsu016_u:682_95: iha te sthitā jinasutā yāvat kṣetrāstriyadhvasaṃkhyātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:682_97: iha te sthitā jinānāṃ caryāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca indriyaṃ jagatām /
S04bsu016_u:682_106: sthitveha sattvasamatāṃ dharmeṣu buddhasamatāṃ ca prekṣya /
S04bsu016_u:682_109: vimṛṣantyapare dharmāniha te bhavanavare sthitā dhīrāḥ // 52 //
S04bsu016_u:682_111: śakyā mayā hi vaktuṃ vistīrṇo 'nantu buddhīnām // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:683_0_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhamahākūṭāgāranivāsino bodhisattvānevaṃ ca apramāṇairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya
S04bsu016_u:683_0_1: vanditvā namaskṛtya praṇipatya udvīkṣa citrīkṛtya āmukhībhūya abhisaṃpūjya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya
S04bsu016_u:683_0_2: mūle 'tiṣṭhanmaitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanamabhilaṣamāṇo maitreyasya bodhisattvasya samavadhānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:683_2: dṛṣṭvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena maitreyo bodhisattvastenābhimukho bhūtvā dūrata eva maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:684_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyavalokya sarvaparṣado dakṣiṇena hastenopadarśya bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃvarṇayan gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:685_3: svāgataṃ praśamaśāntilocana mā kilāmyasi carantu cārikām // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:685_6: ehi svāgatamalīnaindriyā mā kilāmyāsi carantu sūrata // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:685_8: sarvamitrabhajanāya prasthitā svāgataṃ ti acalā dṛḍhavratā // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:685_9: svāgataṃ śubhapathena āgatā svāgataṃ guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitā /
S04bsu016_u:685_10: svāgataṃ jinapathena prasthitā mā śramaṃ kila samarthasva kvacit // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:685_11: ehi svāgatu guṇeṣu tanmayā svāgataṃ ti kuśalāni(bhi)syandita(?) /
S04bsu016_u:685_12: sādhu svāgatamanantagocarā darśanaṃ tava sudurlabhaṃ jage // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:685_16: krodharoṣavigatā anunnata sādhu te darśanaṃ sudarśanam // 63 //
S04bsu016_u:685_23: ehi sarvajinaputrapreṣita darśayāmi ti anāvṛtāṃ diśam // 66 //
S04bsu016_u:685_26: eṣamāṇu sugatāna gocaraṃ mārgamāṇu virajāna cārikām /
S04bsu016_u:685_28: yatra śikṣita atīta nāyakāḥ śikṣiṣenti tatha ye anāgatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_29: tiṣṭhatāṃ ca sugatāna yā carī pṛcchamāṇu ayu tāmihāgataḥ // 69 //
S04bsu016_u:685_32: bodhisattva mama buddhivardhikā buddhaputra mama bodhidāyakāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_33: eti mitra mama buddhavarṇitā evacittakuśalo ihāgataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:685_42: nāyakā mama sukhaṃdadā ime evacitta ayu mitra sevate // 75 //
S04bsu016_u:685_44: sarvadurgatiapāyaśodhakā eti mitra mama sādhu darśakāḥ // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:685_46: eti sarvajinaguhyadhārakā eva mitra bhajateṣa paṇḍitaḥ // 77 //
S04bsu016_u:685_49: paśyathā ayamudāraāśayaḥ sevamāna ima mitra paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_50: yādṛśīṃ pratijaneti sūrata eva yūyamanuśikṣatho sadā // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:685_52: anuśāsti ayu tasya kurvato paśyathā kathamaṭatyakhedavān // 80 //
S04bsu016_u:685_53: eṣa sarvasukhasaukhya ujjhiya utsṛjitva amaropamaṃ gṛham /
S04bsu016_u:685_56: eṣa āśaya viśodhya paṇḍitaḥ svāśrayaṃ jahiya mānuṣaṃ imam /
S04bsu016_u:685_67: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
S04bsu016_u:685_86: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //
S04bsu016_u:685_100: eṣa lokaśaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ eṣa sarvajagati prabhākaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_107: yādṛśaṃ tava prayoga sūrataḥ śraddha yādṛśa tavā aninditaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_109: sarvabuddha nacireṇa drakṣyasi sarvakṣetra nacireṇa yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:685_110: sarvadharma nacireṇa jñāsyasi tādṛśaṃ ti śubhamātmanā kṛtam // 106 //
S04bsu016_u:685_113: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇān bhājanaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi śubhāna saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_114: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi jinaurasaiḥ samo yādṛśaṃ ti adhimuktimaṇḍalam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:685_115: māramaṇḍala parājitaṃ tvayā karmamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ ca te /
S04bsu016_u:685_116: kleśamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ tvayā yādṛśaṃ ti praṇidhānamaṇḍalam // 109 //
S04bsu016_u:685_125: duḥkhajāla jagu mocayiṣyase tādṛśaḥ praṇidhijālu śodhitaḥ // 113 //
S04bsu016_u:685_135: mokṣadvāramupaneṣyase jagat dvāru tādṛśu viśodhitaṃ tvayā // 118 //
S04bsu016_u:685_138: bodhimārga tatha tvaṃ anuddhato mārgase dṛḍhamate atandritaḥ // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:685_145: kṣetrasāgara bahu pravekṣyasi drakṣyase pariṣasāgarān bahūn /
S04bsu016_u:685_151: tvaṃ samādhibhavanaṃ pravekṣyase tvaṃ vimokṣabhavanāni lapsyase /
S04bsu016_u:685_159: nocireṇa spharamāṇu paśyase māruto va gagane asaṅgavān // 129 //
S04bsu016_u:685_162: maiva kheda janayāhi sūratā tuṣṭi vindi vipulāṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu016_u:685_163: yena te imu vimokṣu īdṛśo dṛṣṭu paśyasi ca bhūyu drakṣyase // 131 //
S04bsu016_u:685_165: tvaṃ samartha imu dhārituṃ nayaṃ tena paśyasi idaṃ vikurvitam // 132 //
S04bsu016_u:685_166: yeṣa kalpanayutaiḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ kutu guṇaprabhāvana /
S04bsu016_u:685_167: tehi dṛṣṭa carato sucārikāṃ buddhaputra aniketagocarāḥ // 133 //
S04bsu016_u:685_168: lābha bhūya vipulā acintiyā svāgataṃ ca tava mānuṣo bhava /
S04bsu016_u:685_169: yena mañjuśiri dṛṣṭa saṃmukhamīdṛśaṃ kṛtu guṇān bhājanam // 134 //
S04bsu016_u:685_172: duḥkhadharma tvayi sarva ujjhitāḥ sarvakheda ca vivarjitā bhava // 135 //
S04bsu016_u:685_174: jñānabhūmi paripūrya uttamā buddhabhūmi nacireṇa lapsyase // 136 //
S04bsu016_u:685_178: ye bhajanti ima mitra īdṛśāḥ te bhavanti nacireṇa nāyakāḥ // 138 //
S04bsu016_u:685_179: dṛṣṭva sattva vinayaṃgatā bahu bodhisattvacari citra yāvat /
S04bsu016_u:685_180: mā tu jātu vimatiṃ kariṣyase sarvadharmamukha bodhicārikam // 139 //
S04bsu016_u:685_182: yena saṃpada imā tvamīdṛśī buddhaputra iha adya paśyasi // 140 //
S04bsu016_u:685_183: paśya lābha tava kīdṛśo mahān paśyato jinasutā nirantaram /
S04bsu016_u:685_186: tena co jinasutā nirantaraṃ te vimokṣanaya darśayanti mām // 142 //
S04bsu016_u:685_187: kalpakoṭinayutāni te janā saṃvasanti sugatātmajaiḥ saha /
S04bsu016_u:685_189: te 'pi teṣu na vidanti gocaraṃ nātma tairhi guṇabhājanaṃ kṛtam // 143 //
S04bsu016_u:685_190: tvaṃ śṛṇoṣi ima īdṛśaṃ nayaṃ paśyase ca sudurlabhaṃ jage /
S04bsu016_u:685_192: sarvabuddha samanvāharanti te bodhisattva tava saṃgrahasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_193: tvaṃ ca teṣa anuśāsanisthitaḥ sādhu sūdhana sujīvitaṃ tava // 145 //
S04bsu016_u:685_194: bodhisattvakuladharmi vartase śikṣase jinasutāna tvaṃ guṇaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_195: bheṣyase sugatavaṃśavardhanaḥ prīti vindahi udāra sudhanā // 146 //
S04bsu016_u:685_196: sarvabuddha pitarastavāsamā bodhisattva tava sarvi bhrātaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_197: bodhiaṅga tava sarvi jñātayaḥ tvaṃ sujātu sugatāna orasaḥ // 147 //
S04bsu016_u:685_199: dharmarājamacireṇa lapsyase sūdhanā tuṣṭa bhava prīṇitendriyaḥ // 148 //
S04bsu016_u:685_202: yādṛśaṃ vapati bīja yo naro tādṛśaṃ labhati tasya so phalam /
S04bsu016_u:685_203: prīti vinda vipulāmacintiyāṃ eṣa te 'dya samanvāsayāmyaham // 150 //
S04bsu016_u:685_205: cīrṇa kalpanayutāna ye carī bodhisattvanayutā acintiyā /
S04bsu016_u:685_206: ta 'pi saṃpada labhanti nedṛśīmekajanmi pratilabdha yā tvayā // 151 //
S04bsu016_u:685_207: sarvametadiha muktitaḥ phalaṃ āśayasya dṛḍhavīryatāya ca /
S04bsu016_u:685_208: yasya cārika bhavediyaṃ priyā so dhareya sudhanasya yā carī // 152 //
S04bsu016_u:685_210: sudhana eva samudānitāstvayā nityameṣa hi viśeṣacārikā // 153 //
S04bsu016_u:685_213: eṣa bhotu tava darśito tayā bhadranāmacariyāya sūdhana /
S04bsu016_u:685_214: eta jñātva sa kadāci bheṣyate sevamāna iha mitra tanmayaḥ // 155 //
S04bsu016_u:685_215: kāyakoṭi smara pūrvikā tvayā kāmahetu kṣayitā nirarthakam /
S04bsu016_u:685_216: adya bodhiya mārgaṇo hyayaṃ kāya tarjatu vratena suvrataḥ // 156 //
S04bsu016_u:685_218: gaṅgavālikasamatā virāgitā buddha no ca śruta īdṛśo nayaḥ // 157 //
S04bsu016_u:685_219: so idāni kṣaṇa labdha mānuṣo buddhapādu imu mitru īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_220: śrūyate ca varabodhicārikā viśuddhi na bhaviṣyate katham // 158 //
S04bsu016_u:685_222: bhoti bhūya sugatāna saṃbhavo mitradharmaśravaṇaṃ ca śrūyate /
S04bsu016_u:685_223: no ca śrūyati ayaṃ punarnayo āśayo yadi na bhoti śodhitaḥ // 159 //
S04bsu016_u:685_226: teṣa lābha paramā acintiyāsteṣa mānuṣabhavaḥ suāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_227: yairiyaṃ cari praveśamīdṛśaṃ śrutva eva praṇidhī bhirnirhṛtā // 161 //
S04bsu016_u:685_228: tasya sarvi sugatā na durlabhā tasya sarvi jinaputra nārataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_229: tasya bodhayi na bhūyu saṃśayo yena eva adhimukti śodhitā // 162 //
S04bsu016_u:685_230: tena sarvi vinayā na varjitāḥ tena sarvadukhadharma ujjhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_231: tena sarvaguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ yo imaṃ nayu praviṣṭa īdṛśam // 163 //
S04bsu016_u:685_232: nocireṇa imu kāyu ujjhiyā buddhakṣetra pariśuddha yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:685_234: pūrvahetughana tubhya sūdhana pratyutpanna adhimukti niścitā /
S04bsu016_u:685_235: mitra sevasi viśeṣaarthikaḥ tena vardhayi jale yathotpalam // 165 //
S04bsu016_u:685_241: yādṛśāya adhimuktisaṃpadā vandanaṃ kṛtamidaṃ tvayā mama /
S04bsu016_u:685_246: bhadranāma vara carya uttamāṃ tanumantime praveśayiṣyati // 170 //
S04bsu016_u:685_247: eva maitraku asaṅgagocaro dṛṣṭa sūdhana guṇaiḥ samudgatam /
S04bsu016_u:685_248: darśayitva pariṣāya saṃmukhaṃ varṇakośamimu tasya vyāhari // 171 //
S04bsu016_u:685_249: śrutva sūdhana tadānuśāsanīmīdṛśīṃ ca anuśāsti uttamām /
S04bsu016_u:685_252: utthihitva sudhanaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ maitra nāma kurute pradakṣiṇam // 173 //
S04bsu016_u:685_253: tasya mañjuśiri tena tejasā puṣpahāraratanā ca pāṇiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:685_256: sūdhano varaprahṛṣṭamānaso maitrakasya kṣipi tāni harṣitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_257: tasya śīrṣu parimārjate tadā maitranātha sudhanaṃ ca bhāṣate // 175 //
S04bsu016_u:685_258: sādhu sādhu jinaputra sūdhana yasya te aparikheda īdṛśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_259: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇāna bhājanaṃ mañjughoṣu yatha yādṛśo va ham // 176 //
S04bsu016_u:685_260: śrutva sūdhana udānudānayi durlabhā bhavaśateṣu īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:685_261: mitra yebhiriha me samāgamaḥ sādu āgamanamadya me iha // 177 //
S04bsu016_u:685_263: mitra labdha maya durlabhā ime bhotu me laghu samāgamasvayi // 178 //
S04bsu016_u:686_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:686_1: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:686_2: kathaṃ pratipattavyam / āryamaitreyo vyākṛtaḥ sarvatathāgatairekajātipratibaddhatayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:686_17: sa niryātaḥ sarvaśikṣāsu / tena pariśodhitāḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:686_28: sa vaidyaḥ kleśāturāṇām / so 'graḥ sarvasattvānām / sa indraḥ, sa jyeṣṭhaḥ sarvāryapudgalānām /
S04bsu016_u:686_49: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:686_50: śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam, yathā pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo bodhimadhigacchati,
S04bsu016_u:686_54: mahābodhicaryārambhaṃ samāśvāsayati sadevakaṃ lokaṃ na visaṃvadati,
S04bsu016_u:687_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamupadarśayannevamāha - paśyatha kulaputrā imaṃ śreṣṭhiputram,
S04bsu016_u:687_3: anayā arthikatayā, etena cchandasamādānena, etayā dṛḍhāśayatayā, anivartyavīryatayā, etayā buddhadharmātṛptatayā, etayā viśeṣaparimārgaṇatayā, etayā dīptaśiraścailopamatayā,
S04bsu016_u:687_5_0: etayā kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanāparikhedatayā sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇi parimārgamāṇaḥ paripṛcchan paryupāsīno mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena
S04bsu016_u:687_5_1: saṃpreṣito dhanyākarānnagarādupādāya sarvadakṣiṇāpathamaṭan daśottaraṃ kalyāṇamitraśataṃ paripṛcchan yāvanmamāntikamanuprāptaḥ
S04bsu016_u:687_6_0: durlabhaṃ kulaputrā evaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ mahāpratijñāsamārūḍhānāṃ mahārambhavyavasitamānasānāṃ mahākaruṇāsaṃnaddhagātrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:687_6_3: nāmadheyaśravaṇaṃ vā rūpakāyadarśanaṃ vā gocarasaṃvāso vā caryāsabhāgatā vā /
S04bsu016_u:687_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sarvajagatparitrāṇāya abhyutthitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:688_0_0: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sattvānāṃ caturoghottaraṇatāyai mahādānaṃ mahādharmanāvaṃ samudānetukāmo dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:688_0_1: mahādharmasetuṃ sthāpayitukāmo mohāndhakāraprāptānāṃ jñānālokaṃ kartukāmaḥ saṃsārakāntārapranaṣṭānāmāryamārgaṃ saṃdarśayitukāmaḥ
S04bsu016_u:688_0_2: mahākleśavyādhiprapīḍitānāṃ dharmabhaiṣajyaṃ pradātukāmo jātijarāmaraṇopadrutānāmamṛtadhātuṃ dātukāmaḥ trividhāgnisaṃpradīptānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:688_0_4: jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ prajñāśastramupasaṃhartukāmaḥ traidhātukanagarāvaruddhānāṃ mokṣadvāraṃ darśayitukāmaḥ
S04bsu016_u:688_0_5: traidhātukanagarāvaruddhānāṃ muktidvāraṃ darśayitukāmaḥ akṣemadigabhimukhānāṃ kṣemāṃ diśamupadarśayitukāmaḥ kleśasaṃskāropadrutānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:688_0_6: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo durgatiprapātabhayabhītānāṃ hastālambaṃ dātukāmaḥ skandhavadhakapraghātitānāṃ nirvāṇanagaramupadarśayitukāmo
S04bsu016_u:688_0_7: dhātūragaparivṛtānāṃ niḥsaraṇamākhyātukāmaḥ āyatanaśūnyagrāmasaṃniśritānāṃ prajñālokena niṣkāśayitukāmaḥ kutīrthapratipannān
S04bsu016_u:689_0: sa eṣa kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ evaṃ sattvaparitrāṇāya apratiprasrabdho bodhicittotpādaviśuddhiṃ parimārgamāṇo 'yamaparikhinno mahāyānasamudānayāya,
S04bsu016_u:690_13: na hi kulaputrastāmanye bodhisattvāḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhiparipūrimadhigamiṣyante buddhabodhau vasanto bhaviṣyanti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau vā,
S04bsu016_u:690_14: sattvaparipākavinaye vā, dharmadhātujñānapraveśe vā, pāramitāsamudāgame vā, caryājālapravistāre vā, praṇidhānābhinirhāraparipūryāṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:691_0_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūtaguṇavarṇakīrtanaṃ kṛtvā tadārambaṇaṃ ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:691_0_1: bodhyaṅgāśayaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:691_1: yena te sarvalokahitasukhāya sarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇāya sarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:691_4: sujīvitaṃ te jīvalokeṣu / ārādhitaśca te buddhotpādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:691_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? bodhicittaṃ hi kulaputra bījabhūtaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:691_135: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:692_0: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra, astyabhayā nāmauṣadhiḥ / tayā pañca bhayāni na bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:692_2: viṣasya na ākramati, śastreṇa na kṣaṇyate, udakena nohyate, dhūmena na mriyate / evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
S04bsu016_u:692_3: viṣayaviṣamasya nākramati, kleśaśastreṇa na kṣaṇyate, bhavaughena nohyate, saṃkalpadhūmena na mriyate / tadyathā kulaputra astyanirmuktā nāmauṣadhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:692_5: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:692_6: tadyathā kulaputra, asti maghī nāmauṣadhiḥ / tayā gṛhītayā gandhenaiva sarvāśīviṣāḥ palāyante /
S04bsu016_u:692_8: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:692_9: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:692_10: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
S04bsu016_u:692_11: tena sarvaśalyāḥ patanti / evameva bodhicittavigamabhaiṣajyaparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvarāgadoṣamohadṛṣṭiśalyāḥ patanti /
S04bsu016_u:693_0: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:693_3: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:693_6: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
S04bsu016_u:693_9: yasyāḥ prabhāvena sarvajambudvīpakā [Gv_399] vṛkṣā sarvā vivardhante,
S04bsu016_u:693_12: sā yasya śarīragatā bhavati, tasya kāyacittakalyatā jāyate /
S04bsu016_u:693_21: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:693_22: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
S04bsu016_u:693_23: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
S04bsu016_u:693_24_1: yadekakuśalamapi sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ praṇaśyet nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04bsu016_u:693_32: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:693_33: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
S04bsu016_u:693_35: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:693_37: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:693_39: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:693_43: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:693_45: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
S04bsu016_u:693_47: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
S04bsu016_u:693_49: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
S04bsu016_u:693_52: ca mahājñānālokamavamuñcati / tadyathā kulaputra ye indranīlamahāmaṇiratnābhayā spṛśyante,
S04bsu016_u:693_57: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
S04bsu016_u:693_59: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu016_u:693_60: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu016_u:693_61: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca āyataśca,
S04bsu016_u:693_63: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:693_64_0: evameva sarvaguṇapariśodhitaṃ sarvajñatācittotpādavaśirājamaṇiratnaṃ saṃsāragatameva dharmadhātugaganagocarāṇāṃ tathāgatamahājñānasūryacandramasāṃ
S04bsu016_u:693_67: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
S04bsu016_u:693_70: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
S04bsu016_u:693_71: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:693_73: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
S04bsu016_u:693_74: evameva sarvajñajñānacintārājamahāmaṇiratnaṃ [Gv_401] sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ bodhicittotpādadivyajāmbūnadasuvarṇena /
S04bsu016_u:693_75: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:693_77: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:693_78: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:694_0: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
S04bsu016_u:694_1: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
S04bsu016_u:694_4: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
S04bsu016_u:694_9: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:694_11: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:694_12: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:694_13: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:694_16: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
S04bsu016_u:694_17: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:694_18: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:694_19: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:695_0: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:695_2: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
S04bsu016_u:695_3: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:695_4: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:695_5: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
S04bsu016_u:695_7: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
S04bsu016_u:695_8: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni [Gv_402] paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
S04bsu016_u:695_9: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:695_10: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:695_14_0: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:695_14_1: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo 'vabhāti aparyādattaḥ
S04bsu016_u:695_15: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_16: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
S04bsu016_u:695_19: jñānālokaṃ ca saṃjanayati / tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:695_21: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:695_25: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:695_27: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
S04bsu016_u:695_29: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:695_35: na saṃdhayati, evameva kalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitaḥ karmakleśakṣīramahāsamudraḥ tathāgatamahāpuruṣasiṃhasarvajñatācittotpādadugdhaikabinduprakṣepeṇa sarvo 'navaśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:695_37: na saṃvasati / tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_38: evameva yaḥ saṃsārāṇḍakośagatasyādikarmikabodhisattvakalaviṅkapotasya mahākaruṇābodhicittanādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:695_39: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca,
S04bsu016_u:695_40: [Gv_403] sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_41_0: evameva yaḥ prathamacittotpādikasya tathāgatamahāgaruḍendrasya kulagotrasaṃbhavasya bodhisattvamahāgaruḍendrapotasya sarvajñatācittotpādabalaparākramo
S04bsu016_u:695_43: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
S04bsu016_u:695_47: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:695_49: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:695_51: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:695_53: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
S04bsu016_u:695_54: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:695_55: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
S04bsu016_u:695_56: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya /
S04bsu016_u:695_57: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
S04bsu016_u:695_59: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
S04bsu016_u:695_61: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
S04bsu016_u:695_63: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
S04bsu016_u:695_68: na tiṣṭhante na saṃdadhati / evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
S04bsu016_u:695_69: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu016_u:695_70: na saṃdadhati / tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
S04bsu016_u:695_72: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_73: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_75: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:695_77: sarvamāraiśca na dṛśyate / tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:695_81: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:695_82: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
S04bsu016_u:696_0: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
S04bsu016_u:696_2: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:696_3: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:696_4: na ca saṃsāradoṣairlipyate / tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:696_6: na kvacidduṣyati / tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
S04bsu016_u:696_8: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:696_9: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:696_15: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
S04bsu016_u:696_17: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:696_18: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
S04bsu016_u:696_19: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:696_20: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
S04bsu016_u:696_21: tadyathā kulaputra [Gv_405] sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:696_26: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
S04bsu016_u:696_28: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
S04bsu016_u:696_30: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
S04bsu016_u:696_33: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
S04bsu016_u:696_36: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
S04bsu016_u:697_0: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:697_1: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni /
S04bsu016_u:697_6: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:697_9: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
S04bsu016_u:697_11: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu śobhate,
S04bsu016_u:697_17: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:697_19: [Gv_406] tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
S04bsu016_u:697_23: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:697_26: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
S04bsu016_u:697_28: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
S04bsu016_u:697_29: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
S04bsu016_u:697_30: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
S04bsu016_u:697_31_0: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādamahāvajrapraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhamahānagnairapi saṃdhārayitumanyatra sarvajñatāhetubalopastabdhāpramāṇakuśalamūlamahānārāyaṇasthāmaprativiśiṣṭairmahāvabhāsaprāptairmahābodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:697_32: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
S04bsu016_u:697_33: na pratihanyate, evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
S04bsu016_u:697_35: na pratihanyate / tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
S04bsu016_u:697_38: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:697_39: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
S04bsu016_u:697_40: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
S04bsu016_u:697_42: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
S04bsu016_u:697_43: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
S04bsu016_u:697_47: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
S04bsu016_u:697_48_0: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:697_48_1: bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ saṃpratīcchatāṃ sarvabodhisattvamārgasaṃbhāramupastambhayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:697_48_2: sarvatathāgatānāṃ mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ saṃdhārayitumanyatra
S04bsu016_u:697_49: iti hi [Gv_407] kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:697_50: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
S04bsu016_u:697_53: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya /
S04bsu016_u:698_0: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:698_1: kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti / gaccha kulaputra, asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /
S04bsu016_u:699_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
S04bsu016_u:699_1: pravekṣyāmi / atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:699_2: tasya dvāraṃ vivṛtamabhūt / sa āha - praviśa kulaputra etatkūṭāgāram /
S04bsu016_u:699_3: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:699_5_0: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ samantādākāśadhātuvipulam asaṃkhyeyacchatradhvajapatākālaṃkāram
S04bsu016_u:699_10: te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:700_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya idamevaṃrūpamacintyaviṣayavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā
S04bsu016_u:700_0_3: sarvadiksrotobhimukhena kāyapraśamena sarvārambaṇānāvaraṇasaṃpreṣitacakṣuḥ sarvatrānugatena abhinirhārabalena sarvaśarīreṇa
S04bsu016_u:701_0: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:701_2: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
