S04bsu016_u:701_3_0: yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate
S04bsu016_u:701_4: tatsarvamadrākṣīt, saṃjānīte anusarati / yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:701_5: tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:702_0: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:702_1: yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:702_2: kvacidyatra caryāḥ cīrṇāḥ, kvacidyatra pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:702_3: kvacidyatra kṣāntiravatīrṇā, kvacidyatra bhūmiravakrāntā, kvacidyatra buddhakṣetravyūhāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:702_7: yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:702_8: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:702_19: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:702_21: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:702_22: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:702_24_1: kvacitkūṭāgāre brahmendraparṣadi maitreyaṃ bodhisattva mahābrahmabhūtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:702_29: kvacidyāvaddaśabhūmisthitairbodhisattvaiḥ saha maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvabhūmivaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:702_30_2: kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ caṃkramābhiyuktaṃ sabhāgacaritairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ lokahitakriyārthaṃ vividhaśilpaśānaśāstraviśeṣāṃ
S04bsu016_u:703_5_0: keṣāṃcitsarvaromamukhebhyo vividhāni dharmamukhāni niścaramāṇānyaśrauṣīt - yaduta bodhisattvaguṇavarṇamukhāni dānapāramitāmukhāni
S04bsu016_u:703_7_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ kṣetravimātratāṃ kalpavimātratāṃ
S04bsu016_u:704_0: madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:704_2: tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:704_3: sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:704_4_0: śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadantaṃ sarvakumārabhūmiṃ
S04bsu016_u:704_4_1: saṃdarśayamānaṃ antaḥpuramadhye gatamudyānabhūmiṃ niṣkrāntaṃ sarvajñatābhimukhamabhiniṣkramya pravrajantaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ
S04bsu016_u:704_4_2: saṃdarśayantamāhāraṃ paribhuñjānaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāntaṃ māraṃ dharṣayamāṇaṃ bodhiṃ vibudhyamānaṃ bodhivṛkṣamanimiṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:704_4_3: nirīkṣamāṇaṃ mahābrahmaṇādhyeṣyamāṇaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānaṃ devabhavaneṣu praviśantamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:704_6: sarvatra ca tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:705_0_0: sa sarvaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu sarvakriyāsaṃdarśaneṣu sarvāyuḥpramāṇavimātratāsu asaṃpramuṣitena smṛtyadhiṣṭhānajñānena sarvasaṃjñāgatavyavasitāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:705_0_1: jñānabhūmau sthito yāvanti teṣu sarvakūṭāgāreṣu [Gv_411] ghaṇṭākiṅkiṇījālatūryasaṃgītiprabhṛtīnyārambaṇāni sattvebhyastebhyo
S04bsu016_u:705_2_0: kvacitsarvajñatāprasthānaśabdamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmin lokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo bodhicittamutpādayati amukaṃ dharmamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:705_2_1: śrutvā amukena kalyāṇamitreṇa samādāpito 'mukasya tathāgatasya pādamūle evaṃnāmni kalpe īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛkparṣanmadhyagate
S04bsu016_u:705_2_2: īdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlamūlamavaropya īdṛśāṃstathāgataguṇān śrutvā īdṛśenādhyāśayena īdṛśyā praṇidhānavimātratayā /
S04bsu016_u:705_3: iyataḥ kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā iyadbhiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu016_u:705_6: tasya parinirvṛtasya iyataḥ kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
S04bsu016_u:705_7: iyān samartho bhaviṣyati / kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carannīdṛśāni duṣkaraparityāgaśatāni karoti /
S04bsu016_u:705_9: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati, vīryamālabhate, dhyānāni samāpadyate prajñāvicayaprayuktaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:705_12: agniprapatanaṃ karoti / amuko nāma bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataśāsanamabhyudgato dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:705_14: saddharmakośamārakṣati / kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma tathāgata etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:705_15: dharmaṃ ca deśayati evaṃnāmnābhiṣekeṇa īdṛśyāṃ parṣadi īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛśe kalpe īdṛśenāyuḥpramāṇena īdṛśyā dharmadeśanayā īdṛśena sattvavinayena īdṛkpraṇidhyabhisaṃbodhena /
S04bsu016_u:705_17: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ nirghoṣāṇāṃ śraveṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vipulaprītivegābhiṣyandita cittastāni dharmamukhāni śṛṇoti /
S04bsu016_u:705_19_0: kvacitpraṇidhānamukhāni, kvacitkṣāntimukhāni, kvaciccaryāmukhāni, kvacitpraṇidhānamukhāni, kvacitpāramitāmukhāni, kvacidabhijñāmukhāni,
S04bsu016_u:706_2: teṣu ca caṃkrameṣu niṣadya svāsaneṣu ca asaṃkhyeyān bodhisattvān nānākāryaprayuktānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:706_3_0: kāṃściccaṃkramyamāṇān kāṃścidvyāyacchataḥ kāṃścidvipaśyataḥ kāṃścinmahākaruṇayā spharamāṇān kāṃścidvividhān śāstranayān lokārthasaṃprayuktānabhinirharamāṇān
S04bsu016_u:707_1_0: kvacinnīlavarṇāni kvacitpītavarṇāni kvacillohitavarṇāni kvacidavadātavarṇāni kvacitsphaṭikavarṇāni kvacittapanīyavarṇāni
S04bsu016_u:707_3: mālyadāmapāṇīn chatradhvajapatākāpāṇīn gandhadhūpavilepanapāṇīn vividharatnavicitrasuvarṇasūtrapāṇīn vividhamuktāhārapāṇīn nānāratnahārapāṇīn sarvavyūhaparigṛhītapāṇīn /
S04bsu016_u:707_12_0: yaduta strīrūpān puruṣarūpān dārakarūpān dārikārūpān śakrarūpān brahmarūpān lokapālarūpān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragarūpān
S04bsu016_u:708_6_3: namasyataḥ kāṃścidabhiṣṭuvataḥ kāṃścitsamāpannān kāṃścitsuvarṇavarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścidrūpyavarṇāvabhāsān kāṃścittuṣārasukumāravarṇāvabhāsān
S04bsu016_u:709_1: teṣu ca sarvaratnāṣṭāpadeṣu maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvacaryākramamapaśyat yathā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāścaryāmacaran /
S04bsu016_u:709_3_1: kvacijjihvāpradānaṃ kacitkarṇanāsāpradānaṃ kvaciddhṛdayapradānaṃ kvacinmajjamāṃsapradānaṃ kvacidrudhirapradānaṃ kvacicchavicarmapradānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_6: kvacitsarvopāśrayapradānaṃ kvacidratnakāṃsyapātrīpradānaṃ kvacidvararathapradānaṃ kvacidbandhanāgāragatān vimokṣayantaṃ kvacidvadhyān
S04bsu016_u:709_3_7: nirmokṣayantaṃ kvacidbālāṃścikitsamānaṃ kvacitpranaṣṭamārgāṇāṃ mārgamupadarśayantaṃ kvaciddāśabhūtaṃ nadīpathe nāvaṃ vāhayamānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_8: kvacidbālāhāśvarājabhūtaṃ mahāsamudre rākṣasīdvīpagatān sattvān paritrāyamāṇaṃ kvacinmaharṣibhūtaṃ śāstrāṇyabhinirharamāṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_9: kvaciccakravartibhūtaṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānaṃ kvacidvaidyabhūtamāturāṇāṃ cikitsāṃ prayojayamānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_10: kvacinmātāpitaramupatiṣṭhantaṃ kvacitkalyāṇamitrāṇi śuśrūṣantaṃ kvacicchrāvakavarṇarūpeṇa sattvavinayena prayuktaṃ kvacitpratyekabuddhavarṇarūpeṇa
S04bsu016_u:709_3_12: sattvān paripācayamānaṃ kvaciddharmabhāṇakarūpeṇa tathāgataśāsanopagatamuddiśantaṃ svādhyāyamānaṃ yoniśomīmāṃsāprayuktaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_13: tathāgatacaityānyalaṃkurvāṇaṃ tathāgatavigrahān [Gv_414] kārayamāṇaṃ buddhapūjāyāṃ sattvān samādāpayamānaṃ gandhānulepanapradānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:709_3_15: pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu aṣṭāṅgapoṣadheṣu buddhadharmasaṃghaśaraṇagamaneṣu pravrajyāyāṃ dharmaśravaṇe uddeśasvādhyāyayoniśomanasikāreṣu
S04bsu016_u:709_7: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre yāvanti maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrāṇi paryupāsitāni teṣāṃ vikurvitavyūhānadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:709_8: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalyāṇamitreṣu upasaṃkrāntamābhāṣyamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma - ehi sudhana svāgatam /
S04bsu016_u:710_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastata ekaikasmātkūṭāgārādekaikasmādārambaṇādimāni ca anyāni ca avicintyavyūhaviṣayavikurvitānyadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:710_1_0: asaṃpramuṣitena smṛtibalādhānena samantadigvyavacāritayā cakṣuḥpariśuddhyā anāvaraṇena vipaśyanākauśalyajñānena bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānavaśitāpratilambhena
S04bsu016_u:710_3_0: tadyathā puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato vividhān rūpārambaṇaviśeṣān paśyet yaduta gṛhavimānaramaṇīyāni vā grāmanagaranigamajanapadaramaṇīyāni
S04bsu016_u:710_4: udyānārāmatapovanaramaṇīyāni vā vṛkṣanadīpuṣkiriṇīparvataramaṇīyāni vā mātāpitṛmitrajñātisālohitasamavadhānagataṃ vā ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:710_5: mahāsamudraṃ vā paśyet sumeruṃ vā parvatarājānaṃ sarvadevabhavanāni vā jambudvīpaṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:710_7: tacca gṛhaṃ vā avacarakaṃ vā vipulaṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:710_9: na rātridīrghaṃ ca saṃjānīte na hrasvam,
S04bsu016_u:710_10: na svapna iti saṃjānīte / sukhopasthānaṃ cātmanaḥ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:710_11: sa prasrabdhakāyasaṃskāro vigatastyānamiddhaḥ sarvaratyapakarṣito vipulaprītisukhasaṃvedī dīrghaṃ ca vipulaṃ ca saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:710_12: divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā tato vā uttari saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:710_14_0: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānena sarvatraidhātukasvapnasamavasaraṇajñānena parīttasaṃjñāgataniruddhacetā
S04bsu016_u:710_16: tadyathā glānaḥ puruṣaścarame cittotpāde vartamāna upapatyānantaryacitte pratyupasthite karmabhave āmukhībhūte yathākṛtakarmopacayavipākena aśubhakarmapratyayena narakaṃ vā paśyet,
S04bsu016_u:710_17: tiryagyoniṃ vā pretaviṣayaṃ vā yamapuruṣān vā dṛḍhapraharaṇagṛhītān ruṣitānākrośato ruditākrośitaśabdaṃ ca nārakāṇāṃ śruṇuyāt /
S04bsu016_u:710_18: tāṃ ca kṣāranadīṃ paśyet, tāṃśca kṣuradhārāparvatān, tāṃ ca kūṭāśālmalīm, tacca asipatravanaṃ paśyet / tāṃśca mahānarakānādīptān [Gv_415] saṃprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān,
S04bsu016_u:710_19: tāśca lohakumbhīḥ paśyet, tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān, tāṃśca vedanāmanubhūyamānān saṃjānīt /
S04bsu016_u:710_24: tadāyuḥkālaṃ ca saṃjānīyāt - itaścyutastatra vopapanno 'nantarhita eva karmaviṣayācintyatayā etāṃ kriyāṃ paśyet saṃjānīta anubhavet /
S04bsu016_u:710_26: tadyathā bhūtagrahāviṣṭaḥ puruṣo vividhāni rupagatāni paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:710_27: yacca paripṛcchate, tadvyākaroti / evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānabalena tān sarvavyūhānadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:710_28: tadyathā nāgabhavanapraviṣṭaḥ puruṣo nāgasaṃjñāgatapraveśena divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃjānīte,
S04bsu016_u:710_30: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvasaṃjñāgatānusmṛtabuddhistanmaitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānavaśena tanmuhūrtaṃ bahūni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:710_33_0: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhānanyonyāsaṃkīrṇān sarvārambaṇeṣu pratibhāsaprāptaḥ tadyathā kṛtsnāyatanasamāpattivihārī
S04bsu016_u:710_33_1: bhikṣureko 'dvitīyaḥ śayane vā caṃkrame vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā yathākṛtsnasamāpattiviṣayāvatāreṇa sarvalokaṃ
S04bsu016_u:710_34: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhān yathāviṣayāvatāreṇa paśyati saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:710_37: tadyathā yakṣavimānapraviṣṭāni manuṣyavimānāni yakṣavimānāntargatānyanyonyāsaṃbhinnāni yathākāmaviṣayapariśuddhyā saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:710_38: tadyathā mahāsamudre sarvasya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ pratibhāsasamudrāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:710_39: tadyathā māyākāro mantravidyauṣadhibalādhiṣṭhānena sarvarūpagatāni sarvakriyāśca saṃpaśyati /
S04bsu016_u:710_40_0: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasyādhiṣṭhānajñānamāyācintyapradeśena tāni sarvavyūhavikurvitānyadrākṣīt
S04bsu016_u:711_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvastatkūṭāgāraṃ praviśya tadadhiṣṭhānamavasṛjya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā etadavocata - uttiṣṭha kulaputra /
S04bsu016_u:711_1: eṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā / aviṣṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ kulaputra sarvadharmā bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_3: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tenācchaṭāśabdena tataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_4_0: taṃ maitreyo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭā te kulaputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānavikurvāḥ? dṛṣṭāste bodhisattvasaṃbhārabalaniṣyandāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:711_4_1: dṛṣṭā te bodhisattvapraṇidhijñānaviṭhapanā? dṛṣṭāste bodhisattvacaryāsamudāgamāḥ? śrutaṃ te bodhisattvaniryāṇamukham? dṛṣṭā
S04bsu016_u:711_4_2: te buddhakṣetravyūhāpramāṇatā? dṛṣṭā [Gv_416] te tathāgatapraṇidhivaiśāradyavaiśeṣikatā? anugatā te bodhisattvavimokṣācintyatā?
S04bsu016_u:711_4_3: anubhūtaṃ te bodhisattvasamādhiprītimukham? sudhana āha - dṛṣṭamārya kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhānena kalyāṇamitraprabhāveṇa /
S04bsu016_u:711_5: api tu khalu ārya ko nāmaiṣa vimokṣaḥ? maitreya āha - sarvatryadhvārambaṇajñānapraveśāsaṃmoṣasmṛtivyūhagarbho nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_7: sudhana āha - kva asau ārya vyūho gataḥ? maitreyo bodhisattva āha - yata evāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_8: sudhana āha - kuta āgataḥ? maitreyo bodhisattva āha - bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānābhinirhārādāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_10: na kvacidgato nāgato na rāśībhūto na saṃcayabhūto na kūṭastho na bhāvastho na bhāvasthito na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_11: tadyathā kulaputra nāgānāṃ meghajālaṃ na kāyena cittena abhyantarībhūtaṃ na saṃcayasthitaṃ na saṃdṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:711_13: evameva kulaputra te vyūhā nādhyātmagatā na bahirdhāgatā na ca na saṃdṛśyante,
S04bsu016_u:711_14_0: bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānavaśena, tava ca subhājanatayā / tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya sarvamāyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya
S04bsu016_u:711_14_1: māyā na kutaścidāgacchanti na vigacchanti na kvacitsaṃkrāntim,
S04bsu016_u:711_16: evameva kulaputrate vyūhā na kvacidgatā na kutaścidāgatā na kvacidrāśībhūtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:711_20: / anavekṣāniketagatiḥ / akarmavipākagatiḥ / anutpādānirodhagatiḥ / anucchedāśāśvatagatiḥ / api tu kulaputra mahākaruṇāgatirbodhisattvānāṃ vineyasattvāvekṣaṇatayā,
S04bsu016_u:712_1: ahamasmin kulaputra āgacchāmi janmabhūmermāladebhyo janapadebhyaḥ kuṭigrāmakāt /
S04bsu016_u:712_3: taṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya janmabhūmakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ yathābhājanatayā dharmaṃ deśayitvā mātāpitṛjñātisaṃbandhinaśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn mahāyāne samādāpya /
S04bsu016_u:712_4: sudhana āha - katamā ārya bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmiḥ? āha - daśemāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmayaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:712_5: katamā daśa? yaduta bodhicittotpādo bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:713_1: upāyakauśalyaṃ pitā, dānapāramitā stanyam, śīlapāramitā dhātrī, kṣāntīpāramitā bhūṣaṇālaṃkāraḥ,
S04bsu016_u:713_2: vīryapāramitā saṃvardhikā, dhyānapāramitā caryāviśuddhiḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi śikṣācaryaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:713_3: sarvabodhyaṅgāni sahāyāḥ, sarvabodhisattvā bhrātaraḥ bodhicittaṃ kulam,
S04bsu016_u:713_9: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisattvo 'tikrānto bhavati bālapṛthagjanabhūmim /
S04bsu016_u:713_18: adoṣaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
S04bsu016_u:714_0: evaṃ kulajātisamṛddhāśca kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ pratibhāsāyatanasarvadharmaparijñātatvānna vijugupsante sarvalokopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:714_11_0: so 'haṃ kulaputra sarvalokadhātūpapattyantargatena kāyena sarvajagadrūpasamairbalaviśeṣaiḥ sarvasattvopamairniruktisaṃbhedaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:714_14_1: spharitvā pūrvasabhāgacaritānāṃ sattvānāṃ pranaṣṭabodhicittānāṃ paripācanārthaṃ jambudvīpe ca janmopapattisaṃdarśanārthamiha
S04bsu016_u:714_14_2: dakṣiṇāpathe māladeṣu janapadeṣu kūṭāgrāmake brāhmaṇakuleṣūpapannānāṃ mātṛpitṛjñātisaṃbandhināṃ vinayārthaṃ brāhmaṇakulajātiviśeṣeṇa
S04bsu016_u:714_15: so 'haṃ kulaputra iha dakṣiṇāpathe anenopāyena yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāvineyānāṃ paripākavinayaṃ kurvan ihaiva vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhe kūṭāgāre [Gv_418] prativasāmi /
S04bsu016_u:714_16: itaścāhaṃ cyutaḥ tuṣitabhavane upapattiṃ saṃdarśayiṣyāmi yathāśaye sattvānuvartanatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:714_26: bodhiprāptaṃ ca māṃ kulaputra tvaṃ punarapi drakṣyasi sārdhaṃ mañjuśriyā kalyāṇamitreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:715_0: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra - gaccha tvaṃ tameva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam /
S04bsu016_u:715_1: upasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:715_3_0: kathamabhinirhartavyam, kathaṃ praṇidhātavyam, kathaṃ vipulīkartavyam, kathamanusartavyam, kathaṃ paryadātavyam, kathaṃ praveṣṭavyam,
S04bsu016_u:715_3_1: kathaṃ paripūrayitavyam, sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitra saṃdarśayiṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:715_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa kulaputra bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ praṇidhānaviśeṣaḥ saṃvidyate yo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya /
S04bsu016_u:715_6: apramāṇo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya praṇidhānābhinirhāraḥ apratiprasrabdho mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya sarvabodhisattvaguṇaviśeṣābhinirhāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:715_17: tathāgatakule saṃvardhakaḥ, sarvakuśalamūlānutthāpakaḥ, bodhisaṃbhārāṇāṃ darśakaḥ, bhūtakalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ samādāpakaḥ sarvaguṇeṣu avatārakaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:715_22: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ kulaputra mañjuśrīpādamūlagataḥ eva mā parīttamanamutpādaya,
S04bsu016_u:715_24: tatkasya hetoḥ? yāvanti tvayā sudhana kalyāṇamitrāṇi dṛṣṭāni,
S04bsu016_u:716_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya pādau śirāsābhivandya maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:716_0_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya maitreyasya bodhisattvasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:718_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako daśottaraṃ nagaraśatamaṭitvā sumanāmukhadikpratyuddeśaṃ gatvā atiṣṭhat mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:718_0_1: cintayan anuvilokayan mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya darśanamabhilaṣan prārthayamānaḥ samavadhānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:718_1_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto daśottarādyojanaśatātpāṇiṃ prasārya sumanāmukhanagarasthitasyaiva sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:718_1_1: mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra na śakyaṃ śraddhendriyavirahitaiḥ khinnacittaiḥ līnacittairanabhyastaprayogaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:718_2: eṣa nayaḥ eṣa gocaraḥ eṣa vihāro jñātuṃ vā avagāhayituṃ vā avatarituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā kalpayituṃ vā pratyavagantuṃ vā pratilabdhuṃ vā iti /
S04bsu016_u:719_0_0: sa taṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣayitvā asaṃkhyeyadharmamukhasamanvāgataṃ kṛtvā anantajñānamahāvabhāsaprāptaṃ
S04bsu016_u:721_1_0: samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā bodhicaryāṃ śrutvā praṇidhānaviśeṣaṃ ca śrutvā saṃbhārasaṃbhavaprasthānapratiṣṭhitaviśeṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:721_1_1: ca śrutvā abhinirhāraniryāṇapathaviśeṣaṃ ca śrutvā samantabhadrabhūmyācāravicāraṃ ca śrutvā bhūmisaṃbhāraṃ ca śrutvā lambhaviśeṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:721_1_2: ca śrutvā bhūmipratilambhavegaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmyākramaṇaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmipratiṣṭhānaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmiparākramavikramaṃ ca
S04bsu016_u:721_1_3: śrutvā bhūmigauravaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmyadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmisaṃvāsaṃ ca śrutvā samantabhadrabodhisattvadarśanaparitṛṣitastasminneva
S04bsu016_u:721_1_4: vajrasāgaragarbhabodhimaṇḍe tathāgatasiṃhāsanābhimukhaḥ sarvaratnagarbhapadmāsananiṣaṇṇaḥ ākāśadhātuvipulena cittena sarvābhiniveśoccalitena,
S04bsu016_u:721_12_0: evaṃ cittamanasikāraprayuktasya khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya pūrvakuśalamūlābhiṣyanditasarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena
S04bsu016_u:721_12_1: ca samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlasabhāgatayā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanāya daśa pūrvanimittāni
S04bsu016_u:721_13: katamāni daśa? yaduta sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi [Gv_421] viśudhyanti sma sarvatathāgatabodhimaṇḍālaṃkāraviśuddhyā /
S04bsu016_u:721_24: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurabhavan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanāya /
S04bsu016_u:722_0: apare daśa mahāvabhāsāḥ prādurabhavan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanapūrvanimittam /
S04bsu016_u:722_1: katame daśa? yaduta sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi sarvatathāgatajālāni vidyotayanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_2: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvabuddhaprabhāmaṇḍalameghā niścarya anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_3: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvaratnameghāḥ sarvatathāgatapratibhāsavijñapanānniścaritvā sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_4: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvatathāgatārciścakramaṇḍalameghā niścaritvā sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_6: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvacandrasūryajyotirmeghā niścaritvā samantabhadrabodhisattvaprabhāṃ pramuñcamānāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_7: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvasattvakāyasaṃsthānapradīpameghā niścaritvā buddharaśmivatprabhāsamānāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_8: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvatathāgatakāyapratibhāsamaṇiratnavigrahameghā niścaritvā daśasu dikṣu sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_10_1: sarvasattvanirmāṇakāryaprayogāḥ sarvasattvasarvābhiprāyaparipūriniṣpādanā niścaritvā sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:722_11: ime daśa mahāvabhāsāḥ prādurabhūvan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanapūrvanimittam /
S04bsu016_u:723_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka imān daśa pūrvanimittāvabhāsān dṛṣṭvā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanāvakāśapratilabdhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:723_0_9: samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane
S04bsu016_u:723_1_0: sa tasya sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamān raśmimeghānniścaritvā dharmadhātuparamākāśadhātuparyavasānān
S04bsu016_u:723_2: sa tasya kāyāt sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān prabhāmaṇḍalameghānniścaritvā nānāvarṇān sarvabodhisattvānudāraprītiprāmodyavegān vivardhayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_3: mūrdhatoṃ 'sakūṭābhyāṃ sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇān gandhārcimeghānniścārya sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalāni spharitvā abhipravarṣamāṇānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_9_1: sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā visphuṭaratnadrumameghālaṃkārālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvā sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalāni mahāratnavarṣairabhipravarṣamāṇānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_10: sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromavivarātsarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān rūpadhātudevanikāyameghānniścārya bodhisattvaṃ saṃvarṇayataḥ sarvalokadhātuṃ spharamāṇānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_13_1: ākāśadhātuparyavasānaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā alayanānāmatrāṇānāmapratiśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanatrāṇapratiśaraṇabhūtānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_14_1: ākāśadhātuparyavasānaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā udārādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye vartamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_15_1: ākāśadhātuparyavasānaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye saṃvartamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_16_1: ākāśadhātuparyavasānaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā ekāntasaṃkliṣṭānāṃ viśuddhaye saṃvartamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:723_17_1: ākāśadhātuparyavasānaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā sarvasattvacaryāmanuvartamānānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:724_0_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya idamṛddhiviṣayavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ
S04bsu016_u:724_0_1: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyan adrākṣīt samantabhadrasya
S04bsu016_u:724_0_2: bodhisattvasya ekaikasmādaṅgādekaikāṅgavibhaktitaḥ ekaikasmāccharīrāvayavāt ekaikasyāḥ śarīrāvayavavibhakteḥ ekaikasmādaṅgapradeśāt
S04bsu016_u:724_0_4: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ savāyuskandhaṃ sapṛthivīskandhaṃ satejaḥskandhaṃ sasāgaraṃ sadvīpaṃ sanadīkaṃ saratnaparvataṃ
S04bsu016_u:724_0_5: sasumeruṃ sacakravālaṃ sagrāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhāniṃ savanaṃ sabhavanaṃ sajanakāyaṃ sanarakalokaṃ satiryagyonilokaṃ
S04bsu016_u:724_0_6: sayamalokaṃ sāsuralokaṃ sanāgalokaṃ sagaruḍalokaṃ samanujalokaṃ sadevalokaṃ sabrahmalokaṃ sakāmadhātuviṣayaṃ sārūpyadhātuviṣayaṃ
S04bsu016_u:724_0_7: sādhiṣṭhānaṃ sapratiṣṭhānaṃ sasaṃsthānaṃ sameghaṃ savidyutaṃ sajyotiṣaṃ sarātriṃdivasārdhamāsaṃ samāsartuṃ sasaṃvatsaraṃ
S04bsu016_u:724_1: yathā cemaṃ lokadhātum, evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sarvalokadhātūnadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:724_2_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadhaḥ
S04bsu016_u:724_2_1: ūrdhvaṃ samantātsarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātūnadrākṣīt pratibhāsayogena sarvabuddhotpādān sabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalān sasattvān,
S04bsu016_u:724_3_0: yāśceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ tā api sarvāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya ekasmānmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇādadrākṣīt
S04bsu016_u:724_3_1: sarvabuddhotpādāḥ sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāḥ sasattvāḥ sabhavanāḥ sarātriṃdivāḥ sakalpāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:724_5: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparā adrākṣīt,
S04bsu016_u:724_6_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyādekaikasmānmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇādekaikasmādromavivarādadrākṣīt
S04bsu016_u:724_7: yathā ca samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇamadrākṣīt etadvikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānam,
S04bsu016_u:724_8: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhagavato bhadraśriyastathāgatasya padmaśriyāṃ lokadhātāvetadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:724_9: yathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi, evaṃ samantātsarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva
S04bsu016_u:724_11: yathā ca daśasu dikṣu, evaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:724_12_0: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi dharmadhātuvipuleṣu buddhadharmaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu
S04bsu016_u:724_15_0: sarvasattvarutāni ca sarvabuddhāghoṣāṃśca sarvatathāgatadharmacakrapravartanāni ca sarvānuśāsanyādeśanaprātihāryāṇi ca sarvabodhisattvasamudāgamāṃśca
S04bsu016_u:725_0: sa tadacintyaṃ samantabhadramahābodhisattvavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca daśa jñānapāramitāvihārān pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:725_12: tasyaivaṃ jñānapāramitāvihārasamanvāgatasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadrao bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:725_13: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mūrdhni pāṇiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:725_24: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagataḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya murdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu016_u:725_25: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:725_26_0: evaṃ samantāt sarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajontargateṣvapi sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ
S04bsu016_u:725_26_1: samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:725_27: yathā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagatena samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena pāṇinā spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:725_28: dharmamukhānyavakrāntāni, evaṃ sarvasamantabhadrātmabhāvaprasṛtaiḥ pāṇimeghaiḥ spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya dharmamukhānyavakrāntānyabhūvan nānānayaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:726_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra mama vikurvitam? āha - dṛṣṭamārya /
S04bsu016_u:726_1: api tu tathāgataḥ prajānan prajānīyāttāvadacintyamidaṃ vikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:726_2: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān vicaritaḥ sarvajñatācittamabhilaṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:726_4: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe sarvatyāgasamāyuktāḥ sarvalokavighuṣṭā mahāyajñā yaṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:726_15: karṇanāsāḥ parityaktāḥ / cakṣūṃṣi parityaktāni / svamukhebhyo jihvendriyāṇi parityaktāni buddhajñānāvekṣayā kāyajīvitanirapekṣeṇa /
S04bsu016_u:726_19: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe 'nabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ parameśvarabhūtena satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:726_21: teṣāṃ ca asmiṃstathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā sarvabuddhānuśāsanīṣu pratipannaḥ śāsanaṃ ca me teṣāṃ saṃdhāritam /
S04bsu016_u:727_0: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrerekacittotpādamapi tathāgaśāsane vilopamutpādayituṃ nābhijānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:727_1_0: tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrairekacittotpādamapi pratighasahagatamutpādayitumātmagrahacittaṃ vā ātmagrahaparigrahacittaṃ vā ātmaparanānātvacittaṃ
S04bsu016_u:727_1_1: vā bodhimārgavipravāsacittaṃ vā saṃsārasaṃvāsaparikhedacittaṃ vā avalīnacittaṃ vā āvaraṇasaṃmohacittaṃ vā utpādayitumanyatra
S04bsu016_u:727_2: iti hi kulaputra sarvakalpasāgarāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuḥ tānnirdiśato ye mama pūrvayogasaṃbuddhakṣetrapariśuddhiprayogāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:727_8: tāvadbhyo me kulaputra dharmasamudrebhyo na kiṃcidekapadavyañjanamapi yanna cakravartirājyaparityāgena krītam,
S04bsu016_u:727_9_0: yannāsti sarvāstiparityāgena krītaṃ sarvasattvaparitrāṇaprayuktena svasaṃtaticittanidhyaptiprayuktena abhimukhaparadharmasaṃprāpaṇaprayuktena
S04bsu016_u:728_0_0: tena mayā kulaputra anena evaṃrūpeṇa saṃbhārabalena mūlahetūpacayabalena udārādhimuktibalena guṇapratipattibalena sarvadharmayathāvannidhyaptibalena
S04bsu016_u:728_0_1: prajñācakṣurbalena tathāgatādhiṣṭhānabalena mahāpraṇidhānabalena mahākaruṇābalena supariśodhitābhijñābalena kalyāṇamitraparigrahabalena
S04bsu016_u:728_1_0: anuttaraśca rūpakāyaḥ pariśodhitaḥ [Gv_427] sarvalokābhudgataḥ sarvajagadyathāśayavijñapanaḥ sarvatrānugataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraprasṛtaḥ
S04bsu016_u:728_3: nāhaṃ kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇapathamapyāgacchāmi prāgeva darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:728_4: santi kulaputra sattvāḥ, ye mama nāmadheyaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:728_5_0: santi darśanamātreṇa, santi sparśanamātreṇa, santyanuvrajanamātreṇa, santyanubandhanamātreṇa, santi svapnadarśanena, santi
S04bsu016_u:728_7_0: kecidardhamāsaṃ kecinmāsaṃ kecidvarṣaṃ kecidvarṣaśataṃ kecitkalpaṃ kecitkalpaśataṃ kecidyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:728_13: iti hi kulaputra buddhākṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairupāyaiḥ sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:728_14: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā mama buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:729_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyannadrākṣīt ekaikasmin romavivare 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrasāgarān buddhotpādaparipūrṇān /
S04bsu016_u:729_2: sarvāṃśca tān kṣetrasāgarān nānāpratiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvyūhān nānācakravālān nānāmeghagaganasaṃchannān nānābuddhotpādān nānādharmacakranirghoṣānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:729_4: tathā anavaśeṣataḥ sarvaromavivareṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:729_5_0: ekaikasmiṃśca kṣetrasāgarān sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhakāyanirmitameghānnirgamya daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūn
S04bsu016_u:730_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvāvavādānuśāsanyanuśiṣṭaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvakāyāntargateṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvavatīrya sattvān paripācayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:730_1: ye ca khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamakalyāṇamitropasaṃkramadarśanaparyupāsanajñānālokakuśalamūlopacayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:730_2: te samantabhadrabodhisattvasahadarśanena kuśalamūlopacayasya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
S04bsu016_u:730_4: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamante saprathamacittotpādāya yāvatsamantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:730_6_1: pareṇa aparāntakoṭīgatakalpādhiṣṭhānalokadhātuṃ pareṇa vikrameṇa paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:730_11: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma,
S04bsu016_u:731_0_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:731_0_1: kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
S04bsu016_u:732_0: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_1: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:732_8: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:732_10: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:732_13: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:732_15: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:732_16: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:732_17: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:732_18: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:732_19: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_20: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:732_25: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:732_26: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
S04bsu016_u:732_27: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:732_28: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_30: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_31: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:732_32: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
S04bsu016_u:732_33: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:732_37: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:732_38: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
S04bsu016_u:732_40: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:732_41: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
S04bsu016_u:732_42: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:732_43: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_44: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:732_46: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:732_47: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
S04bsu016_u:732_48: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:732_49: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_50: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:732_51: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
S04bsu016_u:732_52: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:732_54: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:732_56: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_58: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
S04bsu016_u:732_59: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:732_66: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
S04bsu016_u:732_67: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:732_68: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
S04bsu016_u:732_69: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
S04bsu016_u:732_73: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:732_74: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:732_86: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:732_88: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_89: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:732_91: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:732_93: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
S04bsu016_u:732_94: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
S04bsu016_u:732_95: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
S04bsu016_u:732_96: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:732_97: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:732_98: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
S04bsu016_u:732_99: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
S04bsu016_u:732_102: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_103: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
S04bsu016_u:732_105: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
S04bsu016_u:732_106: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
S04bsu016_u:732_107: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
S04bsu016_u:732_108: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
S04bsu016_u:732_109: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_111: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
S04bsu016_u:732_112: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:732_113: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
S04bsu016_u:732_114: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
S04bsu016_u:732_115: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:732_116: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
S04bsu016_u:732_118: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
S04bsu016_u:732_119: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
S04bsu016_u:732_120: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:732_122: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
S04bsu016_u:732_123: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:732_124: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:732_125: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:732_127: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:732_128: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
S04bsu016_u:732_129: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:733_4: te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:733_6: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat, sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S04bsu016_u:735_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu016_u:735_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
